name: Narrator
line: (Breeze) (Meow)

name: Akira
line: It's so windy tonight.... Maybe that's why all the cats won't stop meowing. I managed to buy some canned cat food for cheap, so I should drop by the old cat lady's house on the way back. Kuro and Hanako get tuna; Tama gets some chicken, and Tora gets salmon. And senior food for Grandpa Tails. The old cat lady lets me take care of them every now and then because we live close by. Each cat is so cute and unique. Oh, that's right. The old cat lady mentioned something like this.... Mysterious things happen on nights when the wind is strong, the cats are on edge, and the full moon shines bright in the sky.

name: Narrator
line: (Footsteps)

name: Akira
line: Woah.... What a huge full moon.... It looks even brighter than usual. It's so big and bright, I can probably get a nice picture just with my phone camera. Focus and.... Got it.

name: Narrator
line: (Snap)

name: Narrator
line: Once I get a picture of the moon, I head to my apartment's elevator while gazing at my phone. I press the elevator button, wait for it to arrive, and step through the open doors.

name: Narrator
line: (Elevator doors closing)

name: Akira
line: Oh. I got a really clear picture of the moon. I'll show it to the old cat lady when I drop by with the canned cat food. ....Huh? Something seems off.

name: Narrator
line: I look up from my smartphone, and my eyes widen in surprise. This doesn't look like the elevator in my apartment complex.

name: Narrator
line: (Elevator sounds)

name: Narrator
line: Thump, clatter. The echoing sounds are also unfamiliar.

name: Akira
line: What's going on...? Was the building undergoing renovations....?
Hello.

name: Narrator
line: I can't believe my eyes. A hat floats in mid-air - and it's speaking to me.
Welcome, Sir Sage. Let me escort you to this elevator's destination. I am Murr, a Western wizard. Our destination is a world splintered by the < Great Catastrophe >.

name: Murr
line: It's an honor to meet you, my beloved Sir Sage.

name: Akira
line: Woah....!?

name: Narrator
line: A gracious gentleman appears underneath the hat. He pays no attention to my exclamation of surprise, and continues speaking.

name: Murr
line: I may soon drag you into a rather cumbersome situation, Sir Sage. Now, there are many cumbersome things in this world. Take, for example, love affairs, prestige, war, family, friends, revenge, repayment.... But this time, the most cumbersome problem of all awaits us! Saving the world - we would like to ask you for your assistance in this matter.

name: Akira
line: .....Wh.... What's going on.... Am I dreaming.....?

name: Narrator
line: The young man named Murr smiles in response to my bewilderment.

name: Murr
line: We'll be arriving soon. Both the world and I have been torn apart quite terribly, and... You will probably be sorely disappointed in me. But if we could become friends nonetheless - I would be very happy. Oh, brilliant Sage. I have yearned to meet you for so, so long. Truth be told, I don't care about the world at all. Acts of charity are a pain, after all. But..... I want you to discover the truth about this world.

name: Narrator
line: When Murr disappears, the elevator stops.

name: Narrator
line: (Ding)

name: Narrator
line: Slowly, the doors open.....

name: Man with a fancy beard
line: Sir Sage....!

name: Man with a fancy beard
line: The Sage has arrived! The wizards' summoning ritual was a success!

name: Soldier
line: Cheers for the Sage!

name: Soldier
line: Cheers!

name: Akira
line: Huh!? What's going on!?

name: Man with a fancy beard
line: Now, now, this way, Sir Sage. Thank you for coming to us. My name is Drummond. I am Central Country's Minister of Magical Affairs.

name: Meek-looking man
line: Erm, I'm Cock Robin, the secretary of Central Country.

name: Drummond
line: This way, Sir Sage! Let me escort you to the Central castle before those pesky wizards arrive!

name: Akira
line: Huh!? Um, please wait a second. What are you all doing? Is this a prank? Or some new kind of VR experience?

name: Drummond
line: We were waiting for you, Sir Sage! You are going to battle the < Great Catastrophe > and save the world.

name: Akira
line: Battle what and save the world!? Is my apartment complex doing some kind of game collaboration? Maybe there's a camera hiding somewhere..... I really can't have this, you know......

name: Drummond
line: Do not fear! There's nothing dangerous about this. The pesky wizards are the ones who will be fighting!

name: Akira
line: Wizards?

name: Drummond
line: Yes. But they're a rowdy bunch who never listen to our commands - much like cats. For some reason, they historically only listen to the sage who arrives from another world.

name: Narrator
line: (Footsteps)

name: Soldier
line: Sir Drummond! We have news....

name: Drummond
line: What!? The wizards!? This is bad. We need to coax the Sage away before they arri..... Ahem! We really need to get close to Sir Sage! Sir Sage, let us hurry to the Central castle!

name: Akira
line: Please wait! I don't understand anything at all!

name: Narrator
line: Surrounded by soldiers - feeling threatened - I shake my head furiously.

name: Akira
line: I really don't play RPGs, so I don't know how you want me to react! Please take someone else.....

name: Drummond
line: You'll come with us even if we have to make you. Soldiers!

name: Narrator
line: The moment I try to flee, the soldiers all draw their swords.

name: Cock Robin
line: Sir Drummond, this is excessive......

name: Drummond
line: Silence! The damn wizards are the ones at fault here!

name: Narrator
line: The silver swords approach me with a terrifying glare. The blades shine as if they're real, and I turn pale.

name: Akira
line: (Oh god! There's something wrong with these people!)

name: Narrator
line: In that moment, I spot a shadow approaching us from the sky beyond the window. Two young men, flying through the sky on their broomsticks.

name: Akira
line: (They're flying through the sky....!?) (Wh.... What in the world? Is the outside scenery part of this VR too....?)

name: Narrator
line: I strain my eyes, trying to unveil the trick behind this bizarre sight, when..... They pass through the window and land right in front of my eyes. Whisking up a real breeze.

name: Narrator
line: They make their brooms vanish in an instant like magic, and stand on either side of me.
Your prediction was spot-on, Heath. I didn't think the guys from the Ministry of Magical Affairs would actually come to kidnap the Sage.
I told you. ....Humans just don't trust us.

name: Narrator
line: Surprised, I look at them, one at a time. The tall, fearless young man turns around to look at me. His eyes are of different colors.
Are you the new Sage?
I'm Cain, a Central wizard. I'm also the knight who will protect you. What's your name?

name: Akira
line: Ah.... I'm Akira......

name: Narrator
line: When I answer, the young man named Cain turns the corners of his lips upward into a smile.

name: Cain
line: Sir Akira. Nice to meet you. Before we do anything else, let's deal with these guys.

name: Narrator
line: He laughs boldly and draws his sword. It looks far more splendid than the swords of the other soldiers surrounding us, with fine decorations and a sharpened blade.

name: Akira
line: (I... Is this sword real....?)

name: Narrator
line: As a chill of nervousness runs through my body, the soldiers look just as nervous.

name: Soldier
line: G-General Cain.....

name: Soldier
line: It's General Cain....!

name: Drummond
line: Arrgh, it's former General Cain! He's no longer your commanding officer! Cain! You will be punished for treason if you keep pointing your sword at me, a minister!

name: Cain
line: I don't like threatening the elderly, you know? But if you're going to do anything funny to our dear Sage, that's another story. Sorry, but I'm not holding back.

name: Cain
line: Hey now, don't flinch. Didn't I teach you not to get overwhelmed by your opponent's spirit? Pull yourselves together and march forward. Even if I'm your opponent. -Now, bring it on.

name: Cain
line: Even if I'm your opponent. -Now, bring it on.

name: Soldier
line: Y-Yessir....!

name: Drummond
line: Cain! How many times must I tell you! These soldiers here no longer follow your command! I will give their orders!

name: Cain
line: You're so picky.....

name: Drummond
line: You're too relaxed! That's why you were chased out of your rank as commanding officer!

name: Cain
line: Okay, okay! Have it your way. Just make it quick. Go ahead, Your Excellency.

name: Drummond
line: Ahem..... Go, get him.....!

name: Narrator
line: (Footsteps)

name: Soldier
line: Aaaaargh.....!

name: Narrator
line: The soldiers raise their voices and rush at Cain.

name: Narrator
line: (Swords clashing)

name: Narrator
line: I'm bewildered by the sudden uproar, but Cain battles so dashingly that I can't take my eyes off of him. He dodges soldiers blindly swinging their blades one after another and beats them down with ease.

name: Akira
line: (Amazing... He's so cool.....)

name: Narrator
line: That's when somebody's hand timidly tugs at my arm. His fingertips are cold.
Ah.... I'm Heathcliff, an Eastern wizard. Please follow me.

name: Narrator
line: I take one look at the boy named Heathcliff and my breath is taken away. He's a beautiful boy - more beautiful than anyone I've ever seen on television, or online. He's like a work of art, crafted with the most delicate workmanship. Heathcliff turns his eyes downward, as if to escape my gaze.

name: Heathcliff
line: This way.

name: Narrator
line: I follow Heathcliff to a dark staircase, escaping the floor that has become a total battleground. I feel my anxiety growing - I know there were no spiral staircases in my apartment complex.

name: Akira
line: U... Um, can I ask a question?

name: Narrator
line: Heathcliff looks at me over his shoulder as we're halfway down the stairwell. His vivid eyes are like fine jewels. I'm mesmerized for an instant, but my expression soon turns to a frown. Heathcliff looks ill. Upon closer inspection, Cain, who is fighting on the floor above, also looks exhausted.

name: Akira
line: ....Are you okay? You don't look very good. .....Woa....h.

name: Narrator
line: Heathcliff staggers out of nowhere, and I quickly reach out to support him. Breathing heavily, Heathcliff rests a hand on his forehead.

name: Heathcliff
line: ....I apologize.... I'm almost entirely out of magic......

name: Heathcliff
line: We just came from our battle with the < Great Catastrophe >...... ....Cain is also at his limit.....

name: Soldier
line: Don't let them go! Catch them!

name: Narrator
line: (Footsteps)

name: Narrator
line: The soldiers come chasing us from the floor above. Heathcliff leads me by the hand and we try to make our way to the lower floor. But a crowd approaches us from below.

name: Soldier
line: We've caught you in the middle! Now you can't get away!

name: Heathcliff
line: ....Don't worry, Sir Sage. I will protect you.

name: Akira
line: But you look so ill.....

name: Narrator
line: Heathcliff holds up his hand in front of his chest. A gentle light begins to gather around his hand. Before I can register it, there's a pocket watch in his palm.

name: Akira
line: (Wh-what was that!?)

name: Narrator
line: Heathcliff quietly grips the pocket watch and closes his eyes.

name: Heathcliff
line: << Repsevaivulp Sonus >>

name: Narrator
line: In that moment-. The soldiers all freeze up like figurines.

name: Akira
line: A-are you okay!?

name: Narrator
line: As if overwhelmed by vertigo, Heathcliff falls to one knee. He quickly nods and forces himself to stand back up.

name: Heathcliff
line: ...I'm all right.... Let's hurry. The magic will come undone in an instant. We need to hurry, or else Mr. Faust will......

name: Narrator
line: I support Heath's back while falling deeper into my confusion. He doesn't look like he's performing for a prank. This looks real. The same goes for the sharpness of the soldier's swords, and for Cain, who hides his exhaustion as he fights on.

name: Cain
line: Heath, are you all right!?

name: Heathcliff
line: ....I'm fine!

name: Akira
line: (If it's all real, then......) (What in the world is going on?)

The wind really lingers on your skin tonight. Like the touch of a lover bound to cause future troubles..... The Central tower is within sight. I wonder if Cain and Heathcliff are safe. Come now, stop getting distracted. I'll leave you behind. Murr.

name: Murr
line: I'm headed over right now!

name: Heathcliff
line: This way, Sir Sage.

name: Narrator
line: Still in a daze, I follow Heathcliff as we weave our way through the crowd of soldiers, frozen stiff like figurines. We're almost at the bottom of the stairwell when their fingers begin to twitch.

name: Heathcliff
line: .....The spell is wearing off......

name: Narrator
line: In the next moment, the soldiers all begin to move at once.

name: Soldier
line: ....Capture the Sage! Huh? He's gone? Where'd he go!?

name: Soldier
line: You idiot, he's right behind you!

name: Soldier
line: When did he get there!? We're not letting you go.....!

name: Narrator
line: (Footsteps)

name: Narrator
line: The soldiers surround us.

name: Narrator
line: That's when a strange-smelling white smoke drifts into the scene from the window at the end of the stairs. It's dazzlingly sweet, akin to wine.

name: Narrator
line: I look up in surprise, and there, on the once-empty windowsill, sits a young man. He smiles gently, but there's a mysterious, seductive air to him as well. Perhaps it's because of the long pipe in his mouth.
Good evening.

name: Heathcliff
line: Shylock!
My goodness, I can't believe you. You and Cain are both pushing yourselves far past your limits.... You must've just barely hung onto your brooms to get here.

name: Heathcliff
line: I had to, for Mr. Faust.....
I know. Leave the rest to us.

name: Narrator
line: The young man strokes Heathcliff's pale cheek and smiles at me over Heathcliff's shoulder.
Pleased to meet you, Sir Sage. I am Shylock, a Western wizard.

name: Akira
line: ....A wizard.....

name: Narrator
line: I'm shaken again; Shylock gives me a refined smile. He seductively brings the pipe to his lips.

name: Soldier
line: A-another wizard!

name: Soldier
line: D-don't let him scare you! They should've used up all their power in the battle against the < Great Catastrophe >....!

name: Narrator
line: Shylock simply breathes out a puff of smoke from his pipe. And the white smoke fills the room with a sweet, intoxicating scent. The soldiers all suddenly stumble on their feet - it's as if they're drunk.

name: Soldier
line: Hehe..... Huh.....? Hey, isn't this kinda fun......?

name: Soldier
line: Heheh...... This bed looks real comfy......... I'll just go to sleep......

name: Narrator
line: Before I know it, the soldiers are all falling to the floor wearing delighted expressions. Shylock crosses his legs up high and brings his pipe away from his lips.

name: Shylock
line: Sweet dreams.

name: Narrator
line: That's when Cain comes rushing down towards us from the stairs.

name: Cain
line: Shylock, you saved us!

name: Shylock
line: You owe me one, all right? Treat me to a drink next time.

name: Cain
line: Just one drink? I'll stick around for the whole night. Sir Sage, let's go.

name: Narrator
line: Cain offers me his hand, but I can't take it right away. I'm unsure of whether or not I should take his hand; my gaze wavers.

name: Akira
line: (Let's go? Go where? Who are these people? Where am I?)

name: Narrator
line: Cain doesn't miss the brief flash of anxiety in my expression, and stops in his tracks. He shows no sign of exhaustion as he nods to me, gently and sincerely.

name: Cain
line: Ah.... My bad. The sage comes from another world, right? That means you have no idea what's going on. Of course you'd be scared - we're asking you to come with us when you don't even know where you are. ....Umm.....

name: Shylock
line: Cain. We don't have time for you to explain everything about this world and the sage's role in it all.

name: Cain
line: I know. But a knight doesn't go about whisking clueless people away without explaining anything to them.

name: Narrator
line: Cain thinks for a moment before looking straight into my eyes.

name: Cain
line: Akira. Let me give you the simple explanation. We need your power, and we'd like you to lend it to us. Why? Because we suffered a terrible loss. We were completely destroyed in an annual battle that we'd easily won every prior year. We were neither careless nor neglectful. The old guy back there is angry because he thinks we did a half-hearted job. But that's not true. We didn't even know what was happening - and we lost the battle, along with half of our comrades. I don't want to lose anything else..... That's why we need your help. Of course, that's just our selfish desire. This isn't your world, and I'm sure there are other things that you would rather be doing. You have the right to refuse, and nobody will blame you for making that choice. But we..... We truly need you. If you're willing to come with us and lend us your power, then I'm willing to do anything. I will show you my utmost courage and sincerity; I will express my utmost gratitude and courtesy. This vow may be nothing but words - but I beg of you: Please, believe in us, and lend us your strength.

name: Narrator
line: I don't really understand what Cain is saying. But I truly feel his earnest sincerity from his words and gaze. I can't tell if I'm living in a dream or a simulated reality, but I can tell that his feelings are real. If I take his words seriously, someone on the other end of the camera might laugh at me. But I have to lend him an ear.

name: Akira
line: ...How am I supposed to lend you my strength?

name: Heathcliff
line: We want you to.... We want you to save Mr. Faust.

name: Akira
line: Mr. Faust....?

name: Cain
line: He's our comrade. He's on the brink of death. But you might be able to save him.

name: Akira
line: On the brink of death...? Why....

name: Shylock
line: He was gravely injured while protecting a comrade.

name: Heathcliff
line: ....Mr. Faust is my teacher..... If he hadn't been there for me, I would've died.....

name: Narrator
line: A comrade on the brink of death..... I repeat those words in my mind. I still don't understand what's going on. But I can understand the deep sadness reflected in Heathcliff's reddened eyes.

name: Heathcliff
line: ....Please, I beg of you.... Please save him.....

name: Narrator
line: I take a deep breath and nod.

name: Akira
line: I understand.... If there's anything I can do to help.

name: Narrator
line: A smile of relief spreads across Heathcliff's face. I'm in awe; I didn't realize he was a boy who could smile like this - with such pure, childlike innocence.

name: Heathcliff
line: Thank you, Sir Sage......

name: Drummond
line: Wait! You damn wizards! I won't let you have the Sage....!

name: Narrator
line: The bearded man and the meek-looking young man yell as they rush down the stairwell. The old man looks at me and shouts, as if chiding me:

name: Drummond
line: Sir Sage! You mustn't be fooled! Wizards are all irresponsible liars! They remorselessly deceive humans, and manipulate our hearts with strange powers! You must not believe the wizards!

name: Narrator
line: I turn around to look at the three of them. Cain furrows his brows in frustration, and Heathcliff looks visibly hurt. Shylock alone is smiling. He tilts his head and lets his pipe sway in his hand.

name: Shylock
line: Let's say that we are honest, and telling the truth. That would then make you a liar. In fact, you would be the very "irresponsible liar" you spoke of just moments ago.

name: Drummond
line: I serve my country! I am nothing like you frivolous lot!

name: Shylock
line: Silence, Sir Drummond. You may think you are speaking with us, but you have no intention of holding a real conversation. The only feeling your words convey is the fact that you do not seem to be very fond of us. You would not believe our words even if they were true. And if we do lie, you would sigh a breath of relief. For you wish to believe that we - the wizards you so detest - are all liars. Then does it matter anymore what is true or what is false?

name: Drummond
line: ....Aargh, quit with the word games! In any case, Sir Sage! You must not lend an ear to these wizards! You simply need to listen to us! I'm saying this for your own sake, Sir Sage!

name: Narrator
line: I frown at those words. The old man claims to be speaking in my best interests, but the only thing he's been telling me is to listen to him. Cain asked me to help him - for his own sake and his comrades - even if it might not be in my best interest. I turn around to look at Cain.

name: Akira
line: I still don't understand what's going on.... But I will follow you.

name: Akira
line: I still don't understand what's going on.... But I will follow you.

name: Cain
line: Really!?

name: Heathcliff
line: Are you sure!?

name: Shylock
line: Don't act so surprised, both of you. Sir Sage decided to believe in us; we should be happy.

name: Narrator
line: Shylock laughs wryly. Hearing that, Cain and Heathcliff also break out into smiles.

name: Cain
line: We are happy. I'm just in awe - a human chose to believe in wizards, even though we only just met.

name: Heathcliff
line: Thank you so much, Sir Sage! I will never forget your kindness!

name: Drummond
line: Y-you... Do you realize what a mistake you're making!? Listen to me - wizards are wicked, arrogant, and selfish.....

name: Heathcliff
line: Say one more word and this wicked wizard will curse you.

name: Heathcliff
line: These wicked and arrogant wizards are the ones who fought to protect this world. My teacher, my comrades - they fought and fell to protect the likes of you!

name: Cock Robin
line: S-Sir, you've gone too far.

name: Drummond
line: Why are you taking their side!? All right then, I'm going to take you down by force!

name: Shylock
line: Oh? How? Everyone seems to have departed to the land of dreams.

name: Drummond
line: Heheh.... You fools! There are soldiers waiting for you outside! You won't stand a chance against them, knowing how exhausted you are! It's a massive army, equipped with weapons of magical technology.....
<< Eanul Rambul >>!

name: Narrator
line: (Pop)

name: Narrator
line: Suddenly, the old man disappears.

name: Narrator
line: And in his place stands a mouse, surrounded by his clothes.

name: Mouse
line: Squeak! Squeak!

name: Narrator
line: A young man climbs in through the window, picks the mouse up by its tail, and grins.
Meo~w. I'm gonna eat you.

name: Narrator
line: I hold my breath in surprise. Because he's the young man I just met in the elevator.

name: Shylock
line: What have you been doing all this time, Murr?

name: Murr
line: I was busy saying goodbye to the moon!

name: Cain
line: To the moon? You're as crazy as ever.

name: Narrator
line: I'm bewildered. His name and face are the same, but he seems like a completely different person from the man I met earlier. Earlier, he was a brilliant gentleman; now, he's like a mischievous stray cat.

name: Heathcliff
line: We can talk later. Everyone hurry!

name: Murr
line: Got it!

name: Mouse
line: Squeak~! Squeak!

name: Narrator
line: Murr hurls the mouse through the air, and Cock Robin scrambles to catch it.

name: Cock Robin
line: Um, about the minister.....

name: Shylock
line: He'll turn back to normal after half a day.

name: Murr
line: Hi, Sir Sage, I'm the Western wizard Murr! Have you ever flown?

name: Akira
line: Flown....!? Huh....!?

name: Murr
line: Then come with me! This way!

name: Akira
line: Whoa....!?

name: Cain
line: Stop, Murr!

name: Murr
line: << Eanul Rambul >>!

name: Narrator
line: When Murr utters those mysterious words-. Out of nowhere, a broomstick appears in his hand. He grabs it with one hand and pulls my arm by the other. And we leap out of the closest window.

name: Narrator
line: My body floats into the air. And in the next moment, we plummet at a great speed.

name: Akira
line: Aaaa....h!

name: Narrator
line: The cold night air rushes towards my body. As I fall headfirst from a tall, tall tower. A likewise upside-down but smiling Murr appears in front of my eyes as I scream.

name: Murr
line: Hey, hey, do you think you're gonna die? How does that feel? Is it thrilling? Is it exciting?

name: Cain
line: Murr, that's enough! What are we going to do if something happens to Sir Sage!?

name: Murr
line: What will we do?

name: Cain
line: Don't ask me!

name: Murr
line: Fine, I get it! Sir Sage, hang onto me!

name: Narrator
line: (Woosh)

name: Narrator
line: I grab onto Murr's arm, and he nimbly hops onto his broomstick. The next moment, we're speeding upwards high into the night sky. We're soaring through the wind and flying through the starlit night. Fearfully, I turn my eyes downward and see nothing but unfamiliar woods and castles sprawling across the land below.

name: Murr
line: Did you lose something? Have you checked the insides of your pockets?

name: Akira
line: W-where is Tokyo, Japan!?

name: Murr
line: Who knows? Why don't you look for a new one? Here we go~!

name: Narrator
line: (Woosh)

name: Cain
line: Murr! Don't be so reckless! You're carrying the Sage with you, you know!?

name: Narrator
line: I cling to Murr's body as we cut against the cold air, flying through the sky like a bird. I turn around and spot a tower - much like the Tokyo Tower - glittering within the pitch-black night. We had leapt out of that tower. As we flee through the sky, my heart races with both fear and excitement. I know people who fly on broomsticks. They're wizards.

name: Akira
line: (Don't tell me.... They're real wizards!?)

name: Cain
line: .....! Careful! It's the << Trail of Flowershards >> !

name: Heathcliff
line: A cluster of flower petals, spreading through the entire night sky like a high wave..... Is this the << Trail of Flowershards >> which appears when the world is restoring itself!? Should we go around it....!?

name: Murr
line: Let's dive right into it! You want to touch it too, right, Sir Sage!

name: Akira
line: You can touch it!?

name: Cain
line: Hey, hey, hey, hold on!

name: Shylock
line: Stop it, Murr.

name: Murr
line: It's fine! Come on! Just reach out!

name: Narrator
line: A glittering wave of rainbow flower petals draws close to me. I reach out, my heart racing. The moment my fingertips brush a petal, it bursts into a sparkling powder and dissipates like magic dust.

name: Heathcliff
line: ...It's beautiful......

name: Shylock
line: Is everyone all right?

name: Cain
line: Yeah. What an amazing sight......

name: Murr
line: Ahahaha! See, aren't you glad you touched it? Life is a journey! You'll meet countless, wonderful, once-in-a-lifetime experiences.

name: Narrator
line: Their bodies shine with light; it's as if we're dancing with the galaxy as their laughter echoes through the night. And we fly on to our destination.

name: Snow
line: Oz.

name: White
line: Hey, Oz.

name: Oz
line: Snow. White.

name: Snow
line: How is Faust doing?

name: White
line: Can we save him?

name: Snow
line: You're the strongest wizard amongst all of us.

name: White
line: If you can't save him, no one else can.

name: Oz
line: My magic hasn't returned yet. They're suppressing his pain with herbs for now. If you have any parting words, go tell him now.

name: Snow
line: You're so cold......

name: White
line: This is so sad......

name: Oz
line: ............ If the Sage makes it in time, or......

name: Snow
line: Oh? It's the Northern wizards.

name: White
line: Hey. Where are you all going?

name: Mithra
line: We've played our part.

name: Snow
line: Mithra. Your comrade is on the brink of death.

name: Mithra
line: Huh...... Is that so.

name: White
line: What an unconcerned reply.

name: Snow
line: You're an even colder man than Oz.

name: Mithra
line: I'm free now that I've fulfilled my role. It's up to me to decide where I want to go.

name: White
line: You too, Owen?

name: Owen
line: Fufu...... The world almost ended, you say? Everyone must be crying their eyes out from loss and terror. I have to go and see for myself. It's going to be so much fun.

name: White
line: As always, you're a bad boy.

name: Owen
line: Haha...... Are you going to punish me? The scary, scary twin teachers of the North.

name: Snow
line: Even if we smack you on the bottom, your nature won't change.

name: White
line: You really won't change.

name: Owen
line: I'm glad we're on the same page. Well then.

name: Narrator
line: (Footsteps)

name: White
line: There he goes...... Hmm? What's wrong, Mithra?

name: Mithra
line: Nothing. Owen just beat me to it......

name: White
line: Did you miss your chance to walk away?

name: Snow
line: You might be impudent, but you're still a charming child.

name: Mithra
line: Huh. Thanks.

name: Bradley
line: ......Taking my chance now......

name: Snow
line: Hold on, Bradley!

name: Bradley
line: Got caught! ......Ugh!

name: White
line: You don't get to walk away freely.

name: Snow
line: You're a prisoner, after all. We have to return you to your cell.

name: White
line: Prisoners should stay put behind bars.

name: Bradley
line: Fuck! Let go, you geezers!

name: Snow
line: We're not geezers~.

name: White
line: Yeah, we aren't geezers~.

name: Bradley
line: Stop pretending to be kids, you fucking geezers!

name: Snow & White
line: Tee hee!

name: Mithra
line: Oz.

name: Mithra
line: You call yourself the strongest wizard in the world, yet you were as useless as an infant in the face of the < Great Catastrophe > this time.

name: Oz
line: .........It's not like I call myself that.

name: Mithra
line: I'll overthrow you someday, and claim the title of the world's strongest wizard for myself. Please prepare yourself for that day.

name: Oz
line: If you hadn't been summoned as a Sage's wizard, I would've killed you by now.

name: Oz
line: Leave.

name: Mithra
line: See you another time, then.

name: Narrator
line: (Footsteps)

name: White
line: So Mithra left as well......

name: Snow
line: Oz. Mithra left you with a parting shot.

name: White
line: You weren't paying attention, so he used you to stage his exit.

name: Oz
line: ......Enough.

name: Snow
line: Where are you going?

name: Oz
line: I'm going to Faust.

name: Snow
line: That's right, how sad......

name: White
line: How very sad......

name: Bradley
line: ......Faust...... Is there nothing we can do for that Eastern curseworker?

name: Snow
line: Without the Sage here......

name: White
line: There's nothing we can do if the Sage isn't here.....

name: White
line: Faust.

name: Snow
line: Have you any desires?

name: Bradley
line: Don't hold back, Eastern curseworker. You don't have to play all selfless even in your final moments.

name: Bradley
line: I've never really liked the Eastern wizards, they're all so gloomy and depressing - you especially since you work in curses, but...... You're an idiot, risking your life like that for your comrades - but I don't hate idiots like you.

name: White
line: Bradley......

name: Snow
line: You're a good boy, Bradley.

name: Bradley
line: Shut up! Don't call me a good boy. I'm a Northern wizard - the kind that strikes fear into crying children - and the boss of the strongest, most vicious gang of bandits there's ever been.

name: Snow
line: Does anything come to mind, Faust?

name: White
line: You heard Bradley. Don't hold back.

name: Faust
line: ............ No..... Those frivolous humans will find a way to destroy themselves without me having to lift a finger...... ......Serves them right...... It's what they deserve...... Heheheh...... Hahahahaha......

name: Bradley
line: ............ Yeah, he really is gloomy and depressing......

name: Snow
line: Shh, keep quiet.

name: White
line: Looking back on Faust's life, it's no surprise that his hatred for humans runs so deep......

name: Faust
line: ............ ......This interminable life will finally come to an end......

name: Faust
line: ......I'll finally be released...... God, I pray you grant me freedom......

name: Bradley
line: What's wrong, Oz?

name: Oz
line: ......I sense the Sage's presence......

name: Murr
line: We've arrived!

name: Murr
line: Hmm? Sir Sage?

name: Shylock
line: Oh my, Sir Sage. Are you quite all right? Are you dizzy from the journey?

name: Cain
line: You fly so recklessly, Murr. Here, give me your hand, Sir Sage. This way!

name: Heathcliff
line: Mr. Faust......!

name: Narrator
line: (Door opens)

name: Narrator
line: I open the door to find a young man lying in a bed, quietly surrounded by a group of people. The young man, who Heathcliff called Mr. Faust, has a bloodless face that looks as pale as wax. Poisonous-looking fumes rise from beneath the layers of bandages wrapped around his body, throwing off the occasional spark. My breath catches: the situation was even more dire than I imagined.

name: Snow
line: Is it the Sage!?

name: White
line: The Sage has arrived!

name: Bradley
line: This guy is the Sage? Are you for real?

name: Narrator
line: I stiffen nervously under the scrutiny of so many people. In particular, the man standing in the middle of the group has a terrifying presence about him; his gaze alone could freeze someone where they stand. His eyes, like a merciless blizzard, hold no warmth in them. But the moment he catches sight of me, that cold and terrifying gaze softens into an expression of relief. As if he had been waiting for me.

name: Oz
line: ......You made it in time......

name: Shylock
line: How is Faust holding up? Is he still alive?

name: Faust
line: ......Unfortunately so......

name: Shylock
line: What a relief. We lost exactly ten wizards in this battle against the < Great Catastrophe >. I personally find eleven an unwieldy final count. Faust.

name: Heathcliff
line: Mr. Faust......!

name: Narrator
line: Heathcliff clings to the side of the bed, peering into the face of the injured man. The man - Faust - opens his eyes slightly.

name: Faust
line: ......Heathcliff......?

name: Heathcliff
line: It's all right now! The Sage has come! He'll save you!

name: Faust
line: .....Are you hurt anywhere......?

name: Narrator
line: For a moment, I think I catch a glimpse of Faust's lips turning upwards into a smile.

name: Faust
line: ......Thank goodn......

name: Narrator
line: But before his smile can fully form, Faust's movements slacken, then stop. His fingers, which were about to clasp Heathcliff's hand, fall limply to the bed.

name: Narrator
line: (Rustle)

name: Narrator
line: Faust lays there unmoving, his eyes still wide open and staring.

name: Heathcliff
line: Mr. Faust......! No, please don't die!

name: Snow
line: This is bad! He's not breathing!

name: White
line: Hurry, Sage!

name: Oz
line: Sage.

name: Narrator
line: The man with the terrifying gaze murmurs to me in a voice as quiet as the dark of the night.

name: Oz
line: Your hand.

name: Narrator
line: He stretches out a hand to me.

name: Oz
line: My name is Oz. I am a Central wizard. Lend me your strength.

name: Narrator
line: I hesitate, and then place my palm over Oz's hand. The moment Oz's cold fingertips close over my hand, a small wind blows across the room.

name: Narrator
line: (Woosh)

name: Narrator
line: The mysterious wind grows stronger, flowing and whirling through our hair and clothes. A white light radiates from Oz's body, starting from the center of our clasped hands. Oz chants a curious string of words.

name: Oz
line: << Vox Nox >>

name: Narrator
line: In that moment, the faint light shines brilliantly, and disappears into Faust's body.

name: Snow
line: We did it!

name: White
line: We really did!

name: Heathcliff
line: The fumes from Mr. Faust's body are vanishing!

name: Cain
line: Let's call his name! Faust, Faust......!

name: Shylock
line: Pull yourself together, Faust.

name: Murr
line: Wake up, Faust! It's too early to fall asleep just yet!

name: Bradley
line: Open your eyes! Eastern curseworker!

name: Narrator
line: Faust's eyelids - previously wide open and unmoving - close tightly. His body is wracked with pain, as if time has rewound.

name: Faust
line: ......How cruel...... I thought I would finally get to die......

name: Narrator
line: It seems like we've managed to save him. As I breathe out in relief, the room erupts into cheers.

name: Cain
line: He regained consciousness! Thank goodness......!

name: Murr
line: Congratulations!

name: Shylock
line: My my, what a relief.

name: Bradley
line: Haha. You're a tough one.

name: Heathcliff
line: Mr. Faust...... I'm so glad...... ......Sniff, sniffle......

name: Snow
line: That was really close.

name: White
line: What a relief. That was truly nerve-wracking.

name: Narrator
line: Oz releases my hand before I even realize it. The twins approach me, as I feel drained from exhaustion.

name: Snow
line: You worked hard, Sage.

name: White
line: It's thanks to you that Faust was saved.

name: Narrator
line: I shake my head limply.

name: Akira
line: I didn't do anything...... All I did was stand here. But if I could help, then I'm glad.

name: Heathcliff
line: That's not true.

name: Narrator
line: Heathcliff turns around to look at me. He gazes at me steadily, his eyes still faintly blurred with tears.

name: Heathcliff
line: Sir Sage...... You chose to listen to us instead of the minister of Central Country. ......And you came along with us. That's why Mr. Faust was saved. Thank you...... I'm grateful from the bottom of my heart.

name: Narrator
line: Heathcliff gives me a reserved smile. It is an awkward, but warm smile; I feel Heathcliff's gratitude. I breathe a sigh of relief, and smile back at him.

name: Narrator
line: Faust loses consciousness once again, falling into a deep sleep this time. Things seem to be settling down when I catch the movement of a shadow: Oz is wordlessly turning to leave the room.

name: Snow
line: Oz.

name: White
line: Where are you going?

name: Oz
line: I've fulfilled my duty.

name: Cain
line: Hang on. Shouldn't we discuss what to do for the battle against the < Great Catastrophe > next year? No one could have predicted the damage that we suffered this time. I want us to be prepared for when the < Great Catastrophe > attacks next year, so we don't have to go through the same tragedy. We need your strength, Oz.

name: Oz
line: I refuse.

name: Cain
line: Don't be so cold...... Aren't we both Central wizards? I know that you don't get close to other people. But if we don't want to lose to the same enemy twice, we should develop our battle strategy by getting to know each other's strengths.

name: Oz
line: Young wizards like to gather in groups. There is no meaning to working together. Only those who can survive should survive. If you don't want to be eliminated, then acquire the strength it takes to survive on your own.

name: Cain
line: ......I don't think that way. There are comrades that we wouldn't have lost if only we had joined forces.

name: Oz
line: You're dreaming.

name: Oz
line: You cannot change destiny.

name: Narrator
line: Cain doesn't say anything more. Everyone watches Oz's retreating figure wordlessly, as if they're afraid of something.

name: Narrator
line: (Door closes)

name: Narrator
line: After Oz leaves, the twins start to murmur.

name: Snow
line: My, my. What a thing to say...... Even though he's the one who changed destiny with brute force.

name: Cain
line: Huh?

name: White
line: Don't worry about it, we're just musing aloud. I think there's a point in what you said, Cain.

name: Snow
line: I agree. We expected nothing less from the man who commanded the knights in Central Country.

name: Cain
line: Thanks. But we won't get anywhere until we get Oz on our side. He's the one most suited to keeping all of us in line.

name: Bradley
line: .....I'll pass.

name: Cain
line: Why?

name: Bradley
line: You're asking why? Who would go against Oz's orders? He'd crush you like a tomato if you even dared to defy him.

name: Cain
line: That's why he's perfect for the role. Mithra, Owen, even a prisoner like you - all of you listen to Oz, right?

name: Heathcliff
line: Mithra...... Owen...... Those two are scary......

name: Shylock
line: If you're looking for someone who's powerful enough to subdue the two of them with magic, then it'd have to be Oz.

name: Bradley
line: What do you have to say, you geezers.

name: Snow
line: Ohoho. We've already retired, after all.

name: White
line: Let the elderly retire from the fighting.

name: Bradley
line: You only bring up your age when it's convenient for you......

name: Akira
line: (It seems like everyone wants Oz to lend them his strength.) (Even so......)

name: Narrator
line: I look slowly around the room. As the situation settles down, the anxiety that I had been pushing away rears its head.

name: Akira
line: (What on earth is happening......? I don't think I'm being filmed, not anymore...... And it doesn't feel like I'm dreaming......)

name: Narrator
line: I slap my own cheeks with all my strength, thinking that it might wake me up.

name: Narrator
line: (Slap)

name: Akira
line: Ouch......

name: Heathcliff
line: Sir Sage!?

name: Bradley
line: Why are you hitting yourself!?

name: Akira
line: ......This really isn't a dream......

name: Snow
line: The previous sage pinched his own cheeks too.

name: Akira
line: The previous sage......?

name: White
line: That's right: the sage who came before you.

name: Snow
line: I'll show you something nice.

name: White
line: Come with us.

name: Snow
line: You don't have to be scared. Here, I'll hold your hand.

name: White
line: You must be feeling helpless.

name: Akira
line: Ah...... Thank you......

name: Narrator
line: Snow and White each take one of my hands, and lead me out of the room.

name: Akira
line: Um, Mister Snow, Mister White......

name: Snow
line: You don't have to speak so formally to us - that's the kind of position that the Sage has.

name: Akira
line: Well then...... Snow, White. Where are you taking me?

name: White
line: To where the sage's manuals are.

name: Narrator
line: Snow and White bring me to a library filled with countless books. I'm overwhelmed by the sheer weight of history and knowledge contained in the room.

name: Snow
line: These are all the sages' books.

name: Akira
line: All of it......?

name: White
line: That's right. They're writings left behind by sages who come to this world from another world.

name: Snow
line: This is the manual written by the previous sage.

name: White
line: It's written in a language that we can't read. Can you read it?

name: Narrator
line: I grow nervous as they hand me a heavy, splendid-looking book. I flip open the first page, my heart beating fast. What greets me on the page is - Japanese.

name: Narrator
line: (Flips page)

name: Narrator
line: "How do I get back to Japan? I want to go back to Tokyo...... I want to eat ramen and oden and curry......"

name: Akira
line: (......This is......) (So this really isn't a dream......?)

name: Narrator
line: (Flips page)

name: Narrator
line: I flip to the next page in a hurry as my agitation continues to spike. Following the diary-like entries, I reach a line, written in a shaky hand, that crushes my heart.

name: Narrator
line: "It's no use. I can't go back." "I have to stay here for the rest of my life." "I've been tricked by the wizards."

name: Narrator
line: (Tricked?) I turn pale and look towards the twins.

name: Snow
line: Hmm?

name: White
line: Hmm~?

name: Snow
line: What's wrong?

name: White
line: So you can't read it?

name: Narrator
line: I'm terrified and lost for words as they approach me with smiles on their faces.

name: Akira
line: ("I can't go back"? "I've been tricked by the wizards"?) (Will that happen to me too....?)

name: Narrator
line: The twins look at each other, then back at me, smiling brightly.

name: Snow
line: What's wrong? You're making such a childlike face.

name: White
line: If you're a child, then we'll become adults.

name: Snow & White
line: On the count of three......

name: Narrator
line: The twins chant in unison, their hands clasped together.

name: Narrator
line: Then, they start to rise and grow taller, like bamboo shoots on a rainy day. They look down at me, in the form of slender young men.

name: Snow
line: Here, Sage.

name: White
line: Shall I pat your head?

name: Narrator
line: Snow and White might have taken on adult forms in order to comfort me. Until moments ago, a part of me had been enjoying this strange world of magic. But the moment I discover that I can't go back, the shock of seeing the twins turn into adults becomes too much for me to handle......

name: Narrator
line: (Slump)

name: Narrator
line: And I sink to the ground.

name: Snow
line: Sage!?

name: White
line: What's wrong!?

name: Akira
line: Ah....... But you're.... children......

name: Snow
line: Changing form is child's play.

name: White
line: Did we startle you too much?

name: Narrator
line: I furrow my brows, and ask the question I'm scared of voicing aloud.

name: Akira
line: ......Have you been tricking me......?

name: Narrator
line: Snow and White smile curiously.

name: Snow
line: We're not. Our true forms are those of children.

name: White
line: Wizards live for a long time. Once we reach the height of our powers, our bodies simply stop aging.

name: Snow
line: But it feels good to change into adults occasionally.

name: White
line: What do you think? I'd say we're a rather handsome pair.

name: Narrator
line: As if sensing my distress, Snow and White each take a seat next to me, gripping my hands wordlessly.

name: Snow
line: Apologies, Sage. We're twins; we aren't familiar with loneliness.

name: White
line: We held your hands, thinking you might be feeling helpless, but we cannot truly comprehend the loneliness you feel.

name: Snow
line: Poor child...... You must want to go home.

name: White
line: We don't know how to return you to your world either. I'm sorry that we can't be of any help.

name: Narrator
line: I can feel the warmth in their comforting words, and in their gazes. I'm reminded of the faces of my family and friends, and warmth wells up in my chest. The two of them tighten their grip on my hands.

name: Snow
line: Let's stay like this, until your heart calms down.

name: White
line: We're twins, so we aren't familiar with loneliness. But we encountered it for the first time when we lost each other.

name: Akira
line: ......Lost each other?

name: Snow
line: White is dead. He's no longer of this world - he's a ghost.

name: Narrator
line: I look at White in disbelief. White continues smiling at me, the weight of his hand on mine still so tangible. And yet......

name: White
line: That's right. I'm no longer alive. Snow simply tied my soul to his to preserve this afterimage of me.

name: Snow
line: That loneliness was more than I alone could bear. You're an incredible child: you're all on your own, yet you do not react by hurting others.

name: White
line: You must be lonely, and scared. And yet you still saved Faust. Let me thank you once again.

name: Narrator
line: I press my mouth into a firm line. I don't want to doubt their kind voices. I gently disentangle our clasped hands and reopen the book, hoping that I've misread something. I turn to the page after "I've been tricked by the wizards."

name: Narrator
line: (Flip)

name: Narrator
line: Written there is - "It was a misunderstanding."

name: Akira
line: You're so misleading......!

name: Snow
line: Wh-what's wrong?

name: White
line: Is there something strange written in it?

name: Narrator
line: "Turns out they weren't trying to trick me. I just got depressed and became suspicious. Sorry to all the wizards. Seriously, my bad!"

name: Akira
line: (The previous sage...... He seems like a pretty laid-back guy) Um...... What kind of person was he, the previous sage who wrote this book?

name: Snow
line: He was a dark-haired man who was clever and fond of talking.

name: Snow
line: It seemed to be a rare treasure that was hard to obtain in the previous sage's guild.

name: Akira
line: (.......Did he work at some exploitative company?)

name: Narrator
line: "I've been searching all over for a way to get home, but I have yet to come across any solutions, so I made this manual for whoever comes after me." "At my company, my previous supervisor quit and left without transitioning his job over properly, so I deeply understand the importance of having a manual." "I can only write in Japanese, so I'm sorry about that. This is probably the first manual written in Japanese so far." "I found one that seemed to be written in ancient Japanese, but the only word I could read was â€˜season,' so I put it away. It's the scrolls on the top shelf." "By the way, the sage's manual written by the sage before me is definitely in Arabic no matter how I look at it, but I couldn't read it either, so that was the end of that. " "I always left the English e-mails to my juniors at work, so that was it for the English manuals too." "The English manuals are collected on the shelves in the western end of the library, and shelved in the middle section. For your reference."

name: Narrator
line: After that, the manual becomes a mix of diary-like entries and more manual-like entries. As I flip through the pages, the words "Good news!!!" decorated with a huge flower mark leap out at me.

name: Narrator
line: "How to return to my previous world" "Arthur, the prince of Central Country, said he'd help me look for a way home. He's a good kid. Kinda like a baby brother. Cute, too."

name: Akira
line: ......Prince Arthur......

name: Snow
line: Do you know Arthur?

name: Akira
line: Oh, oh no...... The previous sage wrote about him in this book. Do the two of you know him?

name: White
line: We know him very well. Arthur is a good-natured child. He was rather concerned about the previous sage.

name: Akira
line: H-how do I meet Prince Arthur?

name: Narrator
line: Snow and White look at each other with a smile.

name: Snow
line: Arthur is the prince of Central Country. If you had gone along with the minister, you would have met him immediately.

name: White
line: How was the minister? Was he angry that you came to the magic headquarters?

name: Akira
line: He was......

name: Snow & White
line: We thought as much.

name: Akira
line: Also...... Murr turned him into a mouse.

name: Snow
line: Ohoho. He must be pretty infuriated.

name: White
line: Though we do not fear the wrath of mere humans.

name: Narrator
line: I laugh at their pleased faces. And convey my thanks to them once more.

name: Akira
line: Thank you for staying by my side. I was slightly shaken...... I'm sorry for behaving so rudely.

name: Snow
line: There, there. The most important thing here is for you to feel at ease.

name: White
line: We've only just met, and you've only just arrived in this world. It's natural for you to be incredibly anxious.

name: Akira
line: Well...... I want to return to my own world. That's why I want to meet Prince Arthur.

name: Narrator
line: Snow and White smile at me sadly.

name: Snow
line: Is that so...... We had hoped you would stay, but......

name: White
line: Of course you yearn for your family and friends. We'll try to arrange for you to meet Arthur.

name: Akira
line: Thank you......

name: Snow
line: You can try asking Cain, since he's from the same country as Arthur. He's a knight of Central Country.

name: White
line: Surely even Cain must be worn out by today's events, so let's give him tonight to get some rest. Ask him tomorrow.

name: Akira
line: Ask Cain...... I got it.

name: Snow
line: You should rest up as well. We'll show you to the sage's room.

name: Akira
line: Thank you. Can I take this book with me?

name: White
line: The sage's manual? It belongs to the sage, so of course.

name: Snow
line: This is the room that the previous sage used.

name: White
line: It's still slightly messy, but feel free to tidy it up as you please. Rest up.

name: Akira
line: I see...... Thank you.

name: Snow
line: Good night.

name: White
line: Good night.

name: Akira
line: Good night.

name: Narrator
line: (Door closes)

name: Narrator
line: Left on my own, I take a look around the room. It has a well lived-in air, with traces of its past owner scattered here and there. Unable to fall asleep, I lay open the sage's manual on the bed.

name: Narrator
line: (Flip)

name: Narrator
line: I find a sense of comfort in reading the words of someone who once faced the same situation that I now find myself in. It would take a considerable amount of time for me to look through the entire manual.

name: Narrator
line: (Flip)

name: Narrator
line: So, I open up the page with Arthur's name which mentions how to return home, and start reading intently.

name: Narrator
line: "When I asked Prince Arthur, he got the palace chefs to make me something close to ramen. It was so good, I cried a little." "Prince Arthur brought me good news. Apparently a long time ago there were people who could travel back and forth between their own worlds and this one." "Prince Arthur is so easy to get along with. Life at the magic headquarters would be so much more enjoyable if he were one of the wizards here." "But Oz would probably never allow it. He always disappears somewhere when Arthur comes to visit, and never ever shows his face."

name: Akira
line: ............ Do Oz and Prince Arthur not get along......?

name: Narrator
line: I feel drowsiness wash over me as I continue to read, so I close the manual. So there were people who could travel between my world and this world. That knowledge alone brings me relief. The fragrance of herbs wafts over from the corner of the room, and a gentle breeze stirs outside the window. Moonlight, almost blindingly bright, floods into the room.

name: Akira
line: This world's moon is so huge...... It looks like it might almost fall to the ground......

name: Narrator
line: Before long, I fall asleep.

name: Murr
line: Sigh..... Even though we finally met - I'm sad we have to say goodbye so soon. Goodbye, my radiant beloved.....

name: Shylock
line: Murr. You are the only person who would pine for the < Great Catastrophe > with such longing.

name: Murr
line: Shylock.

name: Shylock
line: Wasn't the calamity that just befell us entirely your doing? -The heretic wizard Murr, who fell in love with the < Great Catastrophe >?

name: Shylock
line: You yearned for the < Great Catastrophe > so desperately that your soul shattered to pieces. Yet you have learned nothing, and continue to pine for the moon.

name: Murr
line: I can't help it! I love shiny things.

name: Shylock
line: ...Even if those shiny things are tied to the calamity that will end this world? Perhaps the moon approached this world with greater force than in prior years because you yearned so desperately for it. If the moon truly came to meet you - then perhaps we can save the world if we erase you from it. ...And if I disclose this information to the other wizards, perhaps they will press for your execution.

name: Murr
line: You really like using the same words over and over again. Are you a fan of "perhaps"?

name: Shylock
line: Is that sarcasm?

name: Murr
line: What's sarcasm? Is that a kind of breakfast food?

name: Shylock
line: I don't dislike what a stray cat you've become, but I do miss the man you used to be - the great philosopher Murr. Your ideas were the most progressive in the world, while your knowledge, the most ancient. You were so intelligent and noble that I even envied you.

name: Murr
line: Hey, anyway, look up at the moon! Isn't it beautiful?

name: Shylock
line: You must stop yearning for the moon.

name: Murr
line: Ah, you're so beautiful....

name: Shylock
line: If you do - your shattered soul may become whole again. Oh, dear genius of the ages. Do not be taken away by the moon.

name: Murr
line: Oh, my dearest, horrifying Catastrophe. Do come meet me again. I will love you for all eternity.

name: Shylock
line: ....Fufu. I suppose my attempts at persuasion were nothing but a waste of time.

name: Murr
line: I like waste too!

name: Shylock
line: My goodness; if nothing else, that silver tongue of yours hasn't changed. Oh loathsome Murr.

name: Murr
line: Ahahaha!

name: Shylock
line: ....I wonder what will happen, come tomorrow? What sorts of wizards will come to replace the comrades we have lost.....?

name: Narrator
line: The night I arrive in this mysterious world -. I haven't a clue what is going on in the various corners of the world as I sleep in my bed.

name: Eastern Country
line: Sherwood Forest.

name: Narrator
line: (Hoot hoot)

name: Eastern merchant
line: ....Ugh, what a horrifying night..... What's going on..... I didn't know the < Great Catastrophe > could come so close.......

name: Eastern merchant
line: I bet the chosen wizards slacked off on their jobs! They're all dishonest and irresponsible.... Woah.....

name: Narrator
line: (Rustle)

name: Eastern merchant
line: Hey, Guide! Don't just stop in your tracks like that!
This is where my job as your guide ends.

name: Eastern merchant
line: Wh-what are you saying!? I already paid you to take me through this forest. I need to get out of here tonight!
Well, wizards are all dishonest and irresponsible, right?

name: Eastern merchant
line: D.... Don't tell me you're a wizard too......
And what if I am?

name: Eastern merchant
line: H-hey, it was just a joke. Don't abandon me in the middle of nowhere like this. I'm begging you here, Eastern wizard.

name: Shino
line: It's Shino.

name: Eastern merchant
line: Sh-Shino! Come on, please. I'll reward you richly once we're out of here.

name: Shino
line: Hmph. Who's the dishonest and irresponsible one now?

name: Eastern merchant
line: Heheh.... My bad.

name: Shino
line: Follow me.

name: Narrator
line: (Footsteps)

name: Eastern merchant
line: Phew.... ....Man, this short brat's got some attitude for his size.......

name: Shino
line: What? Did you just call me short? Want me to leave you to the wolves?

name: Eastern merchant
line: Oh, oh no, of course not! H-hey, if you're a wizard, that means you can fly, right? Can't we just zip through the sky to the other end of the forest?

name: Shino
line: Say you were me. What would you gain from carrying some miserly old man on the back of your broom?

name: Shino
line: If you want to fly that badly, it'll cost you extra.

name: Eastern merchant
line: Extra...... What else can you do? Can you instantly teleport us to our destination or build a palace right here?

name: Shino
line: Traveling through space is a form of high-class magic. The same goes for extracting natural matter to build a sophisticated structure. I can make you a cave if you want.

name: Eastern merchant
line: What else are you good at?

name: Shino
line: Hunting monsters.

name: Eastern merchant
line: ....Monsters....?

name: Narrator
line: (Squeak)

name: Eastern merchant
line: .....hh. That scared me..... It's just a bird, huh...... H-hey...... Isn't the forest acting a little strange? Is it usually like this? It feels like..... The darkness of the forest is dazzling with energy, it's terrifying.

name: Shino
line: It must be the influence of the < Great Catastrophe >. The trees are astir with life; the whole forest is brimming with delight, like a creature panting with lukewarm breath.

name: Eastern merchant
line: Hey, don't scare me like that.....

name: Shino
line: ....Did something happen during the battle with the < Great Catastrophe >....?

name: Narrator
line: (Rumble)

name: Eastern merchant
line: Eeep.....! The ground shook.....!

name: Shino
line: ....This isn't an earthquake. It sounds like something fell and caused the tremor.

name: Eastern merchant
line: What the hell is going on!? Don't tell me the world is gonna end..... Were the chosen wizards wiped out!?

name: Eastern merchant
line: What the hell is going on!? Don't tell me the world is gonna end..... Were the chosen wizards wiped out!?

name: Shino
line: That's nonsense.

name: Shino
line: They haven't been wiped out. I know someone at the magic headquarters. If anything happened to him, I'd know right away.

name: Eastern merchant
line: H-how?

name: Shino
line: Wizards don't make promises. Because if we break a promise, we lose our magic. But I was tricked by my irresponsible master and made a promise with a fellow apprentice. We promised that we would protect each other. ...Hold your breath.

name: Shino
line: I sense an ancient fog..... Head over there. Don't come near me. If a normal human breathes this stuff in, it'll put them to sleep. The stars and the darkness are throbbing with life. The < Great Catastrophe > got too close: it's bringing the forest and the atmosphere back to their primitive state.....

name: Eastern merchant
line: Yaaaawn...... I'm getting kinda sleepy........

name: Narrator
line: (Thump)

name: Shino
line: ......! I told you not to come near! Geez.... Dammit, you're so heavy....... ............ I hope he's not hurt...... But I bet he's ready to cry at any moment now. He's a spoiled young master, after all......

name: Narrator
line: (Roar)

name: Shino
line: .....? What is this..... ....A beast's roar? .........! It's coming this way....... ..........!!

name: Narrator
line: (Roar)

name: Shino
line: What in the world is that......!?

name: Central Country
line: Capital.

name: Central Country citizen woman
line: Look! There's another tornado over there......!

name: Central Country citizen man
line: There are tornadoes howling through the streets left and right! They're tearing huge holes in the ground......!

name: Central Country citizen woman
line: Sigh...... I can't believe this all happened overnight...... Even the beautiful castle is in ruins.......

name: Central Country citizen man
line: ......Ah......! The castle walls are collapsing again......! Run! You'll get crushed by the rubble!
<< Pernoctant Nixzo >> !

name: Central Country citizen man
line: ......! The rubble stopped mid-air......!
Escape from there while you can! It's all right now.

name: Central Country mother
line: Come here, darling!

name: Narrator
line: (Running footsteps)

name: Central Country citizen man
line: Thank goodness! Everyone managed to escape! Who is the wizard who saved us......

name: Central Country child
line: Thank you, mister......
You're welcome. Are you hurt anywhere?

name: Central Country child
line: Nope!
I'm glad that you're safe.

name: Central Country mother
line: Please, let me thank you properly...... May I ask you for your name?
Oh, it was nothing......

name: Narrator
line: (Footsteps)

name: Central Country troops
line: Prince Arthur!

name: Central Country child
line: Prince......?

name: Central Country mother
line: The Prince......!?

name: Central Country troops
line: It's dangerous around here, Your Highness. Please refrain from running off on your own!

name: Arthur
line: Sorry. I'll head back right now. I'll be taking my leave, then.

name: Narrator
line: (Footsteps)

name: Central Country child
line: Thank you, Mister Prince!

name: Central Country mother
line: Thank you very much! I'll never forget your kindness!

name: Central Country troops
line: Your Highness, over here!

name: Arthur
line: Assess the damage! Prioritize medical treatment for the injured!

name: Central Country troops
line: Yes, sir!

name: Arthur
line: Everyone, I understand that you are all undergoing great difficulties right now, but I implore you to endure just a little longer. I will protect the peace of this country!

name: Central Country man
line: Long live Prince Arthur!

name: Central Country woman
line: What a beautiful, kind prince......

name: Arthur
line: So we lost our Sage in the battle against the < Great Catastrophe >...... I wanted to say farewell properly, but I hope he managed to make it safely back to his world...... Was the ritual to summon the new Sage successful?

name: Drummond
line: Y-Yes. But the chosen wizards snatched him away to the magic headquarters.

name: Arthur
line: Why?

name: Drummond
line: They said something about saving a dying wizard......

name: Arthur
line: Some of the wizards got hurt? Why didn't you report this to me?

name: Drummond
line: W-Well, the Sage could always summon new wizards to replace the ones lost during the battle against the .......

name: Arthur
line: Don't talk about wizards like that: they're not weapons you can replace like bows and guns, even if they do possess magic.

name: Drummond
line: With all due respect...... To us, the wizards are nothing more than troublesome weapons. Being a wizard yourself, I understand why you might favor them, but......

name: Arthur
line: ......You think I favor them......

name: Drummond
line: Not all wizards are benevolent beings who help humans, anyway! Just look at Oz, who controlled the world under his rule of terror - he's exactly the kind of wizard I'm talking about! Humans have long suffered under the thumb of wicked wizards!

name: Drummond
line: That's precisely why we have to win the Sage over - the Sage acts as the bridge between humans and wizards, and we must ensure that we are holding the reins. Prince Arthur, it is not the wizards' side that you should be taking, but ours, the humans! Remember that you're the prince of Central Country!

name: Arthur
line: I will not take sides. Like the Sage, I want to play my part in bringing humans and wizards together. The < Great Catastrophe > is a threat to this entire world. Humans and wizards alike have to overcome it by working together.

name: Drummond
line: I understand...... I'll be taking my leave then.

name: Narrator
line: (Footsteps)

name: Arthur
line: ............ Sigh...... There is still a deep gulf between humans and wizards, but I can't give up. Someday, I'm sure we can all come to understand each other. I hope the wizards at the magic headquarters and the new sage are all right......

name: Narrator
line: (Footsteps)

name: Drummond
line: It is truly vexing how Prince Arthur insists on favoring the wizards......
Drummond.

name: Drummond
line: L-Lord Vincent!

name: Vincent
line: I believe my instructions were for you to bring the Sage to the castle at once. But it seems that you have failed to do so.

name: Drummond
line: M-My apologies! The wizards got in the way......

name: Vincent
line: We suffered immense damage from the < Great Catastrophe > precisely because those wizards slacked on their jobs. They say that wizards will obey the Sage. Before the new wizards gather, seize the Sage and make sure he bends to our will.

name: Drummond
line: B-but if we steal away the Sage, we'll just anger the wizards even further......

name: Vincent
line: There's no need to worry. As long as we control the sage, they'll have to obey us. This is all for the sake of the people of Central Country. ......He might very well be the son of my brother the King, but I won't allow Arthur to have his way any longer.

name: Narrator
line: At daybreak, I wake from my dream. I was half-hoping to wake up and find myself back in my old world, but it seems like this is my current reality.

name: Akira
line: (This still feels unreal...... But I'm grateful that I've landed myself in the company of good people.)

name: Narrator
line: I open the window, taking in the sound of birds chirping and the scent of morning dew. Somewhere in the distance, I hear the rippling of a stream. Without thinking, I inhale deeply, breathing in the fragrance of flowers carried by the wind. What a pleasant, refreshing mood to wake up to. Being surrounded by such a lush view of nature is enough to lift my spirits.

name: Akira
line: (How many days has it been since I last had a leisurely morning like this......) (What an endlessly blue sky. How pretty......) (......Ah......) (You can still see the huge white moon so clearly in the sky.)

name: Narrator
line: (Knocking)

name: Akira
line: Oh...... Yes!

name: Cain
line: Good morning, Sir Sage.

name: Cain
line: Good morning, Sir Sage.

name: Narrator
line: It's Cain's voice.

name: Akira
line: (The twins did say that Cain was a knight of Central Country, so he should be acquainted with Prince Arthur since they're from the same country.....)

name: Cain
line: Sir Sage. Are you still asleep?

name: Akira
line: Ah, I'm awake! Please give me a moment. I'm not properly dressed yet......

name: Cain
line: Oh, you don't have to worry about that. I'm sure you look wonderful even if you've just woken up.

name: Akira
line: ............ (What a devastatingly smooth line...... This guy must be really popular......)

name: Cain
line: But manners make the knight. I'll wait for you to get ready.

name: Akira
line: Th-thank you.

name: Cain
line: Take your time.

name: Narrator
line: (Rustle) (Door opens)

name: Narrator
line: After I finish getting ready, I open the door. As I do, Cain's smiling face gives way to confusion.

name: Cain
line: Huh? Where are you?

name: Akira
line: Eh? I'm right here.

name: Cain
line: Uh, where?

name: Akira
line: In front of you......

name: Cain
line: In front of me? See, you're not here.

name: Akira
line: Woah, that was my arm!

name: Cain
line: Eh?

name: Akira
line: I'm right in front of you. See, I'm here......

name: Narrator
line: I clasp Cain's hand with both of mine. In that moment, our eyes meet.

name: Cain
line: Ah, there you are. Why did you hide yourself?

name: Akira
line: I didn't; I can't even use magic.

name: Cain
line: Is that so...... Then why couldn't I see you?

name: Narrator
line: Cain thinks it over for a while, then looks back up suddenly.

name: Cain
line: Well, who cares.

name: Akira
line: A-are you sure?

name: Cain
line: It might be because of this one eye. See how one of my eyeballs is red?

name: Narrator
line: Cain bends down so that his gaze meets mine, and points to one eye with his finger.

name: Cain
line: This red one wasn't originally mine.

name: Akira
line: It's not yours......?

name: Cain
line: Yeah. A wizard with a terrible personality gouged out my eyeball and took it against my will.

name: Cain
line: And then he stuck one of his own eyes in there.

name: Akira
line: S......Some people do some scary things, huh.

name: Cain
line: I should've been more careful. But I'm going to defeat him someday and take my eyeball back.

name: Akira
line: D-did it hurt?

name: Cain
line: Of course it hurt. For a while it wouldn't listen to me at all, and it kept trying to look around at everything but where I was trying to look.

name: Narrator
line: Cain's resolute frown shifts into a grave expression.

name: Cain
line: It was Owen.

name: Cain
line: The guy who stole my eyeball. It was Owen, a Northern wizard. Don't get too close to him. The first thing you should do if you meet Owen is look away immediately. Don't listen to anything he says. It's over once you talk to him. If you don't keep ahold of yourself, he'll drag you into the depths of darkness.

name: Akira
line: ......I understand......

name: Narrator
line: Looking at my nervous expression, Cain laughs amiably.

name: Cain
line: Don't worry. I'll protect you no matter what happens. Owen doesn't really drop by anyway. Uh-oh, I forgot to address you formally. Sorry, Sir Sage. I get reprimanded for it fairly often, but I just.......

name: Akira
line: Oh..... You don't have to speak formally to me.

name: Cain
line: Really? That'd be a great help. I'm no good with manners and etiquette. Please, think of me as your friend. Let's take a walk outside. I'll listen to your request as we walk.

name: Akira
line: Huh?

name: Cain
line: I heard from Sir Snow and Sir White. You want to meet Prince Arthur, don't you? So that you can return to your world.

name: Narrator
line: Cain smiles, a little sadly.

name: Cain
line: Though I personally would like you to stay in this world.

name: Narrator
line: I walk alongside Cain, and look up into the sky. The huge white moon makes a faint outline against the blue skies.

name: Akira
line: It really is huge.......

name: Cain
line: What is?

name: Akira
line: The moon. I was just thinking that the moon in this world is so huge.

name: Cain
line: Well, it did just attack us yesterday.

name: Akira
line: Attack......?

name: Narrator
line: As Cain looks up at the moon, his eyes narrow into a glare.

name: Cain
line: That's the < Great Catastrophe >. It attacks once a year, trying to destroy this world. That is the opponent that we are up against.

name: Akira
line: The moon.....? Are you fighting the moon......!?

name: Cain
line: That's right. We intercept the moon's attacks and send them back into the sky - that's our role as the Sage's wizards.

name: Narrator
line: Wizards who fight against the moon.......

name: Narrator
line: I look up at the sky, struck speechless by that extraordinary tale. To think that every time that huge moon approaches, they have to fight against it in order to protect the world.

name: Akira
line: Once a year, every year......?

name: Cain
line: Yeah, every year.

name: Akira
line: Has it always been like this......?

name: Cain
line: Always.

name: Narrator
line: Cain shrugs.

name: Cain
line: It would be so much easier if only we could finish it off in one shot. But the same goes for most troublesome things in this world. You deal with them, then the next problem pops up...... The same thing happens again and again, and you just try to find a way to deal with it. You don't get a fairytale ending tied up neatly in a bow. You have to patiently carry on.

name: Cain
line: ......That's how things had been all along, and I accepted that fact. But the < Great Catastrophe > was really strange this year.

name: Akira
line: Strange, you say......

name: Cain
line: It was almost impossibly strong. It drew close with so much power that even the veteran wizards were no match for it...... There were twenty of us, but we lost half of our comrades......

name: Narrator
line: Cain falls silent, his eyes cast downwards.

name: Narrator
line: (Wind rustling)

name: Narrator
line: In the rays of the morning sun, a breeze sweeps through the air silently.

name: Cain
line: ......The < Great Catastrophe > got so close. I'm sure the capital suffered significant damage too. You said you wanted to meet Prince Arthur, right? He's in Granvelle Castle in the capital. I make trips to the castle pretty regularly, so I can take you along with me. I'm sure His Highness will welcome you warmly. But could I ask you to just hang in there and wait a little longer, until we can figure out the extent of the damage to the capital and get repairs under way?

name: Akira
line: (......The extent of the damage...... The moon drew close to this world. I can't even begin to imagine the sort of damage that would cause......) I understand...... I'm sorry for making such a selfish demand with everything else going on.

name: Cain
line: What are you saying? We're the ones making selfish demands of you when you're in a difficult situation. I'd hoped that you would come to like us, and this world, if possible...... But I understand that nothing quite beats the home where you've always lived.

name: Akira
line: If there's anything I can do in the time that I'm here.......

name: Cain
line: Are you sure?

name: Akira
line: Y-Yeah. I can clean, for example......

name: Cain
line: Leave the chores to us. But we do want you to perform the summoning ritual for the new wizards.

name: Akira
line: The new wizards?

name: Cain
line: Remember how I said our numbers were down to half? There were originally twenty of the Sage's wizards. Only the sage can summon new wizards to fill in for those we lost. Can I ask you to do that?

name: Narrator
line: I hesitate slightly at Cain's grave expression, then nod.

name: Akira
line: If it's something I can do, I'll give it a shot.

name: Cain
line: Guys, I have news! Sir Sage said he would perform the summoning ritual for the new wizards.

name: Narrator
line: Cain announces this in the dining room. Murr and Shylock turn their eyes towards him. But Cain tilts his head curiously.

name: Cain
line: Huh? Nobody's here?

name: Murr
line: I'm here! Morning, Cain, Sir Sage!

name: Cain
line: Murr? Where are you?

name: Murr
line: Inside your pocket!

name: Cain
line: Stop with your silly jokes. Come on, show yourself.

name: Murr
line: But I am showing myself? In fact, I don't know how much more I can reveal.

name: Cain
line: Ahaha, you're being silly.

name: Akira
line: Cain.... I do think there's something wrong with your eyes.

name: Narrator
line: That's when Snow and White appear.

name: Snow
line: Good morning.

name: White
line: Good morning, everyone.

name: Shylock
line: Good morning. How is Faust doi.... Ouch.

name: Cain
line: Shylock. Don't show up out of thin air right in front of my eyes.

name: Shylock
line: But you are the one who crashed into me headfirst.

name: Cain
line: Huh?

name: Shylock
line: Are you suffering from a hangover?

name: Cain
line: No, it's just that my eyes have been acting up..... But now that I think about it, I can't see the twins.

name: Snow
line: Ohoho. It certainly seems like there are strange things happening.

name: White
line: You see, we too were trapped within a painting last night.

name: Cain
line: Hey, don't turn this into a joke. I'm telling the truth here. Anyway, guess what? Sir Sage said he would perform the summoning ritual for the new wizards.

name: Shylock
line: That would help us out tremendously. Thank you, Sir Sage.

name: Murr
line: Yay! New comrades!

name: Akira
line: I don't know if I can pull it off, but I hope I can be of some help to you all.

name: Snow
line: We are grateful for your help, Sage. Well then, let's perform the summoning ritual a little past noon.

name: White
line: It's better to perform the ritual when the < Great Catastrophe > isn't visible in the sky.

name: Narrator
line: Snow and White say this, gazing up at the faint white moon. Shylock looks at me and smiles.

name: Shylock
line: Please take it easy until then. For now, let us enjoy some breakfast. Cain, could you go wake Heathcliff? The witches and the Southern wizards all turned to stone, so there's nobody to prepare breakfast for us all.

name: Cain
line: Can he even cook breakfast? I thought he was a noble young master.

name: Shylock
line: He's quite skilled with his hands, remember? Can you think of anyone else who can cook?

name: Cain
line: What about you? Don't you run a bar? The light meal you made for me the other day was delicious.

name: Shylock
line: I don't particularly feel like serving others first thing in the morning.

name: Cain
line: Then I'll cook. You just have to throw everything into a pot and let it boil, right?

name: Akira
line: Ah.... If you'd like, I can make something?

name: Akira
line: Ojiya!? I can make ojiya! I didn't realize I could eat ojiya in this world!

name: Cain
line: You sound delighted.

name: Shylock
line: That reminds me - the previous sage also said that delicious meals were the key to adapting to a new environment. Well then, I'll leave it to you. Let me take you to the kitchen.

name: Narrator
line: I am shaken by what awaits me in the kitchen.

name: Narrator
line: Unfamiliar ingredients are stuffed into transparent jars and lined up on shelves.

name: Narrator
line: A mysterious kind of dried seaweed, bottled up and labeled "feels like kombu"..... White grains labeled "feels like rice"....... A sticky, dark green substance labeled "pretty much miso"......

name: Akira
line: The sage before me really tried his best, huh.......

name: Narrator
line: I roll up my sleeves and grab a pot when Heathcliff comes running into the kitchen.
