name: Heathcliff
line: Let me help you, Sir Sage.

name: Akira
line: Ah, it's fine. Don't worry about it.

name: Heathcliff
line: No, I can't have that. I'm actually pretty good at this sort of thing, so please let me assist you.

name: Narrator
line: Heathcliff rolls up his sleeves and smiles at me. His beauty is honestly mesmerizing. At the same time, though, his smile is awkward: like a shy boy trying his best to be friendly. He's probably not a very outgoing person - but maybe he's trying to approach me because of everything that happened with Faust. He reminds me of Hanako from the old cat lady's place. She would first watch all the other cats clamor around me, and then cautiously approach me. I smile at him, hoping it'll help him feel at ease.

name: Akira
line: Thank you very much. I appreciate it.

name: Heathcliff
line: Of course. Um, what are you cooking?

name: Akira
line: I was going to make ojiya.

name: Heathcliff
line: Oh, that's the thing kind of like porridge that the previous sage used to make for us. The soup stock is the key to its flavor, right?

name: Narrator
line: Heathcliff ties his apron and waves his slender fingers like a conductor of an orchestra. The window opens, and an egg comes flying through the air. A kettle floats into the air and tilts water into a pot; it boils the moment it hits the pot, and in goes some "feels like kombu." The "feels like kombu" releases a screech and absorbs the water, expanding to over twice its original size as it transforms into the shape of a webbed hand.

name: Akira
line: ...What is this.....?

name: Heathcliff
line: It's submersive algae. It's a seaweed that clings to ships and drags them to the bottom of the ocean. I had never eaten it before either. Were you able to get a good rest last night?

name: Akira
line: Ah, yes. I fell asleep while reading the sage's manual.....

name: Narrator
line: I answer his questions in a daze while watching the various utensils and ingredients fly about the kitchen.

name: Narrator
line: (Tap tap tap)

name: Narrator
line: The eggs crack to a delightful rhythm and whip themselves up inside the bowl. While preparing the ojiya, Heathcliff begins to drip some coffee.

name: Akira
line: Wow, being a wizard really lets you do a lot......

name: Heathcliff
line: Huh?

name: Akira
line: Ah, it's nothing! There was coffee back in my world too. You're not going to use magic to prepare the coffee?

name: Heathcliff
line: Ahaha. I could, but I feel like it always tastes better when I make it manually. I do make sugar with magic. It's the first kind of magic that wizard children learn and practice. It might look simple, but it can actually be pretty difficult to get the star shape and sweet flavor right. Beginners make all kinds of mistakes: sometimes it stays as powdered sugar, or it doesn't really taste like anything, or it turns into sugar water.

name: Narrator
line: (Water boiling)

name: Narrator
line: The "feels like rice" reaches a boil, and Heathcliff drops the whipped eggs into the pot. They dance in perfect loops through the air as they make their gentle landing.

name: Heathcliff
line: The sugar we make has health benefits; it's known to reduce both physical and mental fatigue. That's why humans purchase sugar from us. Sir Sage, could you hold out your hand?

name: Narrator
line: I do as I'm told, offering Heathcliff my outstretched palm. He points to it with his index finger.

name: Narrator
line: And a few beautiful, star-shaped sugars tumble onto my palm.

name: Akira
line: Woah.... That's amazing!

name: Narrator
line: Heathcliff smiles bashfully in response.

name: Heathcliff
line: It's no big deal, really - any wizard can do this.

name: Narrator
line: I try to pinch the sugar with my fingertips, but it quickly dissolves into a fine powder. The delicacy reminds me of him.

name: Akira
line: (So this is what it's like to live in a world with magic.....) Um.... How does one become a wizard? If I memorize the spell that you used yesterday, will I be able to use magic too?

name: Narrator
line: If I could use magic, I'd like to try - that's what's going through my mind when I ask Heath my question. He looks like he doesn't really know how to answer me.

name: Heathcliff
line: Um..... You don't really get to choose whether or not you're a wizard. Wizards are born from humans at random. And the children of wizards aren't necessarily wizards either. It's like a sudden mutation of sorts. It's said that about one in ten thousand are born as wizards, and it looks like that number has been dwindling as of late. But wizards are also long-lived. The previous sage said it's not a job change, but more like a mutant hero.

name: Akira
line: I see.... So it's not like anyone who mutters a spell can use magic.

name: Heathcliff
line: Yes.... Spells are like charms that reinforce the heart in which magic power lies. That's why every wizard has a different spell. As you repeat your favorite words over and over again, they come to harbor mysterious powers - that's what I learned.

name: Akira
line: So your favorite words become your spell? Heathcliff, what does your spell mean?

name: Narrator
line: Heathcliff blinks, and purses his lip in surprise. He shyly lowers his gaze and mumbles, with bright red cheeks:

name: Heathcliff
line: .....Dusk, and the sound of rain......

name: Akira
line: Dusk and the sound of rain......

name: Heathcliff
line: Do you think it's weird.....?

name: Akira
line: Not at all. I love both dusk and the sound of rain.

name: Narrator
line: Heathcliff smiles, relieved. Though still bashful, he seems to have opened up a little as we continue cooking.

name: Heathcliff
line: I apologize. No one's ever really asked me that question, so I got a little nervous.....

name: Akira
line: Oh no, I'm sorry - was it rude of me to ask?

name: Heathcliff
line: No; I just thought it might sound a bit childish. Especially because some wizards have spells that mean things like "true love" and "the truth of the universe."

name: Akira
line: That sounds cool too. But I think my spell would be something like the title of my favorite song, or the name of a cat.

name: Heathcliff
line: You like cats?

name: Akira
line: Yes. I love them.

name: Heathcliff
line: Mr. Faust loves cats too. He tries to keep it a secret, but I've seen him covertly playing with them a number of times.

name: Akira
line: Really? I think we'll get along, then.

name: Heathcliff
line: He might seem scary, but he's a very good teacher.

name: Narrator
line: Before I knew it, Heathcliff was making eye contact and smiling as we spoke.

name: Heathcliff
line: According to Mr. Faust, "Just as humans fasten their bodies to objects to use them, wizards fasten their hearts to nature to harness it."

name: Akira
line: Fasten their hearts to nature.....

name: Heathcliff
line: Yes. The clearer the vision in your mind, the more powerful your magic, and the more likely your spell is to succeed.

name: Akira
line: The vision in your mind... So if you have great power, does that mean you can do anything at all?

name: Heathcliff
line: What a wizard can do with magic varies depending on the wizard's magical power, as well as his specialties and weak points. There are certain things we can't do, such as reviving the dead, or turning back time.... We can't create something out of nothing.

name: Akira
line: I see. But Heathcliff, it looked like you stopped time yesterday when you used your watch against the soldiers.

name: Heathcliff
line: Oh no, I didn't! I just imagined time had stopped in order to freeze their movements.

name: Narrator
line: Heathcliff laughs, his brows turned down.

name: Heathcliff
line: It would be nice if we could turn back time, though. I'm always so indecisive, so there are lots of things I'd like to redo.

name: Narrator
line: I feel the same. His ordinary commentary makes me feel closer to him.

name: Akira
line: (Magic can be surprising and all, but it looks like wizards can harbor the same feelings as humans.)

name: Heathcliff
line: ....All right, done. I'll take this out to the dining room.

name: Akira
line: Yes, please. Thank you.

name: Murr
line: Ya~y, breakfast time!

name: Shylock
line: Murr, no flying during mealtime. Sit down when you eat your food.

name: Snow
line: Oh. I've had this before. It's sojiya.

name: White
line: You must mean mojiya.

name: Cain
line: It's ojiya. I'm going to add the sal....

name: Narrator
line: (Bump)

name: Bradley
line: Ouch! What do you think you're doing!

name: Cain
line: Bradley.... When did you get here?

name: Bradley
line: I've been here the entire time! Did you leave your eyes at home!?

name: Heathcliff
line: You couldn't see me earlier either. Are you sure you're all right, Cain....?

name: Cain
line: This is getting to be a real problem.... But let's eat for now, before the food gets cold.

name: Shylock
line: You know, it's always bothered me how this meal called ojiya doesn't go well with coffee.

name: Narrator
line: As I spend time with them, I come to learn more about each of their personalities, bit by bit. Murr is whimsical and impulsive. Shylock is mature, but he does everything at his own pace. Cain is friendly, like an older brother. Heathcliff is shy. I don't know much about Bradley, but he's quick to lose his temper. And everyone seems to respect Snow and White. It reminds me of all the cats who lived in the old cat lady's yard. Each one lived life as it pleased. And you couldn't really tell if they got along, or hated each other. - Watching these wizards reminds me of that carefree lifestyle. As does listening to their very lively conversation.

name: Snow
line: That's right. We need to explain the < Great Catastrophe > to the Sage.

name: Cain
line: Oh, I discussed it with him earlier.

name: White
line: Oh, is that so? Excellent; it saves us the effort.

name: Snow
line: If you'd like to learn more, you should ask Murr. He once researched the < Great Catastrophe >, you see.

name: Shylock
line: The current Murr wouldn't be able to explain anything to you. He got too close to the secret behind it all, and it completely shattered his soul.

name: Akira
line: Shattered his soul.... Does that sort of thing happen often?

name: Shylock
line: It's certainly not common. But I could certainly say the same for exchanging eyeballs, or tying a ghost to this world using magic.

name: Bradley
line: Hah. What a bunch of weirdos.

name: Shylock
line: I'm quite fond of you all. Be it wine or humans - bizarre abnormalities carry stories that are just as rich as those of outstanding excellencies.

name: Cain
line: You really are a Western wizard.

name: Shylock
line: And you are very much like a Central wizard - you're honest to your very core.

name: Akira
line: Um.... when you say "like a Central wizard" or "Western wizard," what does that all mean?

name: Snow
line: There are five countries in this world: Central, North, West, East, and South.

name: White
line: A wizard's disposition varies depending on the country they reside in. The previous sage recorded it in the sage's manual.

name: Akira
line: The sage's manual.....

name: Narrator
line: Once I finish eating, I open up the sage's manual, which I brought from my room.

name: Narrator
line: (Flips)

name: Narrator
line: "It looks like four wizards from each of the five countries - Central Country, Eastern Country, Western Country, Southern Country, and Northern Country - are chosen as the Sage's wizards." "Some supernatural power chooses them, so the sage gets no say in who arrives. Which means I can't summon my own army of pretty witches. Pretty disappointing." "The wizards of each region share certain character traits." "Even if a wizard is born in one place, it may not necessarily be the land they're associated with; if they have lived in a country for long enough, they can grow accustomed to the traits of that land. So there are Eastern wizards who were born in the West." "Central wizards have strong hearts of justice. They care deeply about those close to them, and take on jobs that nobody else wants to do. Suited for leadership roles."

name: Akira
line: (Central wizards.... So Cain and Oz. I can definitely see how Cain is a Central wizard.)

name: Narrator
line: "Eastern wizards are usually total misanthropes. They're closed off, fundamentally serious, and like being left alone. They're cute when they become fond of you. But if you piss them off, they'll hold a grudge for the rest of their lives."

name: Akira
line: (Eastern wizards.... So Heathcliff and Faust.)

name: Narrator
line: "Western wizards are temperamental and whimsical. You can't hold a normal conversation with them. They live in their own worlds, and they really love festivals. Lots of weirdos here."

name: Akira
line: (Western wizards.... So Murr and Shylock.)

name: Narrator
line: "Southern wizards are kind and generous. You feel relaxed and at ease around them. They like helping others. But since they're quick to protect those in danger even though their magical powers aren't very strong, I'm always worried about them....."

name: Akira
line: (Southern wizards..... Huh, I haven't met any......) (I want to meet a Southern wizard.... Someone who's kind and makes you feel at ease.....)

name: Narrator
line: "Northern wizards are scary. They're extremely powerful. And they all hate each other. Totally self-centered. These guys would survive even a complete apocalypse."

name: Narrator
line: "I'm pretty sure they will all be here when the next sage arrives, so let me describe each of them in detail." "Snow and White. They're relatively peaceful and fairly cooperative. They love to joke around. They're the oldest wizards here - apparently they've lived for several thousands of years."

name: Akira
line: (Snow and White.... They've lived for even longer than I imagined.)

name: "Bradley. Warning
line: handle with caution. He used to be the boss of a crime group. Currently a prisoner. Terrifying when mad, but you can sort of appease him with food."

name: Akira
line: (Huh. Now that I think about it, he was eating a lot of ojiya.....)

name: "Owen. Warning
line: handle with caution. Creepy. Talking with him makes you feel like you're having a mental breakdown. Just make sure he never takes an interest in you and you should be all right."

name: Akira
line: (He's the one Cain was talking about.... He sounds scary......)

name: "Mithra. Maximum warning
line: handle with extra caution. Don't be fooled by his looks and his polite speech. He's a beast. He'll kill you."

name: Akira
line: (A beast..... He'll kill you....... I really don't want to meet him now.....) (Huh....? There's one more....?)

name: Narrator
line: "Oz. He's a Northern wizard who was summoned as a Central wizard for some reason. He's infamous for taking over the world with his magical powers."

name: Akira
line: (.....He took over the world.....?) (So he was an infamous dictator....? He looked scary, but I don't really think he was that bad a person.)

name: Shylock
line: What are you doing?

name: Narrator
line: Shylock takes a seat next to me as I read the sage's manual. On the table, he places a steaming bottle of wine, leaves of various shapes, small berries, and rose petals.

name: Akira
line: Ah.... There was still some time till noon - when we wanted to do the ceremony - so I was reading the sage's manual.

name: Shylock
line: You looked completely engrossed. Was it that interesting?

name: Akira
line: Yes. It contains stories about this world, and the wizards living in it..... Everything is so fascinating....

name: Shylock
line: I'm glad to hear it.

name: Narrator
line: Shylock smiles as he pulls apart the leaves, berries, and petals, placing them into the wine bottle. When the wine looks like it's about to overflow from the bottle, he pours it into a cup and drinks it. And then goes back to adding leaves to the bottle. He looks like he's enjoying himself.

name: Akira
line: What are you doing, Shylock?

name: Shylock
line: I'm making herbal wine. I run a bar in Western Country, after all.

name: Akira
line: You're supposed to save the world, but you also work at a bar?

name: Narrator
line: Shylock stuffs another petal into the jar as he smiles, his eyes twinkling.

name: Shylock
line: Saving the world doesn't put food on the table, after all. Though failing to save the world would also mean there would be no food on the table.

name: Akira
line: I-I see. That sounds like hard work.

name: Shylock
line: No, I quite enjoy it. I love this job, you see. It can bring about many troubles, but making the time to enjoy yourself leads to a richer and more fulfilling lifestyle.

name: Narrator
line: Shylock's words lighten up my heart. Now that I think about it - I came to such a strange new world, but I haven't yet managed to fully enjoy the opportunity. It would be nice if I could enjoy this world to its fullest before I return home.

name: Akira
line: Um... Would it be rude for me to ask a wizard to show me some magic?

name: Shylock
line: That all depends on the time, the place, and the person. If you were to ask me right now, I wouldn't find it particularly rude. If you begged me, "Please show me magic," I would in fact quite like it; it would feel like a naughty game. I would be tempted to act all bashful and reply, "Just for you, then."

name: Narrator
line: He gazes at me with alluring eyes, and for some reason, my cheeks turn bright red.

name: Narrator
line: (Snap)

name: Narrator
line: The wine bottle begins to boil at the snap of Shylock's fingers. The leaves, the rosebuds, and the berries all dance within the bottle as it spits out a white steam.

name: Shylock
line: I like to provide service by nature, so I couldn't stop myself from putting on a little show without you having to beg. But I'll be looking forward to an adorable "pretty-please" next time.

name: Narrator
line: Shylock smiles delightfully while casting me a seductive gaze.

name: Shylock
line: Wizards use magic with our hearts. That's why we adore love. At the same time, we're terrified of love, and we even loathe it. Yet wizards will fall in love with anything: be it men, women, animals, or stars. There are wizards who fall in love with the breeze and follow it around the world; there are wizards who fear flowers, and try to envelop the whole world in darkness. Sometimes, that becomes their entire life - from beginning to end. It might sound foolish, but I beg of you: do not laugh at us, Sir Sage. We are simply accepting our own dispositions with great earnestness, embracing and enjoying the day to day that our natures bring about as we march forward on our quests for happiness.

name: Narrator
line: The steam from the wine bottle begins to dissipate, and Shylock clears the table and stands up.

name: Shylock
line: I apologize for disturbing you. Please enjoy the rest of your book.

name: Akira
line: Ah.... No.... Do talk to me about wizards again. Your stories were fascinating. I love learning about wizards.

name: Narrator
line: Shylock blinks and smiles happily.

name: Shylock
line: Of course. I would love to.

name: Narrator
line: When the clock strikes noon, the wizards begin to gather. Snow and White are the first ones at the scene. It's time for the summoning ritual.

name: Snow
line: We'll explain the steps as you go through them. It'll be OJT.

name: White
line: We learned this phrase from the previous sage. OJT stands for "On-the-Job Training",you learn through example.

name: Snow
line: Classroom learning is called a lecture.

name: White
line: A discussion is called a meeting.

name: Snow
line: The mediator is called a trainer. Though we call them teachers.

name: Akira
line: I see.... Um, can I ask one question in advance? Is this going to hurt? Or will it be scary.....?

name: Narrator
line: Shylock and Murr look at each other.

name: Shylock
line: It didn't seem particularly painful or frightening to us?

name: Murr
line: Oh, but the previous sage might've cried?

name: Narrator
line: I flinch and take a step backwards.

name: Akira
line: P-please wait a moment. Can I read the sage's manual before we go on? I want to know what to expect before I head into this ritual......

name: Cain
line: Of course. I hope he wrote something about the ritual.

name: Narrator
line: I flip through the pages in a hurry, searching for text related to the summoning ritual.

name: Narrator
line: (Flip)

name: Akira
line: ...Found it!

name: Narrator
line: "On summoning new wizards" "When a wizard's magical powers wane and their crest disappears, they retire from being a Sage's wizard. That's when the sage summons a new wizard to take their place." "Also, when wizards turn to stone during a battle with the < Great Catastrophe >, the sage summons the same number of wizards to replace them. But this rarely happens." "Please see the following for details regarding the summoning process." "You place a mana stone into the goblet of something (I forget the name), drink the pitch-black liquid that emerges, and lift the goblet to the sky." "The black liquid smells like blood, and tastes like the worst mixture of honey, raw fish, herbs, and cheese that you could possibly imagine." "I cried drinking it."

name: Snow
line: Well done.

name: White
line: Well done, Sage.

name: Akira
line: I... I drank it..... Ughhh..........

name: Bradley
line: ......Damn, he really drank it all......

name: Cain
line: Great job, Akira!

name: Heathcliff
line: I'll serve you some delicious coffee later!

name: Murr
line: See, you did cry!

name: Shylock
line: I believe I too would break down in tears.

name: Snow
line: Sage. Lift the "Goblet of Judgment" above your head.

name: White
line: You mustn't let go of the goblet no matter what.

name: Narrator
line: Blinking back tears, I lift the goblet above my head with both arms. In that moment, a strange feeling runs through my body. It feels as if I've become a goblet in order to fulfill something yet to come.......

name: Narrator
line: An exhilarating impulse bubbles up from the depths of my body like a dragon soaring into the skies.

name: Narrator
line: (Woosh)

name: Narrator
line: It transforms into an actual gust of wind that whirls around me. The ceiling of the hall turns pitch black.

name: Akira
line: (......So this is the summoning ritual....!)

name: Narrator
line: (Rustle)

name: Heathcliff
line: ......The wind is so strong...... I wonder if Sir Sage is all right......

name: Snow
line: Do not worry. The summoning ritual is proceeding smoothly.

name: White
line: Right now, the Sage is becoming one with the "Goblet of Judgment."

name: Snow & White
line: So that he may bestow crests upon the newly chosen wizards.

name: Narrator
line: I feel like I can hear Snow and White's voices in the distance, but I can't see them. Forests, rainbow-filled skies, thunderstorms over erupting volcanoes - a cacophony of scenery changes rapidly in front of my eyes. I cling to the goblet, attacked by the sensation of hurtling through different ages and landscapes. "Don't let go no matter what." I recall Snow's warning, and tighten my grip.

name: Narrator
line: ......Before I know it, I'm awash in a sea of golden light. I feel like I'm standing on the moon.

name: Narrator
line: Words unknown to myself tumble out of my mouth. They ripple through the golden world around me, like water overflowing from a filled goblet. And then the golden world vanishes, as if someone drank it all up.

name: Snow
line: You did splendidly, Sage.

name: White
line: Well done. Ten rays of light shot out from the "Goblet of Judgment" and into the world.

name: Akira
line: D-does that mean the ritual was a success?

name: Snow & White
line: Yes, yes.

name: Akira
line: Woah......

name: Narrator
line: I duck down as Snow and White pat my head. Suddenly, I become keenly aware of the heavy weight of the goblet in my hand. Shylock takes it from me, smiling.

name: Shylock
line: You did an excellent job. Under the guidance of the light, crests should appear on the bodies of the newly chosen wizards.

name: Akira
line: Crests......

name: Narrator
line: Shylock continues to smile as he eases his collar open and loosely pulls it aside.

name: Narrator
line: Offering me a furtive glance at his chest. There, on the expanse of smooth skin near the swell of the left side of Shylock's chest, is a design that looks like a tattoo of a lily.

name: Shylock
line: This is the crest.

name: Narrator
line: I grow strangely flustered, both from the act of peeking down someone's collar and under the force of Shylock's sensuality.

name: Akira
line: Ah...... Th-thanks......

name: Shylock
line: My, my. Why is your face all red?

name: Narrator
line: Shylock chuckles amusedly.

name: Shylock
line: How adorable.

name: Shylock
line: The crest appears in a different place for each person. The wizards who manifest crests on their bodies will probably make their way here from the towers in each country.

name: Akira
line: Are they coming on their own? Um, won't there be people who pretend not to notice?

name: Cain
line: Unless the Sage's wizards are gathered, the world will be destroyed. They'll show up unless they wish for self-destruction.

name: Snow
line: Even if there are people like that, they'd get tracked down anyway under the enmity of every wizard in the world.

name: White
line: There's no point to such futile resistance.

name: Akira
line: I see how it is...... (The new wizards......) (I wonder what kinds of people will show up.)

name: Eastern Country
line: Capital.

name: Eastern Country man
line: ......Sigh...... Things are a mess everywhere you go thanks to the < Great Catastrophe >...... Hey, Owner. I'll have the usual.

name: Nero
line: Here you go.

name: Eastern Country man
line: Geez, what a horrible commotion...... And it's all thanks to those damn wizards. They must've slacked off on their jobs.

name: Nero
line: Ahaha. I wonder.

name: Eastern Country man
line: Have you ever met a wizard?

name: Nero
line: Ah...... I guess I have.

name: Eastern Country man
line: Wizards are all such sly, lazy bastards. They have incredible powers, but they won't lift a finger for us......

name: Nero
line: Well, I guess it's like.... You know how no one wants to work for free.

name: Eastern Country man
line: But they can use magic! They already have it easier than us average humans. What more do they want?

name: Nero
line: Haha...... Gratitude, maybe?

name: Eastern Country man
line: Hmph, how ridiculous......

name: Nero
line: Maybe they just want.... The sorts of things you take for granted, like appreciation or compassion. I mean, you say "I'm digging in," or "The meal was great," or "Thank you" whenever you eat my cooking.

name: Eastern Country man
line: Of course. You're a good, hardworking young man, and everything on your menu is delicious.

name: Nero
line: Haha. Thanks. ......hh.......

name: Eastern Country man
line: What's wrong!? Hey, is your arm all right!?

name: Nero
line: ......What's going on.......

name: Eastern Country man
line: H-hey......! Your arm is glowing......!

name: Nero
line: ............!? Don't tell me...... This crest is...... ......You've gotta be kidding me.......!?

name: Central Country
line: Church of Eschatology Headquarters.

name: Riquet
line: ......It seems like the outside world is in considerable upheaval.

name: Priest
line: Last night was the moment of Judgment that befalls us once every year. It seems that the ignorant wizards and humans have failed to protect this world. Listen to me, Revered Riquet, disciple of God. The world has sunken to such a state because of the sheer size of the foolish masses who have strayed from the righteous path. Wizards are neither the chosen ones, nor are they special. They are simply sent by God to serve His chosen humans.

name: Riquet
line: I understand, Father Priest. As a wizard...... No, as a disciple, my powers exist only to serve you and this church. For the sake of everyone here who exposed themselves to this degenerate world on my behalf and allowed me to live...... I will guide you all towards the righteous world with my power.

name: Priest
line: Now that's our Revered Riquet. Everyone, let us offer up our prayers!

name: Church woman
line: Show us the light, Revered Riquet!

name: Church man
line: Guide us through the darkness!

name: Church woman
line: Devote yourself to our service, and guide us on our path forward!

name: Riquet
line: Thank you. ......ugh......

name: Church man
line: What's wrong, Revered Riquet?

name: Riquet
line: ......My forehead is burning up...... Ah...... My head is on fire.......!

name: Church woman
line: There's a light coming from his forehead!

name: Church man
line: Look! What's that crest......!?

name: Riquet
line: ......Crest? Uu..... ......What crest......? Please stop this pain, Father Priest......

name: Priest
line: .....What's this mark......? I've seen it before...... Riquet! What have you done!?

name: Riquet
line: I don't know...... Help me, Father Priest...... You've always taught me everything! ......What is this light? What crest are you talking about?

name: Church woman
line: Revered Riquet!

name: Church man
line: Revered Riquet!

name: Western Country
line: Town near the border.

name: Chloe
line: Rustica. Okay, Rustica. Here's the plan-.

name: Rustica
line: Got it.

name: Chloe
line: Can you agree after you listen to me!?

name: Rustica
line: You're fussy about doing things in order, Chloe.

name: Chloe
line: Let's spend the night in this town. It looks like the damage from the < Great Catastrophe > isn't too bad here. But everyone is on edge from the attack, so let's keep it a secret that we're wizards.

name: Rustica
line: I'm not really keen on telling lies.

name: Chloe
line: But you said "got it"!

name: Rustica
line: Sorry. I got things out of order.

name: Chloe
line: It's not like we're actively lying! We're just keeping quiet, that's all. Also, try not to do "that thing" while we're here.

name: Rustica
line: What do you mean by "that thing"?

name: Chloe
line: It's the whole reason you're on this journey, Rustica.

name: Rustica
line: Ah, the journey in search of my missing bride. I'm afraid I can't agree to that proposal, Chloe. If I find my bride, I simply have to talk to her. And this time, we'll hold a magnificent wedding for real. I'll pledge my eternal love to her.

name: Chloe
line: I understand how you feel, Rustica. I also want to see your precious wish fulfilled. But...... How should I put it...... Aren't you kind of careless when it comes to searching for your bride......?

name: Rustica
line: No way. I'm more faithful than any saint.

name: Chloe
line: I get that you're extremely serious about it. I really get it, but...... It's a peculiar affair, or should I say, it's hard to understand......

name: Western baker
line: Fresh bread, straight from the oven~! My wheat storage bags burst, so bread's going for cheap today~!

name: Rustica
line: ......What a divine smell...... Only my bride could bake such delicious bread......

name: Chloe
line: Rustica!

name: Rustica
line: I've come for you, my bride.

name: Western baker
line: Huh!? Wha......!

name: Narrator
line: (Chirping)

name: Western Country woman
line: Ahhhhhhhh! The baker turned into a bird, and got sucked into that nobleman's birdcage!

name: Western Country man
line: Wizards! There are wizards in this town!

name: Chloe
line: Aaagh, right after I said all that! That guy's just some random uncle!

name: Rustica
line: We finally meet again, my darling little bird. I won't let you go this time. I love you.

name: Chloe
line: Stop it, Rustica....! ......Give me the birdcage.....!

name: Western baker
line: .....Aaagh..... Th-that was a shock! What's with this guy!?

name: Rustica
line: My bride....!

name: Chloe
line: He's obviously not!

name: Western Country woman
line: Those guys are wizards.....

name: Western Country man
line: Those wizards turned a man into a bird and captured him!

name: Chloe
line: ....Th-this is looking bad.... Let's go, Rustica.

name: Rustica
line: But you said we'd stay the night here?

name: Chloe
line: We're changing plans! Got it?

name: Rustica
line: Got it. Oh, look. I ended up saying "got it" after all.

name: Chloe
line: God, Rustica, I can never win with you. .....Let's go!

name: Rustica
line: All right.

name: Western Country woman
line: They're flying....!

name: Western Country woman
line: Wizards! Wizards came to kidnap us!

name: Western Country man
line: Someone might've been whisked away! Make sure your children are all safe!

name: Chloe
line: Sigh.... I guess we're stuck camping for another night.

name: Rustica
line: How unfortunate; it seemed like a nice town, too. I thought I was going to love it. I should've fixed their broken wall.

name: Chloe
line: Even if we end up loving a town, it doesn't mean the town will love us back.

name: Rustica
line: I like camping, too. The campfire is always warm and pretty, and the stars in the sky are such a sight to behold. I can have fun anywhere long as you're there with me, Chloe.

name: Chloe
line: Rustica...... Thanks. I feel the same - even though you're a master who really struggles with everyday tasks. ......hh.... Uugh.....!

name: Rustica
line: Chloe? Chloe, what's wrong?

name: Chloe
line: Wh-what is this..... ....hh....It's like my heart's on fire.........

name: Rustica
line: Are you okay? Let's make a landing somewhere. Hop onto my broomstick-..... ......! ....gh..... My throat........

name: Chloe
line: Rustica.....! Rustica, your neck is shining.....!

name: Rustica
line: ......So is your chest, Chloe...... .....I-is this.... A new fashion you came up with?

name: Chloe
line: Of course not! .....Wh-what is this.... Rustica, do you have any clue!?

name: Rustica
line: ......Th-this crest..... I remember now..... We...... We were chosen by the moon.

name: Southern Country
line: Village school.

name: Southern Country child
line: Mr. Rutile~. We finished cleaning~!

name: Rutile
line: Ye~s. Wow, it's so clean. Well done, everyone! We can't go home until they finish repairs in the village, but let's all work together to get through this. I'm sure it won't be long.

name: Southern Country child
line: Ye~s!

name: Rutile
line: All right. You're all free to do what you want till dinnertime!

name: Narrator
line: (Door opens)

name: Southern Country woman
line: Mr. Rutile. I'd like to boil some water - could you make a flame with magic?

name: Rutile
line: Of course. Should I head over to the fireplace, or would you just like some embers?

name: Southern Country woman
line: I think I'll take some embers, then. Let's see, could you put them in this pot?

name: Rutile
line: Of course. << Ortonik Setomaouge >>!

name: Southern Country woman
line: Oh!

name: Rutile
line: There we go!

name: Southern Country woman
line: Ah, thank goodness. I can prepare the pot now! It's really wonderful to have wizards around during times like these. You even lent us the school as an evacuation site.... The whole village is grateful for your help.

name: Rutile
line: Oh, it's nothing. I'm really grateful for all your delicious meals, too. It was truly a horrible disaster, but in Southern Country, wizards and humans work together.... So I'm sure everything will return to normal soon enough.

name: Southern Country woman
line: I agree!

name: Narrator
line: (Door opens)

name: Mitile
line: Nii-sama.

name: Mitile
line: Nii-sama.

name: Rutile
line: Mitile.

name: Southern Country woman
line: Oh, Mitile. Hello. Mr. Rutile just gave me embers to start a fire.

name: Mitile
line: Hello. Do you need help with anything? I can offer a hand.

name: Southern Country woman
line: Oh, it's all right. Well then, Mr. Rutile, I'll be going now.

name: Rutile
line: Yes. See you later.

name: Narrator
line: (Door closes)

name: Mitile
line: Nii-sama. Dr. Figaro said he'd stop by the school once he closes his clinic for the day. He said he wanted to talk to us about the crests that appeared on our bodies this afternoon.

name: Rutile
line: I see..... So these probably are the marks of the chosen wizards.

name: Mitile
line: Wizards chosen to fight against the < Great Catastrophe >, right? ....Yay! I was chosen!

name: Rutile
line: It's a difficult role, Mitile. Why are you so happy?

name: Mitile
line: It's an incredible role! It means the wizards from other regions won't make fun of us anymore! I won't let anyone call us Southern wizards "soft, slow, and weak" anymore!

name: Rutile
line: Goodness, Mitile. You're so competitive. If you take on a role for a reason like that, you won't be able to follow your heart when you want to be soft or weak.

name: Mitile
line: Follow my heart....?

name: Rutile
line: That's right. The source of a wizard's power is their heart. You simply need to follow your heart and do what you truly wish to do - do what you believe is right. No matter who makes fun of you, and no matter who you lose to - I will always love you, Mitile.

name: Mitile
line: ...I love you too, nii-sama. But that's exactly why I don't want anyone to make fun of you. Nii-sama, you used to have just as much power as the Northern wizards! Because our mother is.....

name: Rutile
line: The great witch Tiretta. Let's live our lives to the fullest so that she can feel proud in heaven.

name: Narrator
line: (Door opens)

name: Figaro
line: Hey, thanks for waiting.

name: Rutile
line: Dr. Figaro. Are you done with work for the day?

name: Figaro
line: Yeah. A lot of folks were injured, so it's been busy since this morning, but I managed to treat everyone.

name: Mitile
line: Dr. Figaro! You're going to tell us about these crests, right?

name: Figaro
line: Before I do, I'm going to introduce you to another wizard with the same crest. He's someone you know well. He stopped by the clinic earlier.... Leno. Lennox, come on in.

name: Rutile
line: Mister Lennox! It's Mister Lennox, the shepherd!

name: Lennox
line: Hello.

name: Mitile
line: It's been a while! Is the little lamb that I hugged all grown up now?

name: Lennox
line: Yes. He's growing up big and strong.

name: Rutile
line: Mister Lennox, is there a crest on your body as well....?

name: Lennox
line: ....Right here.

name: Mitile
line: You're right.... It's the same lily crest.....

name: Rutile
line: So if there are four wizards with new crests.......

name: Figaro
line: It means that none of the Southern wizards who left to fight the < Great Catastrophe > will be coming home......

name: Rutile
line: ....I can't believe it.... They were all such kind people......

name: Mitile
line: Dr. Figaro..... Does that mean the same thing might happen to us....?

name: Figaro
line: Don't worry, Mitile. You two are the sons of the great witch Tiretta. Plus, he might be a shepherd now, but Lennox is an experienced soldier.

name: Rutile
line: Huh!

name: Mitile
line: Wait, really!?

name: Lennox
line: .....I'm not really that experienced........ I've simply wandered the world for many years. That's all.

name: Mitile
line: That's kind of cool......

name: Rutile
line: I didn't realize you were such an amazing person....

name: Figaro
line: See? Feeling a bit better now?

name: Mitile
line: What about you, Dr. Figaro? Is there anything cool about you?

name: Rutile
line: Hey. Don't be rude, Mitile.

name: Mitile
line: I have to know! The wizards from other countries are going to laugh at us - especially the Northern wizards. They're extra mean.

name: Figaro
line: But don't you think Dr. Figaro is cool as he is? My shot-administering techniques have won the whole town over.

name: Rutile
line: Your shots hurt, Doctor.

name: Lennox
line: ....Dr. Figaro. Have you not told the two of them?

name: Figaro
line: Shh. Stay quiet about that for now.

name: Rutile
line: What is it?

name: Lennox
line: Ah..... It's nothing.........

name: Mitile
line: Ahh, geez, there you go keeping secrets again! You know, Dr. Figaro said he'd stop drinking the other day, but I found a stash of alcohol tucked away in his cabinet!

name: Figaro
line: Sorry, sorry. Keeping secrets just happens to be my hobby.

name: Rutile
line: That's not a very good hobby, you know?

name: Figaro
line: Forgive me, Rutile. That's just how I am. In any case, we're going to head to the Southern tower tonight, so start packing now.

name: Lennox
line: Will do.

name: Rutile
line: I wonder if everyone in the village will be okay......

name: Figaro
line: Let's do everything we can before we head on out. The < Great Catastrophe > is shaping up to be a real monster this year. I don't know when we'll be able to return.

name: Rutile
line: Yes.... I understand. I hope that no more terrible things will happen.....

name: Narrator
line: The summoning ritual is over; it's nighttime now.

name: Akira
line: (I wonder when the new wizards will arrive.....) (It must be rough. They were all living their own lives up till today, and now they suddenly have to take on this tremendous role.....) (I guess the same goes for me, but.....)

name: Narrator
line: (Knock knock)

name: Heathcliff
line: May I speak to you for a moment, Sir Sage?

name: Akira
line: Ah, I'm sorry. I'm already in my pajamas, so could you give me some time to change?

name: Heathcliff
line: Ah.... Excuse me. Of course; I'll be waiting right here.

name: Narrator
line: I put on a jacket and look for a scarf to keep me warm. But the only thing I can find is a flashy shawl that seems to be made of bird feathers, so I sigh and wrap it around my neck.

name: Akira
line: Thank you for waiting.

name: Narrator
line: (Door opens)

name: Heathcliff
line: Sir Sage.... .....Ah-choo!

name: Akira
line: S-sorry about the feathers.....

name: Heathcliff
line: No no, it's fine. Are you headed out to a ball?

name: Akira
line: This does look pretty flashy, doesn't it?

name: Heathcliff
line: I think it suits you very well. But we may not have time to dance tonight. Sir Sage. Murr found a strange man sneaking around the magic headquarters.

name: Cock Robin
line: P-please wait! I'm not suspicious! Please don't kill me.....!

name: Akira
line: (Ah.... He's the person who was with the bearded guy I met when I first arrived in this world.....)

name: Murr
line: He was wandering around looking for the entrance to the magic headquarters!

name: Cain
line: We keep the entrance hidden with magic. Those who are officially welcome would be permitted to pass through.

name: Shylock
line: And why were you sneaking around the magic headquarters? What business do you have? Which organization do you belong to?

name: Akira
line: Please wait! I think he was with the old bearded man! If I'm remembering correctly - he's Cock Robin, the secretary of Central Country.

name: Cock Robin
line: Yes! That's right!

name: Shylock
line: Now that you mention it.....

name: Cain
line: I do feel like I've met him before.

name: Murr
line: I'm quick to forget things that don't interest me.

name: Heathcliff
line: So what is the secretary of Central Country doing here?

name: Cock Robin
line: Ah, I guess I was taking a walk.......

name: Shylock
line: A word of advice: lies will get you nowhere with wizards.

name: Cock Robin
line: I'm sorry.... Sir Drummond ordered me to lure the sage out from the magic headquarters! He said, "So long as we have the sage, we can take over the magic headquarters using military force, and make the wizards listen to our commands!"

name: Cain
line: What did you just say!?

name: Cock Robin
line: I-it wasn't my idea! Those were just my orders! I didn't want to come near the magic headquarters either! You wizards could kill me! Plus.....

name: Narrator
line: Cock Robin looks down; he sounds like he's about to cry.

name: Cock Robin
line: I don't actually want to do this to you all, after everything you've done. You fought against the < Great Catastrophe > for us. But I also understand where the minister is coming from. Wizards possess great power, but we cannot control them.....

name: Heathcliff
line: .....Why must we be controlled?

name: Narrator
line: Heathcliff's eyes reflect disgust and a tinge of sadness.

name: Cock Robin
line: Th-that's.... In order to save the world......

name: Heathcliff
line: But we fought to save the world!

name: Narrator
line: Shylock has had enough. He makes his contempt even more apparent.

name: Shylock
line: There's nothing we can do. No matter how great the sacrifices we make; no matter how gently we smile to them.... As long as we possess these unknown powers that make us stronger than them, they will see us as enemies. This "cooperation" they so insist on is merely a guise.

name: Cain
line: Cut it out.

name: Narrator
line: Cain shakes his head bitterly at their words.

name: Cain
line: I agree that Minister Drummond and his agency take an overbearing stance towards wizards. I don't like their tactics either. But that doesn't mean all humans are like them. There has to be another path forward - one where wizards and humans can work together.

name: Cock Robin
line: Yes! Yes! That's the sort of thing I wanted to say!

name: Murr
line: So what should we do?

name: Cain
line: Let's consult Sir Snow and Sir White.

name: Murr
line: Sure. Here you go.

name: Cain
line: .....? What is this frame.....?

name: Heathcliff
line: A portrait of Sir Snow and Sir White....?

name: Snow in the portrait
line: Sage.

name: White in the portrait
line: Sage.

name: Akira
line: Woah, they spoke.....

name: Snow in the portrait
line: It's the same as last night.

name: White in the portrait
line: We've gotten trapped inside this portrait.

name: Akira
line: What do you mean!?

name: Cain
line: Wait, so that wasn't a joke!?

name: Murr
line: Ahaha, this is neat!

name: Snow in the portrait
line: This is no laughing matter, Murr.

name: White in the portrait
line: For some reason, we can't use magic while we're in here.

name: Snow in the portrait
line: We've tried to escape the frame, but.....

name: Snow & White in the portrait
line: Mmgh.....

name: Narrator
line: The two of them slide out of the frame.

name: Snow & White in the portrait
line: But this is our limit.

name: Shylock
line: So you can come out of the portrait. Why are you playing around?

name: Snow
line: Take a closer look.

name: White
line: Our shadows are still stuck within the frame.

name: Heathcliff
line: How did this happen....? Were you two cursed....?

name: Snow
line: A curse....

name: White
line: Perhaps it was.....

name: Bradley
line: Hey, you lot!

name: Narrator
line: At that moment, Bradley appears. He grins widely, aggression written across his face.

name: Bradley
line: I removed the barrier around the magic headquarters for you.

name: Cain
line: You did what!?

name: Bradley
line: And now we're going to kill those bastards out there. If they attack us, we get to give them what they're looking for, right? I didn't get to have any fun during our battle with the < Great Catastrophe >, so I can't wait to give them a good fight.

name: Cock Robin
line: W-wait! Please don't do anything violent!

name: Heathcliff
line: You were the ones who attacked us first.

name: Shylock
line: Oh, dear. I fear that we might have an all-out war between humans and wizards before the < Great Catastrophe > attacks next year.

name: Murr
line: Ahaha! Peace never lasts; that's just how it is!

name: Narrator
line: Portrait still in hand, Murr twirls around up into the air.

name: Murr
line: We only get along when we have the leisure to care for others. But the world is in absolute chaos now because of the < Great Catastrophe >! Neither humans nor wizards can afford to be kind right now, because they're all so worried about themselves. Just as I can love the < Great Catastrophe > when it gently illuminates the night sky, but must push it back when it gets too close.

name: Narrator
line: Murr's eyes gleam like those of a mischievous cat; I can't tell whether he's being sarcastic or genuine.

name: Akira
line: (A war between humans and wizards...... That would be a complete disaster.) (That bearded old man might be infuriating, but that doesn't mean we should kill each other.) (I have to do something about this......)

name: Narrator
line: In my desperation, I look at Bradley. I shiver at the sight of his combative grin. Up till now, I had thought of him as an older brother type, just with a quick temper. But the expression on his face is colder, more terrifying, and filled with more beast-like ferocity than the light of the < Great Catastrophe > itself.

name: Snow
line: Bradley.

name: White
line: Stop. You must not.

name: Bradley
line: Shut up, you old geezers. You really think I'm going to listen to you? Haha...... Seems like your magic really is weaker when you're trapped inside that painting.

name: Narrator
line: (Sword unsheathed)

name: Cain
line: I won't let you, Bradley.

name: Bradley
line: Ahaha! Drawing your sword won't get you anywhere! Some upstart like you can't stop me! I am the great Northern wizard Bradley, leader of the Bandits of Death! I'll kill you all - humans and weak wizards alike!

name: Akira
line: ......P-please stop......!

name: Bradley
line: Shut up! You've got some nerve, locking me up like that!

name: Narrator
line: I draw back in surprise at Bradley's raised voice. As I do, the feathers on my shawl flutter into the air.

name: Bradley
line: I'm never going back to that prison ce...... ......Ah, achoo!

name: Narrator
line: (Bradley disappears)

name: Narrator
line: And with that, Bradley disappears.

name: Cain
line: ......He disappeared!?

name: Heathcliff
line: Where did he go!? Did he run away!?

name: Snow
line: Bradley was not using magic.

name: White
line: He was sent flying by some other force.

name: Shylock
line: Some other force.... What a bizarre night this is shaping up to be.

name: Murr
line: But of course. We got so close to the < Great Catastrophe >, after all.

name: Cain
line: For now, we need to figure out how to handle the minister and his forces - they'll be here any moment now.

name: Heathcliff
line: Any moment now?

name: Cain
line: Yeah. Cock Robin mentioned it earlier, remember? Don't worry. I'll handle.....

name: Heathcliff
line: Cain, can't you see? There are already soldiers gathered in the courtyard.

name: Cain
line: No way....?

name: Drummond
line: No need to hold back! Cock Robin should've gotten the Sage out of there!

name: Soldier
line: The magic headquarters suddenly appeared out of thin air.....

name: Soldier
line: Isn't this all a trap set up by the wizards?

name: Drummond
line: Do not flinch! We must punish the wizards for kidnapping the Sage! We need to place the Sage under our control so that we can tame those damn wizards before Prince Arthur finds out! How dare they turn me into a mouse! I'm going to squeakcure - secure my revenge!! Onwards, troops!

name: Narrator
line: (Soldiers chant)

name: Shylock
line: I suppose we have no choice but to fight. Let's go and shake them off, Murr.

name: Murr
line: Okay!

name: Akira
line: Please wait!

name: Shylock
line: Sir Sage.....

name: Akira
line: Um, we're supposed to be fighting the < Great Catastrophe >, right? Why are we fighting against humans?

name: Heathcliff
line: Because they're attacking us.

name: Akira
line: Mister Cock Robin, why are you attacking the wizards?

name: Cock Robin
line: We're not trying to attack them! We simply want to keep the wizards under control, because they're disturbing the peace.......

name: Snow
line: What a convenient definition of "peace" you have.

name: White
line: You made us fight the < Great Catastrophe >, and yet you demand even more of us.

name: Cock Robin
line: That's because we can't fend it off ourselves! But we are grateful to you all!

name: Murr
line: Okay, then this is a party!

name: Cock Robin
line: It's certainly not a party, but.....

name: Akira
line: (I see.... Humans are afraid of wizards....) (They believe the strength that protects them is also the power that could potentially hurt them.) (If wizards existed back in my world, would the same sort of thing have happened....?)

name: Narrator
line: That thought makes me very sad.

name: Shylock
line: Well, I'll head out and calm them down for now. Do not worry-....

name: Murr
line: Shylock?

name: Heathcliff
line: Shylock....!?

name: Cain
line: Shylock's chest is on fire.....!

name: Narrator
line: Shylock crouches down on the spot, clutching his chest in pain.

name: Narrator
line: Flames envelop Shylock's chest, right around the crest he showed me earlier. Shylock's face twists in pain as he forces himself to speak.

name: Shylock
line: .....My heart.... ....My heart is on fire.......

name: Murr
line: Shylock.....

name: Murr
line: Does it hurt?

name: Shylock
line: ....You horrible man...... Can't you tell......

name: Snow
line: It seems like we truly are feeling the effects of the < Great Catastrophe >......

name: White
line: We got too close to the < Great Catastrophe > - and suffered invisible wounds as a result of last night's battle.

name: Heathcliff
line: We all did....!?

name: Snow
line: Indeed. We might not have realized it at the time, but our souls all sustained serious wounds.

name: White
line: And each of our wounds manifests itself differently. Take, for example, Cain's eyes and Bradley's disappearance. And us, trapped in our portrait.

name: Cain
line: ....What should we do.....?

name: Soldiers
line: Aaaaaagh.....!

name: Heathcliff
line: ....Here come the soldiers. Sir Sage, please stand behind me! I will protect you.

name: Cain
line: Heath! Take care of Shylock.... And also Sir Snow and Sir White!

name: Heathcliff
line: Got it... -Uh, that's a lot of people!?

name: Cain
line: Murr. You come with me. Tell me where the enemy is!

name: Murr
line: Got it!

name: Cain
line: I'll leave the rest to you!

name: Narrator
line: (Footsteps)

name: Heathcliff
line: Uh.... G-got it!

name: Akira
line: Heathcliff, please take care of Shylock. I'll hold Snow and White's portrait!

name: Heathcliff
line: Thank you! Let's escape to the magic tower for now! Shylock, are you all right?

name: Shylock
line: .....gh.... I wonder.... Would you like to swap places with me and find out?

name: Heathcliff
line: No way, I don't want my heart to burn up..... ....I hope my wound isn't painful......

name: Shylock
line: Heh.... Saying that means you'll......

name: Heathcliff
line: Don't talk! It hurts, right?

name: Soldier
line: There they are! Get them.....!

name: Narrator
line: Heath turns around while supporting Shylock on his shoulder. His pocket watch is in his hands.

name: Heathcliff
line: << Repsevaivulp Sonus >>

name: Narrator
line: Following Heathcliff's spell, the dining chairs and tables begin to creak and wrap around each other like entangled ivy. The barricade stops the soldiers from moving forward.

name: Heathcliff
line: Hurry, this way! Let's hide in the tower!

name: Narrator
line: Heathcliff leads us to a tower with an elevator, much like the one I saw when I first arrived in this world. We rush into the tower and come to a halt.

name: Heathcliff
line: We should be safe here... ......!

name: Heathcliff
line: The courtyard is on fire! Someone must have shot a flaming arrow..... ....Do they hate us that much.....

name: Snow
line: That's not it. They're simply afraid.

name: White
line: Those overwhelmed with fear will do anything to protect themselves and those important to them.

name: Heathcliff
line: But that doesn't mean they should.... ......!

name: Shylock
line: .....The fire reached the tower.......

name: Heathcliff
line: I'll extinguish it with magic! << Repsevaivulp... >>

name: Narrator
line: (Door opens)

name: Soldier
line: There they are! Get them with arrows!

name: Soldier
line: We need to attack them before they kill us with their magical fire! Don't hold back! Wizards can't die!

name: Shylock
line: Don't be ridiculo.... Uugh... gh....!

name: Akira
line: Shylock!

name: Soldier
line: Fire!

name: Heathcliff
line: Sir Sage! Shylock!

name: Narrator
line: As Shylock crouches to the ground and I bend down to support him, the soldiers unleash a wave of arrows at us.

name: Narrator
line: If those arrows strike their mark, will it hurt? Will I die? Will I never see my home again? Countless thoughts race through my head in a single moment. But right when the arrows are about to strike-.... A tranquil voice echoes across the room.

name: Faust
line: << Satillquinart Mullcreed >>

name: Narrator
line: In a flash, the arrows are engulfed in quiet flames and fall to the floor. The person standing beyond the embers that dance like burning petals is..... Faust - who had been on the verge of death.

name: Heathcliff
line: Mr. Faust!

name: Faust
line: ....So the humans came to attack us......

name: Narrator
line: It's clear that he hasn't recovered yet - Faust's shoulders heave with pain as he sneers.

name: Faust
line: That sounds just like them..... They're quick to fear, quick to welter, and quick to attack. I'm sick of playing their games. -If you so dearly desire an eternal slumber, I'll grant it to you. Right now.

name: Snow
line: Faust. Stop.

name: White
line: Hurting humans will only exacerbate the problem. You must hold back.

name: Faust
line: I did hold back. In the distant past. And you know exactly how my story ended. ....Humans simply repeat history, time and again......

name: Narrator
line: That's when the doors on the other side of the room begin to creak. Thump, clatter - the sound of something being carried this way.

name: Akira
line: (Those doors. Is that an elevator....?)

name: Shylock
line: .....The elevator......

name: White
line: They've been summoned!

name: Snow
line: The new wizards are coming!

name: Heathcliff
line: The new wizards......

name: Soldier
line: More wizards are coming to attack us!?

name: Soldier
line: R-run....!

name: Narrator
line: The doors slowly open. And one by one, the wizards step out.

name: Shino
line: I'm Shino, an Eastern wizard. I'll be in your care.

name: Nero
line: .......Eastern wizard, Nero. ......Well, nice to meet you......

name: Riquet
line: I'm Riquet, a Central wizard. I don't know much about the outside world, but...... Please take care of me.

name: Rustica
line: I'm Rustica, a Western wizard. Thank you for inviting me here. By the way, has anyone seen my bride?

name: Chloe
line: I'm the Western wizard Chloe! I've been travelling the world with Rustica, and I used to be a tailor. Um, I hope we can get along!

name: Rutile
line: I'm Rutile, a Southern wizard. I was a teacher in the South. I'm glad to meet you all.

name: Mitile
line: I'm Mitile, a wizard of the South! I'm the great witch Tiretta's son. Ahem. Pleased to meet you.

name: Lennox
line: ....Lennox. I'm a Southern wizard. Nice to meet you.

name: Figaro
line: I'm the Southern wizard Figaro. Please take care of me.

name: Arthur
line: I'm Arthur, a Central wizard. Sir Sage, I look forward to working with you.

name: Arthur
line: ......! What in the world is going on here!?

name: Chloe
line: A fire!? And soldiers!? What's happening!?

name: Rustica
line: I put on my best introduction, but it looks like everyone is rather busy at the moment.

name: Nero
line: Oh, come on.....

name: Riquet
line: ....So this is the outside world......

name: Mitile
line: Are the Sage's wizards being attacked by soldiers? But why?

name: Shino
line: Who cares why? I'm here to help the Sage's wizards. I'll put them down right now.

name: Figaro
line: Wait a second.

name: Shino
line: What?

name: Figaro
line: We shouldn't attack the military using magic - it'll just complicate things for the future. Leno, can I count on you?

name: Lennox
line: Got it.

name: Rutile
line: Mister Leno! Let me help you!

name: Lennox
line: No. Stand back; it's dangerous.

name: Narrator
line: (Footsteps)

name: Mitile
line: H-he's kind of cool......

name: Narrator
line: One after another, new faces step through the elevator doors. I can't really make out what each of them looks like from a distance, but I notice a tall young man approaching us.

name: Soldier
line: H-he's gonna kill us! Fire your arrows!

name: Soldier
line: Make a run for it when he flinches.....!

name: Heathcliff
line: Stop!

name: Narrator
line: The soldiers prepare their arrows. But before they can even draw their bows, the young man leaps off the ground and lands right in front of them. Immediately after his feet strike the ground, he delivers a sweeping kick and knocks out the soldiers surrounding him.

name: Rutile & Mitile
line: So cool.....!

name: Nero
line: ....What is that guy? A mercenary?

name: Figaro
line: No, he's a shepherd.

name: Nero
line: A shepherd!?

name: Riquet
line: ....I don't know any shepherds like him......

name: Shino
line: He's huge.....

name: Soldier
line: Aaaaaagh........!

name: Narrator
line: (Footsteps)

name: Narrator
line: The soldiers flee, pulling their injured comrades along. The tall young man offers us his hand.

name: Lennox
line: Are you all right?

name: Akira
line: Thank you......

name: Narrator
line: But as he helps me and Shylock back to our feet, his eyes widen. His astonished gaze is fixed directly on Faust. Faust, too, holds his breath.

name: Lennox
line: .....Sir Faust.......

name: Drummond
line: These damn wizards...... Did they use fire magic!? Are they trying to burn our soldiers to the ground!?

name: Soldier
line: Sir Drummond! We've been ordered to stop fighting!

name: Drummond
line: Ordered to stop fighting!? Who aside from me is allowed to issue commands to these soldiers!?

name: Soldier
line: Well......

name: Drummond
line: What!? Prince Arthur has been summoned as one of the new Sage's wizards!?

name: Narrator
line: (Arthur appears)

name: Arthur
line: Minister! Why did you attack the magic headquarters!?

name: Drummond
line: P-Prince Arthur......! It's because the wizards attacked my subordinates, and......

name: Arthur
line: You were the ones who attacked them! I clearly recall telling you to let them rest and to invite them to the castle! This is a time in which humans and wizards need to work together to take down the < Great Catastrophe >. I can't believe what you've done.....

name: Drummond
line: It's for your sake, Prince Arthur! I'm trying to make sure these wizards won't trick you into-....

name: Arthur
line: Stop calling them "these wizards." I too am a wizard. Have I ever tried to deceive you? Is that how you've felt about me for all these years?

name: Arthur
line: .....Please apologize and help to restore the magic headquarters. Anyone would be furious if you attacked their home. We're the same - aren't we also grieving because the < Great Catastrophe > destroyed our town and castle?

name: Murr
line: Shylock, are you okay?

name: Shylock
line: It seems to have subsided.... Were you worried about me, Murr?

name: Murr
line: Did it make your heart pound? Did you cry? Man, if you cried, I wish I could have seen it myself!

name: Shylock
line: Fufu. One day, I'll inflict the exact same pain on you, and take delight in your screams as I open a fresh bottle of wine. Just you wait.

name: Cain
line: ....Sigh.... What a ruckus. And suddenly we have so many people.....

name: Narrator
line: I glance around the now-lively dining room.

name: Mitile
line: Mister Lennox, I didn't know you were so strong! You were really cool back there!

name: Lennox
line: Ah, thanks. ....I wonder where he went......

name: Rutile
line: It was amazing. Please show us that move one more time!

name: Lennox
line: It's really nothing impressive......

name: Rutile & Mitile
line: Please, please!

name: Shino
line: Those guys are so excitable..... Are they from the South?

name: Figaro
line: And you're the hot-blooded kid from earlier. Are you by chance the Eastern wizard Shino?

name: Shino
line: I am. How did you know?

name: Figaro
line: I heard from a friend of mine that there was a young, powerful wizard in the East, and you seemed to fit the description.

name: Shino
line: Description?

name: Figaro
line: Small and-....

name: Shino
line: What's your name?

name: Figaro
line: I'm the Southern wizard Figaro.

name: Shino
line: Figaro. I'll get real tall next year, and look down on that head of yours.

name: Figaro
line: Ahahaha, my bad. Let's get along, Shino.

name: Mitile
line: Who is that guy....? Wasn't he being kind of rude to you, Dr. Figaro?

name: Figaro
line: He's the guardian of the Eastern forest. The woodlands there are so dense and vast that they're impossible to navigate without a guide. I hear Shino is an excellent guide. He's a wizard with a promising future ahead of him.

name: Mitile
line: Huh, that's amazing..... But I'm good at giving people directions too. And I know how to read maps.

name: Figaro
line: You're right, Mitile. You've got a promising future as well.

name: Mitile
line: Ehehe.

name: Rutile
line: Here we go. I'll help you guys clean up. Where should I put this chair?

name: Soldier
line: T-take it over there.

name: Rutile
line: All right. Mister Lennox, they want it over here.

name: Lennox
line: Got it. Rutile, your pocket.

name: Rutile
line: My pocket?

name: Lennox
line: Your pen's about to fall.....

name: Narrator
line: (Clatter)

name: Rutile
line: Woah.... Ahaha. Mister Leno, you speak so leisurely.

name: Lennox
line: Haha. Sorry.

name: Soldier
line: ....Um, you dropped your pen.

name: Rutile
line: Oh, how kind of you. Thank you very much.

name: Soldier
line: A wizard said thank you......

name: Soldier
line: A-are you sure he wasn't just being sarcastic? Or maybe he was cursing us.....

name: Rutile
line: Ah!

name: Soldier
line: .....! Wh-what is it!?

name: Rutile
line: Poor soul - you're injured.

name: Soldier
line: This is because your fellow wizards-....!

name: Rutile
line: << Ortonik Setomaouge >>

name: Rutile
line: There we go. You should be fine now; please take care.

name: Soldier
line: .....Th-thank you......

name: Lennox
line: What's wrong?

name: Rutile
line: He was injured, so I healed his wounds. It looks like everyone is hurt all over.

name: Lennox
line: Well, getting injured is a soldier's job, after all.

name: Rutile
line: That's incredible. I'd be so concerned if the same thing happened to my students. I was surprised they were waging an all-out battle back there, but if they're the kind of people who can say thank you, I believe we can get along with them.

name: Nero
line: ........... God, what am I going to do about my restaurant.... No, I guess I can't even work there anymore. They've probably caught on that I'm a wizard.....

name: Riquet
line: Excuse me......

name: Riquet
line: I'd like to speak with whoever is in charge here.

name: Nero
line: Sigh......

name: Riquet
line: There's a strange mark on my forehead - the fact that it's so prominent is causing me trouble. Are you an authorized party?

name: Nero
line: Nope, I was dragged into this too. Go find someone else if you have a complaint......

name: Riquet
line: I see. Thank you.

name: Nero
line: You're welcome. Sigh...... I want to go home......

name: Riquet
line: Um, excuse me.

name: Chloe
line: Yes, yes!

name: Riquet
line: Sorry for the sudden request, but could you erase this mark from my forehead? I'll leave immediately once that's done.

name: Chloe
line: Huh? You can erase this thing? Rustica said you couldn't.

name: Riquet
line: Eh? I can't have that......

name: Chloe
line: I feel you. Sometimes you just want to switch up your style - I want it to match my outfit for the day, you know?

name: Riquet
line: Dressing up is an extravagance for the vain. Wizards, who are the disciples of God, need to be frugal......

name: Chloe
line: What's a disciple of god.....? You don't like dressing up.....?

name: Riquet
line: I see you've been tainted by worldly desires. How tragic.

name: Chloe
line: S-sorry......

name: Riquet
line: Where is this person in charge called Mister Rustica?

name: Chloe
line: Person in charge?

name: Riquet
line: You heard about this mark on my forehead from Mister Rustica, right?

name: Chloe
line: Oh, Rustica just happened to know about it. But I wouldn't say he's in charge of anything......

name: Rustica
line: You called for me?

name: Chloe
line: Oh, this is Rustica. I'm Chloe. What's your name?

name: Riquet
line: My name is Riquet. Mister Rustica, if you're not the person in charge here, who is your superior?

name: Rustica
line: My superior? You mean in terms of age? Or height?

name: Riquet
line: Someone with a position superior to yours.

name: Rustica
line: Then I guess that would be my bride? I would follow any order of hers, no matter what she told me to do. For her, I would become a warrior who puts my life on the line, or a faithful and devoted servant. Doesn't that sound wonderful?

name: Riquet
line: I understand. It is our duty as the disciples of God.

name: Rustica
line: Great; I think we will get along.

name: Riquet
line: Fufu...... Yes.

name: Chloe
line: You guys are on totally different wavelengths, but you still managed to become friends. Can you teach me how to do that?

name: Narrator
line: As I gaze at the lively scene in front of me, someone approaches our group. We only exchanged brief greetings earlier, but I immediately recognize him as Prince Arthur. He carries himself with a dashing air; his manners are graceful and elegant with a touch of reserve...... His eyes shine with an innocence purer than that of fairy tale princes.

name: Arthur
line: Sir Sage.

name: Narrator
line: When Prince Arthur catches sight of me, he kneels before me, bowing his head deeply. A stir of uncertainty runs through the soldiers surrounding us.

name: Arthur
line: I am Arthur, the prince of Central Country. I deeply apologize for this commotion. Everything that happened was due to my sheer incompetence. Please forgive us.

name: Soldier
line: P-Prince Arthur is kneeling...... We can't be standing then. H-hey, get down.

name: Narrator
line: All of the soldiers drop to their knees. Flustered, I crouch down as well.

name: Akira
line: D-don't say that...... Please raise your head.

name: Heathcliff
line: ......Sir Sage is kneeling. Should we kneel too?

name: Cain
line: I guess so...... Let's put Sir Snow and Sir White's portrait face down for now.

name: Heathcliff
line: Okay.

name: Snow in the portrait
line: Hey! Cain!

name: White in the portrait
line: Don't do that! Put us back up!

name: Akira
line: Prince Arthur. I've heard so much about you. Or rather...... I've read so much about you in the previous sage's manual.

name: Narrator
line: Prince Arthur looks up, and his gaze meets mine. His eyes are so clear and straightforward that I feel myself almost swallowed by their depth. He must be in a difficult position as a prince. Yet there's nothing twisted or hostile about him; it's clear that he's a pure and earnest soul.

name: Arthur
line: The sage's manual...... If you can read those words, that must mean you came from the same country as he did - Japan.

name: Akira
line: Yes, I think so....... The previous sage said you were like a kind little brother to him.

name: Arthur
line: ......He wrote that about me......

name: Narrator
line: Arthur smiles, a little sadly.

name: Arthur
line: I regret not being able to say a proper goodbye, but I'm glad to hear that. And I am also happy to meet you, Sir Sage.

name: Arthur
line: Like him, you also came from a distant world, right?

name: Akira
line: Yes. And I'd like to return to my world...... That's why I wanted to meet you.

name: Arthur
line: I see...... Forgive me; I might have been waylaid by my responsibilities as the prince, but it still took me far too long to arrive. Unfortunately, we have yet to find a means of returning the sage to the world they came from. But we did gather many of our greatest scholars to search for a path between worlds, and their research continues to this day. You, Sir Sage, and we, the chosen wizards...... The structure of this world remains a complete mystery to all of us. I wasn't able to help the previous sage, but this time, for real - I hope to discover how you may return to your world. Until then, please... Could you lend us your strength?

name: Narrator
line: I fall silent at Arthur's words. But strangely enough, I don't feel despair. I still feel anxious, and it's not like I've given up on returning home, but somehow - I'm still optimistic.

name: Akira
line: ......I understand.

name: Arthur
line: ......Sir Sage...... I'm sorry I couldn't meet your expectations.

name: Akira
line: Please, don't worry about it. Ah...... To be honest, I still really want to go home. But you - and everyone else here - have been so kind to me...... And I'd like to learn more about this world, so...... ......And, tonight...... Watching the wizards and humans fight made me think that maybe there is something I can do......

name: Narrator
line: The gentle night breeze carries in a scent - not of flowers, or of water, but of smoke. I murmur, looking out at the charred, smoldering remnants of the courtyard. In the end, we still don't know who set the fire first - was it the humans, or the wizards? I don't think it was the wizards. But this is how war occurs. None of the wizards are terrifying people. But the bearded old man and the soldiers were all afraid of them. Isn't that fear the reason for the deep divide that exists between them? I lower my gaze, unable to put my feelings into words. But Arthur seems to understand the emotions behind my silence, and nods gravely.

name: Arthur
line: Sir Sage. I feel the same way. I believe humans and wizards can build a better relationship with each other. I pray for the day when wizards and humans are able to trust each other and work together. To that end, I hope you will share your wisdom with us, Sir Sage. I look forward to working with you.

name: Narrator
line: As Arthur gently takes my hand, I notice the crest on the back of his hand. The warmth of his palm and his bright, guileless smile make me feel like we could become friends.

name: Akira
line: Yes! I'd love to be of help.

name: Arthur
line: Thank you, Sir Sage.

name: Narrator
line: Arthur smiles happily. Suddenly, his gaze wanders around furtively as if he's looking for something - for someone. Our eyes meet, and Arthur, with childish nervousness in his expression, asks hesitantly.

name: Arthur
line: Um...... Would you happen to know where Sir Oz is......

name: Narrator
line: At his question, I recall the remark in the sage's manual: Oz and Prince Arthur don't seem to get along.

name: Akira
line: Ah...... He's not around right now. So don't worry.

name: Arthur
line: Is that so......

name: Narrator
line: Arthur sighs, disappointed. His unexpected reaction makes me feel like I've gotten the wrong idea.

name: Akira
line: (Huh? So maybe they do get along?)

name: Narrator
line: Arthur also picks up on the implication behind my words, and blinks with wide, curious eyes as he asks me:

name: Arthur
line: What do you mean, "don't worry"?

name: Akira
line: Ah, well...... I thought you didn't want to run into each other......

name: Arthur
line: Did Sir Oz say that to you?

name: Narrator
line: Arthur looks stricken with shock, his bright eyes wide open with sadness. Well, it seems like Arthur, at the very least, doesn't hate Oz. I hurriedly shake my head.

name: Akira
line: No, I think I've just misunderstood something. Sorry, don't worry about it.

name: Arthur
line: Is that so......

name: Narrator
line: Arthur breathes a sigh of relief, his hand on his chest; it's a boyish gesture, fitting for his age.

name: Akira
line: Are you acquainted with Oz, Prince Arthur?

name: Arthur
line: Please call me Arthur, Sir Sage. Rather than acquaintances, Sir Oz and I are......

name: Narrator
line: (Footsteps)

name: Cock Robin
line: Your Highness! We've more or less finished cleaning up the magic headquarters!

name: Narrator
line: Cock Robin interrupts, cutting Arthur off.

name: Cock Robin
line: We still need to tidy up a few things here and there, so we can continue working if necessary, but......

name: Arthur
line: No, it's already late. Everyone must be exhausted, so please go home, and come back another day to take care of repairs.

name: Cock Robin
line: I understand. What about you, Your Highness?

name: Arthur
line: I'll stay here, and head back after I've spoken with the other wizards.

name: Cock Robin
line: Then let me arrange for a bodyguard......

name: Arthur
line: I don't need one. This isn't a battlefield.

name: Cock Robin
line: But the roads are dangerous at night.

name: Arthur
line: What's so dangerous about them? I'm not a sheltered princess, and unlike you guys, I can fly. There's nothing scary about a bright night like this. Rather, let me illuminate the way back with magic so you can all return safely - the lights will watch over you.

name: Narrator
line: Arthur flashes a playful smile at a worried Cock Robin. He soars slowly into the night sky, the wind draping gently around his form.

name: Narrator
line: As he floats underneath the huge, bright moon, Arthur recites a string of curious words.

name: Arthur
line: << Pernoctant Nixzo >>

name: Narrator
line: The dark night road is illuminated with flickering, gentle lights that lead out from the magic headquarters and into the distance. A pang of nostalgia strikes my chest: the sight reminds me of the lights spilling out from the windows of the last train home from work. The lights glow warmly, beckoning with the promise of home; I'm sure they will bring comfort to the people who see them. Looking up at Arthur, Cock Robin murmurs in a low voice.

name: Cock Robin
line: What a kind person he is...... Even though his own mother, the Queen, abandoned him in the Northern mountains when he was a child......

name: Narrator
line: Cock Robin averts his gaze with a start, as if he's said something he shouldn't have. Before I can ask him about it, Arthur lands back on the ground.

name: Arthur
line: There. You should be fine now.

name: Cock Robin
line: Thank you, Prince Arthur.

name: Arthur
line: Be careful on your way home.

name: Cock Robin
line: Yes.

name: Narrator
line: As he turns to leave, Cock Robin bows stiffly in my direction.

name: Cock Robin
line: I'm very sorry for everything that happened, Sir Sage. Please convey my apologies to the wizards as well. I'll be taking my leave, then.....

name: Narrator
line: Arthur smiles as he watches Cock Robin and the soldiers depart.

name: Arthur
line: Like him, there are people who are willing to understand wizards...... Step by step, I hope we can all move forward in the same way, and change how things currently stand.

name: Akira
line: I feel the same way......

name: Arthur
line: Sir Sage, how are you feeling tonight? Are you exhausted?

name: Akira
line: Oh no, I'm fine.

name: I can hardly believe my ears
line: did the prince suddenly start speaking like a party animal?

name: Akira
line: M-mixer......?

name: Arthur
line: Yes. Before we talk about building bridges between wizards and humans, I think we need to communicate with each other first as wizards. I will prepare an official welcome reception at another time. But before that, I'd like to throw a mixer with everyone tonight.

name: Akira
line: Um, may I ask a question?

name: Arthur
line: Of course.

name: Akira
line: What do you mean when you say "mixer"......

name: Arthur
line: Oh, I apologize. The previous sage mentioned it, so I assumed you knew what it was. A mixer is a banquet to celebrate new encounters. Don't you think it's the perfect event for tonight?

name: Akira
line: (The previous sage sure had a way with words....... How am I supposed to correct him.......) Y-You're right. I agree.

name: Arthur
