line: Great! Then let's get this mixer started right away. Do you like mixers, Sir Sage?

name: Akira
line: Uh, um, good question......

name: Arthur
line: The previous sage seemed to love them. He said he would definitely invite me if he ever held one here in this world. Deepening the bonds between humans and wizards...... Perhaps you can truly call it the ultimate mixer between humans and wizards.

name: Narrator
line: I break out into a cold sweat at the serious expression on Arthur's face. I really should have corrected him earlier.

name: Arthur
line: I'm thinking of setting aside a day of national celebration, and calling it "National Mixer Day".

name: Akira
line: P-perhaps you should come up with a different name for a national holiday?

name: Arthur
line: You think so?

name: Akira
line: Y-Yes.

name: Arthur
line: Well, I guess for now we can just enjoy the mixer in front of our eyes with everyone here.

name: Narrator
line: And thus began our midnight tea party - the wizards' mixer. According to the sage's manual, the wizards' personalities varied depending on where they were from, so I had them group together by country. It seems like some of them know about fellow wizards from their same country.

name: Arthur
line: I'm Arthur, a wizard from Central. I've met Cain before.

name: Cain
line: I was a knight of Central Country. It's an honor to meet you again like this.

name: Riquet
line: I'm Riquet, a Central wizard. I was a disciple of God who spread the teachings of the Church. Excuse me, who is the person in charge here?

name: Cain
line: Person in charge...... Sir Sage only just arrived, so......

name: Shylock
line: If we're going by age, shouldn't it be Sir Snow and Sir White, since they're the oldest?

name: Snow
line: Stop shoving responsibility onto the elderly.

name: White
line: We've lived this long because we avoided taking responsibility for anything, you know?

name: Murr
line: Isn't it Oz? He's not here right now, but he is the strongest.

name: Narrator
line: Upon hearing Oz's name, Arthur shifts in his seat, his restlessness apparent. Next to him, Riquet's face - as lovely as a maiden's - hardens into a frown.

name: Riquet
line: So Oz is the person in charge then? I see. When will he be here?

name: Arthur
line: That's an excellent question. Does anyone know?

name: Narrator
line: His question is met with silence from the table. Arthur looks crestfallen, and Riquet raises an eyebrow.

name: Arthur
line: So nobody knows......

name: Riquet
line: So nobody knows at all?

name: Cain
line: I'll introduce him instead. Oz is a Central wizard. He used to be the instructor of the Central wizards...... He was our... What was the word? He was our teacher and trainer. He's the strongest wizard of us all. I'm sure many of you know of him, but he doesn't really show his face around here often. That's it for our introductions. Could the Western wizards introduce themselves next?

name: Shylock
line: I'm the Western wizard Shylock. I was the teacher of the Western wizards - just in name, though.

name: Murr
line: I'm the Western wizard Murr! I love shiny things!

name: Rustica
line: Murr? Are you the famous philosopher?

name: Narrator
line: The young man with the bearing of a noble looks at Murr, surprised.

name: Rustica
line: How unexpected. I'm honored to meet you, Philosopher Murr.

name: Chloe
line: Do you know him?

name: Rustica
line: He's a very knowledgeable scholar, and one of the greatest minds of our era. His research involves the truth of the universe, and the < Great Catastrophe >.

name: Chloe
line: Wow, that's incredible!

name: Murr
line: Grrr~, woof woof!!

name: Chloe
line: .............!? What was that!? Is this what they say about the thin line between geniuses and freaks?

name: Rustica
line: What a magnificent cry. I'm impressed.

name: Shylock
line: It's been a while since I met someone with praise for Murr. May I ask for your names?

name: Rustica
line: My, I apologize. My name is Rustica. And this is Chloe.

name: Chloe
line: Hello, I'm Chloe. I've been traveling with Rustica, and he's been teaching me magic over the course of our journey. That's why I'm like Rustica's pupil. My dream is to become the best tailor in the land!

name: Shylock
line: Were you traveling with a purpose? Or was it a journey without a goal?

name: Rustica
line: We're on a journey to find my lost bride.

name: Shylock
line: A journey of love, I see. What kind of person is she?

name: Rustica
line: She's a wonderful person.

name: Shylock
line: Anything else?

name: Rustica
line: She's a wonderful person.

name: Chloe
line: Um, I'm sorry.... It's kind of, uh, really hard to explain....

name: Shylock
line: No worries. I'm quite familiar with lunatics.

name: Murr
line: Lunatics are the best! I love all things weird!

name: Narrator
line: Rustica turns his gaze on me with an elegant smile.

name: Rustica
line: Sir Sage, you came from an unknown world - were you on a journey too?

name: Akira
line: I wasn't traveling, but...... Before I knew it, I ended up here.

name: Rustica
line: That's nice. You didn't have to go through the trouble of packing.

name: Akira
line: A-ahaha. That's true.

name: Chloe
line: How are you going to get back? Can I visit your world too, Sir Sage?

name: Akira
line: We actually don't know how I can return yet...... We're currently searching for a way.

name: Chloe
line: Oh...... I see. I'm sorry.

name: Narrator
line: Chloe takes in my predicament, and furrows his brows in sympathy. But his face immediately brightens up with an encouraging smile.

name: Chloe
line: Then, when you find out how to get home, take me with you! Until then, I'll make lots of clothes for you, Sir Sage.

name: Akira
line: Thank you.

name: Rustica
line: Chloe is very clever with his hands.

name: Chloe
line: Ehehe. See, I designed and made Rustica's clothes. I'll make clothes for everyone else too!

name: Shylock
line: Faust, how about you ask him to make you some clothes? Weren't yours ruined during our last battle?

name: Narrator
line: Faust, who had been drinking his tea, gives Shylock a wordless gaze. Shylock smiles and continues talking.

name: Shylock
line: Please introduce the Eastern wizards next.

name: Narrator
line: In the sage's manual, it says that the Eastern wizards hate humans. True to their description, they look more uncomfortable than anyone else in the room. They were the first to grab the seats at the end of the table.

name: Narrator
line: Faust places his cup on the table. His gaze is fixed downwards as he interlocks his fingers and falls into a long, deep silence.

name: Akira
line: Um, if you're still feeling unwell, please don't force yourself......

name: Faust
line: Eastern wizard, Faust.

name: Chloe
line: ....Anything else?

name: Faust
line: No.

name: Heathcliff
line: Ah.... Mr. Faust kept all the Eastern wizards together. He's my teacher.

name: Narrator
line: Heathcliff adds on timidly, trying to help. But Faust simply furrows his eyebrows even more.

name: Faust
line: There is no reason for you to treat me like a teacher.

name: Faust
line: Two of us turned to stone.

name: Narrator
line: Faust's voice is hoarse. A heavy silence falls across the room. I don't know what to say, but as I struggle to find the right words, two voices speak up at the same time.

name: Lennox
line: In the previous battle.....

name: Figaro
line: The catastrophe.....

name: Lennox
line: Ah, go ahead, Dr. Figaro.

name: Figaro
line: No, you speak first.

name: Riquet
line: Excuse me.

name: Narrator
line: As the Southern wizards press each other to speak first, Riquet raises his hand. For some reason, Murr calls on him like a teacher.

name: Murr
line: Yes, Riquet. You may speak.

name: Riquet
line: You said your name was Faust. Are you by any chance the holy wizard Faust, who was said to be involved in the founding of the Central Country Kingdom?

name: Narrator
line: Faust refuses to meet his gaze.

name: Faust
line: You have the wrong person.

name: Akira
line: Ah... Um, there was a wizard like that?

name: Riquet
line: Yes. He's a noble wizard who dedicated his life to serving humans. Father Priest always told me to look to him as my role model.

name: Faust
line: Heathcliff. You're next.

name: Heathcliff
line: Ah.... Yes. I'm Heathcliff, a wizard from Eastern Country. ....Please take care of me.

name: Cain
line: Heath and I are close in age, so we hung out pretty often. I'll introduce you later, Prince Arthur. You too, Riquet.

name: Arthur
line: I see. Nice to meet you.

name: Riquet
line: Nice to meet you......

name: Heathcliff
line: Ah.... Yes. Hi.

name: Faust
line: Keep going in order.

name: Nero
line: Okay, guess I'm next, then...... I'm Nero. Uh..... That's all.

name: Faust
line: Are you stupid? You told us absolutely nothing about yourself.

name: Nero
line: You pretty much did the same.......

name: Faust
line: What was that?

name: Nero
line: Nevermind..... Uh, I ran a restaurant in Eastern Country.

name: Mitile
line: Nii-sama, did you hear that? He ran his own restaurant.

name: Rutile
line: That's amazing. You must be a wonderful chef.

name: Nero
line: Uh, thanks..... And that's why I'd like to go back as soon as I can...... The < Great Catastrophe > only attacks once a year, right? I'll just show up when the time comes. Sorry, but does that sound all right to you all?

name: Shylock
line: That's absolutely fine. Up till now, no one but the Sage lived in this building - the only time we all got together was to defeat the catastrophe.....

name: Cain
line: Wait. Hold up one second. I was going to bring this up later, but... As everyone here knows, the < Great Catastrophe > this year was different - it was powerful.

name: Cain
line: It turned ten of our comrades to stone. In order to prevent such a tragedy from repeating itself, we need to train together and plan ahead; I want us to build our sense of unity as a group.

name: Nero
line: ....What are you trying to say?

name: Cain
line: We're all going to live here together and prepare for the next attack.

name: Cain
line: We're all going to live here together and prepare for the next attack.

name: Snow
line: I think that's a good plan.

name: White
line: I agree. We have ten new wizards, after all. It would be quite difficult for all of us to work together on short notice.

name: Snow
line: On top of that, there's the issue of our bizarre injuries. How does that sound to you all?

name: Narrator
line: I look across the room, surveying everyone's reactions. All of the Eastern wizards immediately look disgusted.

name: Faust
line: Living together.....?

name: Heathcliff
line: Here? For a whole year....?

name: Nero
line: I would seriously rather not.....

name: Narrator
line: But there is one Eastern wizard who voices his agreement.

name: Shino
line: I'm fine with that. I can sleep anywhere so long as I have a roof over my head.

name: Cain
line: And you are?

name: Shino
line: Shino, an Eastern wizard. I'm the guardian of Sherwood Forest, and a servant of the Blanchett family.

name: Faust
line: ....The Blanchett family? So you mean Heath's family?

name: Narrator
line: Heathcliff steals a sideways glance at Shino before nodding with a sigh.

name: Heathcliff
line: ....Shino is my childhood friend.

name: Narrator
line: Faust looks at the two of them and raises his eyebrows in exasperation.

name: Faust
line: ....Why don't any of you know how to introduce yourselves?

name: Nero
line: I mean, considering the example that you set.....

name: Faust
line: Shino.

name: Shino
line: What.

name: Heathcliff
line: Hey, be polite. Mr. Faust is our teacher.

name: Shino
line: I haven't learned a single thing from him. Besides his name.

name: Faust
line: And I haven't been paid for any services. Are you Heathcliff's friend?

name: Narrator
line: Shino shoots a quick glare in Heathcliff's direction.

name: Shino
line: No. We're not friends.

name: Narrator
line: Heathcliff looks ready to pop a vein.

name: Heathcliff
line: Oh, is that so?

name: I can feel a sharp tension in the air
line: the two of them are keenly aware of each other, yet stubbornly refuse to make eye contact.

name: Shino
line: I serve Master and Mistress - Heath just happens to be their child.

name: Heathcliff
line: Yes, that's right. And you just happen to be one of our servants.

name: Shino
line: Exactly.

name: Heathcliff
line: I see how it is.

name: Shino
line: Hmph.

name: Nero
line: What's going on...? Are you two fighting....?

name: Heathcliff & Shino
line: Not at all.

name: Faust
line: And I don't care. But Shino, listen to me.

name: Shino
line: What.

name: Faust
line: This was Heathcliff's first battle. And it was a bitter, traumatic one: he lost two comrades right before his eyes.

name: Faust
line: Be kind to him, at least for tonight.

name: Shino
line: .....Got it.

name: Faust
line: Good. That's it for Eastern Country introductions. Next.

name: Narrator
line: I look at Faust in surprise. He has an unapproachable air, but he isn't unkind.

name: Akira
line: (And I hear he was gravely injured protecting his comrade....)

name: Figaro
line: I guess we'll go through our introductions next. But first, can I ask a question?

name: Akira
line: Ah... Go ahead.

name: Figaro
line: Did the Southern wizards chosen before us all turn to stone?

name: Narrator
line: Every wizard who fought against the < Great Catastrophe > falls silent at Figaro's question. After a long pause, the twins nod.

name: Snow
line: They did.

name: White
line: The kind Southern wizards stepped forward and tried to protect the rest of us.....

name: Mitile
line: ....So they really.....

name: Rutile
line: .....I see..... They were such kind people, after all......

name: Narrator
line: A cloud hangs over the Southern wizards' expressions. I, too, am shocked. So I hadn't met a Southern wizard until now because they had all passed away.

name: Figaro
line: I see..... Ah, I mean. I had prepared myself for this news, as unfortunate as it is. But if that's the case.... Then I can agree to living together. I don't want to let these boys turn to stone. I want to train them so they're prepared to fight the < Great Catastrophe >.

name: Mitile
line: Train us.... You say that, but doesn't that go for you too, Dr. Figaro? You can't use strong magic either. Plus, you said your back hurts because you rarely get to exercise.

name: Figaro
line: Ahahaha. Good point.

name: Snow
line: Figaro.

name: White
line: Oh Figaro.

name: Figaro
line: Can the cute little twins over there stay quiet for a second?

name: Snow
line: He called us cute.

name: White
line: Then I guess we can stay quiet.

name: Rutile
line: Do you know those twins?

name: Figaro
line: Somewhat. Ah, excuse me, I'm getting sidetracked. Let me introduce myself again. I'm Figaro, a Southern wizard. I run a small clinic in Southern Country.

name: Rustica
line: So you're a doctor? That's wonderful.

name: Figaro
line: Thank goodness I'm a wizard. Because even if I slip up during a surgery, I can always get away with it by turning my patient into a zombie.

name: Figaro
line: I'm just kidding.

name: Rutile
line: I'm Rutile. I teach at a school in the South. And this is my little brother Mitile.

name: Mitile
line: I'm Mitile. I'm in school, but I'm also learning magic from Dr. Figaro. I'm still learning and improving, but I'll become a great wizard one day! So please don't look down on us just because we're from the South.

name: Narrator
line: I can't help but smile at Mitile's enthusiasm. I remember how I wanted to get good grades and impress my teachers when I had just started attending school.

name: Akira
line: Of course. Please do your best.

name: Mitile
line: Thank you!

name: Shino
line: But Southern wizards are weak.

name: Shino
line: Plus, they're easily swayed by their emotions. No matter where you go, Southern wizards just drag the rest of us down.

name: Heathcliff
line: Shino!

name: Shino
line: It's better to tell them now - so they won't get wiped out later.

name: Mitile
line: ....Yeah, well, Eastern wizards have terrible personalities and foul mouths.

name: Rutile
line: Hey now, Mitile!

name: Shino
line: What?

name: Heathcliff
line: What?

name: Nero
line: What?

name: Faust
line: What?

name: Mitile
line: Eastern wizards and Northern wizards give all of us wizards a bad reputation! You guys were fighting against the Central Country army earlier today, too!

name: Faust
line: Oh? Are you saying the wizards of Southern Country would've solved the problem by letting them burn you to the ground? I see. So that's what you're teaching them, Figaro.

name: Figaro
line: Don't take it the wrong way, Faust.

name: Mitile
line: Dr. Figaro! You said that wizards and humans should help each other!

name: Figaro
line: I did say that. I sure did say that.

name: Faust
line: You irresponsible man..... You haven't changed in the least.

name: Figaro
line: Hey, come on now, Faust.....

name: Rutile
line: Is he an acquaintance?

name: Figaro
line: I guess he might be, you know?

name: Lennox
line: ....I think I do know him.

name: Narrator
line: Lennox finally breaks his long silence, his expression unchanging. He sets his eyes on Faust and stands from his seat. The leg of his chair catches the tablecloth, which in turn pulls the plates toward the edge of the table; they look like they're about to fall, but Lennox pays no heed.

name: Lennox
line: Sir Faust - Central Country's founding hero. I am the wizard Lennox who fought under your command. I have been searching for you.

name: Mitile
line: Really!?

name: Rutile
line: Really!?

name: Narrator
line: The brothers exclaim in surprise as they lean forward to catch the plates, inches from the ground. Lennox comes to his senses and turns around.

name: Lennox
line: ....Thank you for catching the plates. But why are you so surprised?

name: Mitile
line: Because we thought you were just a normal shepherd until yesterday. And now you're an weathered warrior and all.....

name: Rutile
line: And you were searching for someone all this time? Why didn't you tell us? You could've talked to us about it.

name: Narrator
line: Faust, on the other hand, immediately looks disgusted.

name: Faust
line: .....You've got the wrong man.

name: Lennox
line: Sir Faust.....

name: Narrator
line: Before Lennox can press him further, the twins interrupt with a sigh.

name: Snow
line: Goodness gracious, everyone here seems to be tangled up in connections.

name: White
line: It looks like this year's < Great Catastrophe > will be just as troublesome.

name: Snow
line: Lastly, we'll introduce the Northern wizards: I'm Snow.

name: White
line: I'm the Northern wizard, White. The two of us make one.

name: Snow
line: We'll introduce the remaining three.

name: White
line: Bradley - absent.

name: Snow
line: Owen - absent.

name: White
line: Mithra - also absent. That's all.

name: Rutile
line: Are the Northern wizards busy......?

name: Snow
line: You could say they are......

name: White
line: You could also say they're not......

name: Mitile
line: ......There's no way the Northern wizards will work with us...... Everyone hates wizards because they do bad things. Don't you agree, Sir Sage?

name: Narrator
line: Mitile asking for my opinion makes me flustered. Snow, White, and Bradley are all Northern wizards. I don't know anything about this world, so- I can't say that they're at fault for sure.

name: Akira
line: Rather than pointing fingers...... How about we try to figure out what we can accomplish together, and work on that instead? Cain mentioned it earlier, but if we can all live here together...... I'm sorry for making it all about myself, but I like the idea. It makes me happy because I have nowhere else to go...... It would be a relief if I could stay in the company of people that I trust.

name: Nero
line: Trust......? You're talking about us?

name: Nero
line: Why would you trust us?

name: Akira
line: Well...... You all seem to say whatever you want...... So I don't feel like anyone's lying......

name: Akira
line: The Northern wizards seem like a scary bunch, but...... It'd be nice if we could get along in time....... Stealing eyeballs and causing mental breakdowns; getting murdered by beasts...... It all sounds pretty scary, but......

name: Cain
line: If we want the Northern wizards to cooperate, we're going to need Oz's help. He doesn't like being friendly with others, but he's not an unnecessarily aggressive person. If we can get Oz, the strongest wizard, to keep everyone in line, I'm sure the Northern wizards will listen to him, and the people will feel at ease. Don't you agree, Prince Arthur?

name: Arthur
line: That's true....... It might place a burden on Sir Oz, but...... Having him here would be a relief for everyone.

name: Figaro
line: I feel the same way. I'm speaking as a newcomer here, but the last < Great Catastrophe > was unlike any of the attacks that came before. If it was strong enough to turn ten wizards to stone this time, the next < Great Catastrophe > might be even more powerful. All of the wizards - not just from the North, but also Central, West, East, and South - have to work together to stand up to it.

name: Arthur
line: It's just as Sir Figaro says. Sir Sage......

name: Akira
line: Yes.

name: Arthur
line: I'm thinking of holding a series of events for the Sage and his wizards: victory parades, parties, and of course, the inauguration ceremony. If we can gather all twenty-one wizards in the capital for that, it'll help to put the people at ease after the disasters they've suffered through. And if we can show that even the Northern wizards, who everyone sees as a threat, are loyal to you, Sir Sage...... I believe we can prevent any more unnecessary commotion like what happened tonight, because people fear wizards. For that reason, I'd like to go persuade Sir Oz to help us, but...... What do you think, Sir Sage?

name: Akira
line: I agree...... I've only met him once, but Oz seemed reliable. It would be incredibly reassuring if he would take our side. But......

name: Arthur
line: But?

name: Narrator
line: I hold my tongue.

name: Narrator
line: What did that passage written in the sage's manual mean, then? "Prince Arthur is so easy to get along with. Life at the magic headquarters would be so much more enjoyable if he were one of the wizards here." "But Oz would probably never allow it. He always disappears whenever Arthur comes to visit, and staunchly refuses to meet him."

name: Akira
line: ......No, it's nothing. Let's go persuade Oz.

name: Arthur
line: Yes. I'll do my best, Sir Sage.

name: Snow
line: Then it's decided. That's enough for tonight.

name: White
line: All of you can feel free to choose a room to rest in.

name: Chloe
line: I'm glad everyone seems nice! Rustica, I'll go find a room for you.

name: Rustica
line: Thank you, Chloe.

name: Cain
line: I thought we were just going to introduce ourselves, but it basically turned into a meeting. Heath, introduce me to your friend.

name: Heathcliff
line: He's not my friend.

name: Shino
line: That's my line.

name: Rutile
line: Mitile. You shouldn't be so rude.

name: Mitile
line: But...... That guy was so rude...... Um, can I share a room with you, nii-sama?

name: Rutile
line: There's nothing to be scared of here. You're all grown up now, so you should sleep alone.

name: Rutile
line: Don't worry. Father and Mother are watching over you from heaven, Mitile.

name: Mitile
line: ....... Ah, Mister Lennox! Can we-....

name: Lennox
line: Sir Faust, please wait.

name: Faust
line: Leave me alone. You've got the wrong man.

name: Mitile
line: ...... He seems busy......

name: Riquet
line: Mitile, was it?

name: Mitile
line: Ah...... Yes.

name: Riquet
line: Shall I take the room next to you?

name: Mitile
line: Really?

name: Riquet
line: Yes, gladly. I've been taught to help the small and the weak, after all.

name: Mitile
line: I'm not weak! But thank you......

name: Riquet
line: Not at all. This is my job as a disciple of God.

name: Nero
line: ............ Sigh...... I want to go home......

name: Shylock
line: Nero.

name: Shylock
line: You're a chef, is that right?

name: Nero
line: Well, yeah......

name: Shylock
line: Great. Can I leave tomorrow's breakfast preparations to you?

name: Nero
line: Well...... Sure...... If it's just breakfast......

name: Shylock
line: Thank you. The kitchen is that way. ......Oh? Murr. Are you taking the painting to the kitchen? What are you going to do with it?

name: Murr
line: I'm gonna smoke Snow and White!

name: Snow in the portrait
line: Murr, stop it!

name: White in the portrait
line: Don't smoke us!

name: Narrator
line: I listen to their lively conversation as I turn to make my way to my own room. As I do, I notice Arthur pensively standing in the courtyard. I don't really know what's going on between Oz and Arthur. But looking at Arthur makes me hope that we can persuade Oz to come around.

name: Vincent
line: ......Arthur has been chosen as one of the Sage's wizards?

name: Soldier
line: Yes. It seems like he's been summoned to the magic headquarters! Now that Prince Arthur is one of the chosen wizards, the people must feel more relieved!

name: Vincent
line: ......I see. You can leave now.

name: Vincent
line: ............ I'm not going to let him continue playing the hero - winning over the people's hearts like that. If not for him, I would have been next in line for the throne. Drummond failed to secure the Sage, too...... Since it's come to this, I have no choice but to use the parade and the inauguration ceremony to completely destroy the people's faith in Arthur and the wizards.......

name: Narrator
line: The three Central wizards - Arthur, Cain, Riquet - and I set out to persuade Oz. We gather in front of the elevator in the magic headquarters tower to discuss our strategy.

name: Cain
line: Oz lives in the North, but he's a Central wizard. I think it's better for just the Central wizards to go; he probably wouldn't be too pleased if all of us showed up.

name: Akira
line: If Oz becomes our leader, will the Northern wizards cooperate with us?

name: Cain
line: Yeah. Because no one can stand up to Oz. The Northern wizards dislike human festivities, so they've never joined the annual parade. The previous sage always got told off for it whenever he visited the Central castle. But if Oz is with us, you should be fine.

name: Akira
line: That's a relief to hear.

name: Arthur
line: Even if Sir Oz isn't around, we will protect you, Sir Sage. Cain, how are your eyes?

name: Cain
line: Yeah. I couldn't see you guys earlier, but I can now.

name: Riquet
line: Perhaps you can't see people until you touch them?

name: Narrator
line: At that, the rest of us turn around to look at Riquet.

name: Riquet
line: Just now, our eyes met after I touched him.

name: Akira
line: Now that you mention it...... I think that was the case for me as well.

name: Arthur
line: Same for me.

name: Cain
line: Now that you mention it, that might be true.......

name: Arthur
line: I'm glad we figured out a solution, Cain.

name: Cain
line: Yeah. It's all thanks to you, Riquet.

name: Narrator
line: Cain's large hand reaches out to casually ruffle Riquet's hair. Riquet shrinks back stiffly, his big eyes widening in surprise.

name: Riquet
line: ......Please stop. I'm a disciple of God - only those who have committed virtuous deeds are allowed to touch my body.

name: Cain
line: What's this "disciple of God" that you speak of?

name: Riquet
line: It means those of us who have this mysterious power. We have been sent by God to grant miracles to His chosen ones.

name: Arthur
line: I've heard of this...... There's a church that refers to wizards as gods and disciples. They don't let wizards out into the world; instead, they keep them confined deep within the church walls and make them go along with their activities. Don't tell me, Riquet......

name: Riquet
line: The outside world is corrupted. So once this tainted mark on my forehead is erased, I intend to return to the Church.

name: Narrator
line: Cain and Arthur look at each other. Arthur bends down, smiling kindly at Riquet.

name: Arthur
line: The outside world isn't corrupted. Not everything is good and pure, but I believe there are many things that will bring you happiness, Riquet.

name: Riquet
line: I don't believe you. I saw people fighting yesterday too. I see how it is - wizards who are ignorant of their roles as disciples of God will lie and try to seduce me to the outside world.

name: Narrator
line: Arthur smiles, a little wryly, as Riquet glares at him.

name: Arthur
line: As long as you're happy, it doesn't matter which world you live in. We won't steal away your happiness. But please, don't decide that this world you know nothing about is an evil one.

name: Riquet
line: Why shouldn't I?

name: Arthur
line: Because if you come to despair in your world, there will be nowhere left for you to go. If you make that your only paradise.

name: Arthur
line: Paradise can exist anywhere. Even if, someday, you come to be abandoned - in time you'll find someone else who needs you. No matter where we go, no matter how we live our lives, know that it's possible for you to find happiness. It's all up to you.

name: Riquet
line: ......It's up to me......

name: Cain
line: That's right. Plus, I can't see your face unless I touch you. It'd be troublesome if I couldn't do that.

name: Riquet
line: Woah...... Please stop touching my head.

name: Cain
line: Ahaha! Sorry, my bad. All right, Sir Sage, Your Highness. Shall we go?

name: Arthur
line: Yes.

name: Narrator
line: Cain inserts a beautiful stone into the stone tablet in front of the elevator, and pulls the lever down.

name: Cain
line: We'll take this elevator to the Northern tower.

name: Akira
line: It's pretty convenient how you can cross national borders with an elevator.

name: Cain
line: The elevator is fueled by mana stones. Mana stones are like fossils which contain magical energy.

name: Narrator
line: The stone casts a faint glow, diminishing slowly like a piece of burning coal before disappearing in a brilliant flash of light.

name: Riquet
line: Do you know where in Northern Country we can find Oz?

name: Arthur
line: I think Sir Oz is probably in his castle in the North.

name: Cain
line: I wonder if we can find it. I hear that it's shrouded in so many layers of illusion that few have ever seen it.

name: Arthur
line: I'll be your guide.

name: Riquet
line: Have you been there before?

name: Narrator
line: After a brief moment of hesitation, Arthur looks at me and nods imperceptibly.

name: Arthur
line: I was raised there.

name: Narrator
line: (Elevator dings)

name: Narrator
line: In the elevator, Arthur tells us his story as we make the journey to the Northern tower.

name: Arthur
line: When I was born, the whole country celebrated my birth. But my father and mother kept one thing a secret. -The fact that I was born a wizard. Central Country does not discriminate against wizards, but prejudice against them still remains. Eventually, the truth got out, and...... Rumors spread about my mother being a witch who had tricked my father. My mother took them deeply to heart and grew depressed...... When I was four years old, she ordered a loyal servant to abandon me far away in the Northern mountains.

name: Riquet
line: She threw away her own child!? How horrifying......

name: Arthur
line: I don't blame her - she must have felt truly desperate. .....It was a snowy, cold, blizzarding night...... I didn't even understand that I had been abandoned.... I kept crying, because I wanted to return to the castle. Gradually, I grew sleepier and sleepier. Before I knew it, I could no longer feel the cold. I was a child, but I realized that I was going to die. But that was when Sir Oz appeared. He took me home to his castle.

name: Narrator
line: Shaken by Arthur's tale, I try to imagine the scene. Oz, who comes across a young child on the brink of death lying in the snowy mountainside. A freezing, tranquil moment.

name: Arthur
line: He saved my frozen soul, provided me with meals, and gave me a bed to sleep in. He even taught me magic. That was how he raised me until I reached the age of thirteen.

name: Cain
line: Oz did......?

name: Arthur
line: Sir Oz is a kind person. People often misunderstand him, but...... An evil man would never save a dying child. It may have been nothing but a whim on his part - but to me, he is my savior, and my master in magic. But when I turned thirteen, people from the Central castle came for me, and...... I haven't seen Sir Oz since then. Not even once; not even after he was summoned to the magic headquarters as a Central wizard........

name: Cain
line: Why? Did you fight before you left?

name: Arthur
line: I don't know...... When my father fell ill, and his servants came searching for me...... Sir Oz didn't say a single word. I thought I would be able to return soon afterwards, but...... ......Perhaps Sir Oz is furious with me? For forgetting his kindness in raising me, and leaving his castle behind......

name: Narrator
line: (Clatter)

name: Arthur
line: ......It looks like we've arrived. Sorry...... I got carried away talking about myself.

name: Akira
line: No...... I'm glad you told us about what happened between you and Oz. I hope you can meet him and speak to him today.

name: Arthur
line: Thank you, Sir Sage.

name: Narrator
line: When we arrive at the Northern tower, we're greeted with a freezing blast of cold air. We exhale snowy white puffs of breath; beyond the window, a world of pure silvery brilliance stretches out in front of our eyes. It is so cold that I can't help but shiver. But the scenery is enchantingly beautiful. So beautiful that I feel like it could suck me in.

name: Akira
line: (The air is so clear...... The snow and the forests smell almost primordial......) (The snowy mountain ranges, the vivid blue sky...... How lovely......)

name: Narrator
line: Riquet seems to feel the same way. He leans out the window, gazing at the landscape with rapt enchantment.

name: Riquet
line: ......It's beautiful......

name: Cain
line: You're right...... The weather was miserable the last time I came, but Northern Country is beautiful when the sun's out.

name: Arthur
line: I'm happy to hear that. The North is like a second home to me. Sir Sage. Once we make it over those mountains, there's a lake that's as big as the sea. Beyond that lake, at the peak of a high mountain, is Sir Oz's......

name: Narrator
line: Suddenly, a strong wind sweeps through the air. Cain moves to shield me, one hand going to the hilt of his sword. I know this by now: an unnatural wind marks the presence of a wizard. When the wind subsides, a tall figure stands before us.

name: Narrator
line: It's Oz.

name: Oz
line: What business do you have in these remote lands? Leave.

name: Narrator
line: Everyone freezes at Oz's harsh voice. But Arthur still pleads in desperation.

name: Arthur
line: Sir Oz, please hear us out.

name: Oz
line: I'm telling you to go home.

name: Arthur
line: Sir Oz, it's me, Arthur. I might have grown taller, but I'm Arthur - the boy you raised.

name: Arthur
line: I apologize for not even sending a letter after all this time. Please, forgive me for my ingratitude. Even if...... Even if you cannot forgive me, please listen to what they have to say. We would like you to lend us your strength, Sir Oz.

name: Narrator
line: My chest grows warm at the slight quaver in Arthur's voice. Cain seems to be similarly moved; he places his arm around Arthur's shoulders, and calls out to Oz.

name: Cain
line: That's right, Oz. Come to the magic headquarters, and lead us. You're the only one who can. The humans will feel at ease if they realize that you and the Northern wizards are on their side. But leaving that aside, you should forgive Prince Arthur! Hasn't he apologized enough?

name: Oz
line: This has nothing to do with you, knight from Central.

name: Cain
line: It has everything to do with me. He is my lord. And you are my comrade.

name: Arthur
line: Cain......

name: Riquet
line: Oz! I hear that you're the strongest wizard in the land. Then please tell me how to get rid of this mark. Please release me from this role. I never asked for this!

name: Narrator
line: Riquet pleads with a raised voice. Oz turns both eyes on him, his gaze cold.

name: Oz
line: That goes for us all. We are all burdened with roles we never wished for. Do not assume that you alone can escape.

name: Oz
line: Sage. Do not get involved with me. Take them back to the magic headquarters in Central.

name: Oz
line: This is no place for people like you. I've warned you.

name: Arthur
line: Please wait, Sir Oz......!

name: Narrator
line: Arthur reaches out towards Oz as he turns to leave. In that moment, Oz catches sight of the crest on the back of Arthur's hand...... And for the first time, his expression changes. His eyes widen with a shock akin to despair.

name: Arthur
line: I have also been summoned. I, too, am one of the wizards at the magic headquarters! Just like you, Sir Oz! I am not speaking to you as the prince of Central Country! Please, come with us......!

name: Narrator
line: Oz vanishes like fallen snow, leaving Arthur's pleas hanging in the air. We are left behind in this beautiful world.

name: Cain
line: Please cheer up, Your Highness...... I'm sure you'll make up one day.

name: Arthur
line: ......Thank you.

name: Riquet
line: I can't escape from this role......? ......How am I supposed to tell Father Priest about my disgrace......

name: Narrator
line: The icy cold air sparkles under the vivid blue skies. We've failed to persuade Oz. Arthur's expression as he stands there, silent and still, is so painful that I can't bear to look at it.

name: Narrator
line: (Rumble)

name: Narrator
line: Then, the distant sound of rumbling earth.

name: Riquet
line: ......What is this sound.......? Don't tell me...... It's the roar of some creature.......?

name: Narrator
line: Cain's grim gaze sweeps across the landscape, and he grasps our hands.

name: Cain
line: Let's return to the magic headquarters. Right now.

name: Akira
line: Y-yes.

name: Cain
line: You too, Prince Arthur.

name: Narrator
line: Arthur looks up helplessly, and freezes in his tracks. He gazes intently out the window, his limpid eyes blown wide open. It is impossible to get a clear view out the narrow window, but it looks like a gigantic white creature - so huge it blots out the entire expanse of glittering frost and blue skies. The stomach of the creature writhes and squirms as it ascends. If we could get a closer look, I'm sure it would be bigger than a bullet train...... Bigger even than an oil tanker ship.

name: Riquet
line: ......Is that a Grand Dragon.......? I thought they had gone extinct in the distant past......?

name: Narrator
line: (Roar)

name: Narrator
line: In the next second, a deafening roar resounds throughout the ground. The walls of the Northern tower start to tremble violently, spraying fine grains of crumbling sand.

name: Cain
line: Hurry, to the elevator!

name: Riquet
line: ......Got it!

name: Arthur
line: Sir Sage, this way!

name: Narrator
line: We make a flying leap onto the elevator. Beyond the window, the giant creature flying in the sky notices the tower, and turns to charge towards us. It looms steadily closer with every beat of its wings, as the wind becomes a typhoon so strong that we stagger under its force.

name: Cain
line: Move, move, move......!

name: Narrator
line: The creature is so huge that it could very well knock down the Northern tower simply by crashing into it. Arthur shields me, and I grip Riquet's hand tightly as I look out the window beyond the elevator doors. The last thing we see is - the gigantic creature's jaw and fangs gaping wide open. And then...... A shadow appears, standing between the tower and the creature, as if protecting us from it.

name: Narrator
line: It was only for a split second - it might have been my imagination. Maybe nobody else noticed. Not even Arthur, who had been protecting me. But I was certain that I saw him.

name: Narrator
line: Oz raises his staff towards the sky. And the doors of the elevator close.

name: Riquet
line: ......That surprised me......

name: Cain
line: That wasn't my imagination, right...... Did you guys see it too?

name: Arthur
line: Yes....... That was indeed a Grand Dragon, like the ones I've seen illustrated in books......

name: Riquet
line: I thought unicorns were the only creatures who could wield magic like us?

name: Cain
line: To think that even the Grand Dragon would come back to life...... Was this also caused by the < Great Catastrophe >......?

name: Narrator
line: The wizards turn pale; even to them, that gigantic creature was a fearsome existence.

name: Narrator
line: (Footsteps)

name: Narrator
line: That's when Shino approaches us.

name: Shino
line: Looks like you ran into a monster. I saw one in the Eastern forest, too.

name: Cain
line: The Eastern forest? Do you mean Sherwood Forest?

name: Shino
line: Yeah. I ran into a wyvern. It was a tough opponent.

name: Cain
line: You defeated it?

name: Shino
line: Yeah.

name: Cain
line: You're amazing!

name: Narrator
line: Shino looks a bit pleased at Cain's praise.

name: Shino
line: Well, yeah.

name: Arthur
line: ......I need to report this to the ministers...... Sorry, I'll have to return to the castle for a bit.

name: Cain
line: Understood. Shall we postpone the parade and the inauguration ceremony?

name: Arthur
line: No, we'll hold them as planned. We need to offer the people hope after the suffering they went through under the < Great Catastrophe >. I'm sorry that I keep asking for you to lend me your strength, but please work with me.

name: Akira
line: Yes.

name: Cain
line: Gladly.

name: Riquet
line: ......I understand.

name: Shino
line: A parade and a party? Do I get anything for participating? Can I become someone of status, like the Master of Blanchett?

name: Arthur
line: You can become a hero. Everyone will look forward to witnessing your great deeds.

name: Narrator
line: Shino raises his eyebrow and grins.

name: Shino
line: A hero, huh. Not bad.

name: Cain
line: You're an interesting one. Eastern wizards are supposed to hate humans and attention.

name: Shino
line: There's something that I want.

name: Narrator
line: (Footsteps)

name: Narrator
line: Shino answers shortly, and then walks away. Arthur, too, leaves for the Central castle. His face bore a despondent expression before he left; I don't think the appearance of the gigantic creature was solely to blame. Of course he's sad. Because Oz - the man who raised him - treated him with such harsh coldness.

name: Akira
line: (It's probably better if I don't tell him about seeing Oz at that last moment...... I might be wrong, and I don't want him to worry.) (I hope Oz is safe..... It'd be good if they could make up.) (Since Arthur is feeling so down...... I have to work harder to make the party and parade a success.)

name: Central Country woman
line: I hear that the Sage and the wizards are coming to the capital!

name: Central Country man
line: It's the parade they hold every year after they've held off the attacks of the < Great Catastrophe >! There'll be an inauguration ceremony too, since we have a new Sage and new wizards! Finally, some good news......

name: Cain
line: Oz and the Northern wizards are still missing, but we should follow Arthur's lead and head over to the Central capital. Everyone should get ready to travel.....

name: Akira
line: Yes.

name: Chloe
line: Sir Sage! Sir Sage! I have a guest for you!

name: Akira
line: A guest?

name: Envoy
line: I-I'm an envoy from the capital, with a message from Prince Arthur: preparations for the parade are still underway, so he would like you to wait here for a while longer.

name: Cain
line: I see. The capital must be in disarray, after all.

name: Akira
line: When should we depart, then?

name: Envoy
line: Tomorrow, or the day after.... We will send another envoy your way when preparations are complete. Until then, do relax and spend the time as you please.

name: Akira
line: I see. Thank you. I guess we should wait at the magic headquarters for a while, then.

name: Akira
line: A parade and a party, huh.... I've only ever been to a relative's wedding party - what am I going to do about etiquette....?

name: Narrator
line: (Knock knock)

name: Chloe
line: Sir Sage, can I come on in?

name: Akira
line: Chloe? Yes, of course.

name: Narrator
line: (Door opens)

name: Chloe
line: Excuse me. Can I ask a question?

name: Akira
line: What is it?

name: Chloe
line: Arthur mentioned stuff like a parade and a party and a ceremony, but do we get to participate in all that too?

name: Akira
line: Yes. They'll all be held in Central Country.

name: Chloe
line: Yay~!

name: Narrator
line: Chloe raises both his arms and leaps up in delight.

name: Chloe
line: I've always wanted to go to a party! I've made clothes for parties before, but I've never actually been to one! Yay! I'm so so happy! I love designing clothes! What kinds of clothes should I make this time?

name: Narrator
line: Chloe spins around and around in a dance of joy. I can't help but smile watching him.

name: Akira
line: Seeing you this delighted makes me happy too.

name: Chloe
line: Of course I'm happy - it's a party! Don't you like parties, Sir Sage?

name: Akira
line: I've never really been to one, you see.....

name: Chloe
line: Then we're the same! I'll make you an awesome outfit, Sir Sage. I'm making one for Rustica too. Rustica is tall and handsome, so he looks good in everything. But getting him into the outfit is the hard part! He does his buttons up all wrong, and his laces are always coming untied. He's clumsy in the weirdest ways, so it can be a whole chore.

name: Narrator
line: Chloe calls it a chore, but it looks like he really enjoys taking care of Rustica.

name: Akira
line: So you and Rustica are pretty close, Chloe.

name: Chloe
line: Hmm, yeah. I guess so? I hope that's the case, but Rustica is a bit quirky, so..... Rustica is actually a noble, you see. He's also a famous harpsichord player. He said he's been to parties before. He told me to watch out because parties will make your eyes spin.

name: Akira
line: Make your eyes spin?

name: Chloe
line: They'll spin from looking around at all the people, they'll spin from all the twirling you do as you dance, and they'll spin when you've had too much wine, too.

name: Akira
line: Ahaha!

name: Narrator
line: I laugh at the silly advice. And Chloe's smile grows even bigger.

name: Chloe
line: You laughed! I'm glad. Sir Sage, you said you came here from another world all alone, right? I was alone until I met Rustica, so.... Let's get along. I'll work hard so that I can be of use to you, Sir Sage!

name: Narrator
line: Chloe flashes me a big, bright smile of encouragement. His kindness touches my heart.

name: Akira
line: Thank you very much, Chloe. Let's all enjoy the party together.

name: Chloe
line: Yeah!

name: Rustica
line: Chloe~? Chloe, where are you?

name: Chloe
line: Ah, Rustica's calling for me. I bet he lost something again. I have to go. See you later, Sir Sage!

name: Akira
line: See you.

name: Narrator
line: Some are looking forward to the party; others, not so much.

name: Akira
line: The bread is delicious.... Nero, did you bake this?

name: Nero
line: Yeah.

name: Akira
line: It's so good! The wheat flavor is delicious, and the outer layer is crisp, but it's perfectly soft underneath....

name: Nero
line: Thanks.

name: Akira
line: Bradley would be delighted. I hear he loves delicious food.

name: Nero
line: Is that so. Hey, Mister Sage. Can I go home already?

name: Akira
line: I'm sorry.... We can discuss living arrangements later, but I still want you to take part in the party and the parade.

name: Nero
line: A party and a parade..... Do I really have to go?

name: Akira
line: You don't want to, Nero?

name: Nero
line: Not really......

name: Akira
line: But you ran a restaurant - you must be used to dealing with people?

name: Nero
line: I presented myself as a human when I ran my shop. Only wizards or severe weirdos would visit a wizard's restaurant. The moment you say you're a wizard, people will admire you, hate you, suspect you, avoid you, or fear you. I'm sick of it.

name: Nero
line: I get that you and Arthur are working hard for the sake of wizards, but..... Nothing's gonna change. What you should really do is pretend that you're not a wizard, and just like that, you'll be free of all your burdens.

name: Riquet
line: So you never intend on using your God-granted powers for the sake of others? You're just going to selfishly live an easy life?

name: Akira
line: Riquet......

name: Nero
line: Haha.... Those are some harsh words first thing in the morning. Good morning, little guy from Central. What do you want for breakfast?

name: Riquet
line: I cannot eat soiled foods.

name: Nero
line: What? I'd never feed you any rotten crap. Are you saying I don't keep the kitchen clean?

name: Riquet
line: No, that's not..... I can only eat holy beans, holy milk, holy eggs, and fruit.

name: Nero
line: What are you talking about.... Can you draw me a picture?

name: Riquet
line: ......Red things, like this..... Yellow things, like this......

name: Nero
line: Okay, so a banana and an apple. You're a kid, so you need to get more nutrients. How about carbs? Can you eat bread?

name: Riquet
line: I can eat bread.

name: Nero
line: Got it.

name: Narrator
line: Without a hint of magic, Nero skillfully gathers the kitchen utensils to begin cooking. A pleasant rhythm fills the kitchen. He handles the pan with such grace that I feel like I'm watching a musician or a dancer; it fills my heart with excitement.

name: Nero
line: Here, thanks for waiting. The bread is fresh out of the oven, so it's still warm.

name: Nero
line: What's wrong?

name: Riquet
line: I've never eaten warm food.....

name: Nero
line: Huh? What kind of life have you been living? Were you being bullied?

name: Riquet
line: No. They took good care of me.

name: Nero
line: I see. But if I cared about someone, I'd never offer them a cold meal.

name: Riquet
line: Thank you for the meal.

name: Nero
line: Yeah, eat up. In any case, I refuse to attend the party or the parade......

name: Riquet
line: ....It's delicious......

name: Nero
line: Hm? Haha, right? Doesn't it taste great?

name: Riquet
line: ......I've never eaten anything so good.......

name: Riquet
line: It feels like my mouth is in heaven..... It's truly delicious. Thank you so much, Nero.

name: Nero
line: ........ You're welcome.

name: Riquet
line: ....This is good too! I didn't realize the outside world had such delicious food..... Ah..... But is this temptation....?

name: Nero
line: Temptation? What are you talking about?

name: Riquet
line: Father Priest told me that the outside world is corrupted and full of temptation - that's why both humans and wizards have fallen. That is why the Church is protecting me from the outside world until my powers can be put to proper use. I need to erase this tainted mark from my forehead and return to my people at the Church as soon as possible....

name: Nero
line: Who is this father priest? Is he a wizard?

name: Riquet
line: No. He's human, but he was chosen by God - he can hear His voice. He taught me my way of life.

name: Nero
line: ............. ...Humans are even using kids now, huh.....

name: Riquet
line: Huh?

name: Nero
line: How old are you?

name: Riquet
line: I'm sixteen.

name: Nero
line: You seem younger than that..... Must be because you were locked away all this time....

name: Riquet
line: I wasn't locked away. They were simply protecting me from the corruption of the outside world. They're all very kind people.

name: Nero
line: ......Got it. Feel free to eat as much as you want. There's plenty to go around for seconds, too.

name: Riquet
line: Yes, thank you!

name: Mitile
line: Riquet!

name: Riquet
line: Mitile.....

name: Mitile
line: Ah... Hello Sir Sage. Mister Nero, too - breakfast was delicious!

name: Nero
line: Thanks.

name: Mitile
line: Riquet, when you're finished eating, let's head to the courtyard together. My brother will be teaching lessons!

name: Riquet
line: Rutile will? Am I allowed to join you?

name: Mitile
line: Of course! We're friends now, Riquet.

name: Riquet
line: Friends..... Got it. I'll join you then.

name: Mitile
line: Ah.... Sir Sage, Mister Nero, would you like to join us too?

name: Nero
line: I'm good. Study hard, guys.

name: Akira
line: I'll drop by to see how things are going later.

name: Mitile
line: All right. See you later!

name: Riquet
line: Ye~s!

name: Narrator
line: Riquet and Mitile exchange smiles. The hint of childishness in their interactions warms my heart.

name: Rutile
line: All right now, Mitile, Riquet. I'm going to teach you two some new words today.

name: Mitile & Riquet
line: Yes!

name: Rutile
line: Riquet, how well can you write?

name: Riquet
line: Write.....

name: Mitile
line: Don't you know how to read and write?

name: Riquet
line: It wasn't part of my job.... Does everyone here know how to write?

name: Mitile
line: Yes, my brother taught me!

name: Rutile
line: Then let's start by learning how to write your name, Riquet. I love the name Riquet - it has such a beautiful ring to it. How about you, Riquet?

name: Riquet
line: Ah.... I like it too.....

name: Rutile
line: That's great. "Riquet." This is how you spell your name.

name: Rutile
line: Well done! Next, Mitile, could you write your name? Make it look extra nice, so that Riquet can read it.

name: Mitile
line: Got it! Watch me, Riquet. "Mitile"...... This is my name.

name: Riquet
line: M-i-t-i-l-e. Mitile. Got it! I'll try writing it out.

name: Rutile
line: Excellent job, you two. Both humans and wizards use words to express their thoughts and feelings to others, right? That's why words are so important. Words express the heart, and in turn, the heart is also drawn to words. If you use kind words, you become a kinder person. If you use cruel words, you become a crueler person. The words you use will tinge your heart, dyeing it different colors. And the words that you receive can also influence the color of your heart. If you hear nothing but strict and cruel words, your heart shrivels up and becomes all sad and miserable. That's why words are the same as magic. They can bring blessings upon yourself and others, but they can also cast curses the same way.

name: Riquet
line: I see......

name: Riquet
line: I would like to use words of blessing. Because I want to bless others and make them happy. This includes you two as well.

name: Rutile
line: Thank you. That already makes me happy; you're a kind, good boy, Riquet. And the same goes for Mitile, too. I love you two very much.

name: Mitile
line: Ehehe......

name: Riquet
line: Ehehe.....

name: Narrator
line: Riquet and Mitile blush and giggle to each other.

name: Narrator
line: (Footsteps)

name: Narrator
line: Nero approaches me as I observe the heartwarming moment. He awkwardly averts his gaze as he mumbles.

name: Nero
line: I'll do the party and the parade.

name: Akira
line: Eh? Really....?

name: Nero
line: Just this once. None of it is taking place in Eastern Country, so.... If we wizards show up all fancy - looking all tough - for these events, people will be less likely to take advantage of laid-back guys like them, right?

name: Akira
line: Nero.... Thank you.

name: Nero
line: No need to thank me. It's basically just a free meal and drinks, after all. ...What about the Northern wizards? They're not going to show up, right?

name: Akira
line: I'd like them to come, but..... They probably won't show up unless someone stronger than them - like Oz - commands them to.....

name: Nero
line: Yeah, that makes sense. ....It's for the better.....

name: Akira
line: Nero?

name: Nero
line: No, it's nothing.....

name: Akira
line: Rutile.

name: Rutile
line: Sir Sage.

name: Akira
line: I was listening to your lesson from a distance. Please let me join in next time. I'd love to learn about the world with everyone else.

name: Rutile
line: Giving the Sage a lesson - the prospect makes me nervous, but I'd love to have you!

name: Akira
line: Rutile, both you and your brother Mitile are wizards, right? Were your parents wizards too?

name: Rutile
line: Our father was human, but our mother was a witch. She was known as the great witch Tiretta, and she was apparently quite famous. She passed away after she gave birth to Mitile, but she was a bright and cheerful witch.

name: Akira
line: I see.... Rutile, you must be a kind person because she was a wonderful mother.

name: Rutile
line: Thank you. Mother was an important person in my life, but it's also thanks to one of her friends.

name: Akira
line: Miss Tiretta's friend?

name: Rutile
line: Yes. I met him when Mitile was still in Mother's tummy. I was a child at the time, but he still seemed like such a cool man. Powerful witches and wizards can tell when their life is coming to an end.... When Mother told me that she didn't have much time left.... I fell into shock, and almost started crying. But her friend showed me an incredible spell: it was so powerful that he blew away an entire mountain in an instant.

name: Akira
line: A whole mountain in an instant.... I didn't realize magic could be so powerful.....

name: Rutile
line: Yes. After that, the cool uncle gave me a weird talisman and promised me this: "I will protect you and your brother."

name: Narrator
line: Rutile smiles bashfully.

name: Rutile
line: Those words really heartened me. Because I knew that I wouldn't be alone, even after Mother died. And he was right - my little brother was born. Then my mother passed away, and my father followed, leaving just the two of us behind..... But knowing that we have this uncle watching over us.... That alone reassures me, and I can keep walking forward with my head held high, telling myself, "hang in there, and keep doing your best."

name: Rutile
line: Long legs? Now that you mention it, he did have long legs! Mother introduced him to us as an uncle, but he actually looked a bit younger than that. Ah! I got carried away chatting for so long. It just brought back all these memories.....

name: Akira
line: No, thank you for telling me all this. I hope you get to meet your Daddy Long Legs one day.

name: Rutile
line: Me too!

name: Central Country man
line: Today's the day of the Sage's wizards' parade! We'll get to see the heroes who defeated the < Great Catastrophe >!

name: Central Country woman
line: The wizards sure are taking their time......

name: Central Country man
line: Even if you call them heroes, wizards are just liars who only act according to their whims. Are you sure they didn't just ditch?

name: Central Country woman
line: No way...... But we put so much effort into preparing for their welcome on top of carrying out the restoration work.......

name: Central Country man
line: They must have been this irresponsible when fighting against the < Great Catastrophe > too...... That's why we've suffered such great damages...... .....Even though we suffered as much as they did, why are we the ones who have to welcome them......

name: Arthur
line: ............ Everyone is late.......

name: Cock Robin
line: Indeed......

name: Arthur
line: We were supposed to meet up at the outskirts of town and head to the parade together. I explained all this to Cain. It's already time...... Did something happen? Maybe I should go and check.

name: Cock Robin
line: Y-you can't! Prince Arthur, if you're gone too-....

name: Arthur
line: Then could you go check on them for me, Cock Robin?

name: Cock Robin
line: I understand. If I hurry by carriage, I'll be there in half a day -

name: Arthur
line: No, that'd be too late. If you fly at the speed of a frigate bird, you should be there in no time.

name: Cock Robin
line: Well, sure, but I'm not a frigate bird...... ......!?

name: Arthur
line: << Pernoctant Nixzo >>

name: Narrator
line: (Wings flapping)

name: Cock Robin
line: Squawk, squawk squawk squawk!?

name: Arthur
line: I'm counting on you, Cock Robin.

name: Cock Robin
line: Squawk......squawk squawk!

name: Heathcliff
line: Your nails....? You paint your nails?

name: Chloe
line: Yup, isn't it cute? I'll paint yours too, Heath!

name: Heathcliff
line: Uh, umm....?

name: Shylock
line: It's actually quite sensible to decorate your fingertips. We cast spells with our fingers when we're not using our magic tools, after all. Putting effort into them will increase your power.

name: Chloe
line: Really! Okay then, I'm gonna make them even fancier..... Woah....!

name: Little sheep
line: Baa, baa! Baa!

name: Riquet
line: Woah... Such tiny sheep!

name: Mitile
line: Aren't Mister Leno's sheep so cute?

name: Lennox
line: I didn't know when we'd get to go home, so I made them small and brought them with me.

name: Figaro
line: Yawn.... It's been a while since I've had this much free time. Rutile, can you brew me some tea?

name: Rutile
line: Dr. Figaro, you're going to get as round as a cow if you laze around all day.

name: Figaro
line: Hey, cows are great.

name: Akira
line: We were told to wait until another envoy came for us, so.....

name: Cock Robin
line: Grr-, squawk squawk!!

name: Chloe
line: Woah, what now!? A frigate bird!?

name: Heathcliff
line: No... It's a person.....

name: Figaro
line: Looks like he's under a spell. Here we go!

name: Akira
line: Mister Cock Robin.

name: Cock Robin
line: Sir Sage! Why are you all just sitting around like this!?

name: Akira
line: Huh? But we were told to wait here......

name: Cock Robin
line: The parade's going to begin any moment now!

name: Chloe
line: Oh no, oh no, we need to hurry! I need to pack this and that and..... Oh, Rustica, are you all packed?

name: Rustica
line: Yaawn.... Good morning. Why the rush, Chloe? There's still plenty of time till the party. I slept so well. Looks like it's time for some afternoon tea. Let me boil some water and.....

name: Chloe
line: Save the tea for later! There was some kind of miscommunication - we need to hurry and leave right now!

name: Rustica
line: Really. This is the first time I've heard about that.

name: Chloe
line: Because this is the first time I've mentioned it! Ah, your bedhead.....! Rustica, stay still, I'm gonna fix you up.

name: Rustica
line: Yaawn.... Okay, I'll pack my bag with magic. Some socks, a handkerchief, an umbrella.....

name: Chloe
line: Rustica, that's not an umbrella! That's some snake that was crawling around....!

name: Rustica
line: A necktie?

name: Chloe
line: A snake....!

name: Shino
line: Can't they make up their minds? First they tell us to wait, then they tell us to come. What a fuss.

name: Heathcliff
line: Look.... They probably have their reasons.

name: Cain
line: I'll lead you guys to the capital by broom. Cock Robin, give me the detailed rundown.

name: Cock Robin
line: Uh, umm, we're going to meet with Prince Arthur at the entrance of the city. Then we'll have you transfer over to the ceremonial carriages for the parade. There will be a crowd of people hoping to see you as the carriages make their way to the castle. If you could wave at them....

name: Cain
line: Got it. Let's go! Everyone follow me!

name: Murr
line: There he goes.

name: Shylock
line: Cain certainly enjoys leaping ahead and grabbing the reins - perhaps it's because he was the former general of the knights. Let's follow his lead.

name: Cock Robin
line: Ah, wait for me! What should I do.....!?

name: Figaro
line: You can take the elevator. The headquarters' tower connects to the Central tower, right?

name: Snow
line: Unfortunately it doesn't seem to be functioning. Something might have happened to the Central tower.

name: Rutile
line: Then I can take you. I'll make sure you don't fall, so please hop onto the back of my broom.

name: Cock Robin
line: Th-thank you! I'd feel perfectly comfortable riding behind a wizard as kind as you!

name: Rutile
line: Leave it to me! I'll fly even faster than a frigate bird!

name: Cock Robin
line: Huh?

name: Figaro
line: Hey, good luck. Rutile is usually very calm and gentle, but he's an absolute speed demon when he's flying.

name: Cock Robin
line: Huh!?

name: Rutile
line: Here we go~.

name: Cock Robin
line: W-wai..... Aaaaaahhh......!

name: Narrator
line: The moment Cock Robin mounts the broom, Rutile shoots up into the air. They zip through the sky like a shooting star.

name: Cock Robin
line: Y-you're going too fast! Too fast.....!! Wait, please slow down.....!

name: Rutile
line: Huh? I can't really hear you~.

name: Akira
line: W-will he be all right.....

name: Lennox
line: I think he'll be fine. Rutile is flying slower than usual.

name: Rustica
line: Sir Sage, allow me to fly you there. May I take your hand?

name: Akira
line: Ah.... Thank you, Rustica.

name: Rustica
line: It's an honor.

name: Narrator
line: Rustica takes my hand and bows with the grace of a prince. He's the second wizard who's let me ride his broom, after Murr. Rustica has me sit in front of him, then wraps his arms around me from behind.

name: Rustica
line: Do excuse me. I know there are people who have their guests ride behind them, but I tend to be a bit careless, so. I'm always afraid that I might lose the person riding with me. So please bear with me for the course of this short flight.

name: Narrator
line: I was growing a bit nervous at how close he was - speaking right into my ear - but his gentle and relaxing presence puts me at ease. The soft scent of his refined perfume brightens my mood.

name: Akira
line: Oh, it's fine. Thank you for letting me ride on your broom. Are you sure I'm not too heavy?

name: Rustica
line: Not at all. I feel like I'm carrying a feather. Well then, shall we go? It might be a bit shaky at first, but we'll be flying steady soon enough. So please don't be afraid.

name: Narrator
line: Rustica's broom floats into the air, and I can feel the tips of my toes leave the ground.

name: Narrator
line: (Whoosh)

name: Narrator
line: I realize that each wizard's personality is reflected in how they ride their broom. Murr's flight was a complete mess - a rollercoaster of a ride - but Rustica flies with a delicate, gentlemanly grace. I can see why Chloe is so attached to him.

name: Rustica
line: Is the wind too chilly?

name: Akira
line: No, I'm all right.

name: Rustica
line: Sir Sage, how was the weather back in your country? Was it a cold place? Or was it quite warm?

name: Akira
line: Well.... It was neither extremely hot nor extremely cold. It would get moderately warm, and moderately cold.

name: Rustica
line: That's wonderful. So you could have different experiences while living in one place. That means you're familiar with the flower that blooms in the gentle sunlight, the bright sky that glitters in scorching weather, and the snow that falls upon a freezing night.

name: Akira
line: Yes.... When you put it like that, I guess I am.

name: Rustica
line: Your country, and your life there - it all sounds like a beautiful poem.

name: Narrator
line: My heart grows warm at Rustica's straightforward praise. As I gaze at the vast, sprawling lands beneath us, I'm overcome by nostalgia for my world. I had forgotten about it because of how busy I was, but I loved that world and its four seasons.

name: Akira
line: Yes, it was.... I mean, my world had its problems too, but I still think it was a lovely place. And I like this world too. Day by day, I'm coming to like it more and more. It's mysterious, and beautiful, and a little scary.....

name: Rustica
line: That's wonderful. I'm happy to hear that, and I think this world would feel the same.

name: Narrator
line: A gentle wind blows through the sky and the earth. But as we fly on, the vast and beautiful landscape that had been flourishing with nature slowly begins to reveal the cruel scars of destruction.

name: Mitile
line: There was a landslide over there.....

name: Riquet
line: And there's a giant crack in the ground over there. Was there an earthquake?

name: Lennox
line: How terrible... Catastrophes have left their scars across the land.....

name: Cain
line: It must be because the < Great Catastrophe > got so close.... Prince Arthur said the Central capital was in terrible shape as well.

name: Shino
line: The Eastern forest was a mess too.

name: Heathcliff
line: Does that mean Blanchett Castle....?

name: Shino
line: No. The castle region seemed to be relatively well-off. The forest must have protected it. Master and Mistress are both safe.

name: Heathcliff
line: I see......

name: Shino
line: But magical creatures from the ancient past have been revived. For humans, it must feel like the end of the world.

name: Figaro
line: I see. So that's why they need a hero.

name: Rutile
line: ....What do you mean?

name: Cock Robin
line: Mister Rutile! Please don't make such a sharp turn!

name: Figaro
line: When the world is on the brink of despair, people yearn for heroes - for symbols of hope. But this will be a bit of a dangerous gamble.

name: Chloe
line: A dangerous gamble? Why is it dangerous?

name: Faust
line: Hmph. Because a hero can easily be transformed into a villain. There may be people who believe that we will save the world- But there are just as many who will claim that we will let the world fall to destruction because we are not strong enough. That's just how humans are.

name: Shylock
line: Oh my. So that means we don't know whether the crowd will toss flowers or hurl stones at us during the parade.

name: Akira
line: Oh no.....

name: Chloe
line: Eh....? I finally get to participate in a party and a parade, but everyone's just going to hate me again....?

name: Rustica
line: Nobody will hate you, Chloe. They're all eagerly looking forward to meeting you.

name: Rustica
line: Don't you agree, Sir Snow, Sir White?

name: Snow & White
line: That's right, that's right! ....Is what we'd like to say, but.......

name: Snow
line: Faust has good reason to worry. That was why we wanted to get Oz to bring Mithra and the others along.

name: White
line: Because humans fear Oz and the Northern wizards the most. If people see that even these wizards are with us, they'll surely feel at ease, but..... If they see that these wizards refuse to listen to us, it will simply compound their anxiety. For we won't look like we're working together.

name: Chloe
line: But.... Does that mean that dressing up is pointless....? Nobody will welcome us...?

name: Cain
line: We just need to look confident, no matter the circumstances. There's no use in getting hung up on the fact that we failed to convince Oz. Plus, I bet Prince Arthur made extra preparations to make up for who we're missing.

name: Riquet
line: Indeed.... If we show the people that we are truly here to serve them as disciples of God, I am sure it will put their worries to rest.

name: Shino
line: What do you mean, serve? We're not slaves.

name: Heathcliff
line: Shino......

name: Shino
line: We were chosen for a role that we never asked for. Why do we have to suck up to people on top of that?

name: Riquet
line: Isn't it simply right to use your God-granted powers for the greater good?

name: Shino
line: Who I choose to be of use to is a decision for me alone. I'm willing to sacrifice my life for my Master and Mistress at Blanchett. But if anyone else wants to use my power, they'd better beg me for it. I refuse to kiss up to a bunch of jerks who sit around and whine all day.

name: Riquet
line: ....You are thinking like an oppressor. We are more fortunate than humans, and must.....

name: Nero
line: What do you mean, fortunate? They're out here throwing rocks at us. What do we get from fighting the < Great Catastrophe >? What do we get from fighting public criticism? Absolutely nothing.

name: Rutile
line: Please calm down, everyone.... Even so, I'm sure we can become a symbol of hope for somebody out there - just by existing. Once they remember what it feels like to hope, peace will return to their hearts. And they will no longer reach for rocks to hurl at us.

name: Faust
line: How naive.

name: Rutile
line: Mister Faust.....

name: Faust
line: Humans possessed by fear will easily carry out more horrifying cruelties than the most vicious wizard in the world. What if the crowd turns into a violent mob? What if they attempt to trample your brother to death? What will you do then, wizard of the South?

name: Figaro
line: I'll protect him.

name: Rutile
line: Dr. Figaro.....

name: Figaro
line: And I will also protect you from the stones they hurl, Faust. Because I can smile in the face of such cruelty.

name: Figaro
line: I understand why you loathe humans. But at this rate, they'll simply see wizards as their enemies. We need to put smiles on our faces to make up for the Oz and the missing Northern wizards. Otherwise, we won't even be able to fight the catastrophes.

name: Faust
line: Are you telling me to force a smile!?

name: Figaro
line: Listen.....

name: Lennox
line: I'll do it.

name: Narrator
line: Everyone grows silent at Lennox's words.

name: Lennox
line: I will smile in your stead, Sir Faust, and for the rest of the Eastern wizards too.

name: Narrator
line: We all turn around and look at the usually-quiet man with puzzled expressions on our faces.

name: Mitile
line: ....You will, Mister Lennox?

name: Lennox
line: Yes.

name: Mitile
line: You're going to force a smile....? Um, I don't think I've really seen you smile all that much, Mister Lennox.....

name: Lennox
line: Really?

name: Mitile
line: Yes.... Could you please try to smile right now?

name: Lennox
line: ....Like this?

name: Narrator
line: Lennox bares his teeth and grins. And in that moment, the tension among the wizards shatters as they burst into peals of laughter.

name: Faust
line: Haha. Now that's certainly not it.

name: Lennox
line: ....Really?

name: Figaro
line: Ahaha! No no, it was absolutely charming! All the girls in Central will fall in love with you for sure.

name: Rutile
line: Mister Lennox, you're so cute.

name: Shino
line: Hey Heath, you should give it a try. You've got a pretty face if nothing else, so you'll have the girls squealing in no time.

name: Heathcliff
line: What do you mean, "if nothing else".....

name: Narrator
line: I breathe a sigh of relief at the lightened mood in the air. Murr twirls through the bright blue sky with gleeful laughter.

name: Murr
line: Ahaha! How fun! Whether they throw stones or flowers at us - it'll still be fun! We are wizards. We can turn things into anything we want them to be. So let's turn the flowers into fireworks; and the stones into jewels! Let's laugh and carry on, regardless of who is watching us - be it bustling crowds, singing flowers, or pallid ghosts!

name: Narrator
line: His eyes glimmer with the beauty and terror of a burning moon. I freeze in place, captivated, until Chloe flies up beside me.

name: Chloe
line: Hey, hey, Sir Sage.

name: Akira
line: What is it, Chloe?

name: Chloe
line: Remember how the twins mentioned that we won't look like we're working together because the Northern wizards are missing? I was actually thinking that it'd be nice if we could wear matching clothes - since it's a party and all. But everyone here is so unique, with all different styles, so I had a hard time coming up with a single uniform. That's why.....

name: Narrator
line: Still on his broom, Chloe pulls out his sewing box and flips open the lid. In an instant, matching robes appear atop all the flying wizards.

name: Chloe
line: I made us matching robes and outfits instead!

name: Rutile
line: Oh, these outfits are amazing!

name: Shylock
line: My, they are quite stylish.

name: Shino
line: They look really cool.

name: Snow
line: We match!

name: White
line: We match!

name: Snow & White
line: We love to match!

name: Chloe
line: I was wondering if we could wear these during the parade!?

name: Cain
line: I think that's a great idea. Uniforms make you feel more disciplined and prepared.

name: Heathcliff
line: Reminds me of school.

name: Figaro
line: If you can't afford to spare a smile, how about you at least wear this outfit?

name: Faust
line: No; I'm simply going to wear it because I like it.

name: Lennox
line: Thank you, Chloe.

name: Rustica
line: I'm glad everyone loves your outfits, Chloe.

name: Chloe
line: Ehehe.... Yeah!

name: Murr
line: Oh! Look! Arthur's flying this way!

name: Cock Robin
line: Your Highness! Please, I told you to wait....!

name: Arthur
line: I've come to pick you up! I'm glad you're doing well, Sir Sage. The carriage for the parade will be that way - we're all ready to go.

name: Chloe
line: I've never seen such a fancy carriage! Amazing!

name: Rustica
line: It looks like this will be quite a joyous parade. Let us head onwards, Sir Sage.

name: Akira
line: Yes!

name: Drummond
line: Oh, they made it in time! Lord Vincent, the Sage and the wizards have arrived at the outskirts of town!

name: Drummond
line: Goodness, making me all nervous like that...... Where are you headed, Lord Vincent? Will you not be observing the parade?

name: Vincent
line: I will leave the rest to you all.

name: Drummond
line: I-I understand!

name: Soldier
line: Lord Vincent! We have a problem!

name: Vincent
line: What now.

name: Soldier
line: I apologize; this report was delayed due to the parade, but the Central tower......

name: Narrator
line: The Central Country troops briskly march onwards, as the band plays a cheerful, curious tune. Thus our parade starts, with the soldiers taking the lead. The townspeople gather along the main street, some leaning out of their windows, and wave at us with smiles on their faces.

name: Narrator
line: (Cheering)

name: Central Country man
line: It's the Sage and his wizards!

name: Central Country man
line: The wizards from the magic headquarters who defeated the < Great Catastrophe >!

name: Central Country man
line: We have nothing to fear from the < Great Catastrophe > as long as they're around!

name: Central Country woman
line: Thank you, dear wizards......!

name: Central Country man
line: Blessings to the wizards of the magic headquarters!

name: Narrator
line: Confetti and flower petals of every color imaginable swirl and dance against the brilliant blue sky. We wave at the townspeople, relieved by their enthusiastic welcome.

name: Central Country man
line: Prince Arthur! Long live Prince Arthur!

name: Central Country woman
line: See, look over there! That's our prince! He saved us that day when the catastrophe struck!

name: Arthur
line: Thank you, everyone.

name: Narrator
line: Being the prince of Central Country, Arthur naturally gets showered with cheers of encouragement and support from the crowd; the other wizards also receive the same reception.

name: Central Country man
line: General Cain! Thanks for your hard work!

name: Central Country woman
line: Sir Cain! Come have a drink at my shop again sometime!

name: Cain
line: Sure, thanks!

name: Central Country girl
line: Aahh! What a pretty person!

name: Central Country girl
line: I saw him last year, too! He's the Eastern wizard, Sir Heathcliff!

name: Shino
line: Hey, at least wave to them.

name: Heathcliff
line: No, that's too embarrassing.....

name: Shino
line: What is? You should take more pride in yourself. You're a chosen wizard, and a dashing beauty who takes after Mistress. There's nothing embarrassing about you, Heath....

name: Central Country girl
line: And the boy next to him is so tiny and cute!

name: Shino
