line: Indeed. The previous Murr was the one who invented the magical science technique fueled by mana stones. Murr was a philosopher, an inventor, an astronomer, a mineralogist, and a monster of intellectual curiosity. But he never once spared a thought for the consequences of exposing the secrets of this world - of how it would reshape this world. Even though I tried to stop him time and again.

name: Murr
line: I don't get what you're talking about!

name: Narrator
line: Shylock glances at Murr and smiles cynically.

name: Shylock
line: Of course you wouldn't. That's why I hated you.

name: Narrator
line: Murr looks like he's about to say something. But his reply is interrupted by Vincent's voice resounding across the balcony.

name: Vincent
line: Everything is proceeding as planned. It looks like there's nothing for the wizards to do here.

name: Arthur
line: ......Uncle, surely you didn't have to phrase it that way.......

name: Narrator
line: Before I realize it, Shylock and Murr have disappeared. Instead, Figaro stands close to me, an unusually somber expression on his face.

name: Figaro
line: .....The Magical Technology Corps, huh. If that stuff spreads, we're going to be in trouble.

name: Akira
line: Figaro....

name: Figaro
line: At this rate, they'll start hunting wizards.

name: Akira
line: ....Hunting wizards...?

name: Figaro
line: Yes.

name: Akira
line: What does that mean?

name: Figaro
line: I'll give you the details later. I can't explain anything here.

name: Vincent
line: Did you say something?

name: Figaro
line: Nothing at all, your Highness.

name: Shino
line: ......Something's going on outside.

name: Heathcliff
line: I wonder what they're doing... I'll go check.

name: Shino
line: Yeah.

name: Young Maid
line: ....It's pointless. It's going to collapse again anyway.....

name: Young Maid
line: The tower wasn't destroyed by an earthquake.....

name: Shino
line: What do you mean?

name: Young Maid
line: ....It's nothing. Excuse me....

name: Shino
line: Wait.

name: Shino
line: Don't worry. I won't eat you or anything - I'm already full from that delicious pie.

name: Young Maid
line: Was the pie good.....?

name: Shino
line: Yeah.

name: Young Maid
line: My mother baked it..... She works in the kitchen, you see.

name: Shino
line: Your mom is a genius. Please tell her that.

name: Young Maid
line: Yes... Fufu, she'll be glad to hear that.

name: Shino
line: So what was that about the tower?

name: Young Maid
line: The tower wasn't destroyed by an earthquake. There was no earthquake. I saw.... I saw a giant shadow emerge out of the cemetery, crawl up the hill, and latch itself onto the tower.

name: Shino
line: A shadow?

name: Young Maid
line: Yes.... It was the shadow of... A giant bird.

name: Heathcliff
line: The shadow of a bird? Are you sure she didn't mistake it for the shadow of a cloud?

name: Shino
line: I asked a bunch of people, but they all said they didn't sense an earthquake. Something else must've caused the tower to collapse.

name: Heathcliff
line: Where are you going, Shino?

name: Shino
line: I'm going to check out the cemetery.

name: Heathcliff
line: Right now!?

name: Shino
line: Yeah. You're all staying the night here, right? I'll be back by morning.

name: Heathcliff
line: It's dangerous to go alone.

name: Akira
line: It looks like everyone's rooms are ready. Oh, Heath, Shino, is something the matter?

name: Shino
line: I'm going to find out what monster brought that tower down.

name: Akira
line: A monster...? So it really wasn't an earthquake.....

name: Heathcliff
line: You thought it was weird too, Sir Sage?

name: Akira
line: There were lots of earthquakes back in my world, so.... Normally, when there's a tremor strong enough to bring a tower down, the surrounding regions also shake quite a bit. But I didn't feel anything. Even if it happened while we were flying, we should've been able to tell by observing the people and animals on the ground.

name: Shino
line: The maid told me that the shadow of a bird crawled out of the cemetery and latched itself onto the tower.

name: Akira
line: If it's an ancient creature, maybe Snow and White would know something about it....

name: Shino
line: Please ask them about it. I'm headed off.

name: Heathcliff
line: Hey, wait!

name: Shino
line: What?

name: Heathcliff
line: ....... It's dangerous. I'll go with you.

name: Shino
line: Heath? Headed to a cemetery? In the middle of the night? Did you forget that you're afraid of ghosts despite being a wizard?

name: Heathcliff
line: Shut up.

name: Akira
line: I'm worried about just the two of you going alone. I'll come along too.

name: Heathcliff
line: But Sir Sage, it's even more dangerous for you.

name: Shino
line: You're not going to be of any help.

name: Heathcliff
line: Shino.

name: Shino
line: It's dangerous, Sir Sage. Please get a good night's rest in bed.

name: Akira
line: Then you should at least take someone else with you.....

name: Narrator
line: (Footsteps)

name: Faust
line: Why haven't you headed to your rooms? The party should already be over.

name: Nero
line: Yeah, it ended while you were napping.

name: Heathcliff
line: Mr. Faust, Nero.

name: Shino
line: Where were you guys?

name: Nero
line: The pantry.

name: Faust
line: I missed my meal, you see. I'm about to have a late evening drink with the wine that Nero snagged.

name: Heathcliff
line: You're drinking together?

name: Faust & Nero
line: No way.

name: Faust
line: Alone.

name: Nero
line: You're supposed to enjoy a late night drink all alone.

name: Akira
line: I see the Eastern wizards really love being alone...... Faust, Nero. I apologize, because I know it's quite late, but may I ask you two a favor?

name: Faust
line: No.

name: Shino
line: It's fine. Heath and I will just go together.

name: Heathcliff
line: Shino, wait up! .....Ah, Sir Sage, Mr. Faust, Nero. Good night.

name: Faust
line: Where are you going?

name: Nero
line: Central Country might be a pretty safe place, but you two are still a bit too young for adventures after dark.

name: Heathcliff
line: Well, you see....

name: Faust
line: Oh, please.... How did I get dragged into this mess......

name: Heathcliff
line: I'm sorry, Mr. Faust.

name: Nero
line: You're the one who said, "It's dangerous for two children to be headed out alone," even before Mister Sage could say it. For someone who complains about everything, you're a pretty earnest guy.

name: Faust
line: And you're tagging along with us, so that goes for you too.

name: Akira
line: You're both very kind.

name: Nero
line: You didn't have to come along, you know. If something happens to you, the higher-ups are going to yell at us.

name: Akira
line: Who are the higher-ups?

name: Nero
line: Like Oz, or Snow and White?

name: Akira
line: I'm sorry... I wanted to take a look at the world outside of the castle.

name: Faust
line: There's little to see here; isn't it a boring sight? Hardly anyone walks through the streets at night.

name: Akira
line: It's quite dark, after all....

name: Faust
line: That's right. We fear the < Great Catastrophe >; yet we must rely on its light. We're such inconsistent, selfish beings.

name: Shino
line: I can see the cemetery.

name: Heathcliff
line: Shino, don't go ahead on your own!

name: Faust
line: Don't raise your voice, Heath. You will awaken the dead.

name: Nero
line: What, are you scared? Did you kill the guys sleeping underneath these grounds?

name: Heathcliff
line: I wouldn't kill anyone.....

name: Nero
line: Then there's no need to be afraid.

name: Faust
line: Shino, where are you headed?

name: Shino
line: Isn't that hill also part of the cemetery?

name: Faust
line: It is not. That's the hill of execution, where criminals meet their end. And they are buried nearby.

name: Heathcliff
line: The hill of execution...

name: Shino
line: What sort of criminals? Like bandits?

name: Nero
line: I guess so..... At least they get a proper burial.

name: Faust
line: Bandits, murderers, and.... Those who failed to embody the justice defined by their times.

name: Shino
line: Those who failed to embody justice.... You mean failed heroes became criminals?

name: Faust
line: That's right.

name: Shino
line: Why?

name: Faust
line: Why indeed.

name: Faust
line: Let's go. Follow me. Don't leave my side.

name: Rutile
line: Mister Lennox, are you having trouble falling asleep?

name: Lennox
line: Rutile.... This place brings back memories.

name: Rutile
line: Memories...? Have you been to this castle before?

name: Lennox
line: In the far, distant past.

name: Lennox
line: "Let's go. Follow me. Don't leave my side." -He would say, and continue marching forward. And I would ceaselessly follow his back.... We hoped to reach an ideal future.... Yet why did things turn out this way?

name: Rutile
line: ....Mister Lennox..... ....Ah... Is that a portrait.... Of a past king....?

name: Lennox
line: Alec Granvelle. The first king. ....Why did you condemn him - the wizard, your one and only best friend - to be burned at the stake....?

name: Narrator
line: (Hoot hoot)

name: Akira
line: The cemetery is scary at night.....

name: Heathcliff
line: I agree.....

name: Shino
line: The scariest thing about a midnight cemetery isn't ghosts; it's graverobbers. They'll dig up and sell anything they can find. And if they spot you, they'll bury you alive.

name: Heathcliff
line: You've met one before?

name: Shino
line: Yeah. I thought he was a man-eating demon when I saw him.

name: Faust
line: .....This cemetery might've been visited by some graverobbers too.

name: Faust
line: The whole place has been ravaged.

name: Nero
line: You're right.... You can see where they dug things up.

name: Heathcliff
line: How could they do something so awful...? When we're all suffering from the < Great Catastrophe > already....

name: Shino
line: Here we go....

name: Heathcliff
line: Shino! Don't just jump into the grave!

name: Shino
line: Look at this. They haven't touched any of the valuables. The pearls and money are still here.

name: Nero
line: Then why did they....?

name: Faust
line: What about the body?

name: Faust
line: Is there a corpse inside the coffin?

name: Shino
line: I'll check.

name: Nero
line: That thing must be heavy. I'll help.

name: Heathcliff
line: You're going to open the coffin!? But someone who passed away is resting in there....

name: Faust
line: You're right, Heath. The dead deserve an apology; I'll offer them a prayer. But something is bothering me about this situation. Please check the coffin.

name: Akira
line: What's bothering you...?

name: Faust
line: As wizards, we harness mysterious powers derived from sources such as our hearts and natural surroundings. The < Great Catastrophe > is one such source. When it approaches, its mysterious power also grows. It might sound imprudent while the whole world is in danger, but there are many people who aim for that window in time to perform their rituals.

name: Heathcliff
line: ....You're saying that someone performed a ritual by borrowing the power of the < Great Catastrophe >....?

name: Faust
line: That's right.

name: Narrator
line: (Rustle)

name: Shino
line: ...... This thing is.......

name: Shino
line: ...... This thing is.......

name: Heathcliff
line: Wh-what did you find......

name: Shino
line: It's empty.

name: Heathcliff
line: Empty?

name: Nero
line: There isn't a single bone in this coffin. I'll bet the other graves are the same, too.

name: Shino
line: I'll go check a few.

name: Heathcliff
line: I... I'll help you guys.

name: Shino
line: Don't force yourself. You don't need to touch a single coffin. Just stick to Sir Sage.

name: Narrator
line: (Woosh)

name: Nero
line: ....I don't like the feeling of this wind....

name: Faust
line: The spirits are furious. Don't get the wrong idea. We aren't here to trespass on your souls.

name: Narrator
line: The eerie wind continues to blow. Perhaps it's just my imagination - but I see white wisps, shaped like human faces, flying about the cemetery. Faust closes his eyes.

name: Faust
line: << Satillquinart Mullcreed >>

name: Narrator
line: As he quietly murmurs the spell like a prayer, an old mirror appears in his hands. Reflecting the darkness of the night and the light of the moon.

name: Faust
line: Peace, wandering souls. May you find solace in the quiet of night.

name: Narrator
line: The trees of the cemetery continue to shake in mourning. But slowly, the wind quiets down.

name: Shino
line: Faust. I checked a bunch of coffins, but they were all empty.

name: Faust
line: I see.

name: Nero
line: Same here. What do I do with these burial treasures?

name: Faust
line: Burial treasures?

name: Nero
line: There's a ton of valuable stuff rolling around here, and the owners have headed off to heaven. No reason not to take it, right?

name: Nero
line: Hey, it's a joke, come on.

name: Faust
line: It's certainly an ill-natured one.

name: Heathcliff
line: They're going to curse you, Nero!

name: Nero
line: Sorry, my bad.

name: Shino
line: I think Nero is right. I'd rather people give gold to a starving child than leave it to rot with the dead.

name: Heathcliff
line: These are precious items filled with memories belonging to the dead. They should stay with them, even after they pass away. That's why..........

name: Narrator
line: (Clang)

name: Heathcliff
line: ....Did I just hear something fall?

name: Faust
line: Nero. Jump in place, right now.

name: Nero
line: I didn't take anything!

name: Shino
line: Hey, look over there. Wasn't it that collar on the ground?

name: Heathcliff
line: It's a necklace.

name: Shino
line: Right, that necklace.

name: Faust
line: Shino, wait. Don't get close to that thing.

name: Shino
line: Why?

name: Faust
line: ....It wasn't there just a moment ago.

name: Narrator
line: The wind groans as it blows through the cemetery. And the moon shines brighter than ever in the night sky. Like a flower that blossoms as it absorbs the light of the sun, the jewel of necklace grows bright as it basks in the light of the moon. I watch in disbelief as the necklace slowly floats into the air.

name: Shino
line: Watch out, Sage.

name: Shino
line: This happened back in Sherwood Forest too. The amount of power coming from that thing is just creepy.

name: Faust
line: It must be because the < Great Catastrophe > got too close to this world. What had once gone extinct comes back to life; what had once been forgotten remembers its name, and old obsessions that had once been quieted are rekindled. These things absorb the power of the < Great Catastrophe > and blindly run out of control.

name: Narrator
line: (Flash)

name: Narrator
line: In that moment, the necklace unleashes a bright light.

name: Narrator
line: (Woosh)

name: Narrator
line: Which illuminates the whole cemetery as we are blasted by a wind as powerful as a hurricane. Just as I'm about to get blown away, Nero takes me into his arms and leaps into the air. We land on the branch of a tree and he peers into my face.

name: Nero
line: Are you ok, Mister Sage?

name: Akira
line: Nero! Yes I am, thank you!

name: Nero
line: You're welcome. The higher ups will yell at me if anything happens to you, after all. They're way scarier than that thing over there.

name: Narrator
line: I look down towards the ground through the branches of the tree. The necklace emits a rippling, rainbow-colored light that swells into the shape of a giant eyeball. It's a tremendous, menacing light that looks ready to swallow the entire cemetery. Amidst the merciless waves of light and billowing wind, Shino recites his spell.

name: Shino
line: << MatztzÄh Sudipas >>

name: Narrator
line: A giant scythe - unsuited for his height - appears in Shino's hand. The silver light of the blade is menacing and ferocious, yet also pure; it reminds me of Shino himself.

name: Heathcliff
line: Shino.....!

name: Shino
line: Leave it to me. I'll handle it.

name: Narrator
line: Shino leaps into the ominous light. Like a god of death, he effortlessly swings his scythe around and slices through the light in the blink of an eye. The ominous light emits a screech and grows weaker and weaker. Shino then swings his scythe into the air to crush the last remaining jewel.

name: Shino
line: And we're done. If you were a tamer collar, I'd have offered you as a gift to Mistress. But unfortunately, you were too poorly behaved.

name: Narrator
line: His scythe cuts through the night wind and reaps the jewel. Which shatters and emits countless beams of light as it disappears into the night. All that remains in its place is Shino's silhouette basked in the moonlight, with the scythe on his shoulder.

name: Nero
line: You're pretty amazing.

name: Narrator
line: Shino grins proudly in response to Nero's awe.

name: Shino
line: Well, yeah.

name: Heathcliff
line: You're as reckless as ever, Shino......

name: Shino
line: Hey, can you praise me before you start complaining? A vassal loves and lives to be praised by his lord, you know.

name: Heathcliff
line: Where do you learn these sorts of phrases?

name: Shino
line: That's a secret. Hey Faust, you should praise me too. You're a teacher, right?

name: Faust
line: Well done. But you failed to finish the job.

name: Shino
line: What do you mean?

name: Narrator
line: Faust raises his palm in Shino's direction. And a shard that had been flying straight towards the back of Shino's neck freezes mid-air.

name: Narrator
line: Shino turns around in surprise just as Faust snaps his fingers,. The sound echoes through the cemetery and the shard crumbles like sand.

name: Faust
line: See?

name: Heathcliff
line: Hey. Don't click your tongue. You need to say thank you to Mr. Faust.

name: Narrator
line: Faust releases a short laugh, then turns his narrowed eyes towards the remnants of the jewel being carried away by the wind. He chooses his words quietly and carefully, as if speaking to whatever had been locked within the necklace.

name: Faust
line: .....Get lost. No matter how deep your resentment, no matter how furious your rage.... It is no match for mine.

name: Faust
line: ....... ....I was just speaking to myself. Let's go. We couldn't find the bird's shadow, but this was a worthwhile trip. Sage. I'll leave the rest to you.

name: Akira
line: Yes.... Huh!?

name: Faust
line: I'm a shut-in. I don't particularly enjoy solving mysteries. Ask the other wizards to figure it out.

name: Shino
line: Why? Let's come back tomorrow.

name: Heathcliff
line: I-I want to investigate what's going on, too. Mr. Faust, could you please help us out?

name: Faust
line: What? No.

name: Nero
line: Well, let's report what happened to the higher-ups tomorrow. We're headed home for now.

name: Shino
line: .....Got it.

name: Narrator
line: And with that, we leave the cemetery behind.

name: Narrator
line: The next morning, Shino, Heathcliff and I report last night's happenings to Arthur.

name: Arthur
line: Good morning, Sir Sage.

name: Snow
line: Heathcliff, Shino, you're both so early to rise.

name: White
line: What good boys you are.

name: Shino
line: Don't treat me like a kid.

name: Heathcliff
line: I didn't expect to see you two here as well, Sir Snow and Sir White.

name: Snow
line: Indeed. We wanted to have some morning tea together. We asked Oz to join us too, but he refused.

name: White
line: Arthur, no need for you to feel down. I assume he simply doesn't want to face you because he couldn't use his magic last night.

name: Arthur
line: But... It's all due to the injury left by the < Great Catastrophe >; it's not Sir Oz's fault. And are you all right, Heathcliff? You still don't know what your injury is, right?

name: Heathcliff
line: Yes.... And we're still in the dark about Mr. Faust's and Murr's injuries as well.

name: Shino
line: Once we figure out what someone's bizarre injury is, is there any way to cure it?

name: Snow
line: We're currently working on finding a solution. We really have so much to do.

name: White
line: But once we're through with the inauguration ceremony this afternoon, we should have some room to breathe.

name: Snow
line: Which involves greeting the citizens down in the square from the castle balcony.

name: Shino
line: We get to speak to the crowd from the balcony...? That sounds cool - it's just like what the Lord of Blanchett does. I'm ready to greet them right now.

name: Arthur
line: Ahaha. It'll happen soon enough. We're set to greet them at noontime.

name: White
line: Now then, Sage. Why are you here? You came to tell us something, right?

name: Akira
line: Yes. Last night, when we went to the cemetery....

name: Arthur
line: .....A graverobber?

name: Heathcliff
line: That's right. They simply took the corpses without laying a finger on the treasures that lay within the coffins....

name: Arthur
line: I'm also concerned by what you said about the buried treasure being affected by the < Great Catastrophe > drawing too close, as well as the shadow of a giant bird......

name: Snow
line: The shadow of a giant bird....

name: White
line: I feel like I've heard of it before, but perhaps I have not.....

name: Arthur
line: Really?

name: Snow
line: Hm.... I feel like I almost have it.

name: White
line: When you grow older, your memory just doesn't work the way it used to.

name: Shino
line: We can't just wait around hoping that Snow and White will recall anything. I'll help with the investigation. But I want a reward.

name: Arthur
line: A reward?

name: Heathcliff
line: Hold it, Shino! I apologize, Prince Arthur. Shino is still a child.....

name: Shino
line: You're the naive child here. Hey, your Highness. I'm a mere servant who has never known his parents. I want something that will gain me the trust of society.

name: Arthur
line: I see.... But I cannot be the one to grant you anything.

name: Shino
line: Why?

name: Arthur
line: Because if I grant a personal reward to a vassal of the Blanchett family - the great nobles of the East - it'll compromise our diplomatic relations. But I can slip in a word to the royal family of Eastern Country. What is your desire, Shino?

name: Shino
line: Make me a knight assigned to a general, or the close advisor of a minister.

name: Heathcliff
line: ....A knight assigned to a general....? Do you plan on leaving Blanchett?

name: Shino
line: Yeah, with you. Heathcliff, you're going to be the general or the minister.

name: Heathcliff
line: Wh-what are you saying, you idiot!? There's no way I could be a general or a minister, and I wouldn't want to, either......

name: Shino
line: But why? If anyone speaks poorly of a general, he can just chop off their heads. That way, nobody will start rumors about you.

name: Heathcliff
line: Listen......

name: Arthur
line: Haha..... I don't know about that reasoning. People speak ill of me, even though I'm a prince. There's really nothing that will shield you from rumors.

name: Arthur
line: But if all goes well, I will write a letter to the royal family of the East. Is that all right?

name: Shino
line: Yeah. Please.

name: Heathcliff
line: Shino......

name: Narrator
line: (Door opens)

name: Nicholas
line: Excuse me.

name: Arthur
line: Oh, Nicholas. Good timing. There's something I'd like the Magical Technology Corps to investigate. It looks like there was a graverobbing incident at the capital's cemetery-.

name: Nicholas
line: A graverobbing incident?

name: Arthur
line: Yes. I hear that all the graves were overturned.

name: Nicholas
line: What a fanciful tale you're telling. My subordinates went to the cemetery this morning, and they reported nothing out of the ordinary.

name: Shino
line: That can't be true. Last night we saw......

name: Nicholas
line: You must have been dreaming. Why were you at the cemetery anyway? The people will get anxious if they find out that wizards have been prowling the cemetery. They'll think you're carrying out suspicious rituals.

name: Arthur
line: Don't be rude. The Eastern wizards received a bizarre report from a maid at the castle and went to investigate.

name: Nicholas
line: A bizarre report?

name: Shino
line: Yes. That the shadow of a giant bird crawled out of the cemetery and destroyed the tower....

name: Nicholas
line: The shadow of a giant bird? Haha...... You really went and took the nonsensical ramblings of a young girl for truth.

name: Snow
line: But that goes for your subordinates as well - what were they doing in the cemetery first thing in the morning?

name: Nicholas
line: There were several complaints from citizens about a strange light coming from the cemetery in the middle of the night. To think it was all because of you...... All you ever do is create trouble......

name: Heathcliff
line: Shino, where are you going!?

name: Shino
line: I'm going to check out the cemetery. Those graves were definitely overturned.

name: Nicholas
line: Do as you please.

name: Akira
line: Please let me go with you.

name: Shino
line: Got it. Come along, then.

name: Nicholas
line: How pointless. I've confirmed that there was nothing unusual with my own two eyes. Or would the absence of graverobbers be inconvenient for your purposes?

name: Shino
line: What?

name: Nicholas
line: Even Oz, the strongest and most feared wizard in the world, couldn't use his powers in front of the people. We, the Magical Technology Corps, were the ones who repaired the tower gates. This could very well be your attempt to fabricate chaos at the cemetery in order to restore authority to your reputation, could it not?

name: Arthur
line: Nicholas!

name: Heathcliff
line: Mister Nicholas, Captain of the Magical Technology Corps. I too was there to witness the damage wrought by the graverobbers.

name: Nicholas
line: ...... You're the Blanchett family's.......

name: Heathcliff
line: I see you are suggesting that we have disgraced the dead in order to manufacture accomplishments in our name. I will remember that well - especially for the sake of my own country's close ties with Central Country.

name: Nicholas
line: .....I offer you my deepest apologies. Please forgive me for my foolish words.

name: Heathcliff
line: Oh, I can't assure you anything; you know very well that people from Eastern Country hold deep grudges.

name: Nicholas
line: ........ Please excuse me. I'll be taking my leave.

name: Arthur
line: Heathcliff. I apologize on behalf of Nicholas.....

name: Heathcliff
line: No, it's all right. Please don't worry about it. Anyway, I'll tag along with you, Shino, Sir Sage.

name: Shino
line: Yeah.

name: Heathcliff
line: What are you grinning for?

name: Shino
line: You were so cool.

name: Heathcliff
line: No I wasn't.... I shouldn't have lost my cool like that; how embarrassing. They're going to call us gloomy, vindictive wizards again.

name: Snow
line: We'll accompany you as well.

name: White
line: Shall we take our leave?

name: Akira
line: This......

name: Narrator
line: The cemetery looks undisturbed; there isn't a single trace of the overturned graves. Perhaps someone shoveled the dirt back after we left.

name: Shino
line: Let's dig everything up again. The bones might still be gone.

name: Snow
line: Stop it, Shino. If we dig up the graves now, then the people really will start baseless rumors.

name: White
line: And there's no need to - I can sense that the corpses are gone. Someone must have taken them.

name: Snow
line: Something horrible might befall the Central capital soon.

name: White
line: How interesting. We should offer a warning to Arthur.

name: Heathcliff
line: Shino, let's go.

name: Shino
line: Yeah.

name: Snow
line: Well then, Sage, we will go report the situation to Arthur.

name: Shino
line: We'll continue with our own investigation. I'm not letting the Magical Technology Corps steal all the credit.

name: White
line: Make sure you come back in time for the inauguration ceremony.

name: Narrator
line: (Footsteps)

name: Drummond
line: Sir Sage! Thank goodness, what perfect timing....

name: Akira
line: Mister Drummond.

name: Drummond
line: Please lend us your power! Since the approach of the < Great Catastrophe >, we have received repeated reports of mysterious incidents happening all over the capital! And now there's a possibility that we may have to postpone the inauguration ceremony......

name: Shino
line: Huh? What about waving at everyone from the balcony?

name: Heathcliff
line: It looks like there's a problem. Let's be patient and wait.

name: Shino
line: ....Fine. That means we can investigate as much as we want without worrying about the time. Let's go, Heath.

name: Heathcliff
line: Shino! I'm sorry, Sir Sage. Please excuse us.

name: Heathcliff
line: How are you planning on continuing this investigation anyway?

name: Shino
line: Anything will do, so long as it brings us recognition.

name: Heathcliff
line: Recognition.... Shino, were you serious about making me an Eastern Country general....?

name: Shino
line: Of course I was. You'd never go for a title like that on your own.

name: Heathcliff
line: Shino, you don't know what you're talking about.... If I become a general, what are you going to do if we go to a war with Central Country? It means we'll have to fight against Prince Arthur and Cain.

name: Shino
line: When that happens, I'll seize this entire castle and offer it to you.

name: Shino
line: I'll destroy anything in this world to create a path where you can walk with your head high. I'll steal anything and grant it all to you. Heathcliff Blanchett. You are a man worthy of all this. So do not refuse what I offer you.

name: Shino
line: You don't need to do anything. I will make you a hero. And when that happens, we can go back to the way we used to be.

name: Heathcliff
line: ....The way we used to be....?

name: Shino
line: ......You always used to be so happy whenever I brought you something.

name: Heathcliff
line: B-but.... You're talking about flowers and squirrels!?

name: Shino
line: A generalship and a castle are the same sort of thing.

name: Heathcliff
line: They're not the same!

name: Shino
line: They are the same, because they all suit you. They'll also please Master and Mistress. Anyway, for starters, let's secure our prestige in Central Country. We need to outdo the Magical Technology soldiers who are gloating over repairing the tower gates.

name: Akira
line: Mister Drummond. What do you mean by mysterious incidents.......?

name: Drummond
line: Yes, well.... There have been reports from the capital detailing ancient treasures glowing curiously, and people have been witnessing long-extinct creatures from the distant past....... Amongst the reports, our biggest concern is the dreadful happenings at the Lunar Eclipse Palace......

name: Akira
line: Lunar Eclipse Palace?

name: Drummond
line: It's a palace filled with historic ruins, artifacts, and artwork of incredible academic value collected from all around the world. Many magical tools are stored there for safekeeping as well. According to the curator, you can no longer enter the palace. To be more precise, once you enter the palace, you can never return...... And you see, I haven't been able to contact Cock Robin after he went to check on the palace......

name: Akira
line: You can't reach Mister Cock Robin?

name: Drummond
line: Yes... I asked the Magical Technology Corps to help me out, but they refused, saying they had so much to do..... Sir Sage... He can be rude and careless at times, but he is a precious and hard-working employee of mine. I realize I've been incredibly rude to you and the chosen wizards, but may I ask for your cooperation?

name: Murr
line: It's Sir Sage. Heeeey, Sir Sage!

name: Akira
line: Murr... And the Western wizards....

name: Rustica
line: Good morning, Sir Sage. Last night was simply wonderful.

name: Chloe
line: It was so fun! I even made a new friend~. I'm going to make her a scarf!

name: Shylock
line: What were the two of you discussing?

name: Akira
line: Well...... There have been all kinds of mysterious incidents occurring at this place called the Lunar Eclipse Palace, and Mister Cock Robin seems to have gone missing because of it.

name: Rustica
line: He got lost in a palace? It must be quite huge.

name: Chloe
line: He said there were mysterious incidents going on, so maybe it's all under a spell?

name: Shylock
line: There were many bizarre items in that palace, after all.

name: Akira
line: Are you familiar with the palace?

name: Shylock
line: Murr was very fond of it, you see. He would sneak in without permission, browse around without permission, steal items without permission, and also add items without permission.

name: Drummond
line: H-he did what with the great artifacts of our country!?

name: Shylock
line: Please direct your complaints at Murr. But you want us to look for the missing Cock Robin, right?

name: Drummond
line: ....I do. Could you please save him?

name: Shylock
line: Well, so long as you don't mind relying on these irresponsible, lying wizards.

name: Drummond
line: ............. Of course not. I beg you.

name: Shylock
line: Understood.

name: Rustica
line: I'm sure you must be anxious not knowing what has happened to him. I understand that feeling all too well. For I, too, am looking for my lost bride.

name: Drummond
line: ....I see. I hope you... Manage to find her.

name: Rustica
line: Thank you.

name: Chloe
line: You're a nice old guy. Let me help out! We should all work together!

name: Murr
line: Yeah! Let's go!

name: Akira
line: Oh...... P-please wait! Can I come along too? I'm worried about Mister Cock Robin......

name: Murr
line: Sure! Wanna hop on my broom?

name: Shylock
line: Murr, you fly like an acrobat. I'll take you instead, Sir Sage.

name: Akira
line: Please! Thank you!

name: Shylock
line: The Lunar Eclipse Palace lies just beyond that forest. We'll be there soon enough.

name: Chloe
line: The weather is so nice today! It's perfect for flying.

name: Rustica
line: It's also the perfect weather to host a tea party in the garden. We can sing and dance, round and round.

name: Murr
line: Sounds fun! Hey, Sir Sage, do you like to sing?

name: Akira
line: I'm not very good at it, so....

name: Murr
line: It doesn't matter whether you're good or bad! The real question is, do you like it or hate it?

name: Rustica
line: That's right. Sir Sage, if you like something - whether it's singing or dancing - you should enjoy it to your heart's content.

name: Chloe
line: We don't want to have fun with a talented singer - we just want to have fun with you, Sir Sage! If you're enjoying yourself, then so are we!

name: Akira
line: Haha... Then I guess I'll sing the next time you host a tea party.

name: Chloe
line: Yay!

name: Akira
line: Um... May I ask you all a question?

name: Shylock
line: What is it?

name: Akira
line: Why did you accept Mister Drummond's request? Of course I'm worried about Cock Robin. But... Mister Drummond hasn't treated wizards very well up till now. I got the impression that Western wizards were carefree and lived life as they pleased, so I was surprised that you agreed to help him without a word of complaint.

name: Shylock
line: It's very simple. I'm doing it because I decided I wanted to. You are correct when you say that we are not particularly influenced by our surroundings: we do indeed live life as we please. I am interested in the Lunar Eclipse Palace, and I would feel quite terrible letting Cock Robin just die. That's why I took the job; it's simple. However, I am neither driven by a sense of justice; nor by any concern for my reputation. So if I grow tired of this job, I'll simply cast it aside.

name: Akira
line: I-I see....

name: Rustica
line: Wizards may live long lives, but it's still a waste to spend your time on things that make you sad or angry.

name: Chloe
line: We're not very good at staying depressed, you see. But we are really good at smiling - even if that might seem a little distorted. We don't want to blame anyone else for our smiles or our tears, so every choice we make is our own; in the end, we're all alone.

name: Akira
line: All alone...? But Chloe, you and Rustica get along so well. The same goes for Murr and Shylock.....

name: Rustica
line: We are lonely beings. For no matter how much time we spend in company - at the end of our lives, we're fated to turn into cold stone all alone. That's why we want to huddle close while we can, and share our warmth with those who are precious to us.

name: Shylock
line: We've arrived at the palace, Sir Sage.

name: Akira
line: So this is the Lunar Eclipse Palace......

name: Chloe
line: It's kind of dark in here...... I'm getting creepy crawly feelings.....

name: Rustica
line: What's wrong, Shylock?

name: Shylock
line: I sense Murr's presence.....

name: Chloe
line: Murr is right here.

name: Murr
line: I'm right here!

name: Shylock
line: Yes, you're right.... Don't mind me. Let's go.

name: Narrator
line: (Creaking)

name: Narrator
line: Shylock opens the door, and we are greeted with the interior of an old, Western-style building. A curious atmosphere hangs about the place; artifacts I've never seen before are lined up all around the room. As I walk around marveling at everything I see, a butterfly comes flitting our way. It flutters through the air, covered in glittering dust that sparkles as its wings shift between colors - one moment purple; the next, yellow.

name: Chloe
line: What's with that butterfly....?

name: Rustica
line: It's strange but beautiful.

name: Narrator
line: The butterfly gently lands on Rustica's shoulder. And in an instant, it swells to the size of a horse carriage. Its long, straw-like tongue slithers and wriggles back and forth as it attacks Rustica.

name: Akira
line: Rustica.....!

name: Rustica
line: << Amorest Viesse >>

name: Narrator
line: Without losing a second, Rustica raises the birdcage that he always carries with him. The giant butterfly shrinks right before our eyes, sucked straight into the birdcage.

name: Rustica
line: Phew, that was surprising....

name: Chloe
line: Are you okay, Rustica!?

name: Rustica
line: I'm fine. But now I know that a butterfly has a terrifying face upon close inspection. It'll probably turn up in my nightmares tonight.

name: Chloe
line: Geez, Rustica, you're always so laid back.

name: Narrator
line: I breathe a sigh of relief. But then I frown, noticing that butterfly scales continue to shimmer and flutter around us. Even though the butterfly has already vanished, the glittering scales increase steadily in number - to the point where I start to feel suffocated. Then I realize that the scales have surrounded us.

name: Shylock
line: Don't move.

name: Narrator
line: I nod and nervously hold my breath. Shylock puts his pipe to his mouth, and slowly blows out a cloud of white smoke. Enveloped by the smoke, the glittering scales begin to spin around and radiate light like a disco ball. The scales continue to emit light as they gather into what looks like a giant face. The face peers into mine, and laughter rings through my ears.

name: Narrator
line: (Demonic laugh)

name: Butterfly scales
line: Gyahahahaha!

name: Narrator
line: I feel my head spinning at this series of incomprehensible events.

name: Narrator
line: Shylock places his index finger on my lips, and I desperately clamp my mouth shut. He puts his pipe to his mouth again, and leisurely breathes out a long stream of smoke. At that moment......

name: Murr
line: Wah!!

name: Akira
line: Gyaaah!

name: Narrator
line: Startled by Murr, I let out a resounding scream.

name: Narrator
line: (More demonic laughter)

name: Butterfly scales
line: Gyahahahaha!!

name: Narrator
line: The laughing face made of scales turns toward me, and closes in from above my head. Just as I am about to be swallowed by its giant, gaping mouth- A large, polka-dot patterned cloth wraps around me, as if protecting me.

name: Chloe
line: << Suispicibo Voitengok >> !

name: Narrator
line: In an instant, the polka-dot patterned cloth turns into a raincoat, fitting itself perfectly on my body. But as soon as the glittering scales fall onto the raincoat, it glows with a blue flame and dissipates into cinders. In the meantime, Shylock banishes the glittering scales with the smoke from his pipe. I instinctively pat my body down, but I don't seem to be burnt anywhere.

name: Akira
line: Wh-What was that?

name: Chloe
line: A temporary protective spell. You're not hurt anywhere, right?

name: Akira
line: Yes, I'm all right. Thank you.

name: Narrator
line: Chloe beams cheerfully. Pipe still in his mouth, Shylock narrows his eyes and glares into the darkness.

name: Shylock
line: Stop with this puerile prank right now. Come on out.

name: Akira
line: What do you mean, come on out? Is there someone else in this room?

name: Shylock
line: Oh, yes. In fact, he's a wizard with a terrible personality who makes a hobby out of provoking others.....
Oh dear, what a nasty description.

name: Narrator
line: We all look up in astonishment at the voice echoing from the darkness. I've heard that voice before. The darkness flickers, and takes the shape of a human. And Shylock swallows his breath.

name: Shylock
line: ....Don't tell me.....
It's been ages since we last met, yet you insult me so coldly. I don't dislike that about you, though.

name: Narrator
line: A presence slowly steals closer. The dark human-shaped silhouette takes his hat in hand, and sweeps it into a gentlemanly bow. Before us-

name: Rustica
line: Oh?

name: Murr
line: Eh?

name: Narrator
line: There stands another Murr.
Welcome to the Lunar Palace.

name: Narrator
line: Grinning broadly, the other Murr snaps his fingers. And then-

name: Narrator
line: (Flash of light)

name: Narrator
line: We are drawn into an infinite, spiraling vortex in space.

name: Mithra
line: Please give me one of those. Ah... and one of these, too.

name: Central town shopkeeper
line: Mister Sage's Wizard, um...... I need payment.....

name: Mithra
line: Did you just make a demand?

name: Mithra
line: If we were in the North, I would have killed you already. How would you like that?

name: Central town shopkeeper
line: P-please take everything you need!

name: Mithra
line: Oh, thanks.

name: Rutile
line: Mister Mithra!

name: Mithra
line: ....Who are you?

name: Rutile
line: I'm the Southern wizard Rutile. This is my little brother Mitile.

name: Mitile
line: Hello.....

name: Mithra
line: Okay.....

name: Rutile
line: Were you shopping?

name: Mithra
line: Yes, because I was bored. You see, I need to be careful about what I do, or else Oz will come after me. It's such a pain. Do you have business with me?

name: Rutile
line: Um..... You're Uncle Mithra, right?

name: Mithra
line: Uncle Mithra.

name: Rutile
line: We met once when I was a child. Do you remember me? You said you were my mother's friend, and she introduced you as "Uncle Mithra." You gave us an artifact resembling a monkey's arm...

name: Mithra
line: A monkey's arm? A vanara arm is a powerful talisman, but you're saying I gave you one?

name: Rutile
line: Yes. When Mitile was still in our mother's stomach.

name: Rutile
line: Ah, I forgot to tell you the most important part. Our mother was a witch, and her name was....

name: Mithra
line: I don't care. Since I don't remember.

name: Mithra
line: Please get out of my way.

name: Rutile
line: S-sorry for taking up your time.....

name: Narrator
line: (Footsteps)

name: Mitile
line: .......... What's with him? He's so rude....

name: Rutile
line: Sorry, Mitile. It looks like it was a misunderstanding on my part.

name: Mitile
line: There's no way we'd know a Northern wizard. Mother was a great witch, after all.

name: Rutile
line: There you go again. You know, there are lots of good things about the Northern wizards, too.

name: Central town shopkeeper
line: Hey, you there. Do you know that guy?

name: Rutile
line: Huh? Ah, yes......

name: Central town shopkeeper
line: Great! Can you pay for everything he gobbled up?

name: Mitile
line: He's the worst!

name: Rutile
line: H.... Hey, don't say that. Maybe he just didn't know how to buy groceries. What's the total? I'll pay you.

name: Mitile
line: You're too kind! Our reputation is tanking because the Northern wizards do whatever they want.

name: Figaro
line: Hey, Rutile, Mitile.

name: Rutile
line: Dr. Figaro... and Mister Lennox, too. What are you two doing here?

name: Lennox
line: We were asked to help fix up the city. Apparently there's been a series of bizarre events that slowed down the reconstruction work. We're also keeping an eye on him.......

name: Mitile
line: Him?

name: Bradley
line: Tch..... The twins said I could reduce my sentence by doing volunteer work. I'm only helping you so I can get released as soon as possible.

name: Rutile
line: Mister Bradley.

name: Mitile
line: ...... Another Northern wizard.....

name: Narrator
line: Burning stars hurtle through the vast expanse of infinitely sprawling darkness. I plunge downwards through outer space. No - I could be floating upwards for all I know.

name: Akira
line: Where is everyone? Where are you guys......!?

name: Narrator
line: I reach out blindly, besieged by terror at the thought of wandering through the stars alone. And someone grabs my hand.

name: Akira
line: Murr....!

name: Narrator
line: My relief is short-lived; from the smile on Murr's face, I can tell that he is not the Murr I know. His intelligent gaze cuts like a knife, and his gentlemanly smile hides his true identity like a perfect magic trick.

name: Murr
line: Pardon me, Sir Sage. It looks like my surprise was a bit much for you.

name: Narrator
line: Murr takes my hand as if inviting me to dance. Still bewildered, I tighten my grip on his hand. I'm scared of wandering this space all alone, so I don't want to let go. Even if I don't know who he really is. I remember the Murr that I met in the elevator on the day I first arrived in this world. "Both the world and I have been torn apart quite terribly..." "But I want you to discover the truth about this world."

name: Akira
line: ......Are you the Murr I met in the elevator......?

name: Narrator
line: Murr smirks, the corners of his lips turned upwards.

name: Murr
line: No, this is the first time we've met. I've always been here, in the Lunar Eclipse Palace. I was quite fond of this place, after all. Herein lie the treasures of the ancient past - from the earliest days of civilization - left by wizards and humans alike. There is a shard of my dearest beloved, too.

name: Akira
line: A shard of your dearest beloved....?

name: Murr
line: A shard of the moon.... A moonstone. A small meteorite that arrived from the < Great Catastrophe >.

name: Akira
line: The < Great Catastrophe >......? The < Great Catastrophe > is your dearest beloved?

name: Murr
line: Indeed. I am in love with it.

name: Narrator
line: I gaze at Murr intently. As I observe him closely, I realize that he has a different air to him than the Murr I first met in the elevator. He's a bit more provocative, and a bit more arrogant.

name: Akira
line: Who are you?

name: Murr
line: I am the Western wizard Murr. People called me a philosopher, a genius, a brilliant inventor.... I have many titles, but my favorite is this - "The troublemaker Murr, who fell in love with the moon and destroyed himself" - it's what Shylock called me. It sounds like the title of a comedy.... Or an epitaph.

name: Narrator
line: I don't understand any of it - what the Murr in front of me is saying, whether he's a good person or a bad person. But when his eyes, like burning stars, gaze into mine, I feel like they're sucking me in.

name: Akira
line: ....Who are you....?

name: Murr
line: Don't ask the same question twice; that's boring. Try a different approach. You can find the answer.

name: Akira
line: ....You're a different person than the Murr I was with? Or are you the real Murr?

name: Murr
line: Both answers are right, and also wrong.

name: Akira
line: ...I don't understand....

name: Murr
line: Think. I love observing people's faces as they think.

name: Narrator
line: Murr touches my face and smiles delightedly.

name: Murr
line: They freeze, as if in temporary death; yet they're busy thinking round and round in their minds and hearts. It's quite serene, raw, and beautiful. Just as the cold light of a star is actually burning at a temperature far too hot to approach - intellect burns with intensity. So please, Sir Sage. Approach my identity with the beloved feeling of yearning so hard for the truth that it consumes one's body.

name: Narrator
line: I purse my lips at Murr's delight.

name: Akira
line: ...The Murr I was with up till now was quite strange, but you are plenty strange too....

name: Murr
line: What great praise. If I'm the same as anyone else, there's no reason for me to be alive.

name: Narrator
line: Murr shrugs, and I desperately try to rack my brain. What did Shylock say? I've heard many stories about Murr from him. Murr is an intelligent gentleman. The inventor of magical technology. But he got too close to the secret of the < Great Catastrophe >, and.... His soul shattered to pieces.

name: Akira
line: ....Are you a piece of Murr's shattered soul....?

name: Narrator
line: In high spirits, Murr takes my hand and dances us around in a circle.

name: Murr
line: Excellent! I am one of the many pieces of Murr's shattered soul, which lie all over the world. I fell here, without manifesting any particular form. But the day the < Great Catastrophe > approached - for some reason, I managed to take this physical shape. The beautiful < Great Catastrophe > affects everything it approaches. I see it came quite close this time. And Murr fought the < Great Catastrophe >; that may be why his body was affected by it, causing the shards of his soul to take physical form.

name: Akira
line: The shards of his soul take physical form... So this is Murr's bizarre injury....

name: Murr
line: Bizarre injury. That's an interesting phrase. I'm quite fond of it.

name: Akira
line: Um... So, there are Murrs like you all over the world - if we gather them all, will Murr return to his former self?

name: Murr
line: Perhaps. But I can't say I like the idea. Murr is too intelligent; his brain can never stay in one place. I would like to remain immersed in my own research. Is that a problem?

name: Akira
line: I don't think I can answer that question for you.....

name: Murr
line: I see. To whom do you think I should make my demands known? Do soul shards have human rights?

name: Akira
line: W... Why did you kidnap Mister Cock Robin? Because you didn't want him to get in the way of your research?

name: Murr
line: I didn't kidnap him. I simply stopped him from wandering further into the palace. Because therein lie the traces of a powerful spell.

name: Akira
line: A powerful spell?

name: Murr
line: Yes. An unsuccessful invocation has lost its harmony and is now changing form. They used the moonstone as a medium - some old human bones wouldn't really suffice as a proper sacrifice. To top it off, the person who carried out the ritual wielded no magic.

name: Akira
line: W-what does that mean? Please speak in simpler terms....

name: Narrator
line: Murr narrows his eyes like a cat, smiling enigmatically.

name: Murr
line: People tried to beckon the < Great Catastrophe > to draw close - presumably, people all over the world. This is merely one part of a greater summoning circle.

name: Akira
line: Beckon the < Great Catastrophe >....?

name: Narrator
line: Murr merely continues to smile. I am confused. Everyone so far told me the same thing: that the world will be destroyed when the < Great Catastrophe > comes close. Yet....

name: Akira
line: You mean someone was trying to beckon the < Great Catastrophe >, and that's what caused all this damage? But it's going to cause the end of the world - why would they do this....?

name: Murr
line: Unfortunately, I don't have the answer to that. Perhaps another Murr could tell you, but all I know of is the tragedy that is about to follow.

name: Akira
line: Tragedy....

name: Murr
line: The invocation that was carried out here.... In other words, the summoning of the moon failed, and it is transforming into an entirely different spell. Didn't the Umbra Volans1 make an appearance? The elderly twins from the North should know about it well. But they are getting quite old, so perhaps their memory is deteriorating.

name: Shylock
line: -Let go of his hand.

name: Narrator
line: Suddenly, a pipe is laid against Murr's neck. Murr simply glances over his shoulder. Shylock stands there behind him, Chloe and Rustica following a beat later.

name: Rustica
line: Sir Sage, are you all right!?

name: Chloe
line: Is that man...... The other Murr we saw just moments ago!?

name: Narrator
line: Murr shows no sign of panicking; he merely glances sideways at Shylock and laughs.

name: Murr
line: Hello, Shylock. It's certainly been a while. The scent of your pipe reminds me of the times we spent all night in argument.

name: Shylock
line: It has certainly been a while since I last saw such a garrulous Murr. You must be a piece of Murr's soul.

name: Murr
line: Indeed. What are you going to do with me?

name: Shylock
line: I'm going to retrieve you and return you to Murr.

name: Murr
line: Really? My dear friend Shylock, do you really want to do such a thing?

name: Shylock
line: ...What do you mean?

name: Murr
line: I thought you were quite fond of him. The innocent and simple-minded me, who rolls around like a stray cat.

name: Murr
line: He won't talk down to you; he won't insult you. He'll listen to your every command. The foolish and adorable Murr, who belongs only to you. You loved me, and you loathed me. Of course you're fond of him.

name: Narrator
line: Shylock's face stiffens at Murr's grin.

name: Shylock
line: ....Oh loathsome Murr. But if you are going to call me a friend, I do wish you would understand me a bit better.

name: Murr
line: I believe I do understand you. You wanted to stop me from inventing magical science technology. But I refused. And as a result, your hometown was contaminated. The creatures went extinct, and the waves ceased to echo across the shores. Of course you loathe me. But you are surprisingly obsessive, so you could not cast away your affection for me. That is why you continue to think of me in conflict - the conflict that you so adore. You loathe me and you love me. You blame me and you forgive me. You pity me, and you think of me nostalgically. Am I wrong?

name: Narrator
line: Shylock smiles. He slowly brings the mouthpiece of his pipe to his lips, a vein popping on his forehead.

name: Shylock
line: I am merely saying that I would only like to defeat you after you return to your full strength.

name: Murr
line: You're a fool. If I return to my former self, you wouldn't stand a chance. Because I'm stronger and smarter than you. Isn't that why you hated me?

name: Shylock
line: << Invibelle >>

name: Narrator
line: Shylock casts his spell like a whisper of love, and Murr is enveloped in smoke. His body begins to turn purple, as if it has been poisoned. Shylock watches with freezing cold eyes as Murr's body transforms grotesquely.

name: Shylock
line: You know, I always did think that you needed a proper education in good taste.

name: Murr
line: Ah, ah. Ah.....

name: Shylock
line: Do not fear. I will give the new Murr a fine teaching.

name: Narrator
line: Shylock relentlessly blows more smoke towards Murr, even as he continues to writhe in agony.

name: Rustica
line: Sh-Shylock... Isn't this a bit much.... It makes me want to close my eyes....

name: Shylock
line: Then why don't you look away?

name: Shylock
line: << Invibelle >>

name: Chloe
line: Y-you really aren't holding back.... Shylock, are you mad....?

name: Shylock
line: It's just as this man said.

name: Narrator
line: Shylock huffs out a breath of smoke and quietly closes his eyes.

name: Shylock
line: I have always been furious at Murr, and I have always wanted to get my revenge. All while thinking of him more belovedly than anyone else.

name: Narrator
line: Still struggling, Murr - now entirely discolored - starts to melt and lose his shape. Before long, he turns into a small shard of purple sapphire. As the shard drops to the floor, we find ourselves back in the Western-style building.

name: Chloe
line: Phew... Thank goodness we're back.... So Murr's soul shard made that weird space, huh....

name: Shylock
line: That seems to be the case.

name: Narrator
line: Shylock picks up the shard lying on the floor as if it is something precious. Then we hear a voice calling out for us, and Murr appears on his broom.

name: Murr
line: We were in space! Did you guys see?

name: Chloe
line: We did! But more importantly, Murr, you were in huge trouble.

name: Murr
line: Trouble?

name: Shylock
line: Everything is all right now. Open your mouth.

name: Narrator
line: Shylock offers him the shard of purple sapphire. Murr obediently opens his mouth.

name: Murr
line: Ah.

name: Shylock
line: Murr.

name: Murr
line: Ye~s?

name: Shylock
line: How do you feel about me?

name: Narrator
line: Murr closes his mouth and responds without hesitation.

name: Murr
line: I love you!

name: Narrator
line: Shylock finally smiles, then puts the soul shard into Murr's mouth. Murr swallows the shard and Shylock gently pats his head.

name: Shylock
line: I love you too.

name: Murr
line: Yay~!

name: Rustica
line: Haha. How precious.

name: Chloe
line: Do you really think so....? Personally, it's getting to my stomach after the grotesque scene back there.....

name: Rustica
line: They've lived long lives, you see; that's why their friendship is just a bit extreme.

name: Chloe
line: Rustica, you've lived a long life too, right...? Let's make our friendship not-so-extreme, please....?

name: Rustica
line: I'll do my best. Murr. Did eating that shard help you remember anything?

name: Narrator
line: Murr blinks a few times, and lifts his right hand, where he wears his ring.

name: Murr
line: << Eanul Rambul >>!

name: Akira
line: Mister Cock Robin!

name: Narrator
line: Murr recites his spell, and Mister Cock Robin appears in the previously empty space.

name: Narrator
line: Mister Cock Robin takes one look at Murr's face and screams.

name: Cock Robin
line: Stop! Don't kill me!

name: Shylock
line: Don't worry. The person who trapped you was Murr, but it was also not Murr.

name: Cock Robin
line: Wh-what do you mean?

name: Akira
line: He said he trapped you so that you wouldn't head into the back of the palace. He did it to save you.

name: Cock Robin
line: I... I see. I thought I would be stuck in there forever. Thank you, Sir Sage.

name: Akira
line: Please say that to them. I wasn't the one who saved you - they were.

name: Cock Robin
line: Ah... Thank you, Sage's wizards.

name: Chloe
line: No worries! More importantly, do you remember what happened?

name: Cock Robin
line: Um, let me see...... The curator of the Lunar Eclipse Palace asked me to look into things, so that's why I was exploring the place by myself.

name: Rustica
line: That's amazing. You must be a very brave person.

name: Narrator
line: At Rustica's praise, Cock Robin blushes and scratches his head.

name: Cock Robin
line: N-no, not at all! I'm actually very timid. But you let me ride on your brooms, and when I flew through the sky.... I felt like a different person - I wanted to become someone else... Ah, sorry! That was a tangent. In any case, when I was looking around, I saw a creepy, eerie door. And when I tried to open it-..... Murr appeared, and blasted me off into a place that looked like outer space, and I had been floating around ever since.

name: Chloe
line: That sounds like a lot. I'm sorry you had to go through that.

name: Shylock
line: A creepy, eerie door... Could you take us there?

name: Cock Robin
line: Yes, of course.

name: Cain
line: ....Phew. I'm finally back at the castle. The < Great Catastrophe > caused so much trouble - there's weird stuff going on all over the capital.

name: Central Country soldier
line: Welcome back, General Cain.

name: Cain
line: Woah... H-hey there.

name: Central Country soldier
line: ....? Are you all right? Perhaps you need to get some rest.

name: Cain
line: Sorry, my eyes haven't been doing so well lately.

name: Central Country soldier
line: That's terrible...! Let's get you to a doctor immediately...!

name: Cain
line: Nah, it's no big deal. But... Could you hold my hand?

name: Central Country soldier
line: Hold... your hand....?

name: Cain
line: Yeah. For just a moment.

name: Central Country soldier
line: The hero, General Cain's hand... The hand of the former leader of the Order of Knights and the greatest warrior in all of Central... I'm sure I will be blessed by a goddess!

name: Cain
line: No, it's not that big a deal....

name: Central Country soldier
line: But excuse me for one second, my nails are soiled! Let me wash my hands first....!

name: Cain
line: It's fine, it's fine. Here.

name: Cain
line: Ah, I can finally see you.

name: Central Country soldier
line: General Cain's hand... Is so big......

name: Cain
line: Well, sure. How is the Order of Knights holding up after the attack of the < Great Catastrophe >? Even the Sage's wizards had a lot of trouble fighting it this year, and it caused some horrible damages and losses. Were you guys all right?

name: Central Country soldier
line: Yes. It was all thanks to your training, General Cain....

name: Nicholas
line: What are you doing? Return to your position.

name: Central Country soldier
line: Yes sir....!

name: Cain
line: He was talking to me.

name: Nicholas
line: Show some deference to your superiors.

name: Cain
line: He was talking to me, Sir Nicholas, leader of the Order of Knights - no, captain of the Magical Technology Corps, I guess.

name: Nicholas
line: You taking my spot as the leader of the Order of Knights is already a story of the past. I hear they stripped you of your position and kicked you out after they discovered you were a wizard. No wonder your sword wielding skills were out of this world.

name: Cain
line: I don't recall using magic when I fought you.

name: Nicholas
line: What did I say about deference?

name: Cain
line: ....Sir. But you're weird, too. I remember how much you hated magic. Why did you join the Magical Technology Corps?

name: Nicholas
line: .......You would never understand.

name: Cain
line: Huh?

name: Nicholas
line: Stop acting like you still have any connection to the Central knights. You're already a wizard and an outsider.

name: Nicholas
line: Wizards can manipulate any heart and steal their way past any door. They could easily get their hands on national secrets.

name: Cain
line: What are you suggesting? Are you trying to say I'd betray this country?

name: Nicholas
line: Wizards make organizations fall apart. They aren't suited to knighthood. There's no place for you within this castle anymore. Stop taking advantage of Prince Arthur's kindness. Take your comrades and leave this castle.

name: Cain
line: You.....! ......! Head down!

name: Narrator
line: (Crash)

name: Owen
line: Oh dear? Why did you protect him?

name: Cain
line: Owen.....!

name: Owen
line: I was going to kill him for you.

name: Cain
line: Run. You don't stand a chance against him.

name: Nicholas
line: Shut up! Get down here, Northern wizard Owen! Get on your knees, and show me what's inside your bag!

name: Owen
line: My bag?

name: Nicholas
line: Yes. You might be bringing suspicious items into the castle.

name: Owen
line: I mean, sure. But the moment I open this bag, you're dead.

name: Cain
line: Go. I mean, please go. I'll hold him off.....

name: Nicholas
line: .....You monsters....!

name: Narrator
line: (Footsteps)

name: Owen
line: Ahaha. Even though you protected him. He insulted the both of us together. Humans simply see us as the same kind of monster, my gentle knight.

name: Cain
line: We aren't the same.

name: Owen
line: We're the same. Ahaha....!

name: Cain
line: ....He disappeared..... ......Dammit......!

name: Central Country man
line: Excuse me, could you help me move this rubble?

name: Lennox
line: Certainly.

name: Bradley
line: Dammit. Why the hell does the great Bradley have to do volunteer work?

name: Figaro
line: Now now, no whining. You don't want to go back to prison, right? You should be grateful for your freedom.

name: Mitile
line: Dr. Figaro, could you help me out here?

name: Figaro
line: I'm headed over right now~.

name: Bradley
line: .....Why the hell are you being all friendly with the Southern wizards, Northern wizard Figaro? If you wanted to, you could make everyone here your slave. Why are you helping these powerless humans?

name: Figaro
line: Because I like humans. Also, I've kept my origins a secret from those two. I'll punish you if you let it slip, Bradley.

name: Figaro
line: All right, I'm headed off. Ask Lennox for further instructions. Leno, take care of him.

name: Lennox
line: Got it. Bradley. Can you take the rubble to the other side of the plaza? Make sure you don't hurt anyone.

name: Bradley
line: Dammit, what a pain..... There! Are you satisfied?

name: Narrator
line: (Clatter)

name: Lennox
line: Yes. Thank you.

name: Bradley
line: Hmph.... You're not as strong as Figaro. What would you do if I killed you and ran away?

name: Lennox
line: That would be a problem.

name: Bradley
line: That's all you have to say!?

name: Lennox
line: I mean... It would be a big problem.

name: Bradley
line: Hmph.

name: Lennox
line: Please keep working. You can help everyone out by clearing this path.

name: Bradley
line: Stop acting all nice. I'll let you in on something good. Absent-minded guys like you are the ones who end up attacking women and children when it comes down to it. You get so excited that you don't even know what you're doing.

name: Bradley
line: Hmph. Did I make you mad? Bet I hit the mark. I had lots of underlings, after all. Hey, say something.

name: Lennox
line: You really like to talk.

name: Bradley
line: Aaah!?

name: Lennox
line: I'm sorry. I'm not very good at talking. It takes me a while to gather my thoughts.... Rutile complains about this all the time.

name: Bradley
line: .......You really are absent-minded. You just took the fun out of it.

name: Lennox
line: I see.

name: Bradley
line: Yeah.

name: Lennox
line: Please keep working.

name: Bradley
line: Shut up, you already said that! Geez....

name: Narrator
line: (Footsteps)

name: Central Country child
line: Mister Wizard, thank you for helping us out! This bread is from Mother.....

name: Lennox
line: Thank - ah......

name: Bradley
line: I'm working harder than you. So I get to eat it.

name: Lennox
line: Oh, so you were hungry?

name: Bradley
line: Yeah.

name: Lennox
line: I see. It's easy to get frustrated when you're hungry, isn't it.

name: Bradley
line: I wasn't whining because I was hungry! Geez, Southern wizards are so slow.... Hmph... He bakes better bread, but this isn't bad.

name: Bradley
line: What are you looking at? I'm gonna eat you too.

name: Central Country child
line: Waaaah........

name: Lennox
line: Don't threaten a young child.... Thank you. Say thanks to your mother for me.

name: Narrator
line: (Footsteps)

name: Mitile
line: Hey! Why are you bullying him!

name: Lennox
line: Mitile.

name: Bradley
line: The hell's with you? Want me to make you cry too?

name: Mitile
line: I... I can't have you making all of us wizards look bad.

name: Bradley
line: Well, that's not my problem. The only ones who'd wind up in trouble are weak goody-two-shoes like you. You're weak, but you're still stronger than humans. Why do you go around sucking up to them?

name: Mitile
line: I'm not sucking up to anyone! I just want everyone to get along....

name: Bradley
line: Why does everyone need to get along? We can live on our own. If a town gets covered in rubble, then you just need to look for a new one that's not. Why the hell do we have to do this pain-in-the-ass kinda work? Just find a better town and make that your territory.

name: Mitile
line: This is where everyone here has lived up till now. They're all attached to this place.

name: Bradley
line: That's everyone else. Not me.

name: Mitile
line: We should help each other out in times of trouble! So that we can all live together....

name: Bradley
line: What's the deal with "everyone"? Why do you need everyone to get along?

name: Mitile
line: Most people like being with others. Most people want to be loved; we don't want to be hated! I guess it's different for Northern wizards!

name: Bradley
line: Yeah. I don't get it. Why do you want people to love you? Why are you so afraid of being hated?

name: Mitile
line: That's.....

name: Bradley
line: You don't know? Then you're the same as me.

name: Bradley
line: Hmph. How pointless. You don't even know why you're all hung up on "everyone, everyone" in the first place.

name: Bradley
line: ...What now, you're gonna cry? This is why I hate kids.....

name: Lennox
line: Bradley. Stop it.

name: Mitile
line: When I become a powerful wizard, I'll definitely defeat you.......

name: Mitile
line: I'll definitely, definitely beat you up!!

name: Bradley
line: ....Hah. Hahah! I like that!

name: Mitile
line: What's so funny!?

name: Bradley
line: Wanting to beat up the guys who piss you off - that's the kind of logic I can follow. Much better than "let's all get along." Hey, you Southern brat. You might actually get by pretty well in the North.

name: Mitile
line: ......I'd never go to the North! Don't lump me in with bad guys like you!

name: Figaro
line: Mitile, what's wrong?

name: Mitile
line: Dr. Figaro..... This Northern wizard keeps saying awful, senseless things.....

name: Figaro
line: There, there. Northern wizards sure are awful~. Dr. Figaro will protect you.

name: Bradley
line: Dammit, Figaro... You two-faced bastard.....

name: Lennox
line: Now that you've eaten, we should keep working. Come on.

name: Bradley
line: Don't drag me around! Listen up, you're not allowed to order me around! I get to decide what I'll do next.....

name: Lennox
line: Got it. Then please, lead us along. First, say thanks for the meal.

name: Bradley
line: Thanks for the meal.... Hey, what the fuck, are you picking a fight with me!?

name: Figaro
line: Geez, what a fuss. Mitile, everything's all right now.

name: Mitile
line: Dr. Figaro....

name: Figaro
line: What is it?

name: Mitile
line: I want to get stronger.... I want to become a powerful wizard. Please teach me powerful magic.

name: Mitile
line: If I were powerful, Mister Bradley would've listened to what I had to say. Because what I'm saying is correct! Because it's what nii-sama and Dr. Figaro taught me - it's what's right for everyone's sake! That's why I want to get stronger, Dr. Figaro. Why won't you teach me powerful magic? Do I not have any talent....?

name: Figaro
line: That's not true. Mitile, you're still young. You don't need to sweat it.

name: Figaro
line: Plus, Mitile, do you really want to become stronger in order to help everyone else?

name: Figaro
line: Are you sure it's not for your own sake, because Bradley beat you in an argument? When you say "for everyone's sake," is Bradley included in that?

name: Figaro
line: Calm down and think about it. If you force your selfish desires onto everyone in the name of justice, that would make you no different from a dictator who executes whoever he wants on a whim. I understand that you're frustrated because Bradley won that argument. But that's why you should look for words that will reach him next time. You don't need to be powerful to do that.

name: Figaro
line: Ah, look. Rutile is over there. He looks troubled. You should go help him out.

name: Mitile
line: ....I see. I'll head on over.

name: Figaro
line: Yes, see you later. ........ What to do.... So Mitile realized that I was deliberately avoiding teaching him powerful magic. Mitile. I'm sorry, but that's something I can never teach you.

name: Snow
line: Was it all right for us to force the Southern wizards to keep an eye on Bradley?

name: White
line: Figaro is with them, so I'm sure they'll be fine. And nothing strange seems to be happening with the child of the prophecy for now.

name: Snow
line: The prophecy we saw before Tiretta died.

name: Snow & White
line: Our prophecies are never wrong.

name: Snow
line: We prophesied that the next child born from Tiretta would annihilate all the Southern wizards.

name: White
line: In truth, the great witch Tiretta died when he was born.

name: Snow
line: Now, now, let's see how this goes. We don't know if the prophecy will come to pass in ten years, or in a hundred....

name: Mitile
line: Nii-sama....? Huh? Who's that child?

name: Rutile
line: He helped me with some restoration work. But now I'm being bombarded with questions....

name: Skinny Central Country child
line: Hey, how do I become a wizard? Can I use magic too?

name: Mitile
line: ....You want to be a wizard?

name: Skinny Central Country child
line: Yeah! Because if I could use magic, I could do lots of things, and I'd never have to look for work.

name: Rutile
line: Humans can't become wizards. It's the sort of thing that's decided the moment you're born.

name: Skinny Central Country child
line: But I heard there's a way for humans to use magic too!

name: Rutile
line: I guess you're talking about magical technology from the West? I don't know much about that, you see. .....Huh? Your stomach's all swelled up. What's wrong? Are you keeping something under your clothes?

name: Skinny Central Country child
line: It's a part of my job! I'm taking care of an important package.

name: Mitile
line: It looks heavy. Do you need help?

name: Skinny Central Country child
line: I'm fine! Mister Mithra, the Sage's wizard, asked me to take care of it.

name: Rutile
line: Mister Mithra....?

name: Skinny Central Country child
line: Ah, I just remembered I have something to do! I need to go! Bye-bye....!

name: Narrator
line: (Footsteps)

name: Rutile
line: Mister Mithra.... What did he ask such a young child to do?

name: Skinny Central Country child
line: Ah, there he is. Mister Mithra!

name: Skinny Central Country child
line: I met the Sage's wizards! And just as you said, nobody realized what was going on! But it's getting bigger! Look.....

name: Mithra
line: Don't remove your clothes. I told you not to show that to anyone.

name: Skinny Central Country child
line: S-sorry.... .....Hey, if I do what you say, will you really give this to me? Isn't it an incredible treasure?

name: Mithra
line: Of course I will.

name: Skinny Central Country child
line: Yay! If I sell this, I'll be rich! It's so beautiful...... A jewel that's shining like the moon!

name: Akira
line: So this is the back of the palace... Mister Cock Robin, is this the room you tried to enter before you were stopped?

name: Rustica
line: This is awful... If you stepped in here without suspecting anything, your soul might've been destroyed.

name: Chloe
line: Really......? I can't tell......

name: Shylock
line: Everything here is dancing in madness: a powerful and troublesome spell fell apart, and the order that existed in this room has been contaminated.

name: Akira
line: You mean we can't go any further?

name: Shylock
line: What do you say, Murr?

name: Murr
line: I'll give it a go.

name: Narrator
line: Murr responds and lifts his right hand with his sparkling ring.

name: Murr
line: << Eanul Rambul >>

name: Narrator
line: Suddenly, a dreadful noise tears through the air. And I feel the unpleasant atmosphere in the room fade slightly.

name: Murr
line: I set up a temporary balance of reason here. But it'll go back to chaos in no time. If you're gonna head inside, hurry!

name: Akira
line: Got it.

name: Shylock
line: How long will it hold?

name: Murr
line: Probably long enough for me to do three loops in the sky!

name: Shylock
line: So about a hundred seconds. Chloe, stay here with Cock Robin. When there are ten seconds left, please start counting down.

name: Chloe
line: Got it!

name: Cock Robin
line: Please be careful!

name: Narrator
line: We step into the depths of the palace. The darkness fades as we advance, revealing the faint outlines of the room. Rustica lets out a quiet gasp.

name: Rustica
line: ......How terrible........

name: Narrator
line: A giant pile of human bones arranged in a circle emerges from the darkness. The bones are tied together with a green ivy of rose vines. It overwhelms us, like a giant, horrifying work of art. Within the center of the giant circle of human bones, there lies something resembling an altar.

name: Shylock
line: .....They've tied together the sacrifices with a rose vine. This is a method you use when you merge living offerings, but....

name: Rustica
line: They couldn't prepare living sacrifices. That's why they used ancient bones instead...

name: Narrator
line: Rustica lowers his eyes in sadness as he gazes at the giant pile of human bones.

name: Rustica
line: Poor things.... The bones here weren't just lying around in the wild. They belong to sleeping souls who had been properly buried.

name: Akira
line: Sleeping souls who had been properly buried...... Are these the bones stolen from the cemetery....? If so, that means the grave-robbing culprit came here and......

name: Narrator
line: Murr gazes intently at the altar.

name: Murr
line: There's no medium.

name: Akira
line: Medium....?

name: Rustica
line: When you're making such a powerful circle, you need a medium. Such as a piece of a star or a holy tree, or a relic once owned by a hero....

name: Shylock
line: Which object within the Lunar Eclipse Palace was most worthy to be used as a medium....?

name: Murr
line: The moonstone.

name: Rustica
line: The moonstone!? But if you use the moonstone as a medium, then god knows what could happen.... Most importantly, the moonstone will continue to hold the negative energy born from the failed ritual. We need to find it soon, or else we'll be in great trouble.

name: Rustica
line: Who did this? And for what purpose...?

name: Narrator
line: At Rustica's question, I recall the other Murr's words from earlier.

name: Akira
line: Murr's soul shard said that someone tried to beckon the moon to draw closer - that this was just one part of a greater magic circle....

name: Shylock
line: Someone tried to beckon the < Great Catastrophe >...?

name: Rustica
line: That's what caused this tragedy!? How terrible....

name: Akira
line: There's something else...... He also mentioned that the summoning failed, and that's why it transformed into an entirely different spell.

name: Shylock
line: An entirely different spell...? What does that mean?

name: Akira
line: He mentioned an Umbra... Umbra something. And that the twins would know about it.

name: Chloe
line: Ten!

name: Narrator
line: We hear Chloe's voice, and look at each other with a start.

name: Chloe
line: Nine! Eight!

name: Rustica
line: Let's get out of the room for now. Sir Sage, this way.

name: Akira
line: Yes!

name: Shylock
line: Let's go, Murr.... Murr?

name: Murr
line: Hey, what's that?

name: Narrator
line: Murr runs towards the altar, peers beneath it, and starts pulling at something.

name: Narrator
line: (Rustle)

name: Murr
line: Huh? It's stuck.....

name: Chloe
line: Five! Four! Three!

name: Shylock
line: Murr, hurry!

name: Murr
line: Umm~, give me just one second.......

name: Narrator
line: (Rustle)

name: Chloe
line: Two! One!

name: Murr
line: Got it!

name: Narrator
line: (Flash of light) (Screen goes black)

name: Shylock
line: << Invibelle >>!

name: Rustica
line: << Amorest Viesse >>!

name: Narrator
