line: Shylock and Rustica recite their spells just as Murr leaps away from the altar. For a brief second, the darkness enveloping Murr stops in its tracks. And Murr safely returns to our side. With something in his hand.

name: Chloe
line: God, you surprised me! I thought you wouldn't make it in time! Geez, don't make me so worried!

name: Murr
line: Look!

name: Chloe
line: What's this......?

name: Narrator
line: Murr shows us a half-melted scientific instrument of some sort.

name: Shylock
line: This looks like the driving system for a piece of magical technology machinery. It materializes the magic from inside a mana stone. Though I'm not too familiar with this particular form.....

name: Cock Robin
line: ....This is.... This is what the Magical Technology Corps of our country uses......

name: Chloe
line: Huh?

name: Cock Robin
line: I'm sure of it.... Because the Ministry of Magical Affairs ordered these in an attempt to adopt the techniques of the West.

name: Akira
line: ....What does this mean?

name: Shylock
line: It means someone from the Magical Technology Corps is involved... Or they were dragged into this mess as victims. We'll find out once we return to the castle.

name: Akira
line: Mister Cock Robin is safe, too, so that's probably the best thing to do for now. Let's head back to the castle.

name: Rustica
line: Yes. We need to ask Sir Snow and Sir White some questions, too.

name: Chloe
line: I need to give my friend the scarf I made, too!

name: Murr
line: Then let's head back together!

name: Drummond
line: I'm so glad you're safe, Cock Robin......! What in the world happened to you?

name: Akira
line: He was trapped inside the Lunar Eclipse Palace. But the wizards managed to rescue him!

name: Drummond
line: I see.... Good lord, don't be so reckless..... Um, ahem...... Sir Sage, I truly apologize for all the trouble my unworthy subordinate has caused.....

name: Akira
line: Not at all. Thanks to Mister Cock Robin, we managed to uncover a terrible secret.

name: Drummond
line: What do you mean......?

name: Cock Robin
line: There's some crazy people out there who tried to summon the < Great Catastrophe >!

name: Drummond
line: W-what!?

name: Cock Robin
line: There were tons of bones, and a weird magic circle, and to top it off, equipment from our very own Magical Technology Corps!

name: Drummond
line: From the Magical Technology Corps!? What do you mean!?

name: Shylock
line: We too would like to uncover the truth. Who from the Magical Technology Corps was involved in this ritual - and how? For if that individual was the reason we lost ten of our comrades, and the reason that the whole world was consumed in chaos.... They are the common enemy of humans and wizards.

name: Drummond
line: Yes, you're right.... This is probably a situation where the Ministry of Magical Affairs and the Sage's wizards ought to work together......

name: Shylock
line: I'm glad you seem to understand. So, where is that man who always seems to be so full of himself? The head of the Magical Technology Corps...

name: Drummond
line: Nicholas is.....

name: Lady
line: Aaaaaaaah!

name: Narrator
line: At that moment, a scream breaks out. Chloe leaps to the window and points to the one of the castle's balconies, shouting.

name: Chloe
line: Look, over there!

name: Rustica
line: That's the captain of the Magical Technology Corps......!?

name: Drummond
line: Sir Nicholas......!

name: Narrator
line: I look out the window, immediately stunned speechless. Mister Nicholas, the captain of the Magical Technology Corps, is leaning right over the castle balcony. He staggers unsteadily atop the balcony, with no trace of his strange wings or flying equipment.

name: Drummond
line: Sir Nicholas! What are you doing!? It's dangerous, Sir Nicholas!

name: Narrator
line: Nicholas gradually tilts forwards.

name: Chloe
line: Watch out....!

name: Narrator
line: Chloe exclaims, as he leaps onto his broom and flies out the window.

name: Narrator
line: But before anyone can stop him, Nicholas throws himself off the balcony.

name: Lady
line: Eeeeeeeeek!! Sir Nicholas!

name: Narrator
line: Mister Nicholas plummets to the ground before Chloe's hands can reach him. His body slams against the ground with great force. -Or so we think. But a clear voice rings out from the ground below.

name: Arthur
line: << Pernoctant Nixzo >>!

name: Narrator
line: Right before Mister Nicholas crashes to the ground, his body stops in midair, and gently floats to the ground. He loses consciousness and collapses, and Arthur, who stopped his fall with magic, rushes to his side.

name: Arthur
line: Nicholas! Nicholas, are you all right!?

name: Chloe
line: Ah, I'm glad he's safe....! Thank you, Prince Arthur!

name: Arthur
line: No, thank you! What in the world happened to Nicholas!?

name: Narrator
line: At Arthur's words, I look up towards the balcony. I see someone standing on the same balcony that Mister Nicholas threw himself from moments earlier. I know that person.

name: Narrator
line: It's Owen. I can hear the commotion from the crowd on the ground.

name: Man
line: What in the world happened!?

name: Lady
line: Sir Nicholas leapt off the balcony......

name: Man
line: Sir Nicholas would never do such a thing!

name: Man
line: ......! Look at that! It's the Northern wizard, Owen!

name: Man
line: He tried to manipulate Sir Nicholas into committing suicide!

name: Narrator
line: Owen remains silent, staring down at the ground. His face is completely expressionless. Only when he notices the people pointing at him does he break into a faint, cold smile.

name: Owen
line: ............ Haha........ That's right. It's just as you desire. Every last misfortune that befalls you is my doing.

name: Narrator
line: Showered in a volley of angry roars and insults from the ground, Owen slowly turns away. And he disappears into the castle.

name: Narrator
line: A few hours later, the castle has descended into panic.

name: Castle person
line: I hear that the Sage's wizards nearly killed Sir Nicholas......!

name: Castle person
line: What!? Why would they do such a thing....?

name: Castle person
line: It's the Northern wizards! They're all wicked wizards! They see humans as nothing but slaves!

name: Castle person
line: I heard this from a friend: the wreckage caused by the < Great Catastrophe > was so devastating because the Northern wizards were so wicked!

name: Castle person
line: Listen to what I heard from my friend's acquaintance - he said the Sage's wizards are all manipulating Prince Arthur!

name: Castle person
line: But they're the ones who fought to protect the world.....

name: Castle person
line: You should never trust a wizard! You're young and beautiful, so they'll manipulate your heart and do whatever they please to you!

name: Castle person
line: How terrifying.....

name: Castle person
line: They're scary.....

name: Castle person
line: I'm scared...... I want them to leave the castle right now......

name: Vincent
line: The Northern wizard tried to manipulate Nicholas into throwing himself off the balcony?

name: Drummond
line: Th-there's still no proof, but...... Lord Vincent, leaving that aside, there's another matter of great importance. Someone tried to summon the < Great Catastrophe >, and there's a possibility that they're connected to our Magical Technology Corps! The Ministry of Magical Affairs needs to work with the Sage's wizards to investigate the matter at once......

name: Vincent
line: Work with the men who nearly killed Nicholas? How preposterous! Drive the Sage's wizards out of the castle and send them back to the magic headquarters immediately.

name: Drummond
line: But we've yet to perform the inauguration ceremony......

name: Vincent
line: There's no need to hold an inauguration ceremony for traitors. I'll need to give Arthur a severe talking-to as well.

name: Drummond
line: Please wait, Lord Vincent! Finding out who tried to summon the < Great Catastrophe>, handling the mysterious incidents happening across the capital - we absolutely need the cooperation of the Sage's wizards to accomplish all these tasks!

name: Vincent
line: The Magical Technology Corps can handle it.

name: Figaro
line: Owen killed the captain of the Magical Technology Corps?

name: Akira
line: H-he didn't kill him. Mister Nicholas is still alive. But he hasn't regained consciousness yet......

name: Figaro
line: So he's alive? But would Owen really fail if he wanted to kill someone like that?

name: Snow
line: Perhaps he never intended to kill him. Even if that were the case, Owen still enjoys tearing away at people's hearts, so....

name: White
line: Perhaps Owen was simply having a fun time chatting, and Nicholas felt pressed into jumping off the balcony because of it.

name: Narrator
line: That can't be true... I try to say, but I can't finish my sentence. Because the memory of my conversation with Owen comes rushing back. I was engulfed with a mysterious sense of unease through a simple exchange of words.

name: Cain
line: Dammit, Owen, look what you've done.... Everyone's going to be even more suspicious of wizards now. The Western wizards told me about the remnants of the ritual in the Lunar Eclipse Palace. We need to figure out what's going on there as soon as possible, and yet......

name: Snow
line: What happened at the Lunar Eclipse Palace?

name: Akira
line: Well......

name: Cain
line: ......Wait. Something's going on outside.

name: White
line: Is that Mitile's voice......? He seems to be arguing with someone.

name: Figaro
line: ........ Let's check it out.

name: Soldier
line: Your comrade tried to kill Sir Nicholas!

name: Soldier
line: Just because the Magical Technology Corps threatened your status as heroes......! What unbelievable cruelty!

name: Mitile
line: We don't know anything about that! Owen is a Northern wizard, right!? The Southern wizards have nothing to do with.....

name: Soldier
line: All wizards are the same! Get out of this castle! Stop taking advantage of Prince Arthur!

name: Mitile
line: But we were invited here as guests!?

name: Rutile
line: Stop it, Mitile. The soldiers are just afraid.

name: Mitile
line: But we didn't do anything wrong....!

name: Rutile
line: Even so...... ....gh.

name: Soldier
line: What are you muttering on about!? Get out of the castle right now!

name: Mitile
line: Stop it! Don't hurt my brother......!

name: Lennox
line: Let go of him.

name: Soldier
line: Who are you!?

name: Rutile
line: ....Mister Leno.........

name: Lennox
line: I'm a Southern wizard. But I can knock you out in three seconds without using any magic. And I can take your life in five seconds. What will you do?

name: Soldier
line: .....Tch.... So the wizards hired a mercenary......

name: Lennox
line: I'm a shepherd.

name: Soldier
line: What the hell are you saying!? Let's go...... You need to grab your stuff and get out of here!

name: Narrator
line: (Footsteps)

name: Lennox
line: ......... But it's true....... Are you okay, Rutile?

name: Rutile
line: Yes.... Thank you, Mister Leno. Your grand entrances have been really cool lately.

name: Lennox
line: Really....?

name: Mitile
line: He pulled nii-sama's hair! These Central soldiers are worse than the dine-and-dashers we see in the South!

name: Rutile
line: They think we almost killed their comrade, you know.

name: Mitile
line: But that doesn't justify violence! You were the one who taught me that!

name: Rutile
line: You're right. You're a good boy, Mitile - thank you for getting angry in my stead. But you need to remember that people consumed by fear will do anything..... I didn't want you to get hurt; I also didn't want them to do anything terrible.

name: Mitile
line: You're too kind! They came to attack us because they think the Southern wizards are the weakest of them all! They just stand there, petrified and scared, in front of Oz and the Northern wizards, but when it comes to us, they're so stuck-up!

name: Mitile
line: ......We're always the ones who lose out! It's all Owen's fault! He's a Northern wizard too, right!? The Northern wizards are the reason people hate all wizards....! I hate the Northern wizards....!

name: Figaro
line: Rutile, Mitile! Leno, too - are you all right?

name: Mitile
line: Dr. Figaro....! Waah.... It's the Northern wizards' fault that, nii-sama....

name: Figaro
line: What happened to Rutile?

name: Rutile
line: I'm fine. A soldier just grabbed me for a second......

name: Mitile
line: ......Dr. Figaro! Why are we the ones who have to suffer when the Northern wizards are the ones who did everything wrong!? I hate the Northern wizards. And I hate the humans who can't say a word to the Northern wizards but take out their cruelty on us instead - I hate them even more!

name: Figaro
line: Mitile......

name: Mitile
line: Dr. Figaro, I'm sorry.... You told me that I shouldn't think like a dictator, but I... I don't care if I am one...... If I had my own country, I would kick out all the bad guys.... I would protect nii-sama, and everyone else.....

name: Lennox
line: ....I'm not necessarily agreeing with Mitile, but the castle is currently in chaos. It's dangerous for us to stay here.

name: Rutile
line: ....But the inauguration ceremony....

name: Figaro
line: If we stand on the balcony now, we're going to be showered in abuse, not applause. In times like these, humans are no different from bees. They'll sting away until the enemy has left their precious beehive. They don't know why they're mad, or who they're attacking. They don't think about what's going to happen as a result of their violence; they become blind and unstoppable.

name: Figaro
line: Rutile, are you sure you're not hurt?

name: Rutile
line: My body is fine.... But my heart is in pain. .....Conflict brings nothing but sadness.

name: Rustica
line: Oh, there you are, Chloe.

name: Rustica
line: I know very well how whimsical Westerners can be, but the people of Central are certainly prone to mood swings as well. The person who said hello to me in the morning glared at me and ran away in the afternoon. I was a little bit surprised. Chloe?

name: Chloe
line: Ah...... Rustica. Sorry, sorry. What was that?

name: Rustica
line: Did you hide something behind your back?

name: Chloe
line: No, not at all!

name: Rustica
line: Ahaha. So now you're trying to surprise me too, Chloe. What are you hiding? A bird? A butterfly?

name: Rustica
line: Come on, show me.

name: Rustica
line: ....A torn scarf? Isn't this the scarf you embroidered, Chloe? This blue bird, right here. I remember you working on it, because I thought it was so lovely. How did it get torn?

name: Chloe
line: ......Ah.... ....I gave it. To someone I made friends with at the party.

name: Chloe
line: She said it was pretty, so I told her she could have it as a symbol of our friendship. Then she was really, really happy! She said she'd show it off to her friends and family! ....But this morning.... She said she didn't want it, because a wizard's scarf was bound to have some horrendous curse on it.... She said, "You're trying to deceive me and curse me to death, right?" And she tore it and threw it to the ground....

name: Rustica
line: Chloe....

name: Chloe
line: It's fine, it's fine! I'm not feeling down about it or anything! I'm used to this sort of thing, anyway! .....But I'm an idiot, so I came up with all these ridiculous fantasies. Like, maybe if I give her this scarf, she'll put it on the next day, and come to say hi to me. Then I'd feel really ticklish inside, but I'd also be really happy, and say, it looks great on you....

name: Chloe
line: Maybe her friends and family would ask me to make them scarves too, and I'd get really busy...... .......I came up with so many of those stupid fantasies, like the ones that play through your mind right before you fall asleep..... She was afraid it might be cursed.... Of course she was scared..... I'm such an idiot.....

name: Rustica
line: You're not an idiot.

name: Chloe
line: ...I am an idiot.....

name: Rustica
line: Your dream is absolutely lovely. If she doesn't want the scarf, can I have it instead?

name: Chloe
line: ....It's nothing valuable. Rustica, you're handsome, so you deserve to wear something much nicer.

name: Rustica
line: There's no scarf more valuable than this one.

name: Chloe
line: ....That's not true. I haven't used any expensive fabrics or threads....

name: Rustica
line: Because this scarf is the only one of its kind in this world. It's something that only you could make.

name: Rustica
line: It's more precious than a commonplace luxury you could find anywhere. It's more precious than the moonstone; more precious than any jewel. Here, look. This scarf was created by my beloved Chloe. It's the only one in the world. It has my favorite blue bird embroidered on it, too. It's a bit torn, but that's no cause for concern. For I have a friend who's very good at needlework.

name: Rustica
line: I'm sure he will fix it up perfectly. This blue bird will fly freely into the sky, no matter how many times its wings are torn. Isn't that right, Chloe?

name: Chloe
line: ......Yeah...... I'll sew it back together, as many times as I have to..... .....Thank you, Rustica.

name: Rustica
line: And you have my thanks as well. Don't cry...... Please smile, Chloe.

name: Rustica
line: Please don't feel hurt. Like the bright moon that shines in the sky, we may be shoved away every time we approach someone, but...... We can smile wherever we are. We can sing the songs we love, and dance with the people we love, wherever we are.

name: Vincent
line: That damned Northern wizard Owen....... We never should have trusted the Northern wizards to begin with. It looks like Nicholas narrowly escaped death, but the Sage's wizards must leave the castle at once. Naturally, the inauguration ceremony is cancelled.

name: Arthur
line: Please wait, Uncle Vincent......

name: Vincent
line: Leave the festivities to me; you should consider staying at the royal villa for a while.

name: Vincent
line: There are awful rumors going around. They say that the reason Oz took you in was so he could take over Central Country. Prince Arthur is already under Oz's control, and will one day hand the kingdom over to him.

name: Arthur
line: That's ridiculous...... Sir Oz isn't that kind of person!

name: Vincent
line: What proof do you have!? You are the ones who have stirred up the citizens' anxiety! Until the situation calms down, you should confine yourself to the royal villa, and.......

name: Vincent
line: Oz...... Where did you come from......

name: Arthur
line: Sir Oz......

name: Oz
line: If I so wished, I could conquer Central Country without controlling a child like him. Would you like me to show you my power?

name: Vincent
line: ...... You scoundrel! Guards, capture Oz......!

name: Arthur
line: Uncle!

name: Central Country soldier
line: C-capture Oz......!? No one can do that........

name: Vincent
line: The sun is going to set soon. Oz won't be able to use his magic!

name: Oz
line: Yet at this moment, I could turn this capital to ashes in an instant. I'll start with you.

name: Arthur
line: Sir Oz, please stop! Your anger is justified, but....

name: Oz
line: Out of my way.

name: Arthur
line: ......You're not serious.

name: Arthur
line: ............ << Pernoctant Nixzo >>!

name: Soldier
line: Th-thank goodness......! Prince Arthur protected him! Just as I thought, Prince Arthur is on our side! He's not being manipulated by Oz!

name: Arthur
line: Sir Oz....

name: Oz
line: You just narrowly escaped death.

name: Arthur
line: .....Please wait, Sir Oz! Sir Oz-..... ......He disappeared......

name: Vincent
line: Never let Oz into the castle again!! He's a traitor who tried to kill me......!

name: Arthur
line: You're wrong! Sir Oz isn't that kind of man! ......Sir Oz is...... He acted that way in order to create a place for me in this castle......

name: Vincent
line: ...... Hmph...... I don't believe that. That was his true nature. Guards! Find Owen - and Oz as well!

name: Arthur
line: ......Sir Oz...... Have you been avoiding me in order to protect my reputation......? But I have yet to repay you for any of your kindness......

name: Oz
line: .......... ......I haven't seen his face up close in so long. ............ .....You've grown taller......

name: Arthur
line: ......Pardon me.

name: Akira
line: Arthur...... Are you all right? I heard Mister Vincent summoned you......

name: Arthur
line: ......He informed me that the Sage's wizards are to leave the castle and return to the magic headquarters...... The inauguration ceremony is cancelled...... The Magical Technology Corps will handle the investigation into the mysterious incidents at the cemetery...... And depending on what Nicholas says when he wakes up, Owen might be thrown into prison...... The same goes for Sir Oz as well......

name: Narrator
line: Arthur, who is usually so full of life, lifts his head robotically. His clear eyes are saying, "I am so, so sorry." My heart lurches at his apologetic gaze - it hurts even more than his sadness and frustration.

name: Arthur
line: ......I apologize; this is all because of me - it's due to my incompetence and lack of power....... I failed to repay both you and Sir Oz; the current situation is entirely my fault......

name: Akira
line: Please don't make that face...... It's not your fault, Arthur......

name: Akira
line: Let's hear what Owen has to say once we find him...... I'm sure that is part of my job as the Sage, so please - you don't have to shoulder all the responsibility for what has happened. I know that you treasure everyone here - that includes me, and the wizards, and the people in this castle. Your feelings truly came across......

name: Narrator
line: With an unaffected and straightforward sincerity, Arthur smiles ever-so-slightly through his tears.

name: Arthur
line: ......Thank you, Sir Sage. I am saved by your kindness...... I can't spend my time wallowing in regret. I'll apologize to everyone, hand over the investigation to the Magical Technology Corps, and prepare to leave the castle.

name: Akira
line: Yes. But please don't push yourself.

name: Arthur
line: I'm all right. I feel better after speaking to you, Sir Sage. See you later!

name: Akira
line: I'm counting on you.

name: Narrator
line: I watch Arthur's back as he retreats into the castle, and let out a deep sigh. As I spin around, ready to get back to work, Owen appears right before my eyes without warning.

name: Narrator
line: I observe Owen carefully, holding one hand to my chest, my heart pounding. Owen is not smiling. He appeared out of nowhere without saying a word, yet he's waiting for my reaction. I can't read his expression - but he seems lost, or perhaps dissatisfied. This is the first time I've seen him so close without an eerie grin on his face. His pale red eye, cold as glass, yet strangely alive...... His skin, white as a porcelain doll......

name: Akira
line: (......He's got a pretty face too......) (Do all wizards just have beautiful faces......?)

name: Owen
line: Hey.

name: Akira
line: Ah, yes. Ah......! I have something I'd like to ask you regarding Mister Nicholas.

name: Owen
line: Yeah, that's what I thought, and I was waiting for you to say something, but you didn't utter a word. So I get to go first.

name: Akira
line: Please wait! I was just a little distracted by something else......

name: Owen
line: You were distracted? When I'm right in front of your eyes? All right, tell me about it.

name: Narrator
line: I look at Owen, who is still wearing his thorny smile, and tell him honestly. Since I figure it's probably useless to lie to a wizard.

name: Akira
line: You're always grinning, so I never noticed till now, but..... You're very beautiful, Owen.

name: Narrator
line: Owen falls silent for a moment, and then tries to grin. But his attempt ends in failure, so he furrows his brows instead.

name: Owen
line: So what?

name: Akira
line: Sorry......

name: Owen
line: Well, whatever. There's something I'd like to ask you about the < Great Catastrophe >.

name: Akira
line: The < Great Catastrophe >? But wait, tell me about Mister Nicholas......

name: Owen
line: Shut up. I'm first. You mentioned that bizarre injuries were inflicted upon us when we fought the < Great Catastrophe >, right? Like, Oz falls asleep when he tries to use magic, and Snow and White are trapped inside a frame in the middle of the night.

name: Owen
line: Can you lose your memories from that?

name: Akira
line: Lose your memories? Wait, Owen...... Have you lost your memories?

name: Narrator
line: His displeased expression sets off a chain of thoughts in my mind. When I saw him on the balcony this morning, he was in a daze. But in retrospect, that was a rather strange sight. Because when he tried to drive me into a corner, and whenever he hurled insults at the people around him - Owen always donned a mocking smile.

name: Akira
line: .....You don't remember what happened when you were with Mister Nicholas?

name: Narrator
line: Owen glares at me with frightening displeasure.

name: Owen
line: You're wrong.

name: Owen
line: I killed him. I manipulated his heart so that he would leap off the balcony.

name: Akira
line: But why......

name: Owen
line: Why? Because I wanted to see him crushed like a tomato, of course.

name: Narrator
line: Owen puts on a cruel smile. He appears to be enjoying himself, but I get the feeling he's forcing himself to put on a show. I take a deep breath, and carefully try to persuade Owen.

name: Akira
line: Owen...... If you've lost your memories, then you can't be the only one responsible here. If you explain what happened, I'm sure everyone else will understand. Can you please tell me the truth?

name: Narrator
line: Owen smiles gently.

name: Owen
line: I killed him. It was so much fun.

name: Owen
line: Anyway, who cares about that? Tell me how to fix these bizarre injuries from the < Great Catastrophe >. Can you heal them? Or are you useless?

name: Narrator
line: The word "useless" strikes a nerve within me, and I snap back without thinking.

name: Akira
line: So you want me to heal your injury?

name: Narrator
line: Owen looks ready to kill. I clamp my mouth shut. Terror wells up within me and I can no longer bear to look him in the eye.

name: Owen
line: I'm asking you if you can heal this injury.

name: Akira
line: I-if.... If you didn't need me to fix it, you wouldn't be asking me for help.

name: Narrator
line: Owen's voice turns into a soft, coaxing purr, but his eyes alone remain unsmiling.

name: Owen
line: Hey, Sir Sage....... If I kill you, the world might end, but-. There are plenty of punishments far worse than death. Want me to teach you some?

name: Akira
line: ......I'm aware of that. Because I've already subjected you to one such punishment.....

name: Akira
line: I assumed that you might really have done it, so I blindly suspected you.

name: Akira
line: I'm sorry.

name: Narrator
line: Owen is once again expressionless, just as he was when he stared down at the ground from the balcony. I now understand the emotion that lay behind this face. He was at a complete loss. He didn't know what to do until someone pointed a finger and yelled insults at him - the relief he felt then brought the grin back to his face.

name: Owen
line: ............ Haha........ That's right. It's just as you desire. Every last misfortune that befalls you is my doing.

name: Owen
line: .....Ridiculous.

name: Akira
line: Owen! Wait......!

name: Narrator
line: Owen ignores me and vanishes like smoke.

name: Narrator
line: And thus, we leave the Central castle. As if we are being chased out: a stark contrast to our arrival.

name: Snow
line: So in the end we couldn't find Owen......

name: White
line: They didn't even see us off. The situation in the Lunar Eclipse Palace is also bothering me, but first we need to regroup and figure out what to do next.....

name: Shino
line: We're just going to head back like this? Seriously?

name: Akira
line: Shino......

name: Shino
line: What about the graverobbing incident at the cemetery? It has to be related to what was going on in the Lunar Eclipse Palace. And what happened to the inauguration ceremony? Let's negotiate with Arthur. I'm sure he can do something about it.

name: Cain
line: Don't put Prince Arthur in an even more difficult position. He's suffering more than anyone else.

name: Shino
line: How do you know who's suffering the most here?

name: Cain
line: Okay, maybe I was exaggerating a bit, but....

name: Shino
line: You can handle all this because you're a knight. But I'm a nobody. I was supposed to make a name for myself.

name: Heathcliff
line: Shino......

name: Cain
line: I am also a nobody. The days when I was the General of the Order of Knights are behind me now - they stripped me of my title when they discovered that I was a wizard.

name: Mitile
line: What is it, Riquet?

name: Riquet
line: I'm going back to the Church.

name: Mitile
line: Huh!?

name: Nero
line: What are you saying? What do you get out of heading back to a place where they won't even feed you decent meals?

name: Riquet
line: I'm worried about the people of the Church, and.... I don't see how the Sage's wizards are doing good if we caused the people at the castle so much trouble......

name: Mitile
line: That's the Northern wizards' fault!

name: Mithra
line: Oh? Want to repeat that for me?

name: Bradley
line: What the hell, you shitty brat?

name: Mitile
line: It's the truth! If you guys never did bad things, people wouldn't hate us wizards! People wouldn't think of us as a nuisance!

name: Mithra
line: What are you saying? If people want to hate us, they should feel free to. And if you don't like them, just kick them out of your way. It's simple; you just have to be strong.

name: Mitile
line: See, that kind of thinking is what makes people hate wizards!

name: Mithra
line: What's wrong with that? Why do you want to be loved? Why do you fear being alone? It's not going to kill you.

name: Mitile
line: Because I don't want to see the people precious to me get hurt!

name: Mitile
line: I don't want to get hurt, either! If we'd been friendly, and if Owen had been a good person, then I'm sure the people at the castle would've listened to us. When the soldiers tried to hurt nii-sama - if I were strong enough, I would've wanted to beat them up. But if I'd done that, more people would've rushed over and it would've caused a bigger commotion. And ultimately it would've turned into a fight, which means someone would've gotten hurt.

name: Rutile
line: Mitile......

name: Mitile
line: What's wrong with being kind? What's wrong with getting along with everyone? It's not going to kill you.

name: Mithra
line: It's unnecessary. You simply have to defeat every person who comes your way.

name: Mitile
line: Listen......!

name: Mithra
line: I am prepared to get hurt. I am prepared for the people around me to get hurt as well. In order for me to live freely - I accept the fact that I may be wounded all over.

name: Mithra
line: "I don't want you to get hurt, so please change your way of life" - I can't just agree to that.

name: Mitile
line: ......Even if it means someone precious to you will get hurt?

name: Mithra
line: I have no such person. And I don't plan to find one, either.

name: Mitile
line: Then I feel sorry for you.

name: Mitile
line: ......Anyway, Riquet. Please don't say you're quitting. Let's do our best together!

name: Riquet
line: ......If, as Mitile says, it is truly possible to get along with everyone...... If being a Sage's wizard is a wonderful role that involves serving humans, just as the holy wizard Lord Faust did....

name: Faust
line: A wonderful role? Now that sounds like something I'd much rather refuse.

name: Figaro
line: Where are you going, Faust?

name: Faust
line: I'm headed back to Eastern Country. I'll return to the tower when the < Great Catastrophe > strikes. Isn't that good enough? I'm tired of it. I'm tired of people having high hopes and celebrating me; I'm tired of people losing hope and chasing me away.

name: Lennox
line: Sir Faust......

name: Snow
line: Oz. Say something.

name: White
line: You're the only one who can keep the Sage's wizards together.

name: Oz
line: ........ I certainly could force you to listen to my command. But I cannot bring your hearts and minds together. And there is no need for that.

name: Cain
line: But at this rate, we're going to fall apart. And that's fine; we can scatter. I also prefer to live freely. But this kind of goodbye just feels plain awful.

name: Nero
line: There's no way around it, Mister Knight. In the end, we just can't be with other people.

name: Cain
line: Nero.....

name: Nero
line: Wizards have always been ostracized. That's just how it's always been, for many, many years. I know plenty of ways to live alone. I never learned how to do the opposite, though; I never had the chance. That's why I always reach my limit, no matter who I'm with - at some point, I can't stand it anymore. We've all gone through this sort of thing, right? Even if people say, "poor you"; even if there are nights when you feel absolutely pathetic - sometimes, it's just plain impossible. I'm not cut out for living in the world - for being connected with others.

name: Narrator
line: A lonely silence envelops the wizards as we fly through the sky. Everyone here must have experienced true loneliness. Because they are different from people, they could never huddle close to them.

name: Lennox
line: ......Rutile, are you all right?

name: Narrator
line: Lennox worriedly calls out to Rutile, who has been looking downwards this entire time. Rutile gives him a tiny nod, and points to the city streets that sprawl outwards below our feet.

name: Rutile
line: ......I was just thinking that lots of people walk through the streets of Central......

name: Bradley
line: Huh? What are you talking about? Southern wizards sure are a happy-go-lucky bunch.

name: Narrator
line: Rutile makes a slightly troubled smile.

name: Rutile
line: There aren't this many people back in Southern Country. It's filled with mountains, forests, and barren landscapes...... When the sun sets, it goes completely dark. That's why - when you've been walking down a long road, and you finally run into someone - it makes you happy, even if they're just a stranger. It doesn't matter if they're a human or a wizard. You chat away, saying how lovely the weather is that day, and if they're in trouble, you help them out.

name: Narrator
line: Rutile's kind words are carried away by the sunset breeze. The wizards fly on through the evening sky. Everyone quietly listens without saying a word; some of them look disgruntled, but others wear more inscrutable expressions.

name: Rutile
line: The streets of Central are filled with people. They're all carrying loads of luggage along a narrow path; they continue to walk along, even though it looks like they're about to crash into each other. If everyone could walk at the same speed, it would be much easier. If everyone were headed in the same direction, arriving at their destination would be a simple task. But...... Their destinations, their walking speeds, the sizes of their bodies - everything about them is different, so they end up colliding, and getting in each other's way as they move forward. I think they're just like us right now.

name: Rutile
line: We all think differently. We're all different people, headed in different directions. Each of us has our own destination. We've all walked different paths to get here, and we've encountered things that scare us, or things that we hate. Even if we shove each other out of the way, and glare at those walking by, the path won't grow any wider..... If we get used to others shoving us aside, huddle our shoulders, and keep our eyes down - the path still isn't going to get any wider. If we want to smile and walk along freely, we need to make the path wider...... If we allow the paths in our hearts to grow, then maybe we can all stay together.

name: Narrator
line: No one says anything; no one speaks up in denial or agreement. We continue to fly, spurred on by the wind, suspended between the lively streets below and the sunset-streaked sky. Some children run along the ground below as if they're chasing after us. They look up, and wave energetically at the sky. Murr laughs, and raises his palm. His ring glows, and flower petals fall from his fingertips. The children laugh merrily and reach out to the flower petals. Murr murmurs politely.

name: Murr
line: You're welcome.

name: Narrator
line: Perhaps he heard them exclaim. Thank you, Mister Wizard!

name: Narrator
line: After returning to the magical headquarters, I stand alone in my own room. The words of many people hazily drift through my mind. Rage and hope: at once lonely, earnest, and painful...... My eyes land on the sage's manual. I instinctively take it out, and flip through the pages. One page catches my eye:

name: Narrator
line: (Flips page)

name: Akira
line: ......On wizards......

name: Narrator
line: "On wizards." "I've been thinking a lot about the wizards. At first, I thought they were like Superman." "Or like troublesome supernatural beings, or local gods who make lots of requests." "They have miraculous magical powers, and they can easily do whatever they want. I thought they must be the real winners in life." "But that wasn't true." "They're the same as me."

name: Narrator
line: "The wizards here live their lives carrying the burden of defeating the < Great Catastrophe > that arrives once a year." "I lived the same kind of life back when I was a salaryman. I laughed like an idiot, but I was always anxious." "Is there a way out of this unchanging lifestyle?" "Is there any meaning in going out of my way when nobody expects anything of me?" "If I manage to be useful and people praise me for it, will that really make me happy?" "Will someone out there listen to what I want?" "How am I supposed to forge connections with people?" "Why does nobody say thank you to me? Is it because I'm a worthless person?" "If I were a wizard......" "Would anyone need me for anything other than my magic?" "......I still haven't found the answers to these questions. I don't think they've found them either." "That's why, at the very least......" "I want to be their friend." "I want to give them a place where they can be their true selves." "You need a place where you can laugh at your mistakes and let them go, or else you can't muster up the courage to take a step forward." "No one wants to shoulder a role where you're only going to be attacked over your responsibilities." "At least in this world, I want to be a friend who can say, â€˜What are you doing (lol)' to them." "'Don't worry about it.' 'You did a great job.' 'Take a break. Let's work later.'" "I want to be a friend who can say that to them."

name: Narrator
line: Without realizing, I'm moved to tears while reading the sage's manual. I feel the same. I want to become friends with the wizards. I want to be someone they can smile freely around. We don't have to get along like family. Just like the stray cats who ran away when they first saw me, but, little by little, meowed and came closer to me. I want to build a small bridge of trust. Even if it's a thin, unreliable string, like a spider's web on a rainy day...... As long as there's something you can grasp with your own fingertips, you can carry on walking in this wide world, even if you're all alone.

name: Figaro
line: What are you doing out here so late at night?

name: Faust
line: Figaro.....

name: Figaro
line: Do you plan on leaving this place without a word?

name: Faust
line: ........... This has nothing to do with you.

name: Figaro
line: Faust. The Granvelle monarchy has continued for generations after Alec's death.

name: Faust
line: Your point is?

name: Figaro
line: If your wounds haven't healed after being alone for all those years - that means you need someone else.

name: Faust
line: ........... .......I don't need anyone.

name: Figaro
line: You're so stubborn. Though I guess you've always been this serious and stubborn. The Faust I knew was a pure and noble hero. There were people who kissed your shadow. Yet now you make a living out of cursing people?

name: Faust
line: Shut up. Go away.

name: Figaro
line: Wait, hear me out. How does this sound? I'll steal your specialty.

name: Faust
line: What are you trying to say?

name: Figaro
line: I'm going to curse you, Faust. You don't know what your bizarre injury is. The same goes for Heathcliff. You can't leave that child alone. Because if you leave this place, there will only be irresponsible wizards left. And the responsible ones have little magic power. Cain and Lennox - they don't stand a chance against me, or Oz, or Mithra and the others. You need to stay here. Or else Heathcliff, and the stubborn Shino, and Nero, who has trouble getting along with others - they'll all get beaten down.

name: Faust
line: .....Even if I'm gone, there's still Snow and White.......

name: Figaro
line: Sir Snow and Sir White are like epitome of carelessness! They were my masters, as well as Oz's!

name: Figaro
line: But you don't have to worry about that. Forget about those poor young boys, and enjoy your good old solitary confinement. That is my curse; you know very well how words can also form curses. Take care.

name: Faust
line: ........You coward....!

name: Figaro
line: One more word. I'm probably going to die soon.

name: Figaro
line: Maybe in fifty years.... maybe in five. It might even be next year. I guess it's true, what they say about wizards knowing when they're about to die. Tiretta realized that she was going to die, too.

name: Figaro
line: Unfortunately, I'm telling the truth. Please don't tell anyone else. You're the first person to hear this from me. Sir Snow and Sir White might have noticed. I'm not too sure about Oz; he can be a bit dense..... In any case, I'll turn to stone soon enough.

name: Faust
line: ......Why are you telling me?

name: Figaro
line: When I realized that I didn't have much time left - for the first time, I seriously thought about the world that you and Alec dreamed of. A world where humans and wizards can live together in harmony.... That's the world I want to leave behind for the children. And in order to accomplish that, I need your power.

name: Faust
line: ......... .....You're lying. I refuse to believe you. You're just trying to fool me with a nasty lie.

name: Figaro
line: That might be true. So this is something like a curse, too.

name: Figaro
line: Good night, Faust.

name: Nero
line: You're still awake? It's way past bedtime for kids.

name: Riquet
line: Nero......

name: Nero
line: Did you get a little hungry?

name: Riquet
line: Why did you stop me from leaving? You were the one who said that wizards could never be with other people......

name: Nero
line: There was no deep reason for it. I just thought you shouldn't have to go back to a place where they wouldn't even feed you a decent meal.

name: Nero
line: Didn't my cooking taste good?

name: Nero
line: Tomorrow's breakfast is gonna be bread pudding.

name: Riquet
line: Bread pudding......?

name: Nero
line: Haha...... It's crispy, soft, and sweet.

name: Riquet
line: That sounds delicious......

name: Nero
line: Doesn't it? Now you have something to look forward to as you head off to bed. That's what kids should do. Just think about what you're gonna eat tomorrow, and drift away into the land of sweet dreams. Good night, Riquet.

name: Riquet
line: Good night, Nero. ......Also, let me say one thing.

name: Nero
line: What is it?

name: Riquet
line: You said you weren't cut out to live with others, but...... I like the time that I spend with you, Nero.

name: Riquet
line: The food that you make - while you act like it's a pain, but also like it's no big deal - in my eyes, those meals are a miracle as wondrous as a dream. And the words you offered me today, when you told me to stay. Those words were for me, not for a disciple of God. You didn't say, "Eat this"; instead, you asked me, "Which one do you like?" That was how I discovered what I loved for the first time in my life. I came to realize what kind of person I was...... And that's terrifying, but it's also exciting - and I look forward to seeing what comes next.

name: Nero
line: Riquet......

name: Riquet
line: I'm sure I'll wake up early tomorrow. I can't wait to open my eyes in the morning. Thank you, Nero. Thank you for giving me a reason to look forward to tomorrow.

name: Vincent
line: Did you find the culprits who ransacked the cemetery?

name: Soldier
line: We're still investigating...... Everyone is spooked, you see......

name: Vincent
line: How absurd. It's probably just robbers who used the attack of the < Great Catastrophe > as a cover to steal burial goods from the graves. Even if there was magic at work, we can handle anything so long as we have the Magical Technology Corps on our side. How is Nicholas doing?

name: Soldier
line: It seems like he just regained consciousness......

name: Vincent
line: Nicholas.

name: Soldier
line: Sir Nicholas......

name: Vincent
line: I hear that the Northern wizard Owen manipulated your heart. As the leader of the Magical Technology Corps, you are not setting a proper example for your subordinates.

name: Nicholas
line: ............ Forgive me, Lord Vincent. I shall offer my life in apology.

name: Vincent
line: What?

name: Soldier
line: The darkness is swarming around him......!

name: Soldier
line: Lord Vincent! There's the shadow of a bird looming behind Sir Nicholas......!

name: Soldier
line: The shadow......! The bird's shadow is swallowing up Sir Nicholas!

name: Narrator
line: (Squawk)

name: Soldier
line: It completely swallowed him......! Lord Vincent, please escape!

name: Narrator
line: (Squawk)

name: Soldier
line: I-it seems to have flown away! We have to notify Sir Drummond and the Sage's wizards immediately......!

name: Vincent
line: Wait! It might be some kind of magical technology that Nicholas obtained!

name: Soldier
line: No way......! Sir Nicholas was just swallowed by the bird's shadow......

name: Vincent
line: Silence! Do not utter a word of this to anyone. Understand?

name: Vincent
line: ......If the Sage's wizards continue to strengthen their reputation through achievements, Arthur is going to win more popularity with the people. If Arthur had never returned to the castle, I would have been the next king. What do wizards know of the human world? I am the one who is suited for the role, not Arthur......

name: Skinny Central Country child
line: Uu...... My stomach hurts...... Uu...... Ehehe...... But if I make it through...... Then this thing will be mine......

name: Mithra
line: You're right.

name: Skinny Central Country child
line: Ehehe...... Uuu...... Fufu......

name: Mithra
line: The Umbra Volans is swooping through the land. It should begin soon. I do hope you entertain me, Sir Sage.

name: Narrator
line: A few days later-

name: Cain
line: Prince Arthur hasn't sent word from the Central capital yet. I wonder how he's doing...... Should I go check on him in secret?

name: Shylock
line: I would recommend against it. We have essentially been ordered to quarantine ourselves here.

name: Cain
line: But we need to find the culprit behind the incident at the Lunar Eclipse Palace....

name: Shylock
line: Of course. That is why, until things calm down, we need to do all the investigating we can here at the magic headquarters.

name: Cain
line: Investigating? At the magic headquarters......? Wh-what's with this mountain of massive books!?

name: Shylock
line: Please research the Umbra Volans.

name: Cain
line: ......... You see, I'm not very good at deskwork.....

name: Shylock
line: I know very well. You mischievous boy.

name: Snow
line: Umbra Volans, Umbra Volans......

name: White
line: What was it again......

name: Chloe
line: Please try your best to remember! Murr apparently said that you two would know about it! Right, Murr!

name: Murr
line: Looks like it!

name: Snow
line: Hmm...... I feel like I might remember if I ate something sweet......

name: White
line: Maybe if someone massaged my shoulders......

name: Chloe
line: You said that yesterday, too. Geez, you keep repeating yourselves~.

name: Murr
line: It's because they're old geezers!

name: Snow
line: We're not old geezers!

name: White
line: We're not old geezers~!

name: Figaro
line: And we still don't know anything about the piece of equipment that belonged to the Magical Technology Corps, right?

name: Shylock
line: Even if they'd found anything, they might not report it to us. For it could very well cause a scandal for Central Country.

name: Figaro
line: I'd welcome a scandal or two - otherwise, they're going to start hunting wizards.

name: Akira
line: You mentioned that before. What does that mean?

name: Figaro
line: Magical technology is fueled by mana stones. Mana stones are the stones of wizards - they contain their magic powers. Mana stones are being burned more quickly than ever now due to the emergence of magical technology equipment. Eventually, we'll run into a shortage of mana stones. And when there's a shortage, what will humans do? I think the Western wizards know the answer to this question. Shylock. I hear that in Western Country, they hunted magical creatures to the brink of extinction.

name: Shylock
line: It's just as you say. With the advancement of science, the West has entered an era of madness. Western Country has always been lacking in morals. But now that the citizens' desires have grown exponentially - they've become unstoppable.

name: Figaro
line: Back in the day, we thought it was impossible for humans to kill magical beasts. But now there are too many humans. And with the development of magical science weaponry...... If a weak child like Mitile were attacked, he'd get turned into stone. I want to prevent that kind of future from coming to pass.

name: Cain
line: We need to start by getting people to trust wizards. Where in the world is the root of all evil - Owen?

name: Snow
line: I wonder.

name: White
line: We're not close enough to pay him a home visit, you see.

name: Cain
line: This is about the Northern wizards, so please, pull yourselves together. What are Owen's special characteristics?

name: Snow
line: He can speak to beasts, such as wolves. He was a huntsman, after all. He's also skilled at absorbing magic.

name: White
line: Wizards usually obtain their magic from nature, but Owen is a bit special.

name: Snow
line: He gains his power from human emotions. That's why we think he can't be too far from where humans live......

name: Narrator
line: (Door opens)

name: Heathcliff
line: ......Sir Sage.

name: Akira
line: Ah...... What is it?

name: Heathcliff
line: I apologize for interrupting, but Shino came across a visitor just now......

name: Shino
line: We have guests. Can I bring them in?

name: Akira
line: Guests......?

name: Narrator
line: The person that the two Eastern youths bring over is - Central Country's secretary, Mister Cock Robin. Alongside a beautiful lady with an air of competence around her.

name: Cock Robin
line: It's been a while, Sir Sage. Um, this is......
I'm Canary, Cock Robin's wife. Thank you for taking care of my husband. Could you let me work here too?

name: Akira
line: Work here at the magic headquarters......?

name: Canary
line: Yes! I just couldn't sit still after hearing what he told me! The world was saved thanks to Sir Sage and his wizards, yet you don't even have anyone to take care of you! If you don't mind, I'd love to help out - I can do cleaning, laundry, you name it!

name: Akira
line: Th...... Thank you!

name: Canary
line: That's not all. Come on, say it.

name: Cock Robin
line: Hey, give me a moment...... I need to prepare......

name: Canary
line: Stop mumbling. Muster up some courage!

name: Narrator
line: Miss Canary pushes him forward, and Mister Cock Robin approaches me. He nervously opens his mouth, book and pen in hand.

name: Cock Robin
line: I...... I'm a scribe...... Making a record of events is my job.

name: Cock Robin
line: I was wondering if you would let me write about everyone here until the next < Great Catastrophe > arrives? And, if possible, I'd like to report my writings to the castle.

name: Akira
line: Why would you...... Is it because you don't trust us......?

name: Cock Robin
line: No, it's the other way round. I want them to understand - what wizards are like, and how they saved the world, and so on. What kind of situation you're in, what you're thinking, what's bothering you...... Neither the people in the castle nor the townspeople know anything about you. I was the same. That's why I was scared...... But the wizards still saved me. I want to keep a proper record, so I can convey that wizards are not who people think they are; that they're working this hard for our sake. I'm sure I met the previous sage a number of times, but for some reason I can't remember his face or his name...... But if we kept a proper record, then I'm sure we'd all be able to remember. We would know that the Sage was here, and we would remember the things that he did.

name: Akira
line: Mister Cock Robin......

name: Cock Robin
line: This was actually Sir Drummond's suggestion. But he said to keep it a secret, so please don't tell him...... He said that wizards were the ones who helped us when the world was in trouble - when I was in trouble. He didn't want you to think that humans are all ungrateful.

name: Narrator
line: I recall Mister Drummond's face, and my chest grows warm. There are still humans who care about wizards like this. That alone makes me happy.

name: Akira
line: Thank you...... I'm sure everyone else will be delighted too.

name: Cock Robin
line: Yes!

name: Canary
line: Sir Sage, mister wizards. I'm sure there will be lots of trouble lying ahead of you all, but please never give up. I'll cheer you on with everything I've got!

name: Narrator
line: With Mister Cock Robin and Miss Canary's arrival at the magic headquarters, the wizards begin to regain their spirits.

name: Cock Robin
line: Time to record everything I can! So when wizards use too much magic, their hearts become exhausted, and they grow fatigued......

name: Murr
line: Boo!

name: Cock Robin
line: ......You surprised me! Why did you do that?

name: Murr
line: Because I like surprising people.

name: Narrator
line: (Writing sounds)

name: Cock Robin
line: The Western wizard Murr enjoys surprising people......

name: Murr
line: You're writing it down! What a diligent guy!

name: Canary
line: Delicious! I didn't realize the extra step would make it taste so much better.

name: Nero
line: Glad I could help. Okay, I need to go now......

name: Canary
line: Mister Nero, could you teach me more about cooking from now on? If you don't mind, that is.

name: Canary
line: I'm not that good at cooking, I'd be very grateful for your help.

name: Nero
line: I guess...... Once in a while......

name: Canary
line: Great! Thank you very much!

name: Nero
line: Haha...... You're welcome.

name: Shino
line: We still don't know what Heath's bizarre injury is?

name: Heathcliff
line: Don't bring it up...... I'm getting more and more anxious.

name: Cain
line: Hopefully it's not one of the painful types. Shylock looks like he has it rough. Though it's pretty inconvenient not being able to see people until I touch them.

name: Shino
line: What kind of injury could you handle?

name: Heathcliff
line: Umm...... Sneezing yourself into the distance seems kind of fun.

name: Bradley
line: You bastard.

name: Heathcliff
line: .......I-I didn't realize you were around.

name: Bradley
line: "Seems kinda fun?" This isn't a damn joke.

name: Shino
line: Oh, so you get blasted away seriously?

name: Bradley
line: The hell!?

name: Cain
line: Don't threaten them, Bradley.

name: Bradley
line: First things first, you bastards need to...... Ah-choo!!

name: Narrator
line: (Poof)

name: Heathcliff
line: Yeah, that does seem fun.

name: Narrator
line: (Footsteps)

name: Riquet
line: I'm sorry! Mitile and I were blowing dandelion puffs!

name: Mitile
line: Did they come this way?

name: Cain
line: No worries. You guys did a great job.

name: Narrator
line: That night-.... I witness a new bizarre injury.

name: Akira
line: ......I woke up in the middle of the night...... Guess I'll have a cup of tea before I go back to bed...... ......Huh......? What is this......?

name: Narrator
line: A quiet illusion floats along the moonlit corridor. It's a cluster of lilac-colored flower petals. But they disappear in an instant.

name: Akira
line: ......Ah...... It turned into snow......

name: Narrator
line: In an instant, the dancing flower petals turn into fine snow. But the snow disappears before it has a chance to pile up, like churning sea foam dissolving between the waves. I chase after the wondrous illusion that comes drifting my way from above the stairs.

name: Akira
line: ......It's coming from the door to that room...... That's...... Faust's room......

name: Lennox
line: Sir Sage.

name: Akira
line: Lennox......

name: Lennox
line: What are you doing up so late? ......Where is this snow coming from......?

name: Akira
line: It seems to be spilling out from the cracks in Faust's door.

name: Lennox
line: Sir Faust's......

name: Narrator
line: Lennox falls silent. The dancing snowflakes gradually turn into glowing red sparks. The sparks don't catch fire; they simply vanish in silence. But I still grow concerned.

name: Akira
line: ......Is this some kind of spell? Lennox, do you know what this is?

name: Narrator
line: (Knock knock)

name: Narrator
line: After hesitating for a moment, I knock on Faust's door.

name: Akira
line: Faust...... Faust.

name: Narrator
line: There's no response. Under the dark moonlit night, the red glow of the sparks burns even brighter.

name: Lennox
line: He might have set up a barrier. Sir Faust is a very cautious person, after all.

name: Figaro
line: What are you two up to?

name: Akira
line: Figaro......

name: Narrator
line: Figaro calls out to us from below the stairs. Before we can reply, Figaro notices the strange affair and furrows his brows. The fire burns with greater intensity, the flames curling out from behind the doorframe.

name: Figaro
line: Stand back. I'll open the door.

name: Narrator
line: Figaro places his hand on the doorknob and solemnly chants his spell.

name: Figaro
line: << Possideo >>

name: Narrator
line: The doorknob turns as the sound of his magic slices through the air.

name: Narrator
line: (Door opens)

name: Narrator
line: I fall silent at the scene that greets us beyond the door. A blazing, furious fire surrounds the bed where Faust sleeps. And every corner of the room overflows with strange illusions that crowd around him. The window reflects the hill of execution. On the ceiling: a boy who looks just like Arthur. Figaro and Lennox are there, too And Faust, who is surrounded by people who love and respect him, wearing a calm and gentle smile on his face. Yet I can also see a scene of Faust being crucified and burned at the stake.

name: Lennox
line: ......These must be...... Sir Faust's dreams......

name: Akira
line: Faust's dreams......

name: Narrator
line: Faust stirs slightly. We hold our breath, and Figaro speaks.

name: Figaro
line: Let's get out of here before he wakes up.

name: Narrator
line: We leave Faust's room and walk through the courtyard. The sight we just witnessed is seared into my mind.

name: Lennox
line: ......Was that the bizarre injury that the < Great Catastrophe > left on Sir Faust?

name: Figaro
line: Probably. It looks like the exact thing he would hate more than anything else in the world.

name: Akira
line: Were those illusions in Faust's room images from his past......?

name: Figaro
line: It wasn't just his past; his desires probably manifested a part of those images, too. I didn't participate in the final battle.

name: Figaro
line: I abandoned the front lines. Faust still resents me for it. But I didn't leave because I was struck by panic. Victory was right before our eyes. We all believed the human Alec and the wizard Faust would establish a new, ideal country. I never thought that Alec would be swayed by his close aides and end up actually executing the wizards.

name: Lennox
line: Of course it was possible to resist execution. But Sir Faust believed that Sir Alec would never carry it out........ Until the very moment the fire was lit......

name: Lennox
line: I will never forget that day...... But I never realized that he still dreamed of it so vividly, even now...... I don't think I could possibly ever imagine.... The sheer depth of his pain.

name: Figaro
line: If he discovers the truth about his bizarre injury, Faust will probably say that he's leaving the magic headquarters. We all have our pasts that we would rather hide from others. If his overflows while he's unconscious...... He could probably prevent his dreams from overflowing by establishing an even more powerful barrier, but there's no reason for him to go through that effort just to stay here. If we stay silent, then everything will remain within the realm of dreams. He might not realize what's going on...... I'll leave the decision to you, Sir Sage.

name: Akira
line: ........... Lennox, are you all right with that?

name: Lennox
line: ......I would like you to tell him what's going on. Even if it ultimately leads to Sir Faust leaving the magic headquarters...... I don't want to rob him of anything else that he might trust.

name: Narrator
line: After thinking about it for a night, I decide to tell Faust.

name: Narrator
line: Faust looks shocked, but he listens till the end without saying a word. He doesn't get mad, or try to run away; he simply stands there in silence, as if he's enduring everything I'm telling him.

name: Akira
line: ......If you choose to stay here, I will do anything I can to support you, Faust. I will figure out how to keep you from getting hurt. I can't force you to stay, but please consider it.

name: Faust
line: ............ Why did you tell me? If you had stayed silent, I might never have realized what was going on.

name: Akira
line: I really would like you to stay here at the magic headquarters, Faust. But...... Nobody wants other people to find out about their deepest secrets. Hiding this from you while relying on you for your knowledge and magic - I didn't want to take advantage of you like that. I wanted you to believe in me...... I wanted you to stay here because you trusted me.

name: Akira
line: Faust......

name: Narrator
line: He lowers his eyes, falling silent.

name: Faust
line: ......But I want to set up a powerful barrier to prevent my dreams from overflowing. I'll head out to the East in order to obtain the appropriate medium. I will be gone for a while. Is that all right?

name: Akira
line: Of course...... Thank you, Faust.

name: Faust
line: Not at all.......

name: Lennox
line: Sir Faust. Please take me with you.

name: Akira
line: Lennox......

name: Lennox
line: I'm sure I can at least serve as a watchguard. Please, let me join you.

name: Narrator
line: Faust looks ambivalent. But he doesn't glare at Lennox in displeasure; instead, he sighs softly.

name: Faust
line: There's nothing I can do for you anymore.

name: Lennox
line: I never wished for you to do anything for me. I simply want to be of use to you.

name: Faust
line: .......Have you been searching for me all these years?

name: Lennox
line: I wandered through many lands. Though I've been in the South ever since I met Sir Figaro, the one who taught you magic.

name: Faust
line: I see...... I'm sorry.

name: Narrator
line: Lennox smiles gently.

name: Lennox
line: Why are you apologizing? I was able to meet you again. And this time, I will follow you to the ends of the earth.

name: Faust
line: I'm just looking for a medium. I won't abandon my students and run away - I'm not Figaro.

name: Lennox
line: Sir Figaro was worried about you too.

name: Faust
line: I wonder about that.

name: Narrator
line: Watching their exchange brings a smile to my face. Faust, who kept insisting that Lennox had the wrong person, is now accepting him. His dreams, which weighed him down from every corner of his room, must have been alleviated ever-so-slightly. As he heads out of the room, Faust turns around to look at me.

name: Faust
line: Sage.

name: Faust
line: I, too, once wanted the trust of a certain human. But I simply made a fool of myself. The same thing might happen to you. I might just never return from this journey.

name: Narrator
line: Faust says cynically. But his gaze isn't bitter; instead it looks almost longing. I look him in the eye.

name: Akira
line: Even so I....... I want to believe that you will return, so I will wait for you here.

name: Akira
line: Have a safe journey, Faust.

name: Faust
line: Hmph......

name: Narrator
line: Faust walks out of the hallway. I don't know what he was trying to say, and I don't know what he wanted to hear from me.... I don't know if my feelings came across to him. But I think of Faust's calm smile from yesterday, and something tells me that this won't be a lonely last farewell. Lennox bows to me slightly before chasing after Faust. And thus, the two of them leave the magical headquarters.

name: Narrator
line: The next day, Rutile and the others ask if they can go to the Central capital.

name: Rutile
line: We were in the middle of repair work, and I'm still worried about how everyone in Central is doing......

name: Akira
line: But what if they chase you away like last time......?

name: Figaro
line: It's been a while; we should be all right. People aren't really afraid of Southern wizards anyway.

name: Mitile
line: I want to go help alongside nii-sama too! Plus...

name: Riquet
line: I want to go, too.

name: Akira
line: Riquet......

name: Riquet
line: Mitile invited me, so...... I want to see if I can use my powers to help people.

name: Riquet
line: I'll think about whether I want to return to the Church after that.

name: Akira
line: I understand. Everyone, please be careful. I would be less worried if Lennox were around, but......

name: Rutile
line: Mister Leno was able to make up with Mister Faust, right? Mister Leno seemed so happy.

name: Figaro
line: It's not like they had a falling out, actually. Faust was just avoiding him. Leno used to be Faust's servant.

name: Mitile
line: Mister Faust seemed kind of scary, but if he's an old friend of Mister Leno, then he must be a good person.

name: Figaro
line: That's right. Well then, Sir Sage, we'll get going......

name: Bradley
line: I'll come with you.

name: Akira
line: Bradley......

name: Bradley
line: You're going to go help out with repair work, right? I'm joining you to get my pardon. That's fine by you, right, Sage?

name: Akira
line: Y-yes. Of course.

name: Mitile
line: But you wanted to ditch so badly......

name: Rutile
line: See, everyone here is a kind person at their core. Let's get along, Mister Bradley.

name: Bradley
line: Yeah. Give me a sec. I'm gonna get ready.

name: Narrator
line: (Water boiling)

name: Nero
line: Hmhm~. Let the meat sauce cook overnight~......

name: Bradley
line: Hey, come here for a sec.

name: Nero
line: Woah!? What the hell are you doing!?

name: Bradley
line: Cut the humming. The bloody chef Nero sure lost his edge.

name: Nero
line: Shut up......

name: Bradley
line: Can I get a bite?

name: Nero
line: Not yet, you idiot! What the hell do you want? If you're just here to pick a stupid fight, I'll make it rain pepper.

name: Bradley
line: Hold off, you idiot! Hey, tag along with me tonight. We're gonna sneak off to the Lunar Eclipse Palace in Central.

name: Nero
line: The Lunar Eclipse Palace?

name: Bradley
line: Yeah. All the treasures they took from me when I got captured are stashed away there. I'm gonna use this opportunity to get them back. I eavesdropped on the guys from the West. They say the Lunar Eclipse Palace is a mess right now. It's the perfect opportunity to take everything back.

name: Nero
line: Stop messing with me! I said I went clean!

name: Bradley
line: It's not stealing. I'm just taking it back.

name: Nero
line: Yeah, and you stole it in the first place......

name: Bradley
line: What was that, Nero? Are you gonna put up a fight? Do you think you stand a chance?

name: Nero
line: ......I thought getting thrown into jail might've helped you fix that attitude, but you really haven't changed at all......

name: Bradley
line: Shut up. You should just listen to my orders.

name: Bradley
line: Come on, buddy! Fine, I'll make this the last time. We'll go our separate ways after this, Nero. We never finished our last job because I got captured. So let's wreak havoc in the Lunar Eclipse Palace and call that the end.

name: Nero
line: ............ So this is really gonna be the last time?

name: Bradley
line: That's how I feel right now. But I tend to change my mind easily.

name: Nero
line: Sigh...... Fine.

name: Bradley
line: Alright. Can I eat this meat sauce?

name: Nero
line: Don't touch it, fucker! It still needs to simmer. Want me to turn you into meat sauce?

name: Bradley
line: You're so scary, geez......

name: Rutile
line: Mister Mithra.

name: Mithra
line: ......What is it?

name: Rutile
line: Were you taking an afternoon nap?

name: Mithra
line: No...... I've had trouble sleeping lately......

name: Rutile
line: I see...... Shall I bring you some herbs that will help with your sleep? You can put them inside your pillow.

name: Mithra
line: What do you want from me?

name: Rutile
line: Ah...... I'm sorry. I'm headed off to the Central capital right now. If you'd like, I can collect what you lent to that child.

name: Mithra
line: What I lent to who......? What are you talking about?

name: Rutile
line: A skinny, intelligent child in the Central capital. He said he was carrying something that belonged to you, Mister Mithra.

name: Mithra
line: Huh...... I don't know what you're talking about.

name: Rutile
line: I see......

name: Mithra
line: You always talk about things that make no sense.

name: Rutile
line: ............ I remember them, so they aren't just things that make no sense. To me, they're precious memories.

name: Mithra
line: Okay......

name: Rutile
line: ......Sorry for bothering you. I hope you get lots of rest. Excuse me.

name: Narrator
line: (Footsteps)

name: Mithra
line: ............ ......Herbs, huh. She loved them too. She always mixed those strange-smelling things into her magical potions....... I still can't believe that you no longer exist in this world. The great witch, Tiretta.

name: Rutile
line: Well then, see you later!

name: Cock Robin
line: Mister Rutile! Would you let me ride on your broom? I'd like to make a report to Sir Drummond.

name: Rutile
line: Of course, I'd be glad to!

name: Cock Robin
line: Thank you!

name: Canary
line: Have a safe trip! Take care, dear!

name: Figaro
line: You're a lucky guy, Cock Robin.

name: Mitile
line: Riquet, let's compete!

name: Riquet
line: Yes! Of course!

name: Akira
line: See you later. Take care, everyone. ......Hmm......? I feel like I just saw someone pass by...... Maybe it was just my imagination......

name: Cain
line: Looks like the Southern wizards have headed off to Central. I wanted to join them, but the higher-ups have been keeping a close watch on me lately.

name: Heathcliff
line: On you? Why?

name: Cain
line: See, they've started these baseless rumors. Something about me colluding with a powerful noble from another country, and selling information about the Central troops.

name: Shino
line: A powerful noble from another country?

name: Cain
line: Yeah. I don't know anyone like that.

name: Shino
line: Isn't it this guy?

name: Heathcliff
line: I...... I think it might be me......

name: Cain
line: Oh, right! I forgot you were something like a nobleman's son!

name: Shino
line: "Something like a nobleman's son"? Know your place. You're just a former knight; Heath is of higher status than you.

name: Heathcliff
line: Yeah, speak for yourself first, Shino.

name: Shino
line: What? You were the one who got all embarrassed when I called you "my lord." I wanted to call you that.

name: Cain
line: I get you, I get you! It makes you feel like a loyal vassal. I've addressed Prince Arthur like that before.

name: Heathcliff
line: And what did Prince Arthur say......?

name: Cain
line: He was surprised, and then he laughed.

name: Shino
line: The dude's pretty cheerful.

name: Cain
line: Hey, don't call him a dude. He's my master.

name: Heathcliff
line: You two are peas in a pod. I'll go make some tea.

name: Cain
line: Yeah.

name: Shino
line: Please.

name: Heathcliff
line: ......See, you say all that, but then you make me brew your tea. If we were at home, a servant would be yelling at you right now.

name: Cain
line: What was that?

name: Heathcliff
line: Haha, it's nothi-......!

name: Shino
line: What is it?

name: Heathcliff
line: Did you see someone outside the window just now?

name: Cain
line: I mean, I can't see anyone, so... ..........! I can see him........

name: Heathcliff
line: Where are you headed with your sword, Cain!?

name: Cain
line: There's only one guy I can see!

name: Heathcliff
line: Who?

name: Cain
line: Owen.

name: Narrator
line: (Door opens)

name: Akira
line: Ah...... Sorry, I forgot to knock. Did I surprise you?

name: Cain
line: This voice... Is that you, Sir Sage?

name: Akira
line: Yes. Let's shake hands...... Can you see me now?

name: Cain
line: Yeah. Be careful. Owen's here in the magic headquarters. I'll go check the courtyard.

name: Akira
line: I'll go with you!

name: Cain
line: Where are you...... Owen! Owen, show yourself!

name: Narrator
line: The courtyard greenery rustles noisily. Clouds drift across the clear blue sky, blocking out the sun. Suddenly, Cain stops walking. He gazes intently at the shadow of a tall tree, muttering under his breath.

name: Cain
line: ......There he is.

name: Narrator
line: He's right; there's someone hiding in the shadows cast by the tree. Someone who is gazing in our direction.

name: Cain
line: I'll go check. You stay here.

name: Akira
line: Yes...... Um, please listen to what Owen has to say. He has no memory of what happened at the time.

name: Cain
line: If I listened to Owen, I'd go mad.

name: Narrator
line: Cain narrows his eyes of different colors, and walks closer to the tree. As Cain approaches, the person standing in the shadows slowly reveals himself. A ray of sunlight breaks through the clouds, illuminating his face. Skin as white as a ghost; one eye the color of pale blood, and the other glittering gold. It's Owen. He's smiling in delight.

name: Owen
line: ......Sir Knight......

name: Cain
line: Come on out, Owen......!

name: Narrator
line: Cain tugs roughly at Owen's arm, pulling him towards himself. Owen looks surprised, and he falls to the ground on his knees. Cain is baffled, but Owen just gazes up at him in sheer joy.

name: Owen
line: Sir Knight......

name: Cain
line: What are you saying......? Everyone in the country is looking for you! What did you do to Captain Nicholas!?

name: Owen
line: Nicholas told me. He said that you're the strongest knight in the land, Cain.

name: Owen
line: I thought that if I was a good boy, Sir Knight would come to save me. Did you come to save me?

name: Cain
line: What are you saying......?

name: Narrator
line: Cain, taken aback, releases Owen's hand. But as he does, Owen grabs back onto it like a child pestering him to play. His smile, bathed in the sunlight filtering through the leaves, looks unlike anything I've seen of Owen before. It's a smile full of pure hope.

name: Owen
line: A dark, damp place. There was nothing but rats and moles. That's where I lived. I was lonely, but I had a picture book. It was a book about Sir Knight that was half turned to dirt. He beats up bad guys, and saves people who are in trouble. He finally came. You finally came for me.

name: Narrator
line: Owen looks up at Cain with a pure smile spread across his face as his eyes shine with admiration. He reaches out to touch Cain's face with both his hands. Cain furrows his eyebrows, but he is frozen in place.

name: Cain
line: ...... What are you talking about? I won't fall for it. You've fooled me one too many times playing at weakness and sadness. And you also stole my eye.

name: Narrator
line: Talking about it seems to snap Cain back to his frustration with Owen, and he shakes off Owen's hands. Owen looks heartbroken. His eyes well up with tears; just watching him is enough to make me feel sad.

name: Cain
line: Stop with your creepy acting! What are you up to!?

name: Owen
line: ......Are you mad because I took your eye, Sir Knight......?

name: Cain
line: Exactly! Your left eye belongs to me, you know!

name: Cain
line: D... Did you just say sorry...? Hey, seriously, what's wrong, Owen......

name: Owen
line: I'll give it back to you right now...... So don't get mad......

name: Narrator
line: Owen looks down and, without hesitation, tries to jab his finger into his left eye.

name: Narrator
line: Owen's face distorts with pain. Flustered, Cain grabs his arm.

name: Cain
line: Stop! Stop it......!

name: Narrator
line: Realizing that something must be wrong, I rush over to them.

name: Akira
line: ......You're bleeding. Let's go treat your eye, Owen.

name: Narrator
line: I look up at Cain, who shakes his head like he doesn't understand what's going on, and then sighs.

name: Cain
line: ....I'm not mad at you anymore. Let's fix you up.

name: Narrator
line: Owen smiles.

name: Narrator
line: Once we're inside, Owen puts up with our ministrations in an unbelievably docile manner.

name: Shino
line: Oh, you hurt the white of your eye. Look this way. I'll do your eyedrops.

name: Owen
line: Blep.

name: Shino
line: You don't need to stick out your tongue.

name: Owen
line: Are eyedrops scary?

name: Shino
line: They're a piece of cake.

name: Shino
line: My bad. I missed.

name: Owen
line: ......No more eyedrop......

name: Shino
line: Don't give up.

name: Narrator
line: Heath nervously watches Shino as he applies Owen's eyedrops.

name: Heathcliff
line: Amazing...... I can't believe Owen is obediently letting Shino do his eyedrops.....

name: Cain
line: Just watching them is making me go mad...... Why in the world is this happening?

name: Owen
line: Sir Knight, Sir Knight.

name: Cain
line: ......Er, what?

name: Owen
line: I'll do my best with the eyedrops, so please watch me.

name: Heathcliff
line: He's really attached to you......

name: Cain
line: I don't get it......

name: Owen
line: Sir Knight, Sir Knight.

name: Heathcliff
line: Y... You should say something......

name: Cain
line: Y... You got this~. I'm so proud of you. There. There.

name: Shino
line: My bad. I missed again.

name: Heathcliff
line: You know, he would've killed you twice by now......

name: Owen
line: ......I don't want to do this anymore......

name: Shino
line: You got this. You can totally handle it.

name: Cain
line: You're doing great, I'm so proud of you~.

name: Heathcliff
line: Y... Yeah, you can do it~.

name: Narrator
line: Owen's cheeks end up dripping wet in the process, but Shino manages to finish administering the eyedrops.

name: Cain
line: Are you okay?

name: Owen
line: Um...... Shino sucks at eyedrops.

name: Shino
line: Shut up.

name: Cain
line: Can't you use magic? You stole my eye with magic. Don't stick your finger in your eye anymore.

name: Owen
line: Nicholas said I was a wizard.
