name: Narrator
line: (End flashback)

name: Akira
line: ......Anyway, I was glad to help. I hope the ceremony is a success.

name: Cock Robin & Canary
line: Yes!

name: Canary
line: Ah, I'm so nervous...... My heart's beating so fast, but I'm really looking forward to it!

name: Mithra
line: You're just placing this thing underneath the food, right? I don't think anyone is going to be looking at it.

name: Cock Robin
line: M-Mister Mithra.

name: Mithra
line: It's true. I barely remember the food I eat, let alone the thing that's placed underneath it.

name: Rutile
line: Even if you don't remember the colours of beautiful flowers blooming in the meadow, you still feel a sense of calm and peace, don't you? That's the effect of Miss Canary's work.

name: Canary
line: Mister Rutile......

name: Rutile
line: It's meant to serve as hospitality, Mister Mithra. That's why it's a shame for you to say that when something has been specially prepared for you.

name: Mithra
line: Is that so?

name: Rutile
line: Yes. Let's enjoy yourselves. We can still retain our child-like exuberance and express gratitude for anything that comes our way. Miss Canary, I can't wait for the dinner!

name: Canary
line: Yes! I'll give it my all!

name: Cock Robin
line: ......Whew, that was so close....... I thought I was going to have to fight Mister Mithra......

name: Rutile
line: Oh my! You're so cool, Mister Cock Robin!

name: Mithra
line: Huh? I'm way cooler, though.

name: Canary
line: Fufu, you don't have to push yourself. But you're really wonderful.

name: Shino
line: Cock Robin and the others came to discuss ceremony plans.

name: Heathcliff
line: It's happening soon, after all. I'm sure Eastern Country will be dispatching their high-ranked officials. ...I wonder how the Town of Rain is doing. The avian beast is gone, but it'll take some time for them to repair the buildings and roads. What if a giant beast like that appears again in another city....

name: Shino
line: Then I'll hunt it down and reap the fame. You should use my accomplishment to move up in ranks, Heath.

name: Heathcliff
line: ....I don't need that kind of success. So long as everyone is safe....

name: Shino
line: But I want to see you in your moment of glory. The ambassadors from the East and every other country will be mesmerized at the sight of you. Nothing could make me prouder as your vassal. I'm looking forward to seeing your ceremonial outfit and your portrait.

name: Shino
line: Oh... Looks like I forgot something. Faust's gonna yell at me, so I'm heading back to my room to pick it up.

name: Heathcliff
line: Got it. I'll head to practice first.

name: Shino
line: Yeah.

name: Heathcliff
line: ....I'm not as worthy as you think I am, Shino.

name: Faust
line: I see you two are at it again.

name: Heathcliff
line: ....Mr. Faust. Did you hear all that....?

name: Faust
line: We use magic with our hearts. You are Shino's master; you are the existence that sways Shino's heart. If you cannot accept Shino's devotion, then you must express it clearly.

name: Faust
line: Because you will be the one who throws Shino's magic off course when it matters the most. The more loyal the vassal, the more likely they are to follow their master's will. I know it's hard. But you need to decide where your heart lies soon.

name: Heathcliff
line: ....What about you, Mr. Faust?

name: Faust
line: Me?

name: Heathcliff
line: I hear that Lennox was once your servant, Mr. Faust. Are you two still....

name: Faust
line: The past is long gone. A curseworker doesn't need underlings. He has nothing to do with me now.

name: Faust
line: ....This may sound cold, but if you continue with such a half-hearted attitude, his life is at your mercy. If you cannot take full responsibility for how Shino expends his life, then you must return his life to him.

name: Heathcliff
line: ....Even if it means making him mad? Even if he comes to hate me, and we fight and part ways?

name: Faust
line: ....That's right.

name: Faust
line: He will understand one day.

name: Chloe
line: It seems like everyone has a lot on their plate. I wanted to make new outfits to wear for the ceremony, but I didn't feel like I could say that......

name: Rustica
line: I'm sure there'll be chances in the future. Besides, I'm delighted we can wear the formal outfits you made for us once more, Chloe.

name: Chloe
line: Ehehe. I'm happy to hear that!

name: Narrator
line: (Knock)

name: Chloe
line: Ah, it's a guest.

name: Rustica
line: Let me get it.

name: Narrator
line: (Door opening)

name: Snow
line: Chloe.

name: White
line: Chloe darling.

name: Rustica
line: Well, well, welcome and good day. Sir Snow, Sir White.

name: Chloe
line: Welcome! Snow, I heard you were hurt. Are you all right......?

name: Snow
line: I'm fine, but Mother......

name: Chloe
line: By Mother, do you mean the doll, your magic object? Could I take a look?

name: Rustica
line: Oh dear...... The hem of her dress is all torn up

name: White
line: Mother is aggrieved at her torn clothes. Chloe darling, could you make her some clothes?

name: Snow
line: If possible, I'd like to ask you to make matching attire for Father as well.

name: Chloe
line: Would you let me!? Of course I'd be delighted! How incredibly exciting!

name: Snow & White
line: Ya~y!

name: Snow
line: Thank you, Chloe.

name: Rustica
line: I'm looking forward to seeing what you make too. Isn't it wonderful that you get to present new designs, Chloe?

name: Chloe
line: Yep! I wonder what kind of design would suit them! .....Oh, right! Hey, Rustica. I'd like to go to the Central marketplace to conjure up a design! I might get hit with inspiration by perusing the wonderful materials lined up in the shops and looking at what kinds of clothes the people are wearing!

name: Rustica
line: What a good idea. I'll come along.

name: Chloe
line: Yay, thank you! Snow, White, I'll do my best, so please look forward to it!

name: Snow & White
line: We will!

name: Nero
line: ............ (Cyan...... I don't want to think of her as one of the bad guys causing all that uproar, but......) (Why does it even bother me so much? It's all because I went and mentioned the umbrella of luck....) (......The ring of luck...... I'm just repeating his words......) (Brad's......)

name: Narrator
line: (Flashback)

name: Nero
line: ......Hah...... Hah...... I can't go on anymore...... Please leave me behind...... I can't drag you down with me......

name: Bradley
line: Cut out the nonsense, you tiny rookie. Here, this is the ring you picked up. You found something good. This is the ring of luck. It's the sun to those who hide in the shadows. It'll protect you no matter what. The ring won't let its owner die.

name: Nero
line: ...... The ring of luck......

name: Bradley
line: That's right.

name: Nero
line: Haha...... I'm glad...... If that's so...... I'm giving it to you, Boss......

name: Nero
line: Please...... Make it back alive......

name: Bradley
line: You idiot. I don't need anyone turning over their luck to me.

name: Bradley
line: If you're so set on putting that ring on my finger, then you better make it back alive, get down on your knee, and offer it to me. A guy without any desire won't cut it as a bandit. Live more greedily, and hold on tight to that life of yours. No matter who tries to pin the blame on you, I'll forgive you. Tell me that you don't want to die. If not, tell me that you don't want me to die.

name: Nero
line: ............ I don't want you to die......

name: Bradley
line: Ahahahah! Well, we have to make it back alive then! Every time you find yourself in a life-or-death situation, I'm expecting you to come back and put that ring on me!

name: Narrator
line: (End flashback)

name: Bradley
line: Hey, that sure looks good.

name: Nero
line: Brad. Who the hell let you...... ............ Don't just stand there eating, take a seat and eat properly. I'll serve it on a plate for you. You just came back from a mission, didn't you?

name: Bradley
line: You're being nice. Did something happen?

name: Nero
line: I'm being perfectly normal?

name: Bradley
line: Then I'll take my time and enjoy it. Here goes.... Thank you for the food.

name: Bradley
line: This is great! Meat really tastes especially good when you get to sit down and eat!

name: Nero
line: Haha. There shouldn't be any difference to the taste though.

name: Bradley
line: ......Chomp chomp......

name: Nero
line: ............ Hey...... Do you still remember?

name: Bradley
line: Huh?

name: Nero
line: That thing you used to wear all the time. The ring of luck......

name: Bradley
line: Fuck?

name: Nero
line: No, that's not it. I'm talking about.... ...........You know, the ring of luck......

name: Bradley
line: What's fucking?

name: Nero
line: That's not what I said..... You know, the....... ..........Luck........

name: Bradley
line: Fuck?

name: Nero
line: Shut up! Just forget it! You can keep fucking up all on your own then, you idiot!!

name: Bradley
line: What are you so mad about all of a sudden!? You're the one that's been fucking around this whole time though!? Whispering fuck, fuck to yourself like that......

name: Nero
line: That's not what I said......! ........Geez, you've got food all over your mouth!

name: Owen
line: ............ ........Where am I? Sir Knight's room? Why am I here? Tsk...... I can't remember. That pisses me off. I should get out of here. But his room sure is a mess. Do you never tidy up, Sir Knight? .......This door. It's all scratched up, like someone threw a chair at it over and over....... Huh...... So even he can act violently like this. .......How ridiculous.

name: Mitile
line: I'm not sleepy in the slightest because we fell asleep at such a strange hour.

name: Riquet
line: Me neither.

name: Mitile
line: The wind has gotten colder. I guess it's time for us to stop talking on the rooftop.

name: Riquet
line: Okay. Mitile, thank you for the wonderful beehive. I love how sweet and wonderful it smells.

name: Mitile
line: You can make a honey-scented candle if you melt it down. Please use it for your lantern.

name: Riquet
line: Will it smell sweet when it burns?

name: Mitile
line: I'm sure it will! If you melt it with coloured wax, you can create marble patterns too.

name: Riquet
line: I want to try that.

name: Mitile
line: Let's look for ingredients next time we go to the marketplace.

name: Riquet
line: Mitile. Did you see a giant monster in the Marsh of Epidemics?

name: Mitile
line: Ah...... Yes.

name: Riquet
line: Did it look strong? How big was the monster?

name: Mitile
line: It was really huge...... Just thinking about it makes me feel as good as invisible.

name: Riquet
line: Someday, I'd like to defeat a big monster with you.

name: Mitile
line: Y...... Yes, someday......

name: Riquet
line: ......Mitile? Do you have a stomachache?

name: Mitile
line: ............ ......I guess Southern wizards don't go around defeating giant monsters. Dr. Figaro said so. He said people had things they were good and bad at. And since I'm not good at magic...... I shouldn't force myself to dream of grand achievements like Shino from the East, or Prince Arthur.

name: Riquet
line: Why? I'm sure you could do it, Mitile.

name: Mitile
line: Riquet......

name: Riquet
line: You're kind and pure, so I'm certain you'd be splendid at fighting. You should achieve even greater feats than Oz or Cain.

name: Mitile
line: You think I can?

name: Riquet
line: Yes.

name: Mitile
line: I-I'll work hard.

name: Riquet
line: Ehehe. Yes! I'd like to make a green and yellow marbled pattern for the candle. Because those colors remind me of us.

name: Narrator
line: The day before the ceremony...... We head to the capital of Central Country.

name: Cain
line: Well then, Akira. I'll head on to Granvelle Castle first with Oz. I'll leave Riquet to you. Oz seems to be worried about the situation too.

name: Akira
line: Got it.

name: Chloe
line: Sir Sage, how about we stick together if you're not in a hurry! I'm going to look for material to make clothes for the twins' dolls! Rustica is coming too!

name: Akira
line: I'll tag along then. Is that okay, Lennox?

name: Lennox
line: Yes. Mitile, Riquet. Don't wander off anywhere strange. We'll head to the castle together when you come back.

name: Mitile
line: Got it! Mister Cain, please look after my brother! He should have gone to the castle with Miss Canary earlier.

name: Cain
line: Sure, got it! What about Murr and Shylock?

name: Chloe
line: They went off to investigate something with the twins.

name: Cain
line: So Figaro is with them too?

name: Lennox
line: Dr. Figaro said he had plans somewhere else in the Central capital. The Northern wizards are missing as usual, but where are the Eastern wizards......?

name: Akira
line: They said they were going ahead first. Apparently they were going straight to the market to buy snacks.

name: Shino
line: Wow, you can really see that this is a world-class celebration. There are more stalls here than usual. Heath, let's eat that.

name: Heathcliff
line: I'm not very good at eating while walking.

name: Faust
line: Then you should float. Once we're done with our purchases, we can sit on our brooms and eat in the sky.

name: Nero
line: Not a bad idea. Though it would be a tragedy if we dropped our food.

name: Shino
line: If a bird is allowed to shit from the sky, then I should be allowed to drop my crumbs from the sky.

name: Nero
line: Why are you so full of yourself while comparing yourself to a bird pooping?

name: Faust
line: All right. Let's give this little boy a bib.

name: Shino
line: I'm not a little boy. What's a bib? Have you ever worn one, Heath?

name: Faust
line: He probably has.

name: Nero
line: I bet he has.

name: Heathcliff
line: I probably have....

name: Shino
line: Then let's wear them together later. We'll match. But nah, I want to eat on the ground. The whole point is eating yummy food while looking for the next yummy meal.

name: Nero
line: I get how you fee-..... .........

name: Faust
line: Woah, don't stop out of nowhere.

name: Nero
line: Ah.... My bad.....

name: Shino
line: A jeweler's booth, huh. Chloe would be delighted. Did something catch your eye?

name: Heathcliff
line: Nero?

name: Nero
line: Ah.... Nah.... I just thought I saw a ring that reminded me of something an acquaintance used to wear.....

name: Faust
line: This one?

name: Nero
line: Yeah......

name: Heathcliff
line: That's a nice artifact. This is an absurd price for a gem this good.

name: Shino
line: You mean it's a deal? Why?

name: Heathcliff
line: See how it's all dull? Dull gems usually aren't very popular, but with this particular gem, the duller it is, the more valuable it is.

name: Jeweler
line: Huh, really?

name: Heathcliff
line: Ah, yes, that's right. A smoky black color, shot through with a hint of elegant light.... It's called the lizards' sun, or the ring of luck for those who walk in the shadows. It symbolizes the light of fortune that is invisible to those who have lived happy lives.

name: Jeweler
line: Well, that's great news! Let me jack up the price tag right away.

name: Shino
line: Hold up. We're the ones who caught this gem at this price. Change it after we leave.

name: Jeweler
line: A-and when will that be?

name: Shino
line: We're trying to figure out if we want to buy it right now. It's your call, Nero.

name: Nero
line: Eh!? Me!?

name: Faust
line: You were staring at it so intently. It's not a bad deal.

name: Nero
line: No, but... It's fine. It wasn't mine, it was an acquaintance's. It'd be weird for me to buy it. Like, what am I gonna do? Buy it, and say... Look at what I found.... And hand it to him? Isn't that kinda strange...? ....Because I'm..... (....I'm the reason he had to give it up in the first place.)

name: Shino
line: Stop mumbling to yourself and make a decision.

name: Heathcliff
line: If you can't pay for it right now, I can lend you some money. Ah... Sorry if that came off as rude.

name: Faust
line: This man always carries more than this price in his wallet. He's a cautious buyer, after all. Nero.

name: Faust
line: Fine. I'll buy it.

name: Nero
line: I don't need it.

name: Nero
line: Sorry. I don't need it. It's fine.

name: Shino
line: Hey....

name: Nero
line: Let's go. Sorry for taking up your time, mister.

name: Jeweler
line: Not at all! Thanks for dropping by!

name: Chloe
line: Woah! Look at that woven lace! And the pattern on their bag! It's all so stylish!

name: Akira
line: You're right! Just looking at all the passers-by in their outfits gets me all excited.

name: Lennox
line: I agree.

name: Akira
line: (Lennox... Is quietly keeping watch over our surroundings.) (Also, I haven't bumped into anyone while walking with him....) (He's anticipating my next move, and everyone else's next moves, through our lines of sight.) (He's an amazing bodyguard. But if I were a sheep, I'd feel at ease following him anywhere.)

name: Lennox
line: Sir Sage.....

name: Akira
line: Baa.

name: Lennox
line: Huh?

name: Akira
line: Ah, um, it's nothing!

name: Lennox
line: Are you sure you're not tired?

name: Akira
line: I'm definitely all right. I'm having lots of fun!

name: Chloe
line: It's fun just walking around when the streets are so lively! Ah, that person....

name: Rustica
line: The tall man in the silk hat?

name: Chloe
line: Yup. He's carrying such a gorgeous doll around. I bet he's a puppeteer.

name: Akira
line: A puppeteer?

name: Chloe
line: They use their dolls to put on plays. People say that in the most amazing puppet shows, the dolls have human souls - they're more human than actual humans.

name: Akira
line: Huh.... Now that you mention it, the doll is so delicately crafted that it almost looks human....

name: Chloe
line: Its dress is incredible too. I want to get a closer look at it....

name: Rustica
line: Then why don't you strike up a conversation with him?

name: Chloe
line: But won't he be surprised if I talk to him out of nowhere?

name: Lennox
line: You might never meet the people you run into during your travels again. Think it over; make a choice that you won't regret.

name: Chloe
line: Y-you're right.... Then I'm going to speak to him!

name: Narrator
line: (Footsteps)

name: Chloe
line: Um! Excuse me!

name: Man in the black silk hat
line: ...Me? Are you speaking to me?

name: Narrator
line: The gentleman in the black silk hat turns around to look at us. He has striking dark eyes like the night, and a stubble beard. I catch a whiff of a luxurious and elegant scent.

name: Akira
line: (He smells like roses....)

name: Chloe
line: Ah.... Excuse me for coming up to you out of nowhere. I just thought your doll was really lovely.

name: Man in the black silk hat
line: ....This doll?

name: Chloe
line: Yes, I think she's so lovely - I adore the way her hair shimmers and her skin glows, but most of all, I think the delicate laces on her dress are amazing! I want to be a tailor, you see. Could you possibly show me her dress?

name: Man in the black silk hat
line: Of course. Go ahead.

name: Chloe
line: Yay! Thank y....

name: Man in the black silk hat
line: Ah, don't touch her. She's an important tool of my trade, after all. I'll show you. Here's the front. Here's the back.

name: Chloe
line: Of cours.....

name: Man in the black silk hat
line: One more time. The front. The back.

name: Rustica
line: She's crafted with such exquisite workmanship that you'd think she was alive, yet you're treating her quite apathetically.

name: Man in the black silk hat
line: She's just a doll, after all.

name: Chloe
line: Don't you feel any attachment to her?

name: Man in the black silk hat
line: I do not. She's merely a doll. So what do you think of her?

name: Chloe
line: Ah... She's incredible! Thank you very much!

name: Man in the black silk hat
line: You're welcome. Hm, what's that book you have?

name: Akira
line: Eh? Ah, this is..... (I don't want to surprise him by telling him it's the Sage's manual....) It's just my field notebook. I write notes for my friends' profiles, and use it as a diary.

name: Man in the black silk hat
line: Huh, I see.... Sorry for being nosy. It just reminded me of a book I used to own.

name: Rustica
line: What sort of book was it?

name: Rustica
line: What sort of book was it?

name: Man in the black silk hat
line: It was a script for a puppet play. I wrote a tale for an outcast, featuring an outcast who was rewarded.

name: Chloe
line: A play for an outcast.... Did the audience like it?

name: Man in the black silk hat
line: I haven't presented it yet. But it looks like I'll have a chance to soon. Do look forward to it. Well then, excuse me.

name: Chloe
line: Ah.... Thank you!

name: Narrator
line: (Footsteps)

name: Akira
line: ......He had such a mysterious air.

name: Rustica
line: He was a wizard, after all.

name: Lennox
line: He was? I didn't realize.....

name: Rustica
line: Well, he was hiding it quite cleverly. Perhaps he wanted to avoid getting into trouble.

name: Akira
line: ....A story where an outcast is rewarded......

name: Chloe
line: I kind of want to see it! My family hated me, after all....

name: Akira
line: Chloe.....

name: Chloe
line: So if it features an outcast being loved, maybe I'll feel happy and satisfied too!

name: Child in the marketplace
line: Mom~! I want the Sages' wizards medals~!

name: Mother in the marketplace
line: How about next time? I'll take you to see the portraits once they're hung up.

name: Man in the black silk hat
line: ............ Talia. I shall make you an offering of this complacent peace. Soon enough, I will meet you.

name: Foreign knight
line: ............ The preparations are in place. Everything is going according to plan. Do not cause trouble for that lord.

name: Man in the black silk hat
line: Hahaha...... You should find a seat with a clear view for tonight. Let me show you the ultimate puppet show!

name: Foreign knight
line: ............ Tsk....... What an antiquated, lunatical wizard......

name: Murr
line: Ya~y! We're at the Lunar Eclipse Palace.

name: Shylock
line: Murr. Mind your manners.

name: Murr
line: I will~!

name: Snow
line: How wonderful that the Lunar Eclipse Palace has been splendidly rebuilt after its close brush with destruction.

name: White
line: It appears that treasures and antiques have been moved to the castle treasury instead.

name: Figaro
line: What kind of clues are you proposing that we find here?

name: Snow
line: If there's a wizard around who can control legendary beasts, then surely there must be some record of their name.

name: White
line: The Leviathan and Basilisk are creatures that even we have met only a handful of times.

name: Figaro
line: A wizard powerful enough to control legendary beasts, huh. Would anyone like that still be alive these days? Oz did turn most of the powerful wizards around into stone during his rampaging days.

name: Shylock
line: But the two of you spared those who made no attempt to resist you.

name: Figaro
line: Well, that's true. I recall an elegant and sophisticated master in a certain port town begging me to spare his life.

name: Shylock
line: Fufu. I never begged for my life; I merely offered a word of warning to keep you from becoming a laughingstock.

name: Figaro
line: Oh dear, my apologies. Allow me to thank you for your kindness.

name: Shylock
line: You are very welcome.

name: Murr
line: Then is this beast tamer a Western wizard?

name: Snow
line: They could be an Eastern wizard, a misanthrope who hid themselves away deep inside the mountains.

name: White
line: Whoever they are, they were strong enough to steal something of Oz's to use as a medium. They must be a formidable wizard.

name: Shylock
line: An enemy whose powers are strengthened through drawing on a medium from Oz, the strongest wizard in the world, the world's strongest wizard. This might be tricky.

name: Figaro
line: I don't think this problem is as troublesome as the man standing beside you though.

name: Murr
line: Are you talking about me? Or are you talking about yourself, Figaro?

name: Snow
line: Dear Figaro isn't troublesome.

name: White
line: If anything, he's an honor student. Right, Figaro?

name: Figaro
line: I've been a god since I was born, after all. Well then, I'm leaving this place to you guys.

name: Shylock
line: Are you going off somewhere?

name: Murr
line: Oh, he swiped a grimoire!

name: Figaro
line: Shh. I'll put it back later. I found the book I was looking for, so I'm going to go collect what I need from the marketplace. The rest is on you, Sir Snow and Sir White.

name: Riquet
line: Look, Mitile! It's a fruit I've never seen before!

name: Mitile
line: Wait up, Riquet. You'll get lost if you charge ahead like that!

name: Riquet
line: If I fly to the sky, I can definitely find you, and you'll find me.

name: Mitile
line: That would work if we were in Southern Country, but we're in Central Country now......

name: Narrator
line: (Sound of a tinkling bell)

name: Mysterious shop owner
line: Welcome, welcome.

name: Riquet
line: What could that be? I hear a mysterious voice, and the sound of bells......

name: Mysterious shop owner
line: Welcome, welcome. Come closer, young masters. I have countless marvelous artifacts here. Magic lamps, and flowers that will never wilt. Here we have a casket belonging to the great witch Tiretta......

name: Mitile
line: ............ The great witch Tiretta...... He's talking about my mother!

name: Riquet
line: Ah...... Mitile! Wait!

name: Narrator
line: (Running footsteps) (Sound of tinkling bell)

name: Mysterious shop owner
line: Welcome, welcome.

name: Mitile
line: ..........It's that open stall over there...... Excuse me......!

name: Mysterious shop owner
line: Welcome, young masters.

name: Narrator
line: (Running footsteps)

name: Riquet
line: ......Pant, pant...... I finally caught up to you......

name: Mitile
line: I heard your voice. You mentioned a casket belonging to the great witch Tiretta. If you're talking about the Southern witch Tiretta, then that's my mother. Could you show me that casket?

name: Mysterious shop owner
line: Unfortunately, you don't seem to have any money on you. I couldn't possibly show it to someone penniless. It's an exceptional treasure, after all.

name: Riquet
line: You shouldn't say such mean-spirited things; your greed will consume you and lead to your downfall.

name: Mysterious shop owner
line: .....Where did you come from, young master? What do you have......?

name: Riquet
line: I'm Riquet, the Sage's wizard.

name: Mysterious shop owner
line: Riquet......?

name: Mitile
line: (He only has eyes for Riquet. Even though I'm the one who's the son of the great witch Tiretta......) I'm also one of the Sage's wizards! Please, show me my mother's casket!

name: Mysterious shop owner
line: Forget that and take a look at this instead. Here, peer into this test tube.

name: Mitile
line: ......Tiny beads of lights are turning around in an elliptical orbit......

name: Mysterious shop owner
line: These are comet tears. You can draw on stronger magic if you release these as you cast your spells.

name: Mitile
line: How could you tell that we're wizards?

name: Mysterious shop owner
line: My voice only reaches wizards. This is a shop selling magic tools.

name: Riquet
line: The comet tears are so pretty...... I almost want to gaze at them forever.

name: Mitile
line: ......A tool to make your magic stronger......

name: Mysterious shop owner
line: So, what will you do? I have only one vial of comet tears. Which one of you will take it?

name: Riquet
line: Perhaps I'll take it? Mitile, are you going to get your mother's - the great witch Tiretta's casket?

name: Mitile
line: I..... I also want the vial of comet-......

name: Figaro
line: I don't think you should, Mitile.

name: Mitile
line: Dr. Figaro......

name: Figaro
line: Hey, Mitile, Riquet. I finished my tasks earlier than expected, so I thought I'd just check in with you two.

name: Riquet
line: Were you preparing something? Perfume oils with mysterious scents..... Pearls, and bones......?

name: Figaro
line: As the saying goes, there's nothing to be worried about as long as you're well prepared.

name: Figaro
line: Lift your face, Uncle. What's wrong? You're sweating so furiously. You poor thing. It is pretty hot today. I heard your voice too, you know. Did you say you have a casket of Tiretta's?

name: Figaro
line: Can you show it to me?

name: Mysterious shop owner
line: Well...... Uh, it seems to have been......

name: Figaro
line: This boy is Tiretta's son. I'll buy it if it really is a keepsake of hers. Unfortunately, I don't have much money on me, but...... I can produce a mana stone more valuable than any sum of money right now. You know what I mean.

name: Mysterious shop owner
line: ......My apologies...... I lied about Tiretta's casket to attract customers......

name: Figaro
line: What did you say? Oh dear, what a shame.

name: Figaro
line: You should stop doing such dishonest business. You're lucky that I was the one who stopped by. If it had been a certain red-haired young man, you'd have been killed.

name: Figaro
line: Hear that, Mitile? There's no such thing as Tiretta's casket.

name: Mitile
line: The comet tears......

name: Figaro
line: Hmm?

name: Mitile
line: Why did you stop me from getting the comet tears?

name: Figaro
line: Doesn't this seem shady to you? They might be fake, or even dangerous.

name: Mysterious shop owner
line: Far from it......! These are unmistakably real comet tears! You of all people should be able to tell!

name: Figaro
line: Your commentary is unnecessary.

name: Riquet
line: Then I shall buy them. I will enjoy looking at them since they're so sparkly and pretty.

name: Figaro
line: Is that so.....? Well, I guess it's fine since you have Oz to watch over you.

name: Mitile
line: ....... I can't have them, but it's fine if Riquet does?

name: Mitile
line: Is it because Riquet is better at magic?

name: Figaro
line: That's not it. I was just thinking about how there are other artifacts here as well. Mister, do you have any recommendations?

name: Mysterious shop owner
line: Uh...... Well, there's a short bow that belonged to a bandit lord, and this aphrodisiac for creating a harem......

name: Figaro
line: It's too early for him to have a harem. You should be able to tell just by looking, right!?

name: Mysterious shop owner
line: S-Sorry......

name: Mitile
line: It's fine.

name: Mitile
line: Please give me the comet tears.

name: Figaro
line: Mitile.

name: Mitile
line: I want to give them as a present to my friend. How much are they?

name: Riquet
line: ......Are you okay with that, Mitile?

name: Mitile
line: Yes. It seems like I'm not worthy of them.

name: Riquet
line: Figaro. Is Mitile not worthy?

name: Figaro
line: ......I didn't intend to say anything like that, but......

name: Mitile
line: It's fine. (When I heard that they could boost my magic, for a moment, I wanted the comet tears more than a keepsake of mother's......) (Like Dr. Figaro says, I'm not worthy......)

name: Stall owner
line: Welcome, welcome! Look at this steal over here, a lucky stone known as the lizards' sun! A miraculous ring that can transform the lives of social outcasts who walk in the shadows!

name: Stall owner
line: Woah......! A-aren't you the young man from earlier?

name: Nero
line: You really went and tripled the price......

name: Stall owner
line: O-of course I did! I've still got my business to run now that I know how valuable it is. What will you do? Are you going to buy it? If you are, I'll knock the price down a bit for you......

name: Nero
line: ............ I'm still thinking.

name: Stall owner
line: Can I change the price one more time?

name: Nero
line: You bastard, you're just trying to fleece me......

name: Riquet
line: Nero!

name: Nero
line: Woah.... Riquet. Weren't you shopping with Mitile?

name: Riquet
line: Mitile is over there with Figaro. I caught sight of you, so I came to say hello. What are you doing?

name: Nero
line: It's really nothing. Wait...... Hold on! Stop adding digits to the price!!

name: Stall owner
line: You better make up your mind soon~.

name: Riquet
line: This doesn't look like nothing. What are you actually doing? It's bad to keep secrets.

name: Nero
line: Not necessarily. Secrets can be tasteful things you share with your close friends.

name: Riquet
line: Tasteful things you share with your close friends......

name: Nero
line: That's you and me. So keep it a secret from the others that I was here.

name: Riquet
line: I see! I'll keep our tasteful secret!

name: Nero
line: I'm counting on you.

name: Riquet
line: Fufu. How exciting, having a secret!

name: Nero
line: Haha, that's true. Ah...... Um, that ring......

name: Stall owner
line: Yes! This ring!

name: Nero
line: ............ .....You know what, forget it.

name: Nero
line: ............ Sorry for taking up your time.

name: Riquet
line: Nero......

name: Man in the black silk hat
line: You can never redo your life. Time, once lost, will never return...... Talia. This time, I'll make sure to avenge our downtrodden lives. Violet.

name: Girl with purple eyes
line: Yes.

name: Man in the black silk hat
line: Scarlet.

name: Girl with red hair
line: I'm here, Father.

name: Man in the black silk hat
line: Cyan.

name: Man in the black silk hat
line: Viridian.

name: Girl with green eyes
line: Yes, Father.

name: Man in the black silk hat
line: In order to lift Talia's curse, we must carry out the ceremony according to the legends. Making offerings to the beasts of the sky, land, and seas - so that we can open the door to the wandering dimension. I trust that you've completed the preparations for awakening the beast of the land, Violet.

name: Violet
line: Yes. I'll be leaving Viridian to handle that beast.

name: Man in the black silk hat
line: Can you do it, Viridian?

name: Viridian
line: I can.

name: Scarlet
line: I'm so excited that my heart feels like it might burst. ......Oh my, Cyan. What's with that pale blue umbrella?

name: Cyan
line: ......Someone gave it to me. It's the umbrella of luck. He said that it'll protect me.

name: Man in the black silk hat
line: Foolish child. Discard it.

name: Man in the black silk hat
line: I said to discard it! You don't need charity from anyone aside from me. I see that you're just like Talia......

name: Scarlet
line: Father, please calm your anger. I think it's quite fine. It's such a fashionable umbrella.

name: Violet
line: It is. You could even use it as a harpoon to take down prey.

name: Viridian
line: Perhaps you could borrow it when you lose your hat, Father.

name: Man in the black silk hat
line: ......Fine. I'll permit it this one time. Now, let us go. My daughters. First, we have to rescue our imprisoned Aureolin.

name: Central Country citizen
line: Finally, it's time for the five countries' peace conference. I wonder if the ambassadors from each country have already arrived. Five years ago, they put on a wonderful parade all the way till the castle gates, but.......

name: Central Country citizen
line: There have been so many mysterious incidents because of the < Great Catastrophe >, so they might be trying to avoid anything too flashy.

name: Central Country citizen
line: Even so, I can't wait for tomorrow's opening ceremony.

name: Drummond
line: Prince Arthur! You look wonderfully attired; your formal outfit marks you as one of the Sage's wizards!

name: Arthur
line: Thank you. I've asked everyone to change for the dinner we're holding on the eve of the opening ceremony. ......But it seems like the ambassadors from each country have yet to arrive.

name: Drummond
line: Yes, that seems to be the case...... I've dispatched the Order of Knights to look into the situation, but they have not yet returned.

name: Arthur
line: Perhaps something happened. I should check for myself. << Pernoctant Nix-...... >>

name: Drummond
line: Prince Arthur!

name: Arthur
line: Woah...... You surprised me. I was on the verge of taking off into the sky with you hanging around my waist.

name: Drummond
line: If anyone is surprised here, it should be me! Should anything have happened, it would be all the more reason for Your Highness to remain in the castle!

name: Arthur
line: I'll be back immedia-......

name: Drummond
line: I certainly won't let you!

name: Akira
line: Arthur....... It looks like he's being scolded by Drummond.

name: Heathcliff
line: I'm getting worried.... It looks like the ambassadors from Eastern Country aren't here yet either....

name: Canary
line: We had everyone change into their formal clothes in preparation for the banquet, but I guess we got ahead of ourselves?

name: Akira
line: I think it's fine! But... Murr and Shylock and the Northern wizards, including the twins, have yet to arrive.

name: Rutile
line: I did tell Mister Mithra that we would be in formal attire for the banquet, so I hope he remembers to change.... Oh, that's right. Chloe and Mister Rustica said they wanted to stop by the fabric shop one more time before the market closed.

name: Heathcliff
line: That's no surprise, coming from Chloe.

name: Shino
line: If the banquet isn't starting yet, I'm taking a walk through the courtyard to cool off. I ate too much at the marketplace.

name: Heathcliff
line: That's why I told you.... Sir Sage, I'll be tagging along, just in case something happens.

name: Shino
line: I won't get lost.

name: Heathcliff
line: I'm more worried that you're going to be rude to Prince Arthur's servants. Ah..... Riquet. Mitile. Would you two like to join us?

name: Riquet & Mitile
line: Eh?

name: Heathcliff
line: We're going to take a walk through the courtyard. You look a little tired - is it because of the formal attire?

name: Mitile
line: No, I'm feeling fine! But... Want to go, Riquet?

name: Riquet
line: Yes!

name: Figaro
line: Where are you headed?

name: Mitile
line: Um.... We're going to stroll through the courtyard.

name: Figaro
line: I see. Take care.

name: Mitile
line: Yes! See you later!

name: Nero
line: ........ ....Hm.... Wait, on the other side of the window....

name: Nero
line: ....It's Cyan. Hey, Mr. Faust. Lend me your ear for a second.

name: Faust
line: Woah. What is it?

name: Nero
line: The girl who was with the basilisk back in the Town of Rain - she's flying right outside the castle. I'm gonna see what's going on.

name: Faust
line: ....I'll join you.

name: Nero
line: No. You should stay here. Take care of Shino and the others if something happens. They should've headed to the courtyard.

name: Faust
line: Got it.

name: Arthur
line: ......Fine. I won't go anywhere, Drummond. Instead, I'll go check on the girl.

name: Drummond
line: The girl?

name: Arthur
line: The intruder that Cain captured. I heard that Sir Oz confined her to a room locked with magic, but where is it?

name: Drummond
line: Prince Arthur. A prince does not meet with intruders or suspicious figures face to face.

name: Arthur
line: She might have something to do with the fact that the ambassadors haven't arrived. I hear that she is a witch.

name: Drummond
line: Your Highness. Cain told me not to let you anywhere near the room where the girl is being held.

name: Arthur
line: Cain did? Why?

name: Drummond
line: Because it's dangerous! Just this once, I agree with that man.

name: Arthur
line: Ahaha. Don't worry, Drummond. On my word as a wizard and as the prince, I will protect you from any danger.

name: Drummond
line: That won't do!!

name: Narrator
line: (Flapping of wings)

name: Arthur
line: It's an injured bird...... No...... << Pernoctant Nixzo >>!

name: Drummond
line: What on earth......! The bird transformed into a girl......!

name: Injured blonde witch
line: .....hh...... The prince who sides with the wizards...... Please bring me to meet Prince Arthur......

name: Arthur
line: I'm Arthur. Such terrible wounds...... I'll heal you with magic at onc-......

name: Injured blonde witch
line: It's too late for me...... More importantly, I have a request...... ......The man dressed in black...... Obsius killed my sister........ Kill him for me......

name: Arthur
line: He killed your sister......?

name: Injured blonde witch
line: ......He killed my sister in front of my eyes, and stole her mana stone...... He said it was an offering for the beasts...... ......Please, I beg of you...... Avenge my sister....... ......hh......

name: Arthur
line: ............! Hang in there! Open your eyes! << Pernocta-...... >>

name: Drummond
line: Prince Arthur. It's too late......

name: Narrator
line: (Crack)

name: Drummond
line: ......She turned into stone......

name: Narrator
line: (Bird cawing)

name: Snow
line: I remember now!

name: White
line: Me too!

name: Shylock
line: What have you recalled? The wizard skilled at controlling magical beasts?

name: Snow
line: Exactly so.

name: White
line: That means spending the day investigating wasn't a complete waste of time.

name: Murr
line: So what did you recall? Was it good? Was it bad?

name: Snow
line: It might be bad news for you.

name: White
line: It's Obsius. The puppeteer of darkness.

name: Snow
line: He's a magician who enchants and controls beasts with his toy dolls.

name: Shylock
line: Obsius... I've heard his name in â€‹â€‹the entertainment district of the Town of Nectar.

name: Murr
line: Was he popular?

name: Shylock
line: I recall his reputation being quite similar to yours....

name: Murr
line: So everyone hates him!

name: Snow
line: We once saved Obsius when he was on the brink of death.

name: White
line: He seemed to be in mourning because he and his lover had broken up. So we offered him a prophecy.

name: Shylock
line: A prophecy...?

name: Narrator
line: You will be granted a magical tool or a medium that will make your wishes come true. Our prophecies are never wrong.

name: Murr
line: And where was that place?

name: Snow & White
line: The Ravages of Oz.

name: Shylock
line: That may have been where he obtained Oz's blood to use as a medium.....

name: Murr
line: So he can control beasts, and now he has the ultimate medium in his hands! That's so exciting! Plus, night is approaching! The twins are stuck in their painting, and Oz can't use his magic!

name: Snow & White
line: ........... We need to hurry back to the castle!

name: Shylock
line: Let us do that.

name: Soldier
line: ............! Who goes there!?

name: Scarlet
line: Fufu, can we help you with anything?

name: Soldier
line: I......I apologize, noble ladies. Have you lost your way? This is not the venue for tonight's dinner. If you turn back towards the hallway you came from-......

name: Viridian
line: << Volo Habere >>

name: Violet
line: Shush....... Quiet now.

name: Cyan
line: ......Where's Aureolin?

name: Narrator
line: (Door opening) (Footsteps)

name: Soldier
line: ......Guh...... Uugh...... You knocked out an entire platoon of soldiers in an instant...... W-Who on earth are you people......!?

name: Violet
line: << Volo Habere >>

name: Soldier
line: Aauugh......!

name: Scarlet
line: Ohoho. How dare you imprison my sister.

name: Cyan
line: ......Are you okay?

name: Aureolin
line: I'm fine.

name: Viridian
line: Elder sister. Let's hurry.

name: Narrator
line: (Footsteps)

name: Violet
line: Someone is coming. Do we kill them?

name: Aureolin
line: There'll be no end to the killing. We have to prepare the ritual.

name: Scarlet
line: Fufu. I'll cast a spell so all of us but Aureolin will be invisible. I'll conceal the soldiers, and relock the open door.

name: Viridian
line: They're here.

name: Narrator
line: (Door opening)

name: Cain
line: Hey, do you remember me?

name: Cain
line: At least reply to me. ......Oz, how does she seem to be doing?

name: Oz
line: Which one?

name: Cain
line: What do you mean which one? Aureolin, of course. The blonde-haired girl we captured the other day.

name: Oz
line: She is alive.

name: Cain
line: I know that. I'm asking whether she looks pale, or if she's glaring......

name: Oz
line: She's signalling her comrades with her eyes.

name: Cain
line: Comrades?

name: Oz
line: They used magic to conceal their presence, but there are four of them. There are also twenty soldiers lying prostrate on the ground.

name: Oz
line: What else can you not perceive?

name: Violet
line: Die!

name: Narrator
line: (Flash of light)

name: Cain
line: Are you kidding!? Shoot, the sun already went down!

name: Violet
line: << Volo Habere >>

name: Scarlet
line: << Volo Habere >>

name: Viridian
line: << Volo Habere >>

name: Cain
line: Hang on hang on hang on......!

name: Arthur
line: << Pernoctant Nixzo >>!

name: Cain
line: Arthur!

name: Arthur
line: Cain, I'm here!

name: Narrator
line: (High five)

name: Cain
line: Thank goodness!

name: Arthur
line: You guys were trying to leave me out.

name: Cain
line: I'll hear your complaints later.

name: Arthur
line: I'm warning you now. I'm going to sulk if you do this again.

name: Cain
line: You're already sulking. You're pouting.

name: Arthur
line: ......I've always looked like this. Drummond, please wake Sir Oz up!

name: Drummond
line: I-I shall! O......Oz, wake up...... Wa-.......

name: Oz
line: ......I am awake.

name: Mithra
line: << Arthim >>

name: Arthur
line: ......A door in space!? ......Mithra......!

name: Mithra
line: I finally found you. Witch from the Forest of Dreams.

name: Violet
line: I'm Violet. And you are?

name: Mithra
line: Mithra. You don't have to remember that. Because I'm going to kill you.

name: Violet
line: << Volo Habere >>

name: Narrator
line: (Crash, followed by rumbling)

name: Akira
line: ............!? What was that sound......!?

name: Lennox
line: Please stay put, Sir Sage. ....! Sir Faust!

name: Faust
line: Ah. It's you.

name: Lennox
line: Where are you headed?

name: Faust
line: To the courtyard.

name: Lennox
line: It'll be dangerous to go alone. I will join you. While escorting Sir Sage....

name: Faust
line: No need.

name: Faust
line: You should do your job.

name: Arthur
line: .......Such extreme wind pressure! All the windows shattered...... Sir Oz, are you all right!?

name: Oz
line: Do not worry about me. Mithra......

name: Arthur
line: He went out the window with the purple-eyed witch......!

name: Violet
line: You're pretty good. You tore my dress.

name: Mithra
line: You're not as good as I thought.

name: Violet
line: ......What did you say?

name: Mithra
line: Do show me at least enough magic to keep me awake. << Arthim >>

name: Violet
line: << Volo Habere >>

name: Oz
line: Mithra......

name: Cain
line: Oz, Arthur! Return to the reception hall! Leave things here to me......!

name: Aureolin
line: Like I'll let you!

name: Cain
line: << Gladius Procella >>!

name: Aureolin
line: << Volo Habere >>! Sisters! I'll take this one outside the castle! We'll follow Violet's lead and begin our preparations!

name: Narrator
line: (Crash)

name: Scarlet
line: All right. Let us begin.

name: Viridian
line: All right.

name: Cain
line: ............ What a heavy kick......! You almost snapped my neck......

name: Aureolin
line: << Volo Habere >>!

name: Cain
line: I won't fall for that twice......! << Gladius Procella >>!

name: Narrator
line: (Outside castle)

name: Aureolin
line: I won't let you get in our way.

name: Cain
line: Aureolin! What are you planning!?

name: Aureolin
line: I told you. Revenge, and resurrection. << Volo Habere >>

name: Cain
line: ......!? What's that magic circle......!?

name: Owen
line: Looks like you're in trouble, Sir Knight.

name: Owen
line: Want me to lend you a hand?

name: Rutile
line: .......Flashing light as bright as the sun streaking across the night sky...... What in the world is happening......

name: Canary
line: Look! Mister Rutile, over there......! On the rooftop......!

name: Mithra
line: I'll finish you off right here. ......Hmm? Is that Rutile on that balcony......?

name: Violet
line: ............hh. << Volo Habere >>!

name: Mithra
line: Shoot......!

name: Narrator
line: (Crash on the balcony)

name: Castle person
line: Eeeeeeek......!

name: Rutile
line: ............! Are you all right, Miss Canary!

name: Canary
line: Y-yes, thank y-...... Ah, Mister Rutile, that wound on your arm......!

name: Rutile
line: This is nothing. ......hh, Mister Mithra......

name: Castle person
line: Someone fell from the sky onto the balcony! Like they were thrown down violently......!

name: Rutile
line: Mister Mithra......!

name: Violet
line: Die, Mithra.

name: Rutile
line: ............! << Ortonik Setomaouge >>! ......Aagh......!

name: Canary
line: Mister Rutile......!

name: Mithra
line: You...... Are you an idiot!? Why would a weak wizard like you try to protect me!

name: Rutile
line: Hah...... I'm so glad you're all right...... I knew you'd be fine, Mister Mithra...... I'll take Miss Canary and fly away! Miss Canary, hold on tight to me!

name: Mithra
line: Rutile! Escape by yourself!

name: Canary
line: He's right! Don't worry about me......

line: But somewhere in your heart, you think, "Oh well. Nothing I can do about it." Right?

name: Akira
line: ......Who are you......?

name: Murr
line: I'm your cat! The heart is all about survival of the fittest, after all. It's an environment where weak emotions are consumed by powerful ones. Like a good, understanding child, you will swallow a cup filled to the brim with tragedy, without leaving a single drop. If forcing your opinion upon others will cause them trouble, you would rather suffer the wounds yourself. Oh, gentle spirit. In order to be with others - or, in order to be all alone..... You slowly and gradually yielded every piece of yourself, wearing down your very soul. Even though you had every right to protect your own soul.

name: Murr
line: Did nobody tell you that? That you yourself are one and only? That nobody can replace you?

name: Narrator

name: I open my eyes, and find myself in a mysterious dimension
line: a pure black realm of space, with swirling flowers of light dancing before my eyes.

name: Obsius
line: I see you're awake.

name: Akira
line: You are......!

name: Narrator
line: Standing in front of me is - the man in the black silk hat I met in the Central marketplace.

name: Obsius
line: We met at the marketplace, Sage from a different world. It makes you feel good, doesn't it? A heretic like you being revered by a bunch of fools.

name: Obsius
line: My name is Obsius. You shall stay here and watch as the castle of briars is resurrected.

name: Akira
line: ............ .........Are you the one who did all of this to Granvelle Castle......? Why......? You said you would show me your completed puppet show......

name: Obsius
line: The performance is underway as we speak. Take a look through the rose windows.

name: Narrator
line: Obsius points at the glowing flower patterns, and I strain my eyes in the direction of what he called the rose windows. Beyond the disparate flower patterns, I catch sight of the Sage's wizards. Cain and Owen beating back the briars as they attempt to break into the castle...... Chloe and Rustica flying in the air close by... Above the seas, I see Rutile and Mithra face to face with a giant monster. And Figaro and the twins with them. I see Arthur and Oz, as well as Faust and Lennox in the castle hall. In the labyrinthine courtyard, Shino battles a bovine monster...... As the figures of Heath, Mitile and Riquet race desperately through the maze. A giant bird flies dizzying circles in the night sky, with Nero and Bradley on its heel. Joined by Murr and Shylock, all giving chase on their brooms.

name: Obsius
line: Now, Talia. Accept the sacrifices I offer to you. Hurry! Wake up, and show yourself to me!

name: Narrator
line: The man named Obsius laughs, a distorted sound that resounds in space. With my limbs still entangled in briars, I -....... I can do nothing but hold my breath and watch over the scenes unfolding beyond the rose windows.

name: Figaro
line: << Possideo >>

name: Narrator
line: Figaro chants his spell, whipping up a tornado over the expanse of sea. The maelstrom whirls in dizzying circles, lengthening into a giant pillar that links the sea and the sky together. Standing amidst the stripping wind, Figaro smiles, the portrait of a languid sea god. He narrows his eyes - a disquieting yet beautiful mixture of harvest time hazel and overcast tempest grey - and lifts his orb. And the giant tornado charges straight towards the Leviathan with towering force. With the skies and seas churning around him, Figaro raises his palm like a doctor preparing for surgery and lightly crooks a finger in invitation.

name: Figaro
line: Come, Mithra. We're attacking from both flanks.

name: Narrator
line: Figaro casts a glance beyond the Leviathan between them, to Mithra standing on the opposite side of the seas.

name: Mithra
line: Don't order me around.

name: Narrator
line: Mithra grumbles unamusedly at Figaro's words. But in response, he plunges into the sea, one hand cradling his magical skull. The Leviathan, too, dives beneath the sea, trying to escape the giant maelstrom.

name: Narrator
line: (Splash)

name: Narrator
line: Mithra sinks to the bottom of the dark sea, countless glittering bubbles clinging to him like flurried snow. He relaxes his grip, and for a split moment, his skull floats weightlessly in the water. Before transforming into a gigantic head of death, its gaping jaws thrown wide open in the roar of a feral beast. Mithra utters a single soundless word.

name: Mithra
line: << Arthim >>

name: Narrator
line: In the next instant, frozen rays of blue flame shoot out from the skull's open mouth. With staggering speed, the flames freeze the seawater white in their wake and extend into a drill of ice. Heading directly for the Leviathan's belly. Caught up in the giant maelstrom, the Leviathan should have been pierced straight through by the pillar of ice. Instead, it suddenly disappears. I stand aghast at the sight of such a giant creature disappearing in a blink.

name: Figaro
line: Oh my. It teleported to another body of water.

name: Narrator
line: With the Leviathan gone, the giant tornado and the pillar of ice collide violently, spraying seawater with a thunderous roar.

name: Rutile

A purple shard in that dark corner......) (A glowing bug......? A petal......? No, it's a stone...... It's spinning around like a comet.) (The glow of that purple sapphire feels familiar......)

name: Murr

line: (Woosh)

name: Bradley
