name: Narrator
line: In the courtyard, Shino fights the Minotaur. A monster with a bulky, massive frame - even larger than a stable. The head of a bull tops off its hulking body; it commands an axe of horrific proportions. Despite its fierce movements, the Minotaur's eyes harbor a silent darkness devoid of emotion.

name: Shino
line: Hmph.... You remind me of my old self.

name: Narrator
line: Shino dashes through the dark midnight garden that has transformed into a labyrinth. I thought he was fleeing the Minotaur. But I was wrong. He turns a corner and hides himself in the Minotaur's blind spot, ready to launch an attack on the monster when it reaches him.

name: Shino
line: << MatztzÄh Sudipas >>

name: Narrator
line: (Clash) (Roar)

name: Narrator
line: Shino's scythe strikes the Minotaur's neck, right on target. Any normal beast would've had its head flying in an instant. But....

name: Narrator
line: The scythe only scratches the Minotaur's hide; it stands unharmed. Using the centrifugal force of his scythe, Shino spins through the air like a wheel before hitting the ground. And then he runs through the labyrinth once more. He hides amidst the roots and the trees and waits for his next opportunity to strike. Shino is out of breath, but he remains as composed as a hunter laying his traps. If he manages to slowly and keenly chip away at the Minotaur's stamina, bit by bit, maybe he has a shot at winning this battle. -But the very next moment, tragedy strikes.

name: Narrator
line: (Roar)

name: Maybe the Minotaur sensed where Shino was
line: it slices away the entire corner of the maze where he'd hidden with a heavy blow of its axe. Shino manages to dodge the attack, but it takes him a second to get back on his feet.

name: Shino
line: << MatztzÄh Sudipas >> .......!

name: Narrator
line: The Minotaur swings its axe and slices Shino's body right down the front.

name: Narrator
line: (Crash)

name: Narrator
line: And then, in one sweeping sideways motion, the Minotaur tosses Shino several meters into the distance. As Shino struggles to rise to his feet, the monster stampedes towards him with thundering footsteps. I scream. Even though I know my voice won't reach him.

name: Akira
line: Shino! Run......!

name: Obsius
line: It's pointless. There is no escaping the Minotaur, the greatest warrior on earth.

name: Akira
line: .....What do you hope to accomplish with all this!?

name: Obsius
line: I want to reunite with my dearest wife.

name: Akira
line: Wife.....?

name: Obsius
line: The briar witch, Talia. The pitiful witch who was cursed for attempting forbidden magic, only to fail and be possessed by the briars in return. Against her will, briars would appear and lash out at all those who dared approach her. And thus, ashamed of her cursed existence, Talia hid herself away in an ancient castle. That was where we met each other. My puppet show was a salve to her lonely heart, her smile the very same to my loneliness. We were meant to live happily ever after, free from this meaningless world and its foolish masses. ......And yet that man incited Talia into destroying herself!

name: Obsius
line: The genius of the ages, the philosopher Murr, known for his brilliance! He stole my wife's heart away from me, used her to further his own research, and cast her aside once he was done using her. Unwittingly, Talia was tricked into weaving roses to create a pathway to the moon! She lost herself, weaving away in the ancient castle, and in the end...... She became one with the castle of briars......

name: Akira
line: Became one with the castle......?

name: Obsius
line: It's all that man's fault! The great philosopher Murr destroyed my wife and our love for each other!

name: Akira
line: No way...... Murr wouldn't do something like...... ............. (......The current, innocent Murr might not, but the Murr before his soul shattered, I couldn't say for sure......) ......Even if that were the case...... He wouldn't have gotten innocent people involved.......

name: Narrator
line: Laughter rings out from the darkness. The sweet, insolent, charismatic laughter of a voice accustomed to mockery. A strong light glows from the purple sapphire shard. And that bewitching purple light coalesces into a person.
How cruel of you, Sir Sage. I know that one of the many me's out there explained to you...

name: Murr
line: The one I love is the < Great Catastrophe >. The beautiful moon alone.

name: Narrator
line: The man with a face identical to Murr's takes a bow, so gracious that he seems to be feigning politeness. Then, he smiles at me.

name: Murr
line: It's a pleasure to meet you. My name is Murr Hart. Please call me Murr - Sir Sage.

name: Riquet
line: ......The castle courtyard is like a maze now.

name: Mitile
line: It wasn't like this earlier..... Ah, Mister Heathcliff, come this way.... Are you okay? Are you tired?

name: Heathcliff
line: ....I'm all right. Thank you for looking out for me.

name: Mitile
line: Not at all.

name: Riquet
line: What's wrong, Heathcliff?

name: Heathcliff
line: .....I'm sorry. But could you two escape alone?

name: Mitile
line: Mister Heathcliff.....

name: Heathcliff
line: I can't leave Shino on his own. He was putting on a show, pretending he had everything under control, but I know..... That if he thought he could win, he would want me to be there so I could witness it. He wouldn't let me escape like this.

name: Mitile
line: ....Mister Shino said he would definitely catch up. We should believe in him.

name: Heathcliff
line: I've made a promise with Shino.

name: Riquet
line: A promise?

name: Mitile
line: But wizards aren't supposed to make promises....? Because if we break our promises, we can't use magic anymore.

name: Riquet
line: It must have been a promise you made with great conviction. ....Right, Heathcliff?

name: Heathcliff
line: ....Not at all. We were just swindled by our master, and..... We made it without understanding a thing. Our promise was to protect each other. That's why.... I need to protect Shino. I still don't know how to face the question that Mister Faust posed to me - I still don't know if my heart is ready for me to be his master, but..... But.... I have to go. I'm sorry.

name: Riquet
line: What's wrong, Mitile? ....You look pale.....

name: Mitile
line: .....Mister Heathcliff. Mister Shino actually asked me to.....

name: Heathcliff
line: To what....?

name: Mitile
line: He said that we couldn't beat the Minotaur. So he asked me to take care of you and run, Mister Heathcliff.

name: Heathcliff
line: ....Wh...... .......I can't believe him......! Now I'm seriously pissed off......!!

name: Mitile
line: P-please don't get mad at him!! Mister Shino was doing it for you, Mister Heathcliff.....

name: Heathcliff
line: I know, but.....!

name: Riquet
line: Why didn't you tell us, Mitile?

name: Mitile
line: I did sort of bend to Mister Shino's overwhelming willpower, but.... I was also happy. Because he acknowledged me as a capable, proper wizard. Nobody else treats me like that.... But he said he was counting on me. That's why.... I was so happy......

name: Heathcliff
line: .......... Going by that logic, it means he doesn't trust me.

name: Mitile
line: I-I guess, I guess you could say that, but...... .....Did I make you mad?

name: Heathcliff
line: I'm not angry at you, Mitile.

name: Riquet
line: But your hands are shaking, Heathcliff.....

name: Heathcliff
line: I've never been this mad - I'm so mad that I feel like I could pass out. I don't care about the Minotaur.

name: Mitile
line: Y-you're so reliable.

name: Riquet
line: I will pray so that you can feel at peace, Heathcliff.

name: Heathcliff
line: I'm heading back to Shino. What will you two...

name: Riquet
line: We'll follow you. As a disciple of God, and as a Sage's wizard, I cannot just sit aside idly as my friend is exposed to danger. Plus, there's a little something that I want to try out!

name: Mitile
line: Wait, does that mean.... You have the comet tears with you right now?

name: Riquet
line: Yes! Let's see what it does!

name: Heathcliff
line: All right.... If anything happens, you two should run away.

name: Mitile & Riquet
line: I won't run away!

name: Heathcliff
line: Then your job is to be messengers. I want you two to call for help to make sure we don't die.

name: Riquet
line: Well, if that's the case....

name: Mitile
line: All right. I accept that job.

name: Heathcliff
line: Thank you. << Repsevaivulp Sonus >>

name: Narrator
line: (Woosh)

name: Mitile
line: Woah, the wind cut straight through.....!

name: Riquet
line: It created a path straight across the garden, blowing away all the hedges and the plants....!

name: Heathcliff
line: All right. We're clear. Let's go.

name: Riquet
line: ....He's surprisingly bold.

name: Mitile
line: .....He really is a Blanchett - the strongest military family in Eastern Country.

name: Narrator
line: The brilliant scholar Murr, whose soul shattered when he got too close to the secret of the moon. His friend, Shylock, is gathering the shards of Murr's soul in an attempt to restore him, but.... Under the influence of the < Great Catastrophe >, the shards scattered about the world gain physical form from time to time.

name: Obsius
line: Why are you here....!?

name: Murr
line: Who knows? Perhaps the moon was being mischievous - or perhaps Talia's lonely soul drew me close.

name: Obsius's face twists into an expression that even I can read clearly
line: jealousy. Murr coolly tilts his head, his neatly trimmed hair swaying to one side.

name: Murr
line: In any case, it is quite cozy here. I suppose this could be taken as a risque joke, but we are essentially within her body.

name: Akira
line: What do you mean? He mentioned earlier that she became one with the castle of briars...

name: Murr
line: The briar witch Talia is the ancient castle of roses. She became what she wished to be.

name: Obsius
line: You're wrong! You broke her heart when you cast her aside, and she was possessed by delusions! Why else would anyone wish to become one with an antiquated castle!?

name: Narrator
line: Obsius glares at Murr, his eyes full of loathing. Murr laughs without even bothering to hide his arrogant look of surprise.

name: Murr
line: Amazing. You really never listened to a single word Talia said. She may not look the way you wish she did, but that does not mean that she is unfortunate.

name: Obsius
line: Silence....! You freakish moon-obsessed charlatan....! You are catastrophe itself! I never listened to her, you say!? I was the one who thought of her, more than anyone else! I visited her - an outcast! - and performed my puppet shows to soothe her loneliness! Because I alone understood her! But then you showed up, and Talia grew infatuated with you, and.....

name: Narrator
line: Murr ignores Obsius, whose voice has risen to a yell, and crosses his legs next to me. He peers into my face with a smile, surprisingly innocent for a soul shard Murr. His expression is filled with fondness for his old friend.

name: Murr
line: Sir Sage. Talia was a fascinating girl. She was trying to go to the moon.

name: Akira
line: The moon?

name: Murr
line: That's right. She wished to land on the surface of that sparkling moon so that the castle of briars could take root. An ancient castle of roses standing in a world of gold. That was her dream, and she continues dreaming to this day. She dreamed, and dreamed, and dreamed again, until her hair became rose ivy; her hands, castle walls; and her legs, castle gates. And like a ghost ship, she wanders between dimensions, waiting for the day that her dream will come true.

name: Arthur
line: << Pernoctant Nixzo >>! .....It's not working...... We're surrounded by briars, and the exit to the courtyard is sealed off. Blasting holes in the ceiling and the ground didn't help either......

name: Faust
line: I know this is a dire situation, but I'm amazed by how enthusiastic you are about blasting holes in the castle's reception hall.

name: Arthur
line: Anything to save the Sage and everyone else. I'm sure the first King Alec will understand.

name: Faust
line: Don't look at me.

name: Lennox
line: I apologize.

name: Oz
line: ......I tried to summon Figaro and the twins, but I simply fell asleep, to no avail.

name: Arthur
line: You said you couldn't reach Cain or Riquet either, right?

name: Faust
line: Are your powers being suppressed?

name: Oz
line: This situation is abnormal. Right now, the castle resembles a human that has been possessed by a dead soul.

name: Arthur
line: What do you mean?

name: Oz
line: ...... A ghost ship does not exist, but it is still possible for humans to board that ship. And once they do, it is also possible for them to disappear along with it.

name: Arthur
line: Yes.

name: Oz
line: It is the same thing.

name: Arthur
line: ............ The same thing...... Oh, I understand now!

name: Faust
line: ......You got it from that explanation?

name: Lennox
line: I had no idea what he was getting at...... Central really has excellent students.

name: Arthur
line: In other words, Granvelle Castle has been possessed by a spectral castle.

name: Oz
line: Yes. Like the temples of the original spirits, it originally existed in a world without real form.

name: Faust
line: I see...... But why would something like this happen? Granvelle Castle has not committed such grave sins that it would warrant a castle of dead souls possessing it.

name: Oz
line: Someone cast a forbidden curse upon it. They made a promise to offer holy sacrifices to the beasts of the sky, sea, and land.

name: Lennox
line: A promise......

name: Arthur
line: Sacrifices..... You mean the people sleeping in this castle? I won't let that happen! I'll rouse the castle's inhabitants from their sleep!

name: Faust
line: I agree with Arthur. Those who have fallen to slumber have committed no crimes. ......Besides, I'm worried about Shino and the rest of them.

name: Lennox
line: I'm worried about Mitile and the others too. I hope they're all safe......

name: Aureolin
line: How dare you intrude upon Father and Mother's grief! I'll be your opponent!

name: Faust
line: The blonde girl..... You must be the witch that Cain mentioned.

name: Arthur
line: You look like..... The witch who turned to stone on the balcony......

name: Faust
line: The witch who turned to stone on the balcony?

name: Arthur
line: Yes...... She arrived on the brink of death in the form of a bird. She asked me to take revenge for her sister who was killed by Obsius......

name: Aureolin
line: ......Obsius? That's my father. He would not kill an innocent witch.

name: Arthur
line: You resemble that girl. But...... I also sense Sir Oz's air about you.

name: Faust
line: I sense it too, faintly. Is she related to you by blood?

name: Oz
line: She was created using my blood as a medium.

name: Arthur
line: Created?

name: Oz
line: That is a puppet.

name: Arthur
line: A puppet? This girl?

name: Aureolin
line: .....Did you just call me a puppet? Preposterous!

name: Faust
line: .......I have to agree with her. I can't believe that she's a puppet; I sense blood flowing through her.

name: Oz
line: She is drawing on my blood as a medium. The person who molded her must possess formidable power. They killed witches from each country and harvested their mana stones. They used them to create sacrifices in the images favored by the beasts in order to control them.

name: Aureolin
line: Sacrifices?

name: Oz
line: Yes. You are the sacrifices for the beasts.

name: Oz
line: You will be consumed.

name: Owen
line: << Cure Memimi >>

name: Narrator
line: (Roar)

name: Cain
line: << Gladius Procella >>! ............ ! I'm getting the hang of it.....!

name: Owen
line: Hmph. Good for you.

name: Cain
line: Yeah! It's all thanks to your advice!

name: Owen
line: Haha...... Idiot. I didn't give any advice.

name: Cain
line: Even so, I'm grateful to you. If I keep this up, I can break through!

name: Owen
line: Do as you please.

name: Cain
line: Wait for me, Akira, Arthur!

name: Scarlet
line: ...... I won't let you advance further!

name: Owen
line: I'm your opponent. << Cuare Morito >>

name: Scarlet
line: << Volo Habe.... >>

name: Narrator
line: (Roar)

name: Owen
line: What should I do with you? I'm not as kind as Sir Knight is. Shall I cut you into three and feed each piece to one of Cerberus' heads?

name: Scarlet
line: Well, if you're going to eat me anyway, you wouldn't mind letting me into your stomach, right? << Volo Habere >>!

name: Owen
line: ............ Tsk......! You pesky bastard! You almost blasted a hole through my stomach. You only scratched me, but...... These are rose briars...... ......Briars...... .............. A thorny, dark place...... ............

name: Scarlet
line: Ohoho! I'll turn you into a skewer this time! << Volo Habere >> !

name: Cain
line: Owen, watch out......!

name: Narrator
line: (Footsteps) (Clash)

name: Cain
line: ......Are you okay, Owen!? What's wrong with you, spacing out like that!

name: Cain
line: Owen!? Did you get hit!? Pull yourself together!

name: Owen
line: ......Sir Knight......

name: Cain
line: ......That expression...... Don't tell me you're...... The injured Owen......!?

name: Owen
line: Sir Knight...... Where are we? I'm scared......

name: Cain
line: ......No way...... Not now...... Owen...... Owen! Can you come back? Please, Owen......

name: Owen
line: Come back? From where...... ?

name: Cain
line: I guess not, huh...... Um......

name: Scarlet
line: Ohoho! What a beautiful friendship you have, looking out for each other......!

name: Scarlet
line: Huh? You're plenty scary yourself!

name: Owen
line: ......She yelled at me...... Sir Knight......

name: Cain
line: Hang on a moment. Um...... Let's try to sort this out.

name: Owen
line: Let's sort it out......

name: Cain
line: Owen, you can't use magic, right?

name: Owen
line: Right......

name: Scarlet
line: Huh? What an outrageous falsehood! You just set those vicious howling dogs on me!

name: Cain
line: Stop, wait a second! It's complicated.

name: Scarlet
line: Well, if you say so...... I suppose I could take a break to enjoy some tea. Staying up late is terrible for my complexion, so I'll have some rosehip tea; it's wonderful for the skin. I wonder if I can find a tea set? Let me look around the castle........ My, what delightful tableware!

name: Cain
line: Owen. Listen closely. It's dangerous here.

name: Owen
line: It's dangerous......?

name: Cain
line: Yeah, you can tell by looking around, right? The castle is covered in briars, and the vines are wriggling around.

name: Owen
line: Wriggling around......

name: Cain
line: It's really painful when the briars hit you, and the thorns even make you bleed.

name: Owen
line: That's scary......

name: Cain
line: That's right, it's really scary. That's why you need to watch out for the briars, and find a place to wait for me over there.

name: Cain
line: I'll come back for you, believe me. I'll beat up the enemy, and then......

name: Owen
line: Don't leave me behind...... Don't leave me alone!

name: Cain
line: It'll be more dangerous if I take you with me.

name: Owen
line: No, I'm scared...... The briars are scary....... Sir Knight, don't go......

name: Cain
line: ......I have to go.

name: Owen
line: Why do you have to go? Why won't you stay with me?

name: Cain
line: There are people precious to me trapped in that castle.

name: Cain
line: They're probably in trouble; they can't leave because they're trapped by the magical briars. ......I want to save them no matter what. I don't need glory or medals. There are people waiting for me inside the castle - people who fill my heart with pride and light.

name: Owen
line: .....Do you want to save them?

name: Cain
line: That's right. You understand, don't you? Don't you feel bad for them, trapped inside that dark castle?

name: Owen
line: ............ ......But...... You don't feel bad for me?

name: Owen
line: I'm still trapped. Left behind, all alone. You're going to save them....... Even though you wouldn't save me?

name: Cain
line: ............? What are you talking about, Owen......

name: Narrator
line: (Growling)

name: Cain
line: ............!? Cerberus, where did y-......

name: Narrator
line: (Sickening crunch and spurt of blood)

name: Owen
line: I was a good boy. I waited obediently for so long. But you never came to save me.

name: Owen
line: Just die.

name: Scarlet
line: Fufu....... I had such a lovely teatime. ......Oh my. .....Dear me, did you have a disagreement? The white-haired man's three-headed dog is devouring the red-haired man. I guess the two of you didn't really get along. Even though your eyes are the same color.

name: Chloe
line: .....The vines are all over the place here too..... Ouch.... The thorns caught me again.

name: Rustica
line: Are you all right?

name: Chloe
line: Yeah. This is just a scratch, but.... There's no opening for us to get into the castle.

name: Rustica
line: You're right. The sky is covered in vines, too; I don't see any way out by flying.

name: Chloe
line: It was such a pretty castle, but now it's like a ghost...... ....We were supposed to have a special ceremony, too.... I wonder if they're going to blame us again? Is everyone going to say this was all the wizards' fault.....

name: Rustica
line: I'm not too sure about that. The people in the castle have all fallen asleep.

name: Chloe
line: ....It makes me sad..... I guess there really is no such thing as an outcast who becomes the hero of a story; that's just wishful thinking. No one ever loves an outcast; it doesn't matter if he does good things or bad things. He's still an outcast. Even if we do our best to save people tonight, tomorrow, the people we saved.... Might sigh, and say, this is why we can't trust wizards. ....What do you think, Rustica? Do you ever feel like that....? Am I thinking this way because I have an awful personality....?

name: Rustica
line: You're a kind, good boy.

name: Chloe
line: ....I don't know about that. Whenever these sorts of thoughts cross my mind, I can't bring myself to say, "Thank you."

name: Rustica
line: You don't have to.

name: Rustica
line: ....Oh my, the rain..... ........! << Amorest Viesse >>

name: Chloe
line: Woah....! You surprised me, tugging me close out of nowhere!

name: Rustica
line: Because the rain falling from the sky isn't any old rain. Look.

name: Chloe
line: Ah! You're right.... The bricks and briars are melting away.

name: Rustica
line: But this might be a blessed rainfall that gets us through this conundrum.

name: Rustica
line: Shall we practice magic?

name: Chloe
line: H-huh? Right now? I have such a laid-back master.....

name: Rustica
line: Right now is the time to practice. Look up to the sky, Chloe. What do you see?

name: Chloe
line: .....Um.... Dark clouds, and the heavy shadows of the briars.....

name: Rustica
line: The moon isn't very bright tonight, after all. But look closely.

name: Chloe
line: ....If only the < Great Catastrophe > shone a little brighter......

name: Rustica
line: That's right. It's what we all pray for on the darkest nights: "Let there be light." But Chloe, I know you can find the answer, even amidst the dim gloom. Even on nights where you can't say "thank you"; nights where you feel like a lost, unrewarded specter; nights where you might become a terrifying monster. For you are a wizard, after all.

name: Rustica
line: Listen to the wind and touch the shadows of the invisible - find the long-lost words of the past..... We are wizards. We dance and sing under the very light of the moon that humans fear, frolicking alongside everything in this world.

name: Rustica
line: Now open your eyes wide. Look into the dark night to find the wonderful things that make your heart dance - the things that give you courage.

name: Chloe
line: ........ -Ah! Murr! Shylock! Nero and Bradley are there too! Thank goodness! Everyone's all right....! They're zipping through the sky fighting a giant bird! Amazing....! Rustica, look! Our friends are fighting!

name: Rustica
line: That's right, Chloe.

name: Chloe
line: .....We need to do our best too! I feel like we can do this! Because..... We're wizards, after all! We can turn the worst into the best, and pull miracles out of the air!

name: Rustica
line: Of course.

name: Chloe
line: Ah....! When the briars over there melt, we can enter the castle from that window!

name: Rustica
line: Excellent! Once we manage to open up an entrance, let's get Cain and Owen.

name: Chloe
line: Yeah! Wait for us, Sir Sage! We'll save you!

name: Riquet
line: .....Heathcliff! Isn't that thing shining over there Shino's scythe!?

name: Heathcliff
line: You're right.... It's stuck in a tree trunk..... .....Shino.....! Where is Shino......!?

name: Narrator
line: (Roar)

name: Mitile
line: The bull-headed monster......! ......Ah......!

name: Riquet
line: No way.....! Is the bright red thing in the monster's arm.....!?

name: Heathcliff
line: Shino.....!! You bastard! How dare you......

name: Narrator
line: (Roar)

name: Heathcliff
line: << Repsevaivulp Sonus >> !

name: Mitile
line: Woah......! The garden hedges are stretching and clinging to the bull monster!

name: Riquet
line: Let's help him out! << Sunrotea.... >>

name: Viridian
line: Don't get in my way.

name: Viridian
line: Ah.... It's you from earlier......

name: Mitile
line: Mister Heathcliff! Riquet! Leave this girl to me and go help Mister Shino!

name: Heathcliff
line: Thanks, Mitile!

name: Riquet
line: Be careful! Mitile!

name: Mitile
line: I won't let you through! Are you a witch? Why are you doing such terrible things!? Bad wizards like you are the reason everyone has the wrong idea about all wizards!

name: Viridian
line: I'm not doing anything bad. I just want to meet Mother.

name: Viridian
line: And if you get in my way, I'll turn you to stone. << Volo Habere >>

name: Shino
line: (...My whole body hurts..... What's this smell....? It's the metallic scent of blood - and greenery....) (The scent of Sherwood Forest, protecting Blanchett Castle.... ....My dwelling.....)

name: Shino
line: (....No. What's with these leaves and branches growing from the monster's body....?)

name: Narrator
line: (Roar)

name: Shino
line: .......!! Cough, cough..... Dammit! Hurling me around like that......

name: Heathcliff
line: Shino......!

name: Shino
line: ........... .....Heath!? Why did you come back!? .....Stay away.....!

name: Shino
line: Hurry, run awa..... Agh......

name: Heathcliff
line: Look at you! You've lost too much blood! I'll lend you my shoulder......

name: Riquet
line: Heathcliff! I managed to bind the monster with branches from the courtyard, but it's going to rip through any moment now.....

name: Shino
line: .....Let me go. Where's my hunt?

name: Riquet
line: Hunt? Your scythe is in that tree.....

name: Shino
line: << MatztzÄh Sudipas >> ! Return to my hands!

name: Heathcliff
line: Stop using magic! You were on the brink of death!

name: Narrator
line: (Swish)

name: Shino
line: But I'm not dead. ....All right. I'm gonna finish it off. You guys should run.

name: Heathcliff
line: ......... I will really get mad.

name: Shino
line: And that's fine. I was so fortunate to meet you, Heath.

name: Shino
line: Run - and survive. I'm begging you.

name: Heathcliff
line: How could you say that!? I promised to protect you too! If I break my promise.....

name: Shino
line: You'll no longer be able to use magic. You can be a normal human.

name: Shino
line: ....Unlike me, you always wanted to be normal, right, Heath?

name: Riquet
line: Are you all right, Shino!? You can barely stand on your own......

name: Shino
line: ....Cough..... I'm fine. Riquet, it's probably that monster that even Oz had trouble defeating.....

name: Riquet
line: ....The Minotaur?

name: Shino
line: That's right. ....Cough. It won't fall, no matter how many times I strike.....

name: Heathcliff
line: .....We can beat it together!

name: Shino
line: You're so stubborn! I'm telling you to run! Riquet, take Heath and go!

name: Shino
line: I'm begging you!

name: Narrator
line: (Roar)

name: Heathcliff
line: ......! It broke through the binding....!

name: Riquet
line: ....! Mitile! I can hear Mitile.....!

name: Shino
line: Go! Heath.....!

name: Owen
line: ............ .......Tsk! My memory went black again...... Where's Sir Knight......?

name: Narrator
line: (Growling) (Spurting)

name: Owen
line: What's with you guys? What's that you're devouring-.... ............

name: Owen
line: ......Cain......! Move......! Open your mouths, you stupid dogs! << Cuare Morito >>! ......Hah...... Hah....... .......Cain...... ......Are you dead......?

name: Owen
line: ............ Ahaha...... Hey, how do you feel? I did this. I set Cerberus on you. Every last misfortune that befalls you is my doing....

name: Cain
line: ......It's not your fault......

name: Cain
line: It was me...... I made you angry...... I said thoughtless things....... To the little you......

name: Owen
line: ......The little me?

name: Cain
line: .......I'm cold...... ......This is bad....... I can't even see you now......

name: Owen
line: ......You can see me. Even without touching me.

name: Cain
line: .......hh, Please take care of......... Prince Arthur.........

name: Owen
line: Can you see me if I touch you? ......Here, I'm holding your hand, Sir Knight. Hey, are you listening? ....... Aren't you going to reply? .......Huh, how stupid. ............ .......Open your eyes! You can see me, right!? Cain! Cain......!

name: Rustica
line: Owen!

name: Owen
line: Why, you say? Haha....... My Cerberus bit him and chewed him up. I set him loose on him.

name: Chloe
line: B-but why would you do such a thing......

name: Owen
line: Who knows. Why should it matter? Shouldn't you hurry up and heal him? If you don't, he really might die. Not like I care anyway.

name: Chloe
line: Die.......!? ....... Rustica! Can you save Cain.........

name: Owen
line: Haha. Bye then.

name: Rustica
line: Unfortunately, I can't save him. The most I can do is stop the bleeding.

name: Rustica
line: The wounds on his abdomen are too severe. I think Sir Figaro is the only one who can heal him.

name: Owen
line: So you can't heal him?

name: Rustica
line: And you?

name: Owen
line: I can only fix my own body. I can die countless times, you see.

name: Rustica
line: Cain only has this one time.

name: Owen
line: I know that! What about magical sugar? Should we make him eat some?

name: Rustica
line: Let's stop the bleeding first. Else it might spill out from his stomach.

name: Owen
line: Hurry and do it.

name: Chloe
line: Is Figaro inside the castle? Owen, can you sense Figaro at all?

name: Owen
line: I don't know. .......I really don't know. I don't think he is. What if he isn't?

name: Rustica
line: Then we have no choice but to trust in Cain's fate.

name: Owen
line: ............ ........What's with that. It sounds stupid.

name: Scarlet
line: Ohoho! Oh my, looks like our party has grown! But no matter how many of you there are, it makes no difference!

name: Rustica
line: Oh, you're the lady from before......

name: Scarlet
line: << Volo Habere >>

name: Rustica
line: << Amorest Viesse >>

name: Scarlet
line: Dear me...... You're a formidable one. I've taken a liking to you.

name: Rustica
line: Looks like I'll need to entertain our guest for a short while. Chloe, can you take care of Cain?

name: Chloe
line: T... Take care of him? Can I....?

name: Rustica
line: I know you can, Chloe. Remember how you protected our Sage in the Lunar Eclipse Palace? You just need to do the same here. Right now, Cain's body is so tattered that it has weakened his soul as well. So stay by his side; if possible, touch his body as you pray.....

name: Scarlet
line: Ohohoho! Here I come!

name: Rustica
line: Pardon me. Would you mind waiting a moment?

name: Scarlet
line: Oh dear. I apologize for being so hasty. Do take your time.

name: Rustica
line: I apologize for making you wait. Thank you for your kindness.

name: Scarlet
line: You're very welcome.

name: Rustica
line: Chloe. Pray for Cain. Your feelings will take shape and give rise to wonderful magic.

name: Chloe
line: ...All right. I'll do my best.

name: Rustica
line: Yes. Owen, please take care of Chloe.

name: Owen
line: ....Ridiculous. Praying never helps. It won't reach him. He'll just die. I've never seen anyone survive after Cerberus tore them apart this badly.

name: Chloe
line: Then Cain will be the first.

name: Owen
line: ....What?

name: Chloe
line: It's my prayer. That's what it means to pray, right? I was always praying.

name: Owen
line: Haha. I bet it never reached anyone.

name: Chloe
line: It did.

name: Chloe
line: Rustica, watch out. D... Don't die, okay.

name: Rustica
line: I won't. I promise you, Chloe.

name: Rustica
line: Now then, young lady. Let me be your opponent.

name: Scarlet
line: All right; the pleasure is mine.

name: Rustica
line: << Amorest Viesse >>

name: Chloe
line: Don't die, Rustica..... .....Cain..... Cain, you can do it..... << Suispicibo Voitengok >>

name: Owen
line: ....Are you an idiot? Why are you crying? What are you doing? If you're worried about that gentleman, then you should say this: "Owen, go kill that girl." I'm a Northern wizard. I'm stronger than him. Why are you holding back and sobbing?

name: Owen
line: Or do you actually want that gentleman to die?

name: Chloe
line: ....Owen. If you decided that you wanted to go fight her, that would be fine. But I won't tell you to.

name: Owen
line: You coward.

name: Chloe
line: I'm worried about Rustica, but that doesn't mean I can just cast you away, Owen. .....You shouldn't think like that.

name: Owen
line: To top it off, you're a phony.

name: Chloe
line: That was my role in the family. It was fine if I got hurt. It was fine if I cried. It was fine if everyone laughed at me. Even if I died, nobody would mourn for me. Nobody would cry for me. I knew that, but I still tried to be loved. Because I knew what they would say to me if I wasn't loved. "Hey, can you do this? Huh, you might get hurt? So what?"

name: Chloe
line: .....Nobody in the world deserves that - being the person who's allowed to get hurt..... You don't want anyone to see you like that, right? Rustica was the one who taught me that nobody should be treated like that. That's why I won't tell you to go.... .....I'm worried about Rustica and Cain, but..... But I'm Rustica's apprentice.... Even if my magic is weak, I don't want my heart to fall to weakness too......

name: Chloe
line: Owen, where are you going!?

name: Owen
line: You wouldn't stop sobbing my ears off, so I'm gonna kill that woman for..... ....Huh. He doesn't even need my help.

name: Owen
line: You might not be able to see him, but Rustica is winning. Your master is plenty powerful.

name: Chloe
line: .....Rustica.....

name: Owen
line: ....Hey, let's do that thing. That stupid thing he was talking about, the thing that can protect Cain.

name: Chloe
line: Pray....?

name: Owen
line: ....Yeah. But I've never prayed before.

name: Chloe
line: I'll show you how. Let's do it together!

name: Akira
line: .....Talia, the witch who became a living castle..... Are you saying that's her, the castle?

name: Murr
line: Isn't it fascinating? I don't think many of us could come up with such an idea - "I want to become a castle."

name: Akira
line: Then.... Is your friend Miss Talia attacking everyone, Murr.....?

name: Murr
line: She's currently in a state of transfiguration, you see. Something very shocking happened to her, and she turned herself into a cursed, ancient castle.

name: Obsius
line: .....Stop spewing nonsense.....

name: Murr
line: It's the truth. And you should know better than anyone - for you are the one who killed Talia.

name: Akira
line: He killed Miss Talia....?

name: Akira
line: He killed Miss Talia....?

name: Obsius
line: I did not!

name: Murr
line: I can read the memories of objects, you see. And this old castle is speaking to me - its pillars and stairs are whispering to me.... Obsius decided for himself that Talia's assimilation with the castle was a curse and tragedy, and thus set fire to it.

name: Obsius
line: You're wrong! You're wrong! That's a falsehood!

name: Murr
line: Are you flying into hysterics just because I revealed the truth? What a boring man you are.

name: Obsius
line: It's all Talia's fault! You tricked her into uttering such nonsense....!

name: Murr
line: Who are you proffering your defense to? This isn't a court of law. Unless you want Sir Sage to administer a decision.

name: Akira
line: Huh, me?

name: Obsius
line: Silence....! If you hadn't showed up, I could've made Talia my wife....

name: Murr
line: Your honor! May I be heard?

name: Akira
line: Y-yes. Go on, Mr. Murr Hart.

name: Murr
line: Earlier, Defendant called her his wife; yet just now, he plainly stated, "I could have made her my wife."

name: Akira
line: Ah, you're right.... So you weren't married?

name: Obsius
line: Th-that's..... Why does that matter!? It's all the same! Stop nitpicking!

name: Murr
line: It's all the same? Then from this moment on, you are my wife.

name: Obsius
line: ....I will kill you!

name: Murr
line: Sir Sage, let me introduce you to my wife - my beloved Obsius. Go on now, bow to him.

name: Obsius
line: << Volo Habere >> !

name: Narrator
line: (Crash)

name: Narrator
line: Obsius utters his spell and Murr disappears like a fire extinguished by the wind.

name: Akira
line: .......! (What happened to Murr....!? Don't tell me he's dead!?) (Ah.... There's a shard of purple sapphire on the ground. ....Thank goodness....!)

name: Narrator
line: The briars have loosened around one of my arms. I discreetly wriggle my arm free and pick up the purple shard without Obsius noticing. His back trembles in fury.

name: Akira
line: (....If Murr's soul shard is shattered, Murr might not be able to return to his old self.)

name: Narrator
line: I slide the shard into my sleeve, and whisper to him in my heart.

name: Akira
line: (Murr.... Please stay still for a little while.)

name: Obsius
line: .....Hahaha...... What a mockery..... What a mockery! So that woman was laughing at me with this know-it-all professor the entire time! No matter how dearly I yearned, my feelings never reached her heart! It's fine. I knew all along. And that's why I am bringing her back to life, so we can start over again..... They say that if one offers the holy sacrifices to the Beast of the Sky, the Beast of the Seas, and the Beast of the Earth, even ghost ships and ghost castles will be brought back to life. I'm almost there. This time, everything will go the way I want it to.....

name: Akira
line: ....Go the way you want it to? You're bringing Talia back to life so that you can control her?

name: Narrator
line: Upon hearing my question, Obsius glares at me. Fearfully, I continue.

name: Akira
line: Talia is not your doll. Neither are the people in the castle - nor the wizards! We are not your convenient little dolls!

name: Obsius
line: You're nothing but a mannequin! You're a Sage in name only - you an outsider who has no place in this world!

name: Narrator
line: An outsider with no place in this world. Those lonely words cut deeply into my heart. But out of the corner of my eye, I catch sight of the wizards reflected beyond those unearthly flower-petal windows. A wave of intense sorrow and fervor wells up in me, threatening to overcome my heart. The people he derided as heretics - they are the ones who always gave me a place to belong. And not through grand feats of magic, but rather...... Like those moments when someone picks up something you left behind. Or when you cross shoulders with someone, and they turn around with a smile for you. They created a place for me through faint, gentle tokens of kindness and trust. And that is why I wish, with all my heart, to create a place where they too can breathe a little easier.

name: Akira
line: Obsius! Stop all this! Don't hurt them more than you already have!

name: Narrator
line: I open my mouth and shout at the top of my voice. Knowing very well that it might be a futile gesture against such a powerful opponent. But then...... A miracle occurs.

name: Akira
line: << Obsius! Stop all this at once! Don't hurt them more than you already have! >>

name: Nero
line: ......Mister Sage?

name: Shylock
line: I hear Sir Sage's voice......

name: Akira
line: << Don't hurt them more than you already have! >>

name: Oz
line: I did.

name: Chloe
line: Sir Sage......! I hear Sir Sage's voice!

name: Mithra
line: Oh? Is Sir Sage nearby? Did you summon him?

name: Figaro
line: I didn't, I didn't! It's coming! Look out......!

name: Narrator
line: (Roar)

name: Riquet
line: ......Sir Sage's voice...... Sir Sage, please save us!

name: Akira
line: ......Wh-...... I can hear everyone...... Did my voice reach them too......?

name: Obsius
line: What are you saying......?

name: Akira
line: Can everyone hear me!?

name: Narrator
line: I raise my voice once again. And I am flooded with simultaneous replies.

name: Arthur
line: << We can hear you! Sir Sage, are you all right!? Where are you now...... >>

name: Nero

name: Mithra

name: Akira
line: Ah, um, sorry. I know I'm asking a lot, but can you guys go one at a time......

name: Riquet
line: << Please save us, Sir Sage! Shino is going to die! >>

name: Viridian
line: << Volo Habere >>

name: Riquet
line: ............! << Sunrotea Edif >>! Hah...... Hah....... We're all almost at the end of our magic. Prince Arthur! Oz! Cain! Save us.......!

name: Narrator
line: Listening to Riquet's voice, I stare at the window reflecting scenes of the courtyard. A Minotaur backs Shino and Heathcliff into a corner, while a young witch chases down Mitile and Riquet. It looks like I'm the only one who can hear their voices. Any mistake in my judgement could lead to the worst possible outcome. I feel my stomach churning under the pressure, and sweat breaking out along my forehead. I can't panic now. Taking a deep breath, I glare at the windows made of flower petals.

name: Akira
line: This is a report to all! Shino and Heathcliff, as well as Riquet and Mitile are in the courtyard! They are facing the Minotaur and a young witch. Shino is seriously hurt. Heathcliff and Mitle are also both injured! Can anyone head to their rescue?

name: Arthur
line: Riquet......!

name: Faust
line: Shino is seriously hurt......!? Which direction is the courtyard?

name: Arthur
line: Right outside this window. ......We can't see it beyond these briars, but......

name: Lennox
line: Launching blind attacks from inside the castle might only hurt Mitile and the others. I'll escape from the window, and head to their rescue.....

name: Oz
line: That is impossible. The briars will attack you.

name: Mithra
line: I'll go.

name: Figaro
line: Please do. I'll cover for y......

name: Narrator
line: (Howling)

line: (Crash)

name: Narrator
line: (Underwater)

name: Mithra

name: Snow in the portrait

line: << Noscommia >>

name: Arthur

name: Nero
line: Mister Sage. We'll move into position right above the courtyard. I can't get a clear view of what's happening below the briars, but...... If there's anything shiny to use as a target, Brad can aim and shoot at it from above.

name: Akira
line: << Even against the Minotaur? >>

name: Bradley
line: Who do you think you're talking to? -That's what I wanna say, but I've never gone up against that beast before. I can't guarantee that I can take it down with one shot. But I'll load it with bullets until it goes down. That Central tiny's magic tool is a lantern, right?

name: Akira
line: << You mean Riquet. Yes, his magic tool is a lantern. >>

name: Bradley
line: Get him to shine it above that damn bull's head.

name: Akira
line: << Got it! I'll let him know. >>

name: Viridian
line: Be a good boy! Where are you going!? What is it about the castle windows....? There's nothing over there! Hey! Come back!

name: Riquet
line: The Minotaur is distracted..... Hurry, now's our chance! Let's hide in the shadows of the trees! Mitile, are you okay!?

name: Mitile
line: ......I'm okay..... Mister Heathcliff..... Take this......

name: Heathcliff
line: A magic vial.....?

name: Mitile
line: It's an herbal potion. Please use it on Mister Shino. Because his injuries are the worst.

name: Heathcliff
line: .....Thank you....! Shino, let's stop the bleeding while that beast is wandering off somewhere.....

name: Shino
line: Pant..... Hah...... .......Dammit!

name: Akira
line: << Riquet, can you hear me? >>

name: Riquet

name: Akira

name: Mitile
line: So Mister Bradley is going to save us! Sir Sage, is my brother doing all right....

name: Akira

line: What are you mumbling on about....!?

name: Akira
line: ....I'm just talking to myself!

name: Shylock
line: << Sir Sage, is someone with you? >>

name: Akira
line: Ah, um.... I'm with Obsius, the culprit behind all this madness.... ......!

name: Obsius
line: Silence!

name: Figaro
line: The culprit? You're with the culprit?

name: Nero
line: Why didn't you say so sooner!?

name: Arthur
line: Sir Sage, are you in danger!?

name: Akira
line: I'm fine! Don't worry abou.....

name: Obsius
line: I told you to be silent! If you speak again, I'll kill you!

name: Chloe
line: << Sir Sage! Where is Figaro!? >> << Cain's life is in danger! Rustica said that Figaro is the only one who can heal him..... >>

name: Chloe
line: << He's turning blue and his breath is growing faint! Please save Cain.....!! >>

name: Akira
line: ....Figaro! Please return to the castle. Cain is on the brink of death! Please, Figaro! Return to the castle!

name: Obsius
line: .....You spoke. After I warned you countless times.

name: Figaro
line: Cain is? That's terrible. All right. I'll head over right now! Also, just one word! I left the magic tools to seal the Leviathan in the main hall. There are a few ingredients missing, but if you communicate that to my apprentice, he'll know exactly what we need. Tell him to gather the necessary ingredients before I get there. And take care of yourself.

name: Akira
line: (He said one word, but that was really long.....) (I wonder if I can say all that in one breath. Also, like, am I gonna die....?) (.....Well, it is what it is!) ....Faust! The tools to seal the Leviathan are in the main hall of the castle! Please gather the missing ingredients and pass them on to Figaro....)

name: Obsius
line: << Volo Habere >> !

name: Narrator
line: (Clash)

name: Faust
line: .....Sage? Sage, are you all right....!?

name: Narrator
line: Black flames reach forward to consume my body. But a cape the color of the night sky flutters into their path, fending them off.

name: Murr
line: << Eanul Rambul >>

name: Akira
line: Murr....!

name: Narrator
line: Murr's soul shard, which has once again regained physical form, haughtily lifts the tip of his hat. He laughs, a mischievous sparkle in his narrowed eyes.

name: Murr
line: A bouquet for your courage!

name: Narrator
line: He snaps his fingers, and a small bouquet drops into my hands. He has to put on a show, even at a time like this. It makes me smile. With the bouquet in my arms, I take a deep breath and look straight at Obsius.

name: Obsius
line: .....I'll kill you....! Every last one of you, for making a mockery of me!

name: Narrator
line: I want to pounce on this man, after witnessing Shino covered in blood, after hearing Riquet's screams.... But I can't use magic; I know such actions would be futile. That's why I use my words. Because someone once told me: words, too, are magic. They too can be blessings or curses.

name: Akira
line: Please put an end to all this. Why are you doing such horrible things? I can never forgive you for hurting everyone! But..... If there is a way to realize your desires without hurting anyone - I'll do whatever I can to help you.

name: Obsius
line: ....My desires?

name: Murr
line: I'm shocked. You're quite the negotiator.

name: Akira
line: (I'm hopelessly powerless before wizards. They might even be able to read my heart with magic.) (All I can do is flail about frankly, like a fish on a chopping board.) My wish... Is for you to call back those magical beasts, and return the castle to normal. What is your wish? It's to meet Miss Talia again, right....?

name: Obsius
line: I don't care anymore! I don't care about that woman.....!

name: Akira
line: ..... I get it - it's difficult to harbor unrequited feelings. And it requires a lot of courage to ask important questions.... You don't want to hurt others, and you don't want to get hurt either. I think you and Talia - made many mistakes. You might have done something terrible.... But you did it all because you wanted to start over again, right?

name: Obsius
line: ............. Talia is dead. There's no starting over. This is the only way forward. Beasts - now is the time for us to fulfill our contract! << Volo Habere >> !

name: Akira
line: .......!? The castle is shaking.....!?

name: Murr
line: That's the end of our negotiations. The holy sacrifices have been offered to the beasts.

name: Akira
line: Holy sacrifices....?

name: Murr
line: His daughters.

name: Obsius
line: Silence, lunatic scholar!! This is all your fault!! << Volo Habere >> !

name: Narrator
line: (Crash)

name: Akira
line: Murr.....!

name: Narrator
line: Black flames emerge from Obsius's puppet. Murr once again turns into a purple stone and rolls towards my feet. I pick him up in a hurry. But the moment I raise my head, I turn pale. Because Obsius has blown black flames my way.

name: Narrator
line: The dark fire strokes my cheeks and slides into my mouth. It doesn't feel hot. Instead, my throat is overwhelmed with a disgusting, grainy sensation, as if I've just swallowed smoke. I open my mouth while coughing. But no words come out. He stole my voice.

name: Obsius
line: Haha! You can no longer mumble to yourself! Now stand there and witness this scene of destruction.....!

name: Narrator
line: I glare at him, holding my neck with one hand while gripping the purple shard in my other. The strange petal-shaped windows reflect the girls who have been cornered into ruination.

name: Nero
line: ............!? What happened!? Why did it suddenly change direction......!?

name: Nero
line: Cyan! Watch out! It's aiming for you! Get out of the way......!

name: Nero
line: Hold it, you damn bird......! (Boom) .........Guh, it shook me off......!

name: Murr
line: << Eanul Ranbul >>!

name: Shylock
line: << Invibelle >>

name: Nero
line: ......That was close! Thanks! Murr, Shylock!

name: Shylock
line: Not at all. Now where is she....... .............! Watch out!

name: Cyan
line: ......hh, come to me.

name: Nero
line: ......Cyan!? Why aren't you running!?

name: Cyan
line: ......He won't attack me.

name: Nero
line: Cyan!

name: Cyan
line: It'll be okay. Because I have the umbrella of luck......

name: Heathcliff
line: ....I'll draw in the Minotaur! Riquet, prepare your lantern!

name: Riquet
line: Yes!

name: Shino
line: Stop messing around....! I'll..... ......!

name: Narrator
line: (Roar)

name: Heathcliff
line: << Repsevaivulp Sonus >> !

name: Shino

line: ............ << Satillquinart Mullcreed >>

name: Arthur
line: Faust!?

name: Aureolin

name: Faust

line: .......Can't we save her?

name: Snow in the portrait
line: Save her? Earth to earth, ashes to ashes - that's all this is.

name: White in the portrait
line: The Leviathan's strength will only grow after consuming that girl. That is what we should worry about.

name: Figaro
line: You two are as unfeeling as ever.

name: Snow in the portrait
line: Still, our encounter must have been the hand of fate at work. Violet. I will listen to any last words you have.

name: Violet
line: .......I remember now, just a little...... I was a Northern witch.......

name: Snow in the portrait
line: How pitiful - you were killed by Obsius so he could use your mana stone. Shall I take revenge on your behalf?

name: Violet
line: ......A Northern witch would never ask anyone to avenge her.

name: Snow in the portrait
line: Forgive me, prideful witch. It is fitting that you die all alone.

name: Narrator
line: (Sound of snapping twigs)

name: Figaro
line: Oh dear, the poor thing...... Mithra. Open the door in space for me. Leave Cain and Mitile to me.

name: Mithra
line: Isn't it faster for me to go?

name: Figaro
line: If Mitile is in a critical condition, you wouldn't be able to heal him.

name: Figaro
line: Don't make me say it, Mithra. Only you or Oz can defeat the Leviathan, the demon of the seas. I'm counting on you.

name: Mithra
line: Fine.

name: Figaro
line: They should be preparing the tools to seal away the Leviathan. It might take a little more time to gather everything. Once the door is open, I'll leave the tools with you, and then Rutile and I will make for the castle.

name: Mithra
line: You're taking Rutile with you?

name: Figaro
line: We don't know how many people are in critical condition. I need an extra hand.

name: Rutile
line: Don't worry, Mister Mithra! Mitile and I will be all right. We won't leave you behind.

name: Mithra
line: Huh? It's not like I'm that worried about you. I'm just concerned for my magic.

name: Rutile
line: I-I'm aware of that, but.......

name: Mithra
line: ............ Rutile. Please stay safe.

name: Rutile
line: Yes!

name: Snow in the portrait
line: Figaro dear, you too.......

name: White in the portrait
line: Stay safe, okay?

name: Figaro
line: You make it sound like an afterthought. Geez.......

name: Scarlet
line: Lalala~. Lala~...... Ah...... Ah, ah......

name: Rustica
line: Your singing voice is lovely. Please, do carry on.

name: Narrator
line: (Sound of twigs snapping)

name: Rustica
line: Good night, wonderful lady. Sweet dreams...... ............

name: Chloe
line: ....Rustica! Are you okay!? What happened to the lady!?

name: Rustica
line: She was absorbed by the castle.

name: Chloe
line: By the castle....!?

name: Rustica
line: I cast a spell of sweet dreams so that she would not feel pain in her final moments. She sang me a beautiful song.

name: Chloe
line: .....I see..... I can't believe she was absorbed by the castle.....

name: Rustica
line: Is Cain all right?

name: Chloe
line: .....I can't say he is. We need to get him to Figaro right away.... But Owen is looking after him.

name: Rustica
line: I see.

name: Chloe
line: Hey, Rustica. Owen said that Cerberus tore Cain apart, right? But I think he's lying. ....Or, more like, I don't think he did it on purpose.....

name: Rustica
line: Why do you say so?

name: Chloe
line: .....I don't know how to explain it, but..... He's earnestly praying for Cain. ....I think.

name: Owen
line: Hey.

name: Chloe
line: Woah, you surprised me.

name: Owen
line: So Rustica is back? You should've told me right away. Did you finish off that woman?

name: Rustica
line: We said goodbye. Chloe and I found an entryway to the castle earlier. The briars had melted from the mysterious acid rain. Sir Figaro might be inside the castle. Let's take Cain to him. Owen, could you help us out?

name: Owen
line: Fine. I will.

name: Narrator
line: (Cawing, sound of twigs crunching)

name: Murr
line: She got eaten by the Basilisk!

name: Shylock
line: Her limbs...... They're transforming into wood, like a puppet......

name: Bradley
line: I told you that girl wasn't real flesh and blood. She's just a well-made puppet. Her mana stone got busted into pieces...... It came from an Eastern witch, huh. I can smell Oz's blood mixed up in it too. And now it's all in that bird's stomach. This is some real powerful magic......

name: Shylock
line: ......Did the Basilisk grow stronger after eating her......?

name: Murr
line: It grew even bigger!

name: Nero
line: ........... You're fucking kidding me....... Brad!

name: Bradley
line: Yeah!

name: Nero
line: I'll bring down that bird! Give me your best shot!

name: Bradley
line: I got you. Get out there and kill it! << Adnopotensum >>

name: Shylock
line: ......Bradley's rifle transformed into a pistol......

name: Murr
line: It's Bradley's speciality - reinforcement magic! Wow, I've never witnessed this move at its ultimate stage!

name: Shylock
line: Shooting someone in the chest at close range like that...... Requires an incredible amount of trust.

name: Narrator
line: (Pistol cocking)

name: Bradley
line: Let's do this, Nero!

name: Nero
line: All right!

name: Bradley
line: << Adnopotensum >>!

name: Narrator
line: One by one, the girls transform back into puppets and scatter into pieces...... Amidst those sorrowful scenes, I catch sight of Nero, fury stark on his face. With the full impact from Bradley's bullet, Nero is faster than any beast or bird.

name: Narrator
line: Like a fish swimming through the dark night, he gives chase to the Basilisk, now even larger.

name: Nero
line: << Adnodus Omnis >>!

name: Narrator
line: As Nero chants his spell, his magical cutlery circles him, like servants standing to his will. With a snap of his fingers, he sends an army of countless forks raining down towards the Basilisk. The enlarged Basilisk spreads its powerful wings and flaps furiously.

name: Narrator
line: (Gate of Babylon sounds)

name: Narrator
line: Violent winds from the Basilisk's wings blow the rain of forks off course and throw Nero off balance. Regardless, Nero rights himself and gives chase to the fleeing Basilisk, his flight path a plunging downwards descent. Wizards riding their broomsticks materialize on both sides of Nero. Murr and Shylock. In true Western fashion, they soar through the sky with smiles on their faces, even on a night like this. They can find joy in anything - terror, sorrow, or even loss. So that they can love themselves tomorrow.

name: Shylock
line: That flapping is quite a nuisance. It makes it difficult to get close. Let us rob it of its balance.

name: Murr
line: I'll make it dizzy!

name: Nero
line: I'll close in and finish it off. Leave it to me. I'm used to dressing chicken.

name: Narrator
line: Smiling, Shylock hands something to Nero. -A pale blue umbrella.

name: Shylock
line: This fell from the girl's hands before she turned to wood. I recall seeing it before.

name: Shylock
line: It's time to settle your score, Nero.

name: Narrator
line: Nero silently accepts the pale blue umbrella from Shylock's hands. The lone umbrella linking Shylock and Nero's outstretched hands almost looks like a bridge suspended across the night sky. Murr flies through the pale blue arch, whizzing by like a shooting star.

name: Murr
line: Here I go~! << Eanul Rambul >>!

name: Narrator
line: Brilliant fireworks explode and bloom across the overcast night sky, filling it with cheerful noise. Boom! Boom! The fireworks resound like the beating heart of the castle trapped behind briars. "I'm still alive." "I haven't given up yet."

name: Faust
line: .....I can't hear the Sage's voice anymore. Lennox! Have you spotted Figaro's belongings?

name: Lennox
line: They're right this way......

name: Narrator
line: (Rustle) (Thump)

name: Lennox
line: .........! Please be careful. There are more briars than before.

name: Oz
line: The sacrificial doll must have strengthened its powers.

name: Lennox
line: I believe so. Here are Sir Figaro's belongings.

name: Faust
line: Thank you. Apparently this is what he needs to seal the Leviathan. Though there are some ingredients missing.....

name: Arthur
line: Missing ingredients.... Let us see what we have first. A strangely-scented oil, a blue pearl, blackened bones....

name: Oz
line: Arthur. Don't touch these items so carelessly.

name: Arthur
line: Ah.... I apologize.

name: Faust
line: Let me do it instead. Commanding oil, a pearl from the Ocean of Stars, the fang of a Moonlit Bat..... And a needle used to sew burial clothes, a silk thread dyed with the blood of a chick.... You shouldn't touch these.

name: Arthur
line: All right. Is there anything missing?

name: Faust
line: We need a medium to serve as the keystone. Either the shard of a star, or the relic of a hero.....

name: Arthur
line: We keep the sacred sword, Caletvwlch, in the castle treasury. It's a relic of our first king Alec - the hero who founded this country.

name: Faust
line: .....The sacred sword Caletvwlch should be more than enough for the job.

name: Arthur
line: I'll retrieve it right away.

name: Oz
line: But first, the Sage. Faust, you located the Sage, did you not?

name: Lennox
line: You found Sir Sage?

name: Faust
line: So you noticed. I haven't been able to narrow down his exact whereabouts, but.... The moment before the Sage's voice cut out, I felt our realms connect. I might be able to pinpoint his location.

name: Arthur
line: Is that true!? Then can we count on you to do that, Faust? Sir Sage mentioned that the mastermind was nearby. I want to save him as soon as possible.

name: Faust
line: I will try. Can I ask you to handle the sacred sword, Caletvwlch?

name: Arthur
line: Please leave it to m.... << Pernoctant Nixzo >> !

name: Faust
line: The attacks are becoming even more vicious.... Will you really be all right, Arthur?

name: Arthur
line: Yes.

name: Oz
line: .....I will go with him. Lennox. Detection magic requires full concentration of the mind. Protect Faust.

name: Lennox
line: With my life.

name: Arthur
line: We're off!

name: Faust
line: ....Wait, Arthur! Oz cannot use magic. Don't be reckless!

name: Arthur
line: All right!

name: Faust
line: Promise me you won't!

name: Arthur
line: I am a wizard. I do not make promises. But I will return! Do not worry about me! Let us go, Sir Oz.

name: Oz
line: Yes.

name: Faust
line: .......... .......He is his very image.

name: Lennox
line: Indeed.

name: Faust
line: Lennox. I am going to search for the Sage. I leave my back to you.

name: Lennox
line: Yes, Sir.

name: Lennox
line: What is the matter?

name: Faust
line: I'm regretting my own words. I keep insisting that our relationship has been left in the past, yet.... (.....I am involuntarily relying on him the way I used to.) (At this rate, I can never set Lennox free from the barren future of my life....)

name: Lennox
line: Sir Faust.

name: Faust
line: What.

name: Lennox
line: I am happy.

name: Lennox
line: Please focus on your task. I will protect you at any cost.

name: Narrator
line: Skillfully handling his cutlery, Nero closes in on the Basilisk. The Basilisk rears up and unfurls its wings, ready to blow him away. But Shylock takes the moment to blow a trail of smoke from his pipe towards the Basilisk.

name: Shylock
line: << Invibelle >>

name: Narrator
line: Enveloped in a cloud of smoke, the Basilisk veers unsteadily in its flight path. Shylock approaches the Basilisk, night wind whipping around him like a cape. With a light gesture, he tucks his magic pipe into his hair and reaches out with slender fingers, caressing the wind. A faint glow gathers at the tips of his fingers. Just as it coalesces into small beads of light, I muffle a scream. Because Shylock is about to charge straight into the Basilisk's gaping beak.

name: Akira
line: (Watch out......!)

name: Narrator
line: But the next instant, Shylock gracefully somersaults through the air. An exquisite full rotation, as bold, artistic, and bewitching as a performance by a circus trapeze artist. The blue night seems to freeze, suspended in time. The glittering golden moon, the Basilisk with its wings unfurled - every being held in thrall by the beautiful loop he draws in the sky. Shylock hangs upside-down in the air, an alluring, temptation-laden smile spreading across his face. He parts his lips and clicks his tongue, as if humoring the Basilisk, frozen with its beak wide open.

name: Shylock
line: Tsk tsk tsk.

name: Narrator
line: The Basilisk gawks at Shylock, spellbound. Shylock languidly slips the bewitching beads of light gathered at his fingertips into the Basilisk's beak before elegantly flying away. The Basilisk's gaze trails after Shylock as it very nearly plummets to the ground. Swaying from side to side, it flails like a drunkard. On his broom, Shylock turns around, freeing the pipe from the back of his head and placing it in his mouth. He narrows his eyes with a playful smile.

name: Shylock
line: How adorable.

name: Narrator
line: The Basilisk spreads its wings and contorts its body like it's shaking off a drunken stupor. Nero, lying in wait for an opening, raises his right hand above his head.

name: Nero
line: << Adnodus Omnis >>!

name: Narrator
line: In the blink of an eye, a towering knife, huge as a lance, appears in his right hand. Without hesitation, Nero drives his gigantic knife into the joint of the Basilisk's wing. A shower of fresh blood spurts all over Nero. The Basilisk shrieks and throws its head back. Writhing in agony and thrashing wildly, the snake on the Basilisk's tail raises its head. It bares its sharp fangs, poised to spit poison at Nero, when......

name: Nero
line: .......Eat that yourself!

name: Narrator
line: Nero sends the snake flying with a roundhouse kick. The kick seals the snake's mouth shut and obliterates its chance to spit its poison. Nero stabs his fork into the snake, skewering it from head to jaw. With blood spraying everywhere, the three cutlery weapons dislodge themselves and return obediently to Nero's side. Standing on his broom and looking down on the Basilisk with a cold, imperious gaze, Nero lowers both his arms. His eyes say it all: he knows he won the fight.

name: Nero
line: << Adnodus Omnis >>

name: Narrator
line: The Basilisk raises its voice, a final dying cry. As countless feathers flutter and dance in the air.

name: Shylock
line: Magnificent. All that's left is for us to pray that Bradley's attack will succeed.

name: Nero
line: ......Yeah. Brad, you ready to fire!?

name: Bradley
line: I'm ready anytime.

name: Nero
line: ......Riquet, Shino, wait for us. We're coming to save you right now.

name: Narrator
line: Mitile, who just witnessed a young girl transform to wood before his eyes, huddles on the ground crying. But he's not just crying. He's glaring at the Minotaur with fury in his eyes as he prepares Riquet's lantern. Riquet stands by his side, his fingers interlocked as he offers a quiet prayer.

name: Riquet
line: ...I pray that her tender soul shall be guided to God's restful Eden. And that Mitile and I... and Bradley, while we're at it.... Will enact God's divine punishment upon that terrible monster.

name: Mitile
line: .....All right. I've equipped your lantern with the comet tears, Riquet.

name: Riquet
line: Thank you, Mitile.

name: Narrator
line: The lantern unleashes beautiful beams of light that quietly spread across the courtyard. Like petals gently blooming amidst a dark forest labyrinth. Riquet and Mitile face each other at the core of that warm flower of light. They gaze at each other with serious expressions - while holding hands in innocent prayer. Behind them, a terrifying monster of immense stature runs rampant as its shadow criss-crosses with those of two boys.

name: Riquet
line: Please do me a favor: don't let go of my hand.

name: Mitile
line: ....When we're raising the lantern above the Minotaur's head?

name: Riquet
line: Yes. I'm worried - I'm scared that I'll mess up. Sir Sage said that Cain was on the brink of death... Shino and Heathcliff are also in critical condition..... If I mess up..... We might lose someone. .....I'm so scared......

name: Narrator
line: Riquet's face looks like it's about to twist into tears. He rubs his eyes with his fingertips, still interlocked with Mitile's. Mitile looks surprised - maybe his fingers touched Riquet's tears.

name: Riquet
line: ....I want Nero or Oz by my side right now. But they're not here. So please, please hold my hand. .....Mitile, will you laugh at my weakness?

name: Narrator
line: Mitile solemnly shakes his head and grips Riquet's hands even tighter.

name: Mitile
line: I won't laugh. My brother told me that we use magic with our hearts. I will be your heart's anchor, Riquet. I'll make your heart stronger. It's all right... We will succeed! Riquet, you've been practicing so hard. So even if they're not here..... You remember all sorts of things Sir Oz and Mister Nero taught you, right?

name: Narrator
line: Riquet nods as tears spill down his cheeks. Mitile keeps talking through his own tears, as if trying to comfort himself too.

name: Mitile
line: I remember everything that my brother, Dr. Figaro, and Mister Leno taught me too.... So let's do this! I'm sure we can!

name: Narrator
line: They take each other's hands and stand up with determination in their eyes. And when they do, Riquet's lantern begins to spin. The dark labyrinth becomes a merry-go-round of blessings, bringing courage to their young hearts. They rush forward, heading straight for the Minotaur. Shino and Heathcliff, who were fighting the Minotaur, can barely stand. I can't tell if the stains all over their bodies come from blood or dirt or the darkness of the night. Yet Shino still turns around to look at Mitile with a smile.

name: Shino
line: ....Your potion really saved me, Mitile.

name: Narrator
line: Mitile smiles faintly too. Heathcliff rubs the blood off his cheeks and gives orders like a commanding officer.

name: Heathcliff
line: Shino and I will do everything we can to stop the Minotaur in its tracks. So make that lantern shine as bright as you can - Bradley will need it to take aim.

name: Mitile
line: All right.

name: Heathcliff
line: Bradley may be an excellent hunter, but we still need to watch for stray bullets.

name: Riquet
line: Yes.

name: Heathcliff
line: ....All right, let's begin. Shino, are you okay?

name: Shino
line: Of course I'm ready. ....Leave it to me.

name: Narrator
line: Heathcliff gazes at Shino worriedly. But he takes a deep breath without a word.

name: Heathcliff
line: Then let's begin.

name: Shino
line: << MatztzÄh Sudipas >> !

name: Narrator
line: I don't know how he has the strength remaining in his body, but Shino kicks the ground and breaks into a run. He scythe cuts through the air as he leaps into the sky. The pointed blade reflects a silver light, ready to hunt the moon out of the night sky.

name: Heathcliff
line: << Repsevaivulp Sonus >>

name: Narrator
line: Under Shino's flying shadow, Heathcliff grips his pocket watch with both hands. He may be gentle, sensitive, and timid, but fear has no place in Heathcliff's eyes now. He is focused on the mission before him, like the hands of a watch steadily marking the passage of time. Because he is the only one who can save his friend.

name: Narrator
line: (Clash) (Roar)

name: Narrator
line: Struck by Shino's scythe, the Minotaur topples into the branches of the courtyard that begin to wrap around its limbs. Shino slices at the beast's legs.

name: Narrator
line: (Roar)

name: Narrator
line: His blade gouges into the Minotaur's joints, and it unleashes a howl as it falls to its knees. Shino spins around and yells.

name: Shino
line: Now's your chance....! Riquet! Mitile!

name: Riquet
line: -Yes! << Sunrotea Edif >> !

name: Mitile
line: << Ortonik Sealsispilce >> !

name: Narrator
line: Riquet grips Mitile's hand as he raises the lantern into the air. As the lantern ascends higher and higher, the area surrounding the Minotaur grows bright as day. It slowly makes its way directly above the Minotaur's head - and upon reaching its destination, unleashes an even brighter light. An outpouring of intense golden rays that slice through the depths of any darkness.

name: Riquet
line: Is this the power of the comet tears....?

name: Murr
line: I see it!

name: Nero
line: It's Riquet's lantern! Brad!

name: Bradley
line: Got it! Leave it to me! There's no wind ....... We kept you waiting, Eastern, Western, Southern, Northern and Central tinies. Bradley the Great will take down that damn bull.

name: Murr
line: Is there a Northern tiny?

name: Shylock
line: I don't think the Western one is there either, but....... Please take care of them, Bradley.

name: Nero
line: We're counting on you, Brad. Those kids' lives are on the line.

name: Bradley
line: Don't worry. I've got this. Here we go! << Adnopo- >> ......hh, A...... Ah.......

name: Bradley
line: Achoo!

name: Murr
line: He disappeared!

name: Nero
line: You can't be serious!?

name: Murr
line: He sneezed off somewhere!

name: Shylock
line: W-why now......

name: Murr
line: It's Bradley's injury from the < Great Catastrophe >! He flies off somewhere every time he sneezes!

name: Nero
line: It didn't have to be now!? Hey, what are we gonna do!?

name: Shylock
line: What should we do......

name: Murr
line: Chaos! Chaos!!

name: Nero
line: Where the hell did you go, Brad!?

name: Riquet
line: ......... (The lantern is shining! We're ready anytime, Bradley!)

name: Mitile
line: ........... (The enemy will start swinging at us any moment now....! Please shoot, Mister Bradley....!)

name: Riquet
line: He's not shooting.....

name: Mitile
line: Mister Bradley!?

name: Narrator
line: (Boom) (Roar)

name: Heathcliff
line: .....We can't hold it back any longer......

name: Shino
line: ....You two! Run!

name: Mitile
line: Mister Shino!

name: Shino
line: Get out of here while I distract the beast....! You too, Heath!

name: Heathcliff
line: I won't.....!

name: Shino
line: Don't be stubborn! You're a scaredy-cat.....!

name: Heathcliff
line: You're right, I am a scaredy-cat! I'm terrified of you dying!

name: Narrator
line: (Roar)

name: Heathcliff
line: ....It broke through the binding....!

name: Shino
line: It's coming! Run.....!

name: Narrator
line: Arthur and Oz head towards the castle treasury to retrieve the treasured sword Caletvwlch. But the attacking briars obstruct the path, preventing their advance.

name: Arthur
line: << Pernoctant Nixzo >>! ......Hah.......

name: Oz
line: You are running out of magic. In time, your heart will still, and your senses will grow dull.

name: Arthur
line: ......I'm fine....... We have to reach the treasury.

name: Oz
line: ............ How worthless I've become. I never thought I would be this powerless without magic......

name: Arthur
line: That is simply not true! Your sword skills are improving. And you saved me back there.

name: Oz
line: It was my first time launching a physical attack.

name: Arthur
line: I will break through these briars and clear a path towards the castle treasury. Let us go.

name: Oz
line: Wait. The air of hostility pervading the castle is escalating.

name: Arthur
line: I told Faust that we were going to return with Caletvwlch. Sir Figaro must also be fighting somewhere. Cain, too...... Riquet....... And Shino and the others...... If I can save them, I fear nothing that comes my way.

name: Narrator
line: Oz gazes upon the resolute set of Arthur's face, his own expression pained. At that moment, the briars once again surround and trap them.

name: Arthur
line: << Pernoctant Nixzo >>! Ah......!?

name: Narrator
line: Arthur tries to drive back the briars, but they twine themselves around his arm - perhaps his magic is flagging from sheer fatigue. The briars also latch onto Oz's arm and entangle the length of it, along with the sword in his hand as he tries to help Arthur.

name: Arthur
line: .............!? Sir Oz, look at this!

name: Arthur
line: Look at the briars that touched your blood! They've swelled to twice the size, and they're moving more animatedly than the other vines!

name: Narrator
line: Oz's breath catches in his throat as he looks up at the briars advancing relentlessly. He hangs his head, chagrined.

name: Oz
line: ......If only I had realized earlier...... I could have transferred some to Faust and Lennox.......

name: Arthur
line: Sir Oz......?

name: Oz
line: I apologize, Arthur. I have never attempted something like this before...... The thought never even occurred to me. Can you hold out your hand?

name: Arthur
line: ......Yes......! Can you reach me?

name: Oz
line: This is more than enough.

name: Narrator
line: Oz grabs Arthur's hand. He takes the hand emblazoned with the lily crest and flips it over, spreading his fingers over Arthur's palm. With the blood dripping from the briars wrapped around his wrist, he draws a magic circle.

name: Oz
line: I will grant you my magic, using my blood as a medium.

name: Arthur
line: Sir Oz's magic......

name: Narrator
line: Arthur gazes at the magic circle drawn in blood, the curiosity on his boyish face marred by the slightest trace of fear. Slowly, the mystical lines of the magic circle start to glow with a faint, red light.

name: Oz
line: Listen to me, Arthur. I will fall asleep once I finish chanting my spell. You do not need to reach the castle treasury. Summon Caletvwlch to your hand.

name: Arthur
line: Summon Caletvwlch...... Do you think I can do it?

name: Narrator
line: Smiling, Oz nods.

name: Oz
line: I know you can. Believe me, Arthur. You are the child who has inherited the blood of heroes. You defied fate and survived the blizzards of the north. There is nothing that will stand in your way.

name: Narrator
line: Arthur's blue eyes blaze with strong conviction.

name: Arthur
line: I understand.

name: Oz
line: << Vox Nox >>

name: Narrator
line: Oz chants his spell. He tightens his grip on the briars, resisting the sleepiness that overcomes him, but before long his head droops. In return, a red light envelops Arthur's palm - at once ominous, powerful, and beautiful. A gentle breeze stirs and ruffles Arthur's bangs, before escalating into the dreadful awe of a tempest. Arthur calmly takes in his surroundings, a storm brewing in the palm of his hand. The briars fall back, as if shrinking from the sight of his silver hair and his fingertips. Taking a deep breath, Arthur makes his declamation in a ringing voice.

name: Arthur
line: Oh, treasured sword Caletvwlch! Come to me! << Pernoctant Nixzo >>!

name: Narrator
line: With a thunderous roar, the wind swells into a whirling vortex, and a dazzling light envelops Arthur's body. A ray of pure-white light appears out of nowhere, standing before Arthur like a human silhouette. And transforms into a sword. Arthur stretches out his hand - still glowing crimson with Oz's magic circle - and reaches for the sword of light which has materialized before him. The legendary sword which Alec Granvelle, the founding hero and the first king of Central Country, wielded...... Caletvwlch.

name: Arthur
line: I did it! Let's go, Caletvwlch!

name: Narrator
line: Arthur draws the sword from its sheath, calling its name like he would a comrade in arms. He slashes downward, cutting through the briars tangled around a sleeping Oz.

name: Arthur
line: << Pernoctant Nixzo >>!

name: Narrator
line: With the force of a gale, his strike clears a straight line through the castle's long hallway. -Like a relentless, divine bolt of lightning.

name: Narrator
line: Blood and sweat dripping from his cheeks, Lennox's footfalls pound against the ground as he launches into a swinging kick aimed at the briars whipping around him.

name: Narrator
line: He resumes running, slicing the writhing briars in another corner of the room with his sword; then, he leaps back once more. The shepherd's usual tranquility is nowhere to be seen. With shocking agility for his height, Lennox switches between attack and defense with precision. He has the calm yet passionate eyes of a warrior. He dodges the briars as if following orders, without uttering a single word when they splice through his skin. Because Faust stands behind him, focused on his spell. Faust faces the wall with his back to Lennox, his eyes closed. Not a single drop of blood has tainted Faust's pure white outfit.
