He is close enough to hear Lennox's rapid breathing as he drips with blood and sweat, but he does not budge: his back remains still and upright. Because that is their form of trust: they understand their roles.

name: Narrator
line: Lennox arches his body and dodges the briars as he grips his magic tool - and ancient key - in his hand. Even if what stood behind them were the hill of execution; even if the attacking rose briars were flames threatening to engulf a sinner.... Lennox would have protected him. No matter how many thousands of years it took.

name: Narrator
line: Lennox's eyes shine with might, but as the battle wears on, his body begins to show signs of exhaustion. And that's when Faust raises his voice.

name: Faust
line: ....I found him!

name: Narrator
line: Faust spins around and swallows his breath at the sight of Lennox's body covered in injuries. He takes a step to rush to his side and support him. Lennox shakes his head and steps back, but wobbles and turns his face downward. His glasses hit the floor as the briars reach for his body. Faust chants his spell.

name: Faust
line: << Satillquinart Mullcreed >>

name: Narrator
line: The briars retreat, repelled by an unseen barrier. Faust retrieves Lennox's glasses using magic, then places them back on his face.

name: Lennox
line: ......Ah.... Hah..... I apologize......

name: Faust
line: Stay still.

name: Lennox
line: Is Sir Sage.....

name: Faust
line: He's all right. We're going to save him. But I need to cast healing magic on you first.

name: Lennox
line: ....Hah...... I think you should save your magic. I hear that many of us are wounded.

name: Faust
line: And you are one of them.

name: Lennox
line: .....!? What's this sound!?

name: Faust
line: It's not the enemy. Is this Oz....? Or Arthur?

name: Narrator
line: (Footsteps)

name: Arthur
line: Faust! Lennox! I have the sword!

name: Faust
line: Arthur. Oz.

name: Arthur
line: The sacred sword, Caletvwlch!

name: Mithra
line: << Arthim >>

name: Lennox
line: The door of space.....!

name: Oz
line: Mithra....!

name: Mithra
line: I don't have time! Give me everything I need!

name: Faust
line: ....Got it!

name: Narrator
line: (Roar) (Woosh)

name: Figaro
line: Where are the injured?

name: Lennox
line: They haven't arrived yet.

name: Rutile
line: Mister Leno! Are you okay!?

name: Faust
line: Arthur! Hand him the sacred sword, Caletvwlch!

name: Arthur
line: If Sir Figaro is going to remain here, then you will need reinforcements on your end. I'll head to the seas!

name: Oz
line: Arthur!?

name: Arthur
line: I will be fine - I have the powers you granted me, Sir Oz! Sir Figaro, please take care of Cain!

name: Figaro
line: Hold up, Arthur! Show me your face. Come here. I pray for your safety too.

name: Arthur
line: ....Yes! I wish you the same, Sir Figaro!

name: Mithra
line: I don't have time for hugs right now!

name: Figaro
line: I'm just standing in for Oz - doing what he can't! Alright, Rutile, let's go!

name: Rutile
line: Yes!

name: Mithra
line: We're off!

name: Arthur
line: Yes. I'll be back!

name: Mithra
line: << Arthim >>

name: Lennox
line: The door in space closed... Sir Oz. I'm certain Prince Arthur will be all right.

name: Oz
line: You are covered in injuries......

name: Faust
line: Figaro, wait!

name: Figaro
line: Hm? Do you need a hug too?

name: Faust
line: I'll kill you. We located the Sage. We're going to break through.

name: Figaro
line: Excellent. I wish I could join you, but there are patients in critical condition awaiting my care. Do you know how to pick a fight?

name: Faust
line: You've taught me more than enough times. Please take care of Shino and Heathcliff for me. They should be in the courtyard.

name: Figaro
line: All right. I'll head their way after I see to Cain. You take care of yourself too - don't get too worked up. Leno, open your mouth.

name: Lennox
line: Ah. .....Nnh.

name: Figaro
line: It's Dr. Figaro's sugar. Take care of Oz and Faust for me, okay?

name: Lennox
line: All right. Please be careful.

name: Narrator
line: The Minotaur drives Riquet and Mitile into a corner as it unleashes a terrifying roar.

name: Mitile & Riquet
line: Aaaaaah......!

name: Shino
line: I'm your opponent! .......hh ...Uugh.......

name: Heathcliff
line: Shino.....!

name: Narrator
line: Shino and Heathcliff stand before the Minotaur, shielding Riquet and Mitile behind their backs. Witnessing this, Riquet slows to a halt.

name: Riquet
line: ....I can't keep running like this! I need to fight too.....!

name: Riquet
line: Let's attack on the count of three, just like Sir Snow and Sir White do!

name: Mitile
line: Got it!

name: Riquet
line: << Sunrotea Edif >> !

name: Mitile
line: << Ortonik Sealsispilce >> !

name: Narrator
line: They cast their spells at once. A small tornado and a bouncing ball of electricity bump against the back of the Minotaur's shoulder. The monster slowly turns around to look at them, its horrific eyes devoid of emotion. It growls with its fangs bared. And swings its axe as it rushes towards the boys.

name: Mitile
line: .....! Here it comes.....!

name: Riquet
line: ....Let's run!! Ah....!

name: Narrator
line: (Crash)

name: Mitile
line: Riquet, are you okay!?

name: Riquet
line: I'm fine! I just tripped...... ....Ow.....!

name: Mitile
line: Your ankle is bright red......

name: Narrator
line: (Crash) (Roar)

name: Riquet
line: Mitile! Mitile, run away......!

name: Mitile
line: I can't leave you behind, Riquet! ....I-it's here......

name: Narrator
line: The shadow of the gigantic Minotaur brandishing its axe looms over Mitile and Riquet's cowering figures. Mitile throws himself over Riquet, covering him. Tears spill from Riquet's wide eyes. Mustering all his courage, Mitile yells.

name: Mitile
line: Mother, please save us......!!

name: Narrator
line: But the one who answers Mitile's cry for help is not his caring mother in heaven. It's the Northern wizard Bradley.

name: Bradley
line: << Adnopotensum >>!

name: Narrator
line: From the far depths of the garden labyrinth, Bradley readies his rifle and fires at the Minotaur. Shot through the head, the Minotaur collapses to the ground with a deafening crash.

name: Mitile
line: Mister Bradley!

name: Riquet
line: Bradley!

name: Narrator
line: Bradley grins at the relief and joy lighting up their faces.

name: Bradley
line: Sorry, my bad! That took me some time! I got blasted away by a sneeze, see. So I kept sneezing my way back. Stroke of luck landed me here in time......

name: Narrator
line: Bradley casually chats away, but then he seems to take notice. Of the boys' wet eyes, their swollen ankles, their elbows scraped red. He narrows his eyes kindly.

name: Bradley
line: Hey, you look like real men right now. You worked hard.

name: Narrator
line: At Bradley's praise, Riquet and Mitile's faces crumple up tearfully.

name: Mitile & Riquet
line: ......W-we did!!

name: Bradley
line: Save the tears for later.

name: Narrator
line: Hearing that, Mitile turns to peer behind him. Despite being shot, the Minotaur slowly lifts its large body off the ground. Mitile turns pale at the monster's seemingly invincible tenacity.

name: Mitile
line: ......Ah.......! But the bullet went through its head......

name: Bradley
line: ...... It went and got back on its feet. Stubborn fucker. Leave the rest to me.

name: Narrator
line: At that moment, two shadows stagger over from the opposite end of the thicket. It's Shino and Heathcliff. They're so drenched in blood that it's a mystery how they're still standing.

name: Shino
line: ......Bradley.

name: Bradley
line: Eastern tiny. You got the most messed up out of the bunch. Stand back.

name: Narrator
line: Shino is silent. But exhaustion and resignation wash across his face. He's the one who fought a battle of life and death against the Minotaur. He must want to finish it off with his own hands. The usual Shino would have objected. But he doesn't even have the strength to do that now. Heathcliff gazes at him, holding back his words.

name: Heathcliff
line: .......... Bradley, wait a second.

name: Bradley
line: What now, young master?

name: Heathcliff
line: Don't finish it off just yet.

name: Bradley
line: That's gonna be tough.

name: Heathcliff
line: Give me one minute... No, thirty seconds.

name: Narrator
line: Heathcliff places himself in front of Shino, who looks ready to crumple to the ground at any moment. Shino breathes, his shoulders heaving as he gazes up to Heathcliff in silence.

name: Heathcliff
line: Shino. I've been thinking about what Mr. Faust told me.

name: Shino
line: ....Faust?

name: Heathcliff
line: He said that you might have trouble unleashing your full power because I've been so half-hearted.....

name: Narrator
line: (Roar)

name: Bradley
line: Five seconds! He's headed our way!

name: Heathcliff
line: Shino. In the name of Heathcliff Blanchett, I command you. Bring me that Minotaur's head.

name: Narrator
line: That's when Shino's eyes begin to shine. A powerful breeze sweeps through the courtyard, making way for a blue night sky to peer through the cracks of gray clouds overhead. Shino grins under the moonlight.

name: Shino
line: .....Your wish is my command!

name: Narrator
line: Heathcliff flashes him an awkward smile. Shino begins to run, as if the pain has evaporated from his body.

name: Shino
line: Move, Bradley! I'll finish it off!

name: Bradley
line: The light's back in your eyes. Even Northern wizards have trouble with that monster, you know? You think you can kill it?

name: Shino
line: I can. ....I will!

name: Bradley
line: Ahahaha! All right then. Make it all yours. I got your back.

name: Shino
line: Don't miss.

name: Bradley
line: Right back at you. I'm taking all the credit if you mess up. << Adnopotensum >> !

name: Narrator
line: (Boom) (Boom)

name: Mitile
line: He got the Minotaur's leg!

name: Riquet
line: It's down on its knees....!

name: Bradley
line: That'll make it easier for you to reach with your scythe, Eastern tiny.

name: Shino
line: Don't call me short, dammit.....!

name: Narrator
line: Shino darts forward, readying his scythe. Heathcliff shouts, his voice pushing him forward.

name: Heathcliff
line: Go! Run, Shino!

name: Mitile
line: You can do it, Mister Shino.....!

name: Riquet
line: You can do it!

name: Shino
line: .....This is the end, you damn bull.....! << MatztzÄh Sudipas >> !

name: Narrator
line: Shino's scythe flashes gallantly above the Minotaur's head.

name: Narrator
line: (Roar)

name: Narrator
line: The bull's thick neck rips away from its body and flies high into the air.

name: Heathcliff
line: .....He finished it off....!

name: Bradley
line: Hahaha! He just blasted its whole head off!

name: Heathcliff
line: Yes! Shino....! You're amazing!

name: Shino
line: .....hh...... Praise me more!

name: Heathcliff
line: You're amazing! You're incredible!!

name: Shino
line: Heh!

name: Rutile
line: << Ortonik Setomaouge >> ! .....There's no end to these briars - they keep attacking. Are the people collapsed on the floor all right....?

name: Figaro
line: Looks like they're just asleep. They should wake up once we free Granvelle Castle from the rose castle's curse.

name: Rutile
line: And if we can't undo the curse....?

name: Figaro
line: They'll become sacrifices for the cursed ghost castle, never to open their eyes again as they wander through the dimensions. But not to fear. So long as we defeat the beasts and find the man behind this ritual.... They should wake up like nothing ever happened. .......!

name: Rutile
line: What's wrong, Dr. Figaro!?

name: Figaro
line: Stand back, Rutile. I sense powerful magic and animus from the other side of this wall.

name: Rutile
line: Could it be another beast!?

name: Figaro
line: No.... This feels vaguely.... Familiar..... Hold up! Hold up, Owen!

name: Owen
line: << Cure Memini >>

name: Figaro
line: << Possideo >> !

name: Narrator
line: (Crash) (Crumble)

name: Figaro
line: That was close. We were about to knock each other out.

name: Rutile
line: Chloe! Mister Rustica!

name: Chloe
line: Rutile! Thank goodness you're all right!

name: Rutile
line: Where's Mister Cain....!?

name: Rustica
line: Right here.

name: Figaro
line: Is he conscious?

name: Chloe
line: He goes in and out. We kept talking to him, just as Rustica instructed, but.....

name: Figaro
line: Thank you - that's very important. Cain. Cain, can you hear me?

name: Owen
line: Hey! He's on the brink of death; don't force him to speak! Haha..... I know what you are. You take pleasure in people's final moments. It must be like poking dying bugs to you. I thought it was strange - you, a doctor? In reality, you're just a horrifying Norther-.....

name: Figaro
line: Owen. Shut your mouth. I'll take your eye and send the rest of you flying. Ah, this is awful. He's been bitten by a giant beast. What magical beast did this to you?

name: Owen
line: Don't look at me.

name: Cain
line: .....It's not Owen's fault. It's my......

name: Owen
line: What....?

name: Owen
line: Of course it's my fault!

name: Figaro
line: Cain. Cain, don't pass out. Everyone, keep saying his name.

name: Chloe
line: Cain!

name: Rutile
line: Pull yourself together, Mister Cain!

name: Rustica
line: Cain. It'll be all right.

name: Figaro
line: Don't worry. I will save you. << Possideo >>

name: Narrator
line: The sea breeze blows even stronger than before. Arthur's jaw falls open as the wind toys with the tips of his hair.

name: Arthur
line: ......! So that's the Leviathan......! It's huge......!

name: Mithra
line: Please don't react the same way Rutile did.

name: Snow in the portrait
line: We will guide you, Arthur. You have to use the sword to draw a sealing circle in the sea.

name: White in the portrait
line: Mithra, until the magic circle is completed, you will act as a decoy and head into the sea.

name: Snow in the portrait
line: Once Arthur confines the Leviathan to the sea with the magic circle, Mithra will take it down.

name: White in the portrait
line: Understand, you two?

name: Arthur
line: Got it!

name: Mithra
line: I'll show you.

name: Snow & White in the portrait
line: Ohoho! Time to put the plan into action!

name: Arthur
line: Mithra, I'm leaving it to you!

name: Mithra
line: What's with your hand? ......You've been giving off Oz's scent.

name: Arthur
line: Sir Oz granted me his magic. Here, let's high five.

name: Mithra
line: Okay.

name: Narrator
line: Exchanging a high five, Arthur and Mithra mount their brooms and fly parallel to the horizon.

name: Mithra
line: << Arthim >>

name: Narrator
line: Provoked by Mithra's attack, the Leviathan - its gigantic frame bigger than a building - chases after him. With all the force and profound impact of a colossal ship racing through the waters. But Mithra skims across the sea, his expression unchanging. The instant the Leviathan throws open its jaw to sink its teeth into him, Mithra dives into the sea. He cuts through the water, the Leviathan still in pursuit. Mithra takes out his magic skull, skillfully evading the Leviathan as it closes the distance between the two of them. He unleashes attack after attack from his skull, all the while strategically preventing the Leviathan from surfacing. From the depths of the sea, Mithra's gaze travels beyond the surface of the water, looking at the magic circle of foam that Arthur is drawing with Caletvwlch while riding on his broom.

name: Snow in the portrait
line: Have you set the red silk thread aflame on the surface of the sea?

name: Arthur
line: Yes!

name: White in the portrait
line: Have you anointed the treasured sword Caletvwlch with a single drop of commanding oil?

name: Arthur
line: Yes!

name: Snow in the portrait
line: Very well. Then let's begin the sealing ceremony!

name: White in the portrait
line: It's time for Mithra to lead the Leviathan into the magic circle that you drew!

name: Arthur
line: All right. << Pernoctant Nixzo >>!

name: Narrator
line: Arthur chants his spell, his grimoire in one hand and Caletvwlch in the other. He slashes the surface of the sea with Caletvwlch. Drawing the magic circle of water, his movements across the sea resemble a dance upon the waves. Once he connects the final line, water erupts from the magic circle drawn on the sea like a suboceanic volcano erupting. The sea spray gushes high into the night sky, forming a circular pillar with Arthur as its core. With lingering traces of boyishness, Arthur's clear blue eyes are alight with the air of a king.

name: Arthur
line: Mithra, over to you!

name: Narrator
line: Bathed in moonlight and sea spray, the twins peer steadily at the water's surface with identical expressions. Snow and White break into delighted smiles at the same moment. Perhaps they spot the unknowing Leviathan in furious pursuit of Mithra as he swims towards the magic circle.

name: Snow & White in the portrait
line: You fell for it!

name: Narrator
line: Mithra breaks through the water surface, and the Leviathan on his heels follows suit.

name: Arthur
line: << Pernoctant Nixzo >>!

name: Narrator
line: The magic circle glows brightly. The glowing circle traps the Leviathan's gigantic body as it breaches the surface, rendering it motionless. Soaring high into the sky, Mithra stands atop his broom as he looks down at the rampaging Leviathan. He languidly tosses his magic skull into the air, pushing back his wet hair.

name: Mithra
line: << Arthim >>

name: Narrator
line: The enlarged skull throws its jaw wide open in a show of intimidation. An icy blast of wind blows from its mouth. The roaring gale relentlessly leaves swaths of white ice in its path - freezing over the surface of the sea, the night air, even the sea spray. Even the Leviathan, which seemed like an immortal demon, freezes over instantaneously. If it hadn't been trapped within the magic circle, it would have escaped to a different body of water.

name: Arthur
line: Amazing......

name: Narrator
line: Arthur exclaims, his breath misting white, brimming with genuine admiration at the overwhelming impact of Mithra's magic. Until dawn breaks, he is the strongest wizard in the world. Mithra blinks languidly - he has a sleepy gaze for the lord of the night.

name: Mithra
line: This is the end.

name: Narrator
line: Mithra snaps his fingers. And the Leviathan shatters into pieces before anyone can even gasp in awe. The fragments rain down on the sea surface like hail. Arthur raises the painting over his head to shield himself.

name: Arthur
line: You did it, Mithra!

name: Snow in the portrait
line: Ouch, ouch, that hurts!

name: White in the portrait
line: Hey, Arthur! Don't go using us as an umbrella!

name: Arthur
line: S-sorry!

name: Narrator
line: Arthur hastily lowers the portrait. Mithra breaks into laughter at the sight. Like an innocent young boy.

name: Mithra
line: Ahaha!

name: Faust
line: This way, Lennox. Let's head to the Sage.

name: Lennox
line: Where in this castle is he?

name: Faust
line: He's trapped within that puppeteer's barrier. I'm going to make a connection to breach that dimension. We might face some resistance, but we'll force our way in.

name: Lennox
line: I understand.

name: Faust
line: As long as we have the Sage, Oz can use his magic. I don't know what might happen, but let's prioritize bringing Oz and the Sage into contact with each other.

name: Oz
line: Understood.

name: Faust
line: << Satillquinart Mulcreed >>

name: Obsius
line: ......My magical beasts...... How did this happen...... My one desire, laid to waste after all these long years!

name: Narrator
line: Obsius discards his silk hat, tearing messily at his hair. His face flashes with despair and rage, twitching with the ghost of a crooked smile. Obsius paces the room, keeping up rapid conversation with himself.

name: Obsius
line: That's why I said! We shouldn't go against Oz and the twins from the North! I just wanted to see Talia again! Anywhere would have sufficed, as long as I could gather the magical beasts and summon the briar castle! This all happened because that person insisted I take action at Granvelle Castle during the five countries' peace conference......!

name: Akira
line: (That person......?)

name: Narrator
line: At that moment, a familiar-looking mirror materializes in the unearthly dimension. It's Faust's magic tool.

name: Narrator
line: Holding his puppet close, Obsius chants his spell. As he does, the mirror distorts limply and shrinks. But the next moment, it returns to its original size. The mirror expands and shrinks in a cycle like a contest of wills, before steadily glowing brighter and brighter. With a dazzling brilliance-...... Oz, Faust and Lennox appear before me.

name: Narrator
line: I attempt to call Faust's name, but to no avail. Obsius sealed my voice away.

name: Faust
line: So he stole your voice with magic. ......You bastard......

name: Narrator
line: Realizing my predicament, Faust glares sharply at Obsius. A far cry from the usual, listless Faust - right now, he has all the sharpness and intensity of a leader. Immediately, Obsius grabs the back of my collar and pulls me close. He wraps his arms around my own and holds me back.

name: Lennox
line: Sir Sage!

name: Obsius
line: Back away! I'll kill your precious Sage!

name: Oz
line: Try it if you can.

name: Narrator
line: Narrowing his gaze, Oz raises his staff. Obsius' entire body stiffens with tension: perhaps he knows of Oz. He chuckles in a show of false bravado.

name: Obsius
line: And why should I fear you? I know you can't use magic until dawn breaks!

name: Faust
line: ......Where did you hear that? Intel regarding wizards' weaknesses is highly confidential.

name: Obsius
line: From the sponsor of my plans. But it has all come to nothing. Even after summoning the three beasts and the fabled castle wandering between dimensions, the curse remains in place....... Even after all this, I cannot see Talia........

name: Narrator
line: Obsius laughs hollowly, black flames igniting in the palm of his right hand. Eerie flames dance and sway before my eyes.

name: Obsius
line: Nothing matters anymore..... This is just the way of the world: cold and unforgiving to outcasts. Perhaps I should just lend myself to this cursed castle as it is swallowed into the distant dimensions, doomed to wander for eternity.....

name: Obsius
line: And I will take every last one of you with me - the Sage, the demon, and the sleeping humans, all of you....! The philosopher Murr's shard, or whatever it is... The Prince, the King... They all mean nothing! Talia, too, and the days I spent with her.... I haven't a single care in the world for them! They were never special; they were never wonderful. It was all a pathetic sham; a waste of time! That was what I wasted my life upon!

name: Narrator
line: Obsius' voice resounds, an indistinguishable cacophony of fury and anguish. Suddenly, a wave of emotion - something like sorrow - washes over me. It does not originate from Obsius, nor from Oz nor Faust. It permeates the space we inhabit...... This terrifying, unearthly castle of briars.

name: Narrator
line: I look up at the sound of boots clicking on the ground. Oz takes a step forward. He walks towards me, one step after another, wordlessly holding his staff aloft. Like a beast rubbed the wrong way, Obsius spits out threats, his voice ragged.

name: Obsius
line: Oz! There's no point brandishing your weapon at me! I know you can't use magic!

name: Oz
line: It is as you say. Until the day breaks, I cannot use magic. However...... I have learned physical attacks.

name: Obsius
line: What?

name: Narrator
line: (Thwack)

name: Narrator
line: Oz bashes Obsius with his staff.

name: Faust & Lennox
line: Huh!?

name: Narrator
line: No one expected the great wizard known as the demon king to strike someone physically. Missing his chance to dodge, Obsius staggers under the blow. I seize the opening to shake off his grip and run towards Oz. I don't know what role the Sage holds in this world. But I do know that-...... When Oz - who can't use magic because of his injury from the < Great Catastrophe > - touches me, he'll regain his magic. He can unleash the strongest power on earth.

name: Oz
line: << Vox Nox >>

name: Narrator
line: The second he chants his spell, my voice breaks free from my throat.

name: Oz
line: I kept you waiting. Sage.

name: Obsius
line: ......You......! << Volo Habero >>!

name: Narrator
line: I hear Obsius' spell reverberate behind me. His puppet spews black flames, ready to attack. But Faust and Lennox throw themselves in front of the flames.

name: Faust
line: You will not lay a finger on him.

name: Lennox
line: << Forsettao Meiuvat >>

name: Faust
line: << Satillquinart Mulcreed >>

name: Narrator
line: Faust and Lennox's magic keeps Obsius' black flames at bay, dissipating the scorching heat of the attack. Oz pulls me towards him with one hand, his staff poised in the other. He fixes a stern gaze on Obsius, only to suddenly turn to look down at me as a thought occurs to him.

name: Oz
line: Have you ever witnessed the death of a wizard?

name: Narrator
line: I can't immediately grasp the meaning behind his question. I answer truthfully.

name: Akira
line: No.

name: Narrator
line: Oz does not reply. He presses my head down firmly, turning my eyes to the ground.

name: Oz
line: << Vox Nox >>

name: Narrator
line: Oz chants his spell, whipping up a gentle breeze that flutters through his long hair. Blue flashes of light streak across the space, followed by the reverberations of tremendous, ear-splitting claps of thunder.

name: Narrator
line: My head still bowed, I hear a sound like shattering glass. The crystal clear notes of splintering cracks. By that point, I can guess what is happening. Wizards turn into stone when they die. Priceless, beautiful crystals that people call mana stones. Oz releases my hand and I raise my head. Obsius is no longer there. In his place, countless mana stones have scattered around us. I close my eyes, suddenly feeling faint.

name: Lennox
line: Sir Sage......!

name: Narrator
line: Perhaps the tension sustaining me snapped. I fall unconscious as Lennox supports my body.

name: Narrator
line: Then, I dream a short dream. It may have been someone's memory rather than a dream. From a long, long time ago......

name: Murr
line: Tell me your story, Talia. I'm all agog to know how you turned out this way.

name: Talia
line: ....You're so rude..... I am not your research subject!

name: Murr
line: Pardon me. I simply cannot temper my curiosity when faced with something spectacular.

name: Talia
line: Spectacular? Me? You must be lying!

name: Murr
line: It's not a lie.

name: Talia
line: ....What are you plotting? Do you pity me? Or are you just going to mock me later in front of all your friends, in hopes of inciting peals of vicious laughter?

name: Murr
line: You are not particularly unique, so I don't think I can use your story to amuse others. My friends are also not the type to laugh viciously.

name: Talia
line: Then what is it!? What is it about me that makes the great Murr, the famous, genius scholar, say that I am spectacular!?

name: Murr
line: The fact that you are a societal outcast: a cursed, violent, ill-bred witch who lashes out at all who approach her with briars.

name: Talia
line: .......So you are making fun of me......! You're so awful......! Waaah.........

name: Murr
line: .....I do confess that your contorted and emotional personality makes me recoil from the sheer pain of dealing with you. Here, a handkerchief.

name: Talia
line: Well I'm equally sick of you! You know, Obsius said that the world is pointless! Because it's a world that belongs to the chosen. Outcasts should just stick with outcasts! A popular scholar like you should go hang out with someone just as popular!

name: Murr
line: But I want to know about you.

name: Talia
line: Stop lying to my face. Even my long-time friend Obsius has no interest in me. He never even asks me a single question. And that's because I'm a boring witch.

name: Murr
line: He simply thinks you'll shrink back - that you'll fear any interest directed at you.

name: Talia
line: ....That's true; I am a little afraid. Because I don't know what he'll ask me, and I don't want to disappoint him with a strange answer.....

name: Murr
line: See? Your hysterical fit a moment ago also stemmed from that fear.

name: Talia
line: .....Murr. If you know that I fear questions, then why do you still ask them of me?

name: Murr
line: Because my own fascination takes priority.

name: Murr
line: You have a kind friend. But he's wrong about two things. This world is beautiful and spectacular. And you are loved.

name: Murr
line: By this world.

name: Talia
line: .............. .....Would you mind acting like a gentleman? Then I might be willing to answer your questions.

name: Murr
line: Of course. That's my specialty.

name: Talia
line: Then..... I'll tell you my story. I'll do my best......

name: Murr
line: I'm looking forward to it.

name: Talia
line: .....But it might be boring. I'm not.... Really special in any way. And nothing amazing has happened in my life.

name: Murr
line: Talia. Tell me your story.

name: Talia
line: ........... Hey, Murr. I..... I want to be an ancient castle of roses standing on the moon. A quiet castle, befitting of roses. Obsius may hate wizards and humans; the only thing he may care about is puppetry.... But he loves the moon, and this castle, and the fragrance of roses. I want to become a castle of roses so he'll come visit me for eternity.

name: Narrator
line: Apparently, the incident was more or less resolved while I was unconscious.

name: Oz
line: << Vox Nox >>

name: Narrator
line: With Oz's magic, Gravelle Castle returned to normal.

name: Drummond
line: Yawn, mmm..... Hah......! The opening ceremony!?

name: Canary
line: ......Yaawn...... Oh my, what am I doing here......?

name: Narrator
line: The castle's inhabitants arise unharmed from their slumber. And the labyrinthine courtyard returns to normal. The children who sustained terrible injuries were also all right.

name: Rutile
line: Mitile......!

name: Mitile
line: Nii-sama! Nii-sama.....!

name: Nero
line: Riquet! Are you okay!?

name: Riquet
line: Yes! I'm all right, but Shino and Heathcliff......

name: Nero
line: Are you guys okay!?

name: Faust
line: Shino, Heathcliff.... I'm sorry we couldn't be with you during this horrific incident. I'm so glad you're safe.

name: Shino
line: Hey, don't feel too bad about it, Faust.

name: Faust
line: Why did you push yourself past your limit.....

name: Shino
line: Heh. Well, my master demanded that I show off to him.

name: Heathcliff
line: Um, well.... Yes. I did.

name: Shino
line: I defeated the Minotaur. How's that? Am I amazing? Tell me, Nero, Faust.

name: Faust
line: You are. Well done.

name: Nero
line: You're the greatest warrior ever.

name: Shino
line: Hehe. Hear that?

name: Heathcliff
line: ........ I want to praise you, but if I do, you're going to push yourself over the edge again.......

name: Figaro
line: Exactly. I'm glad to see you in high spirits, but you need to rest up for a while, Shino. Now who's my next patient?

name: Faust
line: You've been healing people all night. Are you hurt anywhere?

name: Figaro
line: I'm fine because Mithra did a lot of work for us tonight.

name: Faust
line: I see. Thank you for tending to the children's wounds.

name: Figaro
line: You're welcome.

name: Mithra
line: Phew..... I'm so glad Rutile and Mitile are all right.....

name: Mitile
line: Mister Mithra......

name: Rutile
line: Mister Mithra. Thank you for thinking about us.

name: Mithra
line: I was beyond uneasy, you know. My stomach was in pain the entire night......

name: Rutile
line: You were that worried about us!?

name: Mithra
line: ........ I feel like it still hurts......

name: Mitile
line: My stomach hurt all night too..... I didn't know the same thing could happen to you, Mister Mithra. I'll pat your stomach for you.

name: Mithra
line: Sigh......

name: Rutile
line: Mister Mithra, Mitile. I'll brew you some stomach-easing herbal tea, and then we can all rest up together. You worked so hard tonight.

name: Snow
line: Sage. You've finally awakened.

name: White
line: We're glad you're safe, dear Sage.

name: Akira
line: Good morning...... I'm glad that everyone is all right. There's no trace of their injuries or torn clothes...... Did Figaro and Chloe fix them all up? Even though there was such a ruckus, the castle is so calm. It's almost as if nothing happened......

name: Snow
line: We decided not to say anything.

name: Akira
line: Not to say anything.......?

name: White
line: Right, Arthur, Oz?

name: Arthur
line: Yes. Once the spell broke, no one seemed to remember what happened in this castle last night......

name: Akira
line: I see......

name: Arthur
line: I considered telling Drummond and Cock Robin what happened, but they don't seem to have any memories of it at all. Perhaps I have a duty to tell everyone in the castle the truth, but the thought of subjecting them to such a terrifying story...... It would be unwise to needlessly arouse their fear of wizards......

name: Snow
line: Thus we've decided to write it off as a night of mysterious happenings.

name: Akira
line: A night of mysterious happenings, huh. And everyone's okay with that? You all staked your lives and desperately protected the people of this castle, and yet no one will know of your efforts......

name: Arthur
line: That's fine. Right, Sir Oz?

name: Oz
line: Yes.

name: Akira
line: What do you mean?

name: Oz
line: Sage. So long as you remember, that alone is enough. The ones who fought valiantly have all accepted this outcome. You should convey your appreciation to them later.

name: Narrator
line: As he speaks, I feel an indescribable emotion. A strange mixture of happiness, grief, warmth, and loneliness...... If I am the Sage, then the ones known as the Sage's wizards - they are my wizards.

name: Narrator
line: My wizards who battled through this night of mysterious happenings, right till the end.

name: Narrator
line: I am the only one who can shower these unknown heroes of the night with endless applause and celebratory bouquets.

name: Narrator
line: It is my honor, and yet a bit of a shame. Won't somebody say this to them?

name: Narrator
line: Tell me your story.

name: Narrator
line: The story of that mysterious night.

name: Narrator
line: Please ask them in a gentlemanly and courteous manner. On a calm night, with polite words that will not hurt them. Please, don't hurt them. If we could learn about each other, bit by bit, like hearts growing closer ......

name: Akira
line: Shylock, here.....

name: Shylock
line: ....This is a shard of Murr's soul. Was it in Granvelle Castle?

name: Akira
line: I think it was actually within Talia, the castle of roses. He protected me.

name: Shylock
line: I see.... I'm glad to hear he was of use to you.

name: Akira
line: Are you going to feed that shard to Murr?

name: Shylock
line: I plan on it. Why do you ask?

name: Akira
line: I thought you might want to meet this shard in physical form before you do. He was.... He seemed to be a Murr who cared about his friends - at least relatively so.

name: Shylock
line: Oh my. I see there are all sorts of Murrs. Each Murr is a bit different from the others..... Yet they all undeniably Murr. They are fragments of the expressions Murr once wore on his face. Soul shards are certainly entertaining.

name: Akira
line: What would you do if you met a shard that really loved you or really hated you, Shylock?

name: Shylock
line: .....I wonder. I might feel very good, or incredibly displeased. But it would be a bore if they were not complicated. I love you, but I hate you, but I still love you.... You are poison, yet you are honey. I want to direct my gaze at something that will stir up my heart. I like to be thrilled, you see.

name: Cain
line: Phew, they finally let me go outside! The fresh air feels great! Looks like they postponed the five countries' peace conference until tomorrow. I heard the ambassadors from each country couldn't make it in time because of all these disasters - landslides and broken bridges left and right. ....Sounds like too much of a coincidence. Well, in any case, I'm glad the conference is still set to happen. .....Hm? Owen.

name: Owen
line: Sir Knight.

name: Owen
line: It's me. The one who gouged out your eye.

name: Cain
line: What a way to introduce yourself.

name: Owen
line: How else am I supposed to? Though you did call me something weird without my permission.

name: Cain
line: Something weird?

name: Owen
line: I'm not telling you.

name: Cain
line: ....... We're headed out to lunch after this. Wanna join us?

name: Owen
line: What?

name: Cain
line: A meal. We're celebrating Shino and Heath's full recovery. Chloe and Rustica will be there too.

name: Owen
line: I'll never go.

name: Cain
line: Why?

name: Owen
line: Why?

name: Cain
line: ...... I'll invite you again another day.

name: Owen
line: No need.

name: Cain
line: Owen. I won't let you be the one who's left behind.

name: Cain
line: That's what I've decided.

name: Chloe
line: Cain! We're all here!

name: Rustica
line: Are you talking to someone? Why don't you invite them along too?

name: Cain
line: I did! He said he'll pass today!

name: Chloe
line: Ok, I see!

name: Cain
line: ....Alright. Well, see you later.

name: Owen
line: Sir Knight.

name: Cain
line: Hm?

name: Owen
line: I hate you. Don't go talking to me like we're friends. I'll set Cerberus on you again.

name: Cain
line: Then I might catch you praying for me this time, Owen.

name: Owen
line: What?

name: Cain
line: You and Chloe prayed for me together, right? Thank you. See you later.

name: Owen
line: And this is why I hate you, Sir Knight. .............

name: Nero
line: Huh...... You sold it?

name: Shop owner
line: That ring of luck? Yeah. Mister, I told you that you should have just bought it. Well, it's not like I sold it, but the head of the merchant's guild had a customer who asked me for it, so naturally I passed it along.

name: Shop owner
line: But I have other fine items too, so come take a look!

name: Nero
line: Sigh...... I guess I should have bought it back then. There's no point in saying it now, but...... I sure am an indecisive guy...... ............

name: Bradley
line: Hey, Nero!

name: Nero
line: Brad.....

name: Bradley
line: I owe you one for that mess the other day. You know, I was pretty worried how things were gonna go when I sneezed off somewhere!

name: Nero
line: Yeah, that was close.

name: Bradley
line: What's wrong? Where's all your energy?

name: Nero
line: It's with me. I'm doing fine......

name: Bradley
line: Nah, it's totally gone...... Oh, that's right. Remember this thing? The ring of luck! It's one of my favorites - I always wore it on big jobs!

name: Bradley
line: This merchant I saved in the Forest of Dreams some time back said he wanted to gift me a token of appreciation. When I took a look around the stalls, there it was. Don't you think this is fate!? Hey, Nero. Don't you remember it?

name: Nero
line: ............ Who knows, I've forgotten.

name: Riquet
line: I knew I wanted to go on an adventure with you, Mitile.... But I didn't expect it to happen so soon.

name: Mitile
line: Y-yes, I agree. I think I've had enough adventure for a while. ....Was it the kind of adventure you expected?

name: Riquet
line: I can't say.... I think I expected myself to be capable of a lot more. I never imagined myself crying or cowering in fear. I didn't think things wouldn't go the way I imagined. But... I'm glad I got to experience it with you, Mitile.

name: Mitile
line: Ehehe.... Yes. Oh, right, Riquet. Please keep it a secret from my brother that I cried so much. I told him that I only cried a little - because I wanted to show off, just a tiny bit.

name: Riquet
line: A secret.... Is something tasteful shared between close friends! Yes, I think this is wonderful.

name: Mitile
line: R-really?

name: Riquet
line: Yes. So this.... Is a secret between the two of us.

name: Mitile
line: Yes; please keep it a secret between the two of us.

name: Narrator
line: And the day of the postponed peace conference arrives.

name: Narrator
line: (Fireworks and cheering)

name: Child
line: Look! It's the wizards! All of the Sage's wizards are flying in a circle above the castle!

name: Mother
line: My, their white outfits look wonderful......! What a lovely sight, a symbol of peace!

name: Child
line: Who's that with his hands raised on the balcony?

name: Mother
line: That's the Sage who came from a different world.

name: Child
line: The Sage is so small. He's only as big as a normal human.

name: Mother
line: Oh dear. Did you think of him as a giant who lives above the clouds, like the ones in your picture books? He's just as big as a normal human. Wizards, the Sage, even the King - they're all just like us. And those people just like us are protecting the world.

name: Cock Robin
line: Ah...... Everyone looks so lovely......

name: Canary
line: What are you crying for? Thank goodness we got to host the opening ceremony for real this time. We have to start preparing for the luncheon!

name: Drummond
line: You've grown so splendid, Prince Arthur......

name: Narrator
line: (Loud cheering)

name: Akira
line: The wizards are being welcomed warmly. I'm so glad......

name: Narrator
line: (Woosh)

name: Murr
line: Sir Sage!

name: Akira
line: Woah, Murr! What's wrong? Aren't you supposed to be flying in a circle above the castle for the people......

name: Murr
line: You should join us, Sir Sage!

name: Akira
line: I'm fine!

name: Mithra
line: Why not? You don't have to hold back.

name: Akira
line: Not you too, Mithra.......

name: Rutile
line: Let's go! The sky is so lovely and warm today!

name: Akira
line: You make it sound like we're going for a bike ride...... I think this whole thing is technically supposed to be a parade......

name: Shino
line: Hop on my broom, Sage. You should try waving to the guys looking up at us from below. It feels so good.

name: Akira
line: You're really enjoying this.

name: Arthur
line: Sir Sage!

name: Akira
line: Arthur! Even the Prince is sneaking out of the procession!?

name: Arthur
line: I might be the prince of Central Country, but I'm also a wizard!

name: Akira
line: Huh?

name: Arthur
line: I can do bad things, too.

name: Narrator
line: I laugh at the prim expression on Arthur's face and reach out my hand. Amidst the resounding cheer of the crowd, I lean over the balcony railing, and he pulls me up into the sky. I gaze at the top of the castle, growing smaller beneath my feet as we soar higher and higher. A refreshing breeze caresses my cheek. Twenty-one wizards against the brilliant blue sky. And so the story of this splintered yet enchantingly beautiful world, and the Sage's wizards within it, will continue to unfold.

name: Akira
line: There's a strong breeze today....

name: Narrator
line: (Woosh)

name: Akira
line: Woah....! ...Something came flying into my face... What is this, a newspaper clipping?

name: Chloe
line: Ah! Sorry, Sir Sage! Rustica was showing me a newspaper bulletin for a salon that features a portrait of Murr!

name: Akira
line: Of Murr? Ah, you're right.... He looks like a completely different person here - intelligent and cool....

name: Chloe
line: This Murr is so cool, right! He's winking with a composed expression and crossing his legs... He looks super smart.

name: Rustica
line: Pardon us, Sir Sage. This bulletin was published by a social salon in Western Country. Murr was a famous man; he was known as the genius of the era.

name: Akira
line: Right.... Murr was an incredible scholar before he got too close to the secret of the < Great Catastrophe > and his soul shattered to pieces.

name: Murr
line: Did you call~?

name: Chloe
line: Ah, it's the current Murr. What were you doing? Playing with a ball? Chasing a bird?

name: Murr
line: I was playing with Shino! He was blowing bubbles, and my job was to break them!

name: Akira
line: (He really is like a playful cat... I can't believe he was a genius of the era. I mean, the Murr in the clipping does look handsome, but....) (The current Murr and the old Murr. I think I prefer....)

name: Option
line: The current Murr.

name: Akira
line: (The current Murr. I feel like I'm playing with a cat, after all...)

name: Murr
line: Meo~w!

name: Akira
line: Woah....!

name: Chloe
line: What's wrong, Murr. You're cuddling up to Sir Sage!

name: Option
line: The old Murr.

name: Akira
line: (The old Murr. He's the first person I met when I came to this world, after all....)

name: Murr
line: I thought so!

name: Rustica
line: What's this out of nowhere, Murr?

name: Murr
line: Nothi~ng.

name: Akira
line: Murr. May I ask you some questions? I'd like to interview you. I want to leave notes in the Sage's manual, so that even if I have to go back to my world all of a sudden, everyone here will have an easier time getting along with the new sage....

name: Murr
line: Sure! But can I interview you first? What's that newspaper clipping?

name: Akira
line: It's a bulletin featuring the old you, Murr. ...That's right. How do you feel looking at your old self, Murr?

name: Murr
line: He looks cool!

name: Chloe
line: He sure is.

name: Akira
line: Okay, so that's the appropriate response.... I'm glad I wasn't just being shallow.

name: Rustica
line: You seem to like that clipping, so I'll give it to you, Sir Sage.

name: Murr
line: Okay then, Sir Sage. Come to my room for the interview. I'll show you all sorts of things!

name: Akira
line: Thank you. I'll pay a visit, then.

name: Akira
line: So this is your room, Murr...

name: Option
line: Do you sleep in a hammock?

name: Murr
line: Most of the time! I love swaying back and forth! I also like falling asleep on tree branches!

name: Option
line: Do you like rocking chairs?

name: Murr
line: I do! You know when someone tells you to sit still, and you look like you're sitting still, but you're not!

name: Option
line: Are you good at darts?

name: Murr
line: I am! I love playing with cards and roulettes too! Gambling is exciting!

name: Murr
line: What else do you want to look at? A diamond? An iolite? A cat's eye? An opal? A garnet?

name: Akira
line: Woah.... You have so many jewels in your drawer... Murr, you really like sparkling things, don't you?

name: Murr
line: I do~!

name: Akira
line: Um, before we talk about gems, could you tell me about yourself, Murr? Like your full name, or your job....

name: Murr
line: Murr Hart. I guess my job is a brinicle? Being a piece of ice growing downward sounds fun!

name: Murr
line: When the ocean freezes, the dense, cold seawater it produces overflows downward, and it instantaneously creates a hollow pillar of ice!

name: Akira
line: P-please don't pull trivia out of nowhere. That's not your real job, is it, Murr?

name: Murr
line: What's real? Does it bite? Does it have a tail?

name: Murr
line: Isn't that a wolf? Grrr!

name: Murr
line: Isn't that a wolf? Grrr!

name: Akira
line: Woah... Ahaha! Don't nibble at me! Um....

name: Option
line: Tell me about your family.

name: Murr
line: They were rich merchants! They travelled the world! I dug!

name: Akira
line: You dug?

name: Murr
line: Stones! Because we were jewelers!

name: Akira
line: Eh? That means....

name: Murr
line: I'm gonna bite you!

name: Option
line: What's your favorite food?

name: Murr
line: Fish meuniere! I like it when the flavoring is simple, so it suits white wine! As for the wine, I like it when it's heavy and dry!

name: Akira
line: You sound like a connoisseur.

name: Murr
line: I've been told I have a refined palette!

name: Akira
line: I see! I thought you would steal fish in your mouth like a cat.....

name: Murr
line: Mithra's the only guy who would be so unrefined~! Cooking is science! Because it's the product of a chef's knowledge! But I will bite you raw!

name: Option
line: What's your hobby?

name: Murr
line: Gambling! Place a bet with me, Sir Sage!

name: Akira
line: A bet? I'm not confident....

name: Murr
line: Eh~? But I wanna strip you down~! I wanna see your lifeless, pathetic face~!

name: Akira
line: P-please don't say something so terrifying so cheerfully.

name: Murr
line: I like gambling because it's exciting! I also like nibbling!

name: Akira
line: Aaagh! W-wait....!

name: Murr
line: Ahahaha!

name: Akira
line: (At this rate, it looks like I'll have trouble getting a lot of information out of Murr himself....)

name: Shylock
line: And that's why you came to me? I think that was the right choice, Sir Sage.

name: Akira
line: I'm sorry for making you do this... Could you tell me Murr's basic profile?

name: Shylock
line: Murr Hart. His professions are: a jeweler, a philosopher, a professor of mineralogy, an astronomer, a mathematician, an inventor, a renowned scholar....

name: Akira
line: P-please give me a moment. I can't write that fast....

name: Shylock
line: One phrase is enough: "A lunatic genius."

name: Akira
line: Wh-what kind of person was the old Murr? I have a bulletin from a salon with a portrait of the old Murr, but....

name: Shylock
line: My, he looks so composed... Fufu, this brings back memories. This was the expression he made whenever he messed up.

name: Akira
line: Really? He's winking all handsomely, though.

name: Shylock
line: He's looking at you with one eye instead of two... What he's trying to say is "let me get away with it." This article is from an academic meeting - he must've done something to infuriate all the gathered scholars. Murr was always making people furious. He was an insensitive and arrogant bundle of intellectual curiosity-and a heartless person to boot, after all.

name: Shylock
line: He really was a loathsome person. I often insulted him, calling him "loathsome Murr."

name: Akira
line: (Shylock... He's roasting Murr, but he looks like he's having fun....) I can't believe Murr was that kind of person, knowing what he's like now. He loves to pull pranks, but he's kind and adorable, like a cat.

name: Shylock
line: It makes me happy to hear that. I essentially raised the current Murr, after all. When Murr's soul first shattered, he was basically a beast; he couldn't even speak human words. I patiently taught him words and common sense, and finally, he became capable of conversation. Isn't he such a cute, good boy?

name: Akira
line: Yes. His sudden actions often surprise me, but Murr always makes me feel happy.

name: Shylock
line: I'm glad to hear it.

name: Akira
line: I want to know what Murr wants to do, and what he doesn't want to do... Basically, his desires, but how do you think I should go about asking him? Should we ask the current Murr, or should we try to guess what the old Murr would've wanted....

name: Shylock
line: I know of Murr's past, but not of his future. I don't intend to tamper with it either. ....I'll give you something nice. It might be of use to you, Sir Sage.

name: Akira
line: Something nice?

name: Shylock
line: A fragment of Murr's soul that I discovered in Western Country in the distant past.

name: Akira
line: A fragment of Murr's soul that Shylock sealed in a jar using magic.... It's shining like purple sapphire.... If I open the jar, Murr might materialize because of his bizarre injury, and then I could speak to a part of his soul..... ...But I'm kind of scared. The Murr in the newspaper clip was handsome, but it seems like he had lots of personality issues..... .......

name: Narrator
line: I think it over for a long time, and ultimately reach for the lid of the magic jar. I open it slowly using my strength. An arrogant, heartless, insensitive genius. I'm scared, but I want to meet him. The "loathsome Murr" Shylock speaks of.

name: Narrator
line: (Click)

name: Narrator
line: I open the jar. The purple sapphire fragment shines and dyes the moonlit night a blue color. A human shadow appears amidst the strange, beautiful light. An elegant and bold demeanor. I hold my breath, overwhelmed by the sight of his sexy, sharp, intellectual eyes. The materialized soul shard narrows his cat-like eyes, then proceeds to remove his hat and bow like a gentleman.

name: Murr
line: Good evening, Sir Sage. My name is Murr Hart. I was born in Western Country, and I am currently your wizard. Does this suffice as a greeting? Is this the brief introduction Sir Sage desires?

name: Narrator
line: I open my mouth nervously.

name: Akira
line: You knew that I wanted to speak to you....?

name: Murr
line: I was listening to your conversation with Shylock from within the jar, after all. He's a good friend of mine, but don't you think he's a bit too possessive, trapping me inside a jar like that?

name: Narrator
line: Murr laughs and begins to walk away from me. I snap out of my daze and chase after him.

name: Akira
line: Wh-where are you going?

name: Murr
line: I can't go anywhere. Because I am merely a fragment of Murr's soul, tucked away in your hands. You must at least let me moonbathe. Ah... my dearest beauty. I've longed to meet you all this time.

name: Narrator
line: Murr stops and gazes up at the moon. As if performing a vow of love, he puts his lips to his fingertips and reaches for the moon. Bathed in the blue moonlight, he looks more powerful and fortunate than anyone else in this world.

name: Akira
line: Um... May I ask you a question?

name: Murr
line: Go on. But first, let me beg for your forgiveness. Even if I do something to infuriate you, please know that it's not because I loathe you. By the by, do you enjoy the night breeze?

name: Akira
line: The night breeze? I don't dislike it....

name: Murr
line: Excellent.

name: Akira
line: Eh? W-woah....!?

name: Narrator
line: The moment Murr takes my hand, a sudden gust of wind surrounds us, and in the next moment we are floating in the night sky decorated with glittering stars. Murr laughs at how I cling to him immediately; together, we step across the night wind without a broom.

name: Murr
line: Let's make this a walk through the sky. It's perfect for an interview. Light exercise stimulates the brain, after all.

name: Narrator
line: Murr draws my hand as we walk across the moonlit sky.

name: Murr
line: Do give me your questions, Sir Sage.

name: Akira
line: Ah... Um, please wait a moment. I need to open my sage's manual.... P-please don't let go of my hand.

name: Murr
line: No worries; I won't drop you like a plate. What's this? A newspaper clipping about me?

name: Akira
line: Ah... I left it in my pocket.... This is kind of embarrassing....

name: Murr
line: Why do you say so?

name: Akira
line: Because carrying this around makes it seem like I'm your fan.

name: Murr
line: How interesting. You say you're interested in me, but you're embarrassed to admit your affectionate feelings for me? Or perhaps you have no affectionate feelings for me?

name: Akira
line: I do think... I like you. But I thought you might dislike the kind of affection that is purely based in curiosity.

name: Murr
line: But you still want to know?

name: Akira
line: Yes... That's why I'm prepared to be told strange things, and to get hurt.

name: Narrator
line: Murr stops moving. The tips of his mouth curve upwards in amusement.

name: Murr
line: Excellent. I respect that sensibility of yours. That's what it means to be an explorer at heart: your interest and curiosity win over your feelings of fear and anxiety. Your intellect defeats your instinct. Go on; take a look. I am the unknown cave you have discovered. Continue your search: discover whether what lies in this cave is treasure, or a demonic dragon.

name: Narrator
line: Murr laughs, as if testing me. I take a deep breath and open the sage's manual. The wizard before my eyes is the embodiment of many charming and dangerous questions. Let me unravel them one by one.

name: Akira
line: What do you like, Murr?

name: Murr
line: Mysteries. Surprises. Gems. Mana stones. Travels. Stars. < The Great Catastrophe >.

name: Akira
line: What do you dislike?

name: Murr
line: Boredom.

name: Akira
line: What are you bad at?

name: Murr
line: Staying still. Sympathize for the poor me trapped in a jar, Sir Sage.

name: Akira
line: But you can use magic - why can't you just transport yourself elsewhere?

name: Murr
line: I can't move the soul fragment, you see. And I can't travel very far from the fragment itself.

name: Akira
line: Could you show me your magic tool, Murr?

name: Murr
line: It lies within your hands.

name: Akira
line: Huh?

name: Murr
line: Look at my fingertips that are joined with yours. The ring there is my magic tool. Isn't it beautiful?

name: Akira
line: It is... What is this gemstone called?

name: Murr
line: Red beryl. I made it from a rock I cut myself when I was a child traveling the world with my parents.

name: Narrator
line: I take my eyes off the unusual, glittering ring, and notice that Murr is gazing at me. His chilly, brilliant eyes look as if they see right through me.

name: Akira
line: ...What kind of person are you?

name: Murr
line: Now that is a philosophical question. What kind of person do I look like to you? Do I seem rational? Or do I seem emotional?

name: Akira
line: I think you're a rational and intelligent person. But....

name: Murr
line: But?

name: Akira
line: I also kind of think a rational person wouldn't fall in love with the moon....

name: Murr
line: Good point. To fall in love so passionately that you lose your soul - that's terribly emotional behavior.

name: Akira
line: So which are you?

name: Murr
line: I wonder. I can fall in love through reason; I can yearn for exploration through emotion. Of course, the opposite could happen too. But I simply cannot stop myself. The mysteries of the world, the light of the moon - they make my heart race. I am feverishly driven by the passion of curiosity and affection.

name: Narrator
line: I feel the same way about him. The more I talk to Murr, the more I'm driven by my curiosity and affection towards him.

name: Option
line: How do you feel about yourself?

name: Murr
line: I feel the same way you do. I too want to know about myself. Everything in this world exists to satisfy the pursuit of self-knowledge. My intellect, my curiosity, my passion; they all exist to define where my soul truly belongs. You, too, should feel, listen, taste, and touch the world; toy with it, as you search for your true self. Because there is nothing more important in your world than the sensibilities of your soul.

name: Option
line: How do you feel about me?

name: Murr
line: That's a cute question.

name: Akira
line: ...S-sorry. I got curious....

name: Murr
line: Huh.

name: Narrator
line: S-sorry. Pretend you didn't hear that.....

name: Murr
line: Oh, no need to apologize. I was enjoying the silence. See, whenever I fall silent after a delicate question, everyone just apologizes. I like to enjoy that moment.

name: Akira
line: (H-he has a terrible personality....)

name: Murr
line: Judging from your reaction, I think you fall into the "like" category. It's up to you to search me out and discover how I feel about you.

name: Murr
line: Now, Sir Sage. You also wish to know Murr, right? May I ask for your cooperation?

name: Akira
line: My cooperation?

name: Murr
line: I would like to go to the City of Glory in Central Country. I have business with the seabirds there who love shiny objects. In order to get closer to Murr's identity, could you put me in a jar and take me to the City of Glory?

name: Narrator
line: The next day, I bring Murr's soul fragment to the City of Glory. The City of Glory is a canal town. It also happens to be where Cain is from. Many ships float down the canals, passing under the bridges. I stand atop a bridge in the City of Glory, just as Murr tells me to.

name: Akira
line: Is this spot all right?

name: Murr
line: It should be fine. Now place Shylock's magic jar atop the bridge handrail.

name: Akira
line: The magic jar?

name: Murr
line: Yes. Hurry; the sun will set soon.

name: Narrator
line: I don't understand why the sunset is relevant. I place the jar on the handrail as I'm told. An approaching ship blows its whistle. Murr narrows his cat-like eyes and gazes at me with an exceptionally kind smile.

name: Murr
line: I'd like you to do me a favor. Please write the following in the sage's manual.

name: Akira
line: The sage's manual? Give me a moment. I'll pull out a notepad...

name: Murr
line: Murr respects the sage, who is an intelligent explorer. For fascination and curiosity are the key to the evolution of life, the world, and the universe. For fearlessly approaching the subject of investigation - for approaching me - as his heart willed him to... I do not hesitate to shower him in praise or extend a hand of fellowship. That is why Murr truly felt guilty. The sage was infuriated, but he eventually forgave him. For we are both friends who understand the nature of investigation.

name: Akira
line: ...I was infuriated but I forgave you? What do you mean?

name: Murr
line: Duck down.

name: Akira
line: Huh?

name: Narrator
line: In that moment, a screeching seabird flies over my head.

name: Akira
line: Woah...!

name: Narrator
line: I duck down immediately. The seabird grabs the jar reflecting the light of the sunset, and casts it into the canal.

name: Akira
line: Ah...! Oh no....!

name: Narrator
line: The color drains from my face as I look into the canal.

name: Akira
line: (I can't believe I dropped the soul fragment I borrowed from Shylock into the canal....)

name: Narrator
line: But the jar had not sunk into the canal. It lays on the deck of a ship passing under the bridge - the timing seems just perfect. And next to it stands Murr, who was standing by my side just moments ago. He's winking with a composed expression. That's right - this is the expression that says, "let me get away with it."

name: Akira
line: Murr...!?

name: Murr
line: I gave you plenty of hints, you know? I hate boredom, and I am bad at staying still. Naturally I couldn't stand being stuck in a jar on a shelf in the magic headquarters. Our nightwalk was terribly fun, Sir Sage. Say hi to Shylock for me. And let us meet again.

name: Narrator
line: I finally realize what has happened. Murr tricked me so smoothly into letting him depart on his distant travels. Driven by Murr's lies, I took the magic jar out of the magic headquarters, and placed him atop a ship headed to who-knows-where.

name: Akira
line: Y-you tricked me!?

name: Murr
line: Alternatively, you could see it like this: I helped you build your adventurous spirit. This goodbye exists so that we can enjoy our next meeting.

name: Narrator
line: The ship continues to accelerate, maybe due to Murr's magic.

name: Narrator
line: I am lost for words, but somewhere in my heart, I feel myself enjoying the moment. He fooled me, and I'm frustrated, but I'm also having fun. I feel a bizarre excitement racing up my body because of his power. I think I understand why Shylock insulted him in this way - "Loathsome Murr." What a charming, terrible person.

name: Akira
line: Geez...! I won't forgive you when I catch you again!

name: Murr
line: My dearest Sage - did I not beg for your forgiveness at the very beginning?

name: Narrator
line: Murr pulls his hat down and bows like a gentleman. And then - Murr's soul fragment disappears.

name: Shylock
line: ...I see. So Murr's fragment disappeared.

name: Murr
line: Disappeared? Like this?

name: Narrator
line: (Woosh)

name: Murr
line: Hello! Am I here? Not here? Here?

name: Shylock
line: Murr, please behave.

name: Narrator
line: (Woosh)

name: Murr
line: Ye~s! I'll do as you say!

name: Akira
line: I'm sorry... I lost it even though you let me borrow it, Shylock.

name: Shylock
line: It's all right. I expected this to happen. Plus....

name: Narrator
line: Shylock places several magic jars on the countertop and smiles. Purple sapphire shards glimmer within each jar.

name: Shylock
line: I still have plenty of soul fragments that I have yet to feed Murr.

name: Murr
line: You're a tough one, Shylock!

name: Akira
line: We've arrived at the Western tower. Today I'd like the Western wizards to head to the Observatory of the Undeveloped Lands.

name: Chloe
line: An observatory! There's a huge telescope you can use to view the stars, right?

name: Rustica
line: That's what I hear. I've never been either. If I peer through the telescope and find my bride, how will I go to space?

name: Shylock
line: Murr often spent all his time at the Observatory of the Undeveloped Lands - before his soul shattered, that is. Murr, do you remember the Observatory?

name: Murr
line: Umm, it makes me sneeze!

name: Rustica
line: I see.

name: Chloe
line: No, I don't think you do. He probably doesn't remember.

name: Akira
line: But why did Murr spend all his time at the Observatory..... ....Ah!

name: Option
line: Because he loves the < Great Catastrophe >?

name: Murr
line: I love it~! I wonder if we can meet tonight~?

name: Option
line: Because he's an astronomer?

name: Murr
line: Astronomer? Me when I was an astronomer? Is that something you haven't eaten yet?

name: Option
line: Because the telescope is shiny?

name: Murr
line: I love shiny things! But the only shiny part of the telescope is the lens. The moon that you see through the telescope shines more brightly than anything else in the universe, though!

name: Shylock
line: Well, I guess we should head off.

name: Akira
line: Yes! I'm counting on you all.

name: Murr
line: Oh, that's right, Sir Sage. Apparently you get inspired when you gaze at the stars from the Observatory.

name: Akira
line: Inspired?

name: Murr
line: That's right! Like, ping! Inspiration! You're gazing into the abyss of the universe, after all. It's only natural that you might discover a new side of yourself. You should try it out too, Sir Sage. After we solve this case, of course!

name: Akira
line: Inspiration - I see. I'll try it out when I feel like discovering a new side of myself.

name: Akira
line: So this is the Observatory....

name: Chloe
line: There really isn't much around here. I bet you can see the stars really clearly from a place this empty.

name: Rustica
line: It's way off from the city lights too. The stars look like they're about to fall out of the sky - you don't even need to look through a telescope.

name: Akira
line: It really is beautiful....

name: Murr
line: Telescope, telescope!

name: Shylock
line: Oh? Do you remember now, Murr?

name: Murr
line: This is where you can get a clear look at the < Great Catastrophe >!

name: Chloe
line: Ah! Someone left the observatory!

name: Astronomer
line: Oh, Sir Sage.... Ugh...! My hip....!

name: Rustica
line: Are you all right, good sir?

name: Astronomer
line: Ouchh.... I spend all my time gazing through a telescope, so I've ruined my hip....

name: Akira
line: Please don't push yourself. Are you the astronomer who requested our help?

name: Astronomer
line: Indeed..... There have been a series of bizarre incidents ever since the < Great Catastrophe > got so close..... I was hoping the great astronomer, Sir Murr - who I heard had been chosen as a Sage's wizard - would come along.....

name: Murr
line: You have business with me?

name: Astronomer
line: Oh! So you are Sir Murr...! You look exactly the same as the portrait....!

name: Murr
line: What does he look like? Like this? Grrr!

name: Chloe
line: As expected of the great genius Murr! You're so famous!

name: Astronomer
line: Please, come this way.... I'll explain what I'd like you to do.

name: Chloe
line: Woah....! So this is what the observatory looks like from the inside!

name: Murr
line: Let's look at the moon! It looks really close when you gaze at it through the telescope!

name: Rustica
line: All these papers on the floor are covered in numbers. Why do you need numbers to gaze at the stars?

name: Chloe
line: Rustica, you look at a page of tadpoles swimming along lines when you play the harpsichord.

name: Rustica
line: Oh, I see. How profound.

name: Akira
line: Ah... This portrait.... What a refined, intellectual elderly lady.....

name: Shylock
line: That would be Patia. She was the first head astronomer of this observatory. Though she passed away several hundreds of years ago.

name: Astronomer
line: Exactly.... Patia was one of very few female astronomers at the time, and I am her descendant.

name: Akira
line: I see.

name: Astronomer
line: Indeed. This observatory was established by Patia and Sir Murr. Patia went through a lot of trouble, you see.... Society was not kind to female scholars at the time, but Sir Murr came to her defense.

name: Chloe
line: That's so cool of you, Murr!

name: Rustica
line: A true gentleman.

name: Astronomer
line: I hear that the two of them were wonderful friends.

name: Shylock
line: Friends......

name: Akira
line: What's wrong, Shylock?

name: Shylock
line: Oh, it's nothing. Could you tell us about the job?

name: Astronomer
line: Well, it's about the astronomical telescope over there.....

name: Murr
line: Huh!? I can't see!?

name: Akira
line: Murr. You were already looking through the telescope?

name: Chloe
line: You mean you can't see the stars? Huh, let me take a look....

name: Narrator
line: Woah....! The stars are so beautiful! So you can see the stars, Murr!

name: Murr
line: I can't see the < Great Catastrophe >! It's the only thing that's missing!

name: Chloe
line: Eh!? ....Ah, you're right....! This astronomical telescope - you can see everything except the < Great Catastrophe >!

name: Akira
line: Wh-why!?

name: Chloe
line: Did you figure out why the telescope isn't working? I checked outside, but you can see the < Great Catastrophe > in the sky.

name: Shylock
line: I see. Murr is pouring all his attention into it right now.

name: Akira
line: Any luck, Murr? How's it going?

name: Akira
line: What's that book? What does it say?

name: Akira
line: You should take a break. Let me pour you some tea. Come on, Murr......

name: Shylock
line: He can't hear you. When he gets focused like this, he completely shuts out his surroundings.

name: Akira
line: I-I see.

name: Shylock
line: Let's leave the telescope to Murr and take a walk outside.

name: Chloe
line: I wonder why we can't see the < Great Catastrophe >?

name: Shylock
line: I know why.

name: Rustica
line: I think I've figured it out as well. I noticed a certain feeling in the air, directed at Murr and the astronomical telescope. It wasn't malicious, but.....

name: Akira
line: What do you mean?

name: Shylock
line: Do you recall the elderly lady in the portrait? She is probably the cause.... The first head astronomer, Patia. The feelings she left behind must have materialized due to the influence of the < Great Catastrophe >, causing these strange incidents to occur.

name: Chloe
line: The feelings that Patia left behind.... Oh, right, Shylock. Weren't you trying to say something back there?

name: Shylock
line: Well, it's all in the past, so I suppose I can tell you all.... Patia was probably in love with Murr.

name: Akira
line: In love!?

name: Chloe
line: Oh no! Now I'm all excited!

name: Rustica
line: And? And? Can you give us the details?

name: Shylock
line: You all love gossip, don't you. It's true that the two of them were friends, but.... One day, Patia asked Murr this: "Are you in love with anybody?"

name: Chloe
line: Ohhh! So she asked! And? What did Murr say in response?

name: Shylock
line: I hear he answered yes. Patia fell silent for a while, and then went on....

name: Patia
line: I see. So you are in love with somebody.....

name: Murr
line: Indeed.

name: Patia
line: Murr. If that person rejects you, or leaves you, will you....

name: Murr
line: They will neither reject me nor leave me. For I am in love with the moon.

name: Patia
line: The moon? You mean the < Great Catastrophe >?

name: Murr
line: Yes. I created this observatory in order to gaze at the moon.

name: Patia
line: I understand that you're a wizard, Murr, but being in love with the moon is....

name: Murr
line: I may be an astronomer, but I am also a philosopher. Do you really want to debate the concept of love with a philosopher, Patia? All right, then. Here's a question for you. Is it not love if it's not mutual?

name: Patia
line: ...I think it's still love.

name: Murr
line: Is it not love if it's not accompanied by sexual reproduction?

name: Patia
line: ...I think it's still love.

name: Murr
line: See? I've just proven that you can fall in love with the moon. I've been yearning for that beautiful moon for all these years. I want to gaze at it, always - even if I can never touch it; even if it will never be mine.

name: Patia
line: I see.....

name: Murr
line: And? What were you trying to say?

name: Patia
line: ....It's nothing. I forget what we were talking about. Murr, you should really stop cutting people off when they're talking. That's a bad habit of yours.

name: Akira
line: Miss Patia....

name: Shylock
line: Murr was delighted that he had convinced an astronomer that one could be in love with the moon, but he never caught on to her true feelings.

name: Chloe
line: Oh no.... That's heartbreaking.....

name: Rustica
line: So for Madam Patia, this was a hopeless love.....

name: Shylock
line: Well, falling in love with such an unhinged man would only utterly destroy you, so I think this was all for the best.

name: Chloe
line: I wonder if Murr will realize...? I want Murr to solve this problem - for Miss Patia's sake as well.

name: Rustica
line: He might not remember anything. He looked like he was furiously calculating something earlier.....

name: Shylock
line: Let's leave him alone for a while. I think that lunatic ought to learn his lesson: that there are some problems that can't be solved with mathematical equations.

name: Akira
line: Murr, how is it going? Do you think you can solve the mystery behind the broken telescope? Everyone else has fallen asleep.

name: Akira
line: Um, you might be overthinking it? Maybe you're missing something really obvious.

name: Murr
line: I know the answer. The equation is the difficult part.

name: Akira
line: The equation....?

name: Murr
line: The path to the answer! Because Patia also understands. You're no longer here. You became a star and now lie beyond my reach - just like the moon.

name: Akira
line: Ah.... The telescope lit up....!

name: Murr
line: We're both asking for the moon here.

name: Patia
line: ....It's nothing. I forget what we were talking about. Murr, you should really stop cutting people off when they're talking. That's a bad habit of yours.

name: Murr
line: And humans die too soon. That's a bad habit of theirs. You will have a happy marriage, and give birth to a child. And eventually, you will die. I'm not the moon, so I'll reject you and leave this place behind. Though I will drop by to gaze at the moon every once in a while. Would you like to have your heart properly broken so you can move on without regrets? Shall I hear out your words of confession?

name: Patia
line: You're a brilliant man and a great friend, but you truly have the worst personality.......

name: Murr
line: You're a strange one too - falling in love with me when the richest man in town wants to marry you. I guess that's just what scholars are like?

name: Patia
line: Murr. If you could no longer see the moon, would you gaze at me instead?

name: Murr
line: If you haven't turned into a star by then, I'll consider it.

name: Akira
line: The light that was surrounding the telescope is growing dimmer......

name: Murr
line: Ah.... I can see it..... I can see the < Great Catastrophe >! Sir Sage, look!

name: Akira
line: You're right....! That's wonderful, Murr!

name: Murr
line: I can finally see it again! ....Ah, it's so beautiful..... My beloved < Great Catastrophe >.

name: Akira
line: Murr.....

name: Murr
line: Thank you, Patia. It's because of you that I got to see such a beautiful moon. You must be up in the sky as well. You're very beautiful! Cheers for the moon and the stars! << Eanul Rambul >> !

name: Rustica
line: Yawn.... Good morning. Looks like the problem was solved by the time we woke up.

name: Shylock
line: And we don't know how he reached the answer..... Well, that does sound just like Murr.

name: Akira
line: I agree. And now we can see the moon from the telescope.

name: Chloe
line: The observatory was fun! I'm glad you got to see the < Great Catastrophe > from the astronomical telescope.

name: Murr
line: Yeah! Both the moon and the stars were beautiful! I love shiny things!

name: Narrator
line: The moon, also known as the < Great Catastrophe >, which attacks this world once a year. Because the troublesome moon approached this world too closely, bizarre incidents have cropped up all across the continent. Ancient beasts have been revived, and souls have begun to inhabit inanimate objects.... At the magic headquarters where we reside, we're swamped on the daily with missions to subdue these mysterious events.

name: Cock Robin
line: Sir Sage! Hello! I've brought this month's mission paperwork and summary reports!

name: Akira
line: Hello, Mister Cock Robin. W... Wait, are these all reports!?

name: Cock Robin
line: This is all the paperwork from the Central Country capital. I'll bring the reports from peripheral provinces and other countries later on!

name: Murr
line: Lots of letters! Does it make you happy to get lots of letters? Or does it make you sad?

name: Akira
line: U-under these circumstances, I'd say I'm sad....?

name: Murr
line: Ok, time to burn them! << Eanul Ra-.... >>

name: Cock Robin
line: Hey, no!! Stop that! These are important documents....!

name: Akira
line: But we can't possibly keep up with this flood of paperwork.... I wish we had a more effective way to subdue these incidents all over the world.....

name: Snow
line: We have discovered a method to quieten these bizarre occurrences stemming from the influence of the < Great Catastrophe >!

name: White
line: While this method might not eliminate such incidents altogether, it should palliate their number significantly.

name: Akira
line: That's amazing!

name: Figaro
line: So that was why you gathered all of us teachers here - me, Oz, Shylock, and Faust.

name: Snow
line: Indeed! I thought we should inform you all first.

name: Faust
line: So what is this method you speak of?

name: Snow
line: All twenty-one of us wizards shall carry out the holy festivals.

name: White
line: We will revive the ancient temples to summon the original spirits, so the lands may regain their true powers.

name: Oz
line: ....Revive the ancient temples?

name: Shylock
line: Do you really mean that? Is that even possible in this day and age? The ancient temples no longer exist. If we revive them, won't they create a threat to the humans living on the land today?

name: Faust
line: And humans will be infuriated if you steal their land. Perhaps Central Country will cooperate - the magic headquarters is housed here, after all. But I can't imagine the humans of other countries cooperating with us wizards.

name: Oz
line: What is it?

name: Akira
line: What exactly is the purpose of the holy festival, and what does it entail?

name: Oz
line: .......... It is difficult to explain to humans using words.

name: Figaro
line: That's your answer to everything. It's a miracle you managed to raise a child.

name: Shylock
line: Sir Sage, allow me to provide a simple explanation. Our world is currently in a state of confusion and disarray because the < Great Catastrophe > came too close - imagine how oil reacts when mixed with water.
